links_reviews_text: Literally goes with anything. Loved the star detail and wording on the back made it not just like every other denim jacket. Very comfortable soft denim.

What place is more appropriate to wear a jean jacket that says "Girls Girls Girls" on the back than a bachelorette party in Nashville! Loved the weight, design and fit of this jacket. Ended up wearing it a week longer when I got home!

links_reviews_title: Twist on a classic jean jacket!
links_reviews_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this jean jacket. It's classy and fun and is very comfortable. I got so many compliments wearing this around town and love the embroidered stars and "Girls Girls Girls" on the back. Would buy this piece if it weren't so expensive! So fun and cute.
Girls, girls, girls. This jacket is EVERYTHING! I normally wear an XS or S and the XS was perfect. A little roomy still but perfectly comfortable. I loved it. So sad to return it!
This is the second time i have rented this jacket. Its everything i ever wanted in a denim jacket and if it wasn't so expensive I would buy it.
Great casual layer. Super cute but subtle details. Definitely fits a little loose and boxy but flattering.
Ordered up to a large for an oversized fit which is exactly how it was. Jacket was so cute and comfortable for everyday wear. Perfect spring weather jacket

links_reviews_title: Fun twist on a denim jacket
links_reviews_text: This was a great jacket for a casual Saturday at a beer garden! Loved the stars on it for a twist on the regular denim jacket. I don't think it needed the "girls girls girls" on the back, but was still cute! Fit slightly oversized but TTS.
This was so cute! Normally a small and a rented the small it was perfect! I wore it twice in the same week! It's very soft and light weight so it was easy to wear under a winter coat!

Cute jacket once you 'juj' it a bit. Roll up the sleeves, tighten the waist. It's just a fun piece to throw on, and the stars and cute saying on the back made it unique. Only 4 stars bc I thought the fit was a little off.

links_reviews_title: Great everyday jacket with a flair
links_reviews_text: I love this jacket. Definitely going to rent again. It's slightly oversized which I love, and it is super comfy.
Fit exactly as expected all around. Got a lot of compliments- except on the 'girls. Girls. Girls' on the back. It was a fun jacket to wear for a weekend!

I wore this bad boy a ton in the three + weeks I held on to it for. I normally wear a L in jackets - especially denim- but the M was nice and roomy & fit perfectly. It added a little extra flair to everything I wore! Will def be renting again!
Great fit, quality and detail!

links_reviews_title: MY FAV THING I HAVE EVER RENTED
links_reviews_text: This jacket is literally perfect. Size up for a more relaxed and looser fit. The stars are soooo cute and the girls on the back is amazing. So cute, well made, a million compliments. Might shell out the big bucks and buy this jacket for real.

One of my favorite jean jackets! It's comfy and stylish for everyday wear. I've worn it to school, work, and for a simple walk in the park! I wore a size Medium, but I think I would've felt a bit more comfortable with a large- for the simple fact that I like my jackets a bit loose on me. It's not a stretchy material. Received compliments everywhere I went! :)

This was the perfect jacket for my summer trip to upstate NY. It added a pop to my outfits and kept the chill off in the mornings and evenings. I rented a Medium and it was true to size. I have larger arms and they fit with no issue despite the jacket not having any stretch.

It fit better then I expected, sleeves was a little bit long for me, but jeans can be folded & it's look stylish. It wasn't boxy as some, but I could not button it, was tight at the chest, looks good un buttoned. Jeans material was semi soft

This jacket so fun (and spot on) for girls weekend. It was big on me but I probably should have ordered the M so I'm going to assume it's true to size. But I liked the oversized, comfy feel of it. Would def rent again!

LOVE this jean jacket! I rented it for Memorial Day weekend and didn't want to take it off! True to size, probably could have done the Medium if I wanted it a little more form fitting. Overall, great jacket. Would rent again!
Really cute but didn't end up wearing as it was a bit more cropped than I was expecting

links_reviews_title: Loved so much I bought it!!
links_reviews_text: Incredible quality jacket and sooo cute. Got so many compliments. Ended up buying it lol!
loved it!
Just perfect if you're looking for a good, everyday denim jacket.

This jacket is SO cute and goes with absolutely anything. It is the perfect cropped style, without being too short. The stars are subtle, and the words on the back give it a nice flair. I don't want to return it!
Rented this for a girls trip, and it was a hit! Perfect addition to all outfits. Fits TTS, and I would not have wanted it any bigger or smaller!
I loved this jean jacket. It's runs a LITTLE big but is still amazing. Detailing is awesome
I wore this for a bachelorette weekend and all the other girls LOVED it! They loved the clever text on the back and the stars are just enough to add something special to your typical denim jacket.
Fit wasn't as good as other jackets I've gotten from RTR. The stars and words on the back give it flair but not enough to rent again.

links_reviews_title: This jacket was great. Different enough to stand out, but classic enough to wear multiple times.
links_reviews_text: Was a little bigger than I expected the small to be, and I ended up loving that fit. Hits at a good spot on the waist, so you could wear with jeans or a sundress.

links_reviews_title: Cute jacket but embroidered girls, girls, girls on the back
links_reviews_text: not a fan of the embroidery on the back
Good option for a casual Jean jacket. Stars weren't too bold that took away from outfits.
Such a great staple piece for every day, casual looks. I may just have to buy it!
Jacket was nice but not fitted enough for me so run a tiny bit big for me. Cute tho!
Did not wear

links_reviews_title: Makes your butt look great! Very cozy!
links_reviews_text: Tight fitting bottom. I wore an XS bottom and small top. Looked cute and felt amazing.
These pants were very comfortable and no camel toe. Good for casual days and traveling

links_reviews_title: Cute sparkly sweatpants. Fitted. Run small.
links_reviews_text: The tie on my pair was too frayed to tie or wear.
Cute sweatsuit. I am an 8/10 and should have rented a medium. The grey fabric has silver strands running through it. Very cute with the matching cropped hoodie.
Fun dress with stylish and different sleeve details. A little snug around chest so wouldn't recommend for busty women. Also a bit too short to be a work dress, but perfect for a party.
I liked this dress. It was a comfortable fit. It arrived wrinkled. So I did have to iron it. It didn't seem that all the wrinkles came out. I received several compliments throughout the day.

links_reviews_title: You can wear to party beach work anywhere. Very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Great color, burnt orange. Make sure to sz up for big busted ladies I wear a 4 & only in Breast area could have used an 8. Or sz 40. Fabulous. Arms are not too tight. Just need to adjust them to fit u.
Sleeve detail wins the show. Great fit. Wore for a conference, transitioned from day meetings to nighttime event flawlessly.
Great color!!!! Easy summer outfit for work. Runs a bit small on top. I am a 34A/B and I found the cut up top a bit narrow. Still a great dress.

links_reviews_title: Tight arm holes and baggy fit
links_reviews_text: I knew this style would be a stretch on my figure and it definitely was. The arm holes are very tight, even when tied loosely and not flattering on athletic arms. The dress torso is cut loosely and would disguise a full tummy nicely, but was not very flattering with my small chest.
This dress was different and fun. Comfortable and colorful.

First off, it was a tiny but snug in the bust but not enough to make it hard to wear or uncomfortable. The color is more of an orange than a red but I loved it. The fit is flowy but not not tent-like. I got so many compliments, it's a beauty!

I’m a full C cup and the chest area was too tight. It gathered on front and back. Looked ok for video conference meeting and was flattering fit on bottom. I’d recommend for smaller bust women. If you go up in size, it will be too baggy at bottom.
The detail in the sleeves is what made this dress fun. It was comfortable and fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: This is a great, fun. flirty dress for work or weekend!
links_reviews_text: The deep orange color was brilliant and I got lots of compliments. It was a little tight in the chest and flowy everywhere else. You could always add a belt to give it more shape. The ties on the arms are cute and give the dress interesting detail. I got lots of compliments on this one!
I loved this dress. It was perfect with a pair of boots as the weather was getting cooler. I also loved how fun the sleeves were. Not too much design and very fun.
Wore this dress on vacation in Newport and loved it. Fun color and comfortable fit.

links_reviews_title: Lovely color and fabric but didn't like the sleeves
links_reviews_text: I liked this dress for a warm fall day; the material is heavy enough so it doesn't wrinkle, and the color is really nice, almost a peachy orange. But the sleeves were hard to tie and I didn't like how they looked or how the strings felt. I also think they needed to make the back zipper longer as it doesn't stretch so was hard to pull off. I only wore it once because of those points.

Lovely fall color- I would call it burnt orange. Small around the chest and shoulders. Busty ladies can consider sizing up- but the a-line cut will make the skirt larger. Easily wrinkled so if you are up and down all day you may not want this one.
Was unable to wear this as it was WAY too tight across my chest. Would only recommend for very flat chested ladies

links_reviews_title: overall fit was fine but left no room for boobs. very cute otherwise. couldn't wear
links_reviews_text: too small in the chest
So comfortable! Wore it because I had a LOONNNNGGGG day of meetings and I wanted a comfy dress that would look good after sitting. So many compliments on how fun the shoulders were!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color for early fall when it's still warm!
links_reviews_text: Loved the color, style, and sleeves but almost tight in the chest and I'm a 34B. Plenty of room in other areas and longer length for tall folks.
I got this as a nice work appropriate casual Friday dress for summer. It looked soo cute but did not fit whatsoever. I couldn't even get it past my shoulders or chest.

Absolutely runs small in the chest. I am a 34A so when I read the reviews I thought I would be okay...I was mistaken. The dress was great everywhere except under the airports and across the chest. It's a shift so just size up.
VERY tight on the arms and tight on the chest. Im a 34 D, but just not flattering on a athletic build.

links_reviews_title: Cute shift dress but I sized up like 3 sizes
links_reviews_text: Based on other reviewers and I have a larger chest, I sized up three sizes. It fit nicely-cute shift dress. Tie sleeve detail is fun but overall nothing so special. Burnt orange color nice transition into fall.

links_reviews_title: Super cute but right ip top
links_reviews_text: Loved it! Runs super tight in the chest, armpits and arms. I wore it anyways, but it was uncomfortable. I will rent again in a larger size
This dress was very flattering on my small bust. The color was bright and perfect for summer.

For reference, I typically range from a size 2-4, and am typically more of a 2 in dresses. I have my rent the runway set to a size 4 though, just because it's nicer when things are a little too large rather than a little too small. The dress was very cute but SO tight in the chest. I don't have tiny boobs, but they aren't huge either. If you size up, you run the risk of it looking very boxy. I would be forewarned that it's not for bustier women.
A little snug in a bust area. I will most definitely rent this one again, but a size bigger.
The rest of the fit was OK but my chest was totally smashed. There is no stretch to the material. I am only a B cup so I'm not sure how others could wear this.

links_reviews_title: it was work....nothing too unforgettable about a day at the office but I did get lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Fit great, very comfy, nice length, lovely dress paired with black strappy sandals and black jewelry.
Problem with sleeves and bows

links_reviews_title: Sleeves are so insanely puffy, I felt like an 18th century aristocrat
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were so ridiculously puffy that I could never have worn this out.

links_reviews_title: Huge dress, very long, fell at or below the knee and I'm 5'7
links_reviews_text: Huge dress, very long, fell at or below the knee and I'm 5'7

links_reviews_title: love this drsss, the color is really beautiful and the material is crepe and flows really nice
links_reviews_text: tight on the chest, otherwise great
I couldn't wear this, though, because it was way too tight in the chest. I'm 36C. The rest of the dress fit really well, just couldn't squeeze in.
Great dress! Wrinkles easily, but it works. It was a little tight on the chest but not enough that it didn't fit.
This dress fits small in the shoulders and bust.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear, the color did not look right for me.
links_reviews_text: I rented this bc people rated it as small in the top and loose in the hips, which is exactly what I need! The fit was ok, if I would wear with spandex, but the color was just not right for me.

A seriously perfect dress! I wore it to work, Easter, and to an event. It's the perfect workhorse dress that barely wrinkles and is super flattering. I will be renting this one again and will hope that the price will come down a bit to purchase.
Tight thru chest

links_reviews_title: cute dress, great color, but for small busts
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress, but alas, the bust was very tight as to be uncomfortable. Because the bust area was so tight, I couldn't really put my arms around myself. So, good if you have a small bust.

Comfortable and warm. I thought it was bulkier in the photo, but it's actually pretty lightweight but still warm. The neck is kind of tight and itched a bit (the rest of the sweater was soft and not itchy). And the bottom rode up sometimes so I had to keep pulling it down. I got compliments and loved it, but seriously how does a sweater retail for $890??
looked better in picture
The color of the sweater is very pretty. The fit was spot on and true to size. The only negative was the turtleneck became itchy towards the end of the day.
Great for work and weekend!
Fitted around the waist so flattering.
Cute, nice material

I enjoyed wearing this shirt as it was an easy but cute look when paired with jeans and flats. The fabric was nothing special but the buttons added some "spark". It definitely needed a cami underneath for the deep v and high-waist jeans due to the shorter length. I usually wear a medium in tops but definitely needed the large here, and if my chest were any bigger it wouldn't have worked. Overall, liked but didn't love.
The center buttons leave the middle of your body showing so you need to wear a tank underneath or feel ok with that. I had to wear a tank since I got it for work.
This top was cute, it did run small and was very low cut so i paired it with an ivory cami.

I rented the top to wear to work but it is too low cut for the office. It would be good with a lace tank underneath if I had one. I kept having to adjust it so my bra and cleavage wouldn't show. The buttons make it extra complicated to put on too. Otherwise it was cute and might be nice for a date.

Very low cut I wore with soma lacy tank bra. White with pale pink and blue flowers and black polka dots. TONS of difficult buttons. Don't go clothes shopping wearing this. Stretchable string to wrap around each of buttons. Flares out at bottom slightly lots of compliments. Was great to wear but not sure I would rent again. Too many buttons
Many Compliments. And gorgeous fabric and print. Nicely lined. Those that are large busted, will have an issue with the buttons.
i enjoyed this blouse but the elastic on the arms was way too tight. I needed a larger size

links_reviews_title: Runs very small, very low cut
links_reviews_text: Buttons pull, too tight, fits very poorly

links_reviews_title: Liked print and fabric was soft
links_reviews_text: Closures are elastic loops so if you're busty, size up. Also a bit low cut.
Very tight around arms (elasticized arm bands) and very form fitting. Looks much better on someone with less "curviness."
not cute, i did not wear it
This shirt was so tight around my waist and my ribs that it would've been inappropriate for me to wear
Could not wear it. Too small. It looked like it would have looked cute so size up if you're interested in this..
good fit
Great sleeves, breathable, button detail but wrinkles easily.

links_reviews_title: Super cute but very small on top
links_reviews_text: This shirt is super cute but it is very small in the chest. I am usually a small or medium and I wish I got a medium. I ended up wearing it with a tank underneath and the top button opens and I think it was okay, but I would have loved to wear it as it should be. I might rent again but in a medium.
Did not fit at all like model photo. I would have had to size up like 3-4 sizes and I still don't think it would have covered my chest. Huge disappointment.
I couldn't even button it :-(

I wore this blouse with jeans and shoes to work for casual Friday. I got so many compliments and the blouse alone gave a put together look all on its own. The cleavage area was a little low so I wore a white cami underneath, but not complaints. I chose this blouse on a whim
Great little top. I work a camisole underneath. Cute and hides an area I am working on!

The waist was perfect, but I normally wear a medium shirt size and the buttons on this L looked like they were going to bust open at any moment. There is a strip of material behind the buttons, but they were pulling past that. Made for someone with a smaller chest, which I don't often have an issue without. Might be better to size up

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit, beautiful fabric and fun button detail
links_reviews_text: Love this one!!

I love the flirty floral breezy fabrics of Yumi Kim. Runs true to Yumi Kim sizing in which XL is size 8-10. Silk would be better but i don't mind the quality of the fabric too much. Love it with a blue midi pencil skirt! Might purchase.
I liked the zipper on these jeans but that's about it. They fit true to size but idk I felt like they weren't flattering

I rented these jeans for a weekend in NYC. They were the cutest and I got so many compliments! I wore them shopping with this sweater (Derek Lam that you can also rent) and to a wine festival with girlfriends. Normally a 27, tiny waist but a lot of booty curve, they fit me well but did stretch as other reviews said. If you don't have a big booty, size down! Either way, rent them! You won't regret it.
Was a little snug at first, but loosened throughout the day. I'm happy I sized up, as they have no stretch.

I loved these jeans so much. I have a big bum so I ordered a size up; however, they were super large. After wearing them all day, they stretched out and I had to tighten my belt a few times every hour. A size down would've been perfect. I still wore it and loved it! The zipper detail is awesome! Definitely would rent again!
High waisted and high waters (I am 5'9). Fitted in the hips and butt (I am pear shaped) and a fun change from my normal jeans
I wore these a few times and loved the zipper detail and relaxed fit. They do seem to run a bit big. I'm normally a 4/6 and the size 4 was a couple of inches loose in the waist.
These pants are just way too big.. I got a size 0 but still... size isn't very accurate. Didn't get to wear them at all
loved these, they were so easy to just throw on instead a basic denim. Great length for me too, which is always a win!
Rent these jeans, you will not regret it!
These are comfy and fun to wear for a day. Definitely soooo big. Would size down to 0 next time. Zipper gets cold!
They run super large but the zipper on the side is cool and I cuffed them with pumps it looked good but couldn't wear flat shoes

links_reviews_title: Cool jeans but not for an hourglass type! (My opinion)
links_reviews_text: Very cool design of the jeans. But it was hard to move in them, plus, they made me look and feel bigger (I am usually wearing size 6 or 8, the jeans were 10, and they are not flattering as you can see) - that's the main problem of most of the jeans if you have a butt ;-) and, the material is not comfy. It was a little painful to bend down and tie the laces. I wore them for 3 hours and had to return the same day unfortunately
great statement piece!

These are definitely the coolest jeans I've ever worn -- and some of the best-fitting. I've got a curvy lower half & finding jeans that fit my thighs, hips, and waist can be difficult, but these felt like they were made for me. I wore them three days in a row and didn't want to give them back!

Very cute jeans with a mom fit but lots of edgy details – an interesting mix. I actually did not care for the zipper – it’s only on one side which I didn’t realize but it is COLD if the weather is chilly. Otherwise the fit and material was great. I’m usually a 2 or 4 in pants (my hips!) and I wanted these to be relaxed and they were great. Actually kind of roomy throughout which is nice for non-stretch jeans, although they did sag just a little after wearing all day. They still looked great even when they were saggier but the crotch seam then fit at a place between my thighs that rubbed a little when I walked. I might try the 2 if I rented again but I suspect they might be too tight or less comfortable.

These were so unflattering on my apple shape belly, legs were roomy but my stomach looked like I was 12 month pregnant. Would not recommend for Apple shape or anyone who's got that true belly fat that then gets slim around the waste real quick.

To say I'm obsessed with these jeans is an understatement. These jeans are amazing - I've rented them multiple times. Only thing stopping me from purchasing is the price! Personally, they ran pretty large for me. I'm usually a 0/2 / 25 waist, and these pants would fall off without a belt.
Great fit and I loved the zipper detail.

A big part of why I'm experimenting with RLR this month is to try new things and take some risks! These jeans were totally outside any denim I've worn before. They're a beautiful light wash and the side zipper runs the full length of the pants. I adore these jeans! They're comfortable and stylish and a ton of fun!
I love when a pair of jeans are as cool as a nice pair of pants and these hit the mark.

links_reviews_title: Great length for petites, fits large at the waist
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'3" and this hit right below my ankles, so was happy with the length fit. It fit large at the waist, but was very high up on me because of my height, so didn't end up needing a belt/my top covered it. The side zipper is a cool accent - just beware that the zipper is a full length metal one, and can be pretty cold against your skin if you're wearing outside in the fall/winter :)

I am late to the mom Jean party but trying out new styles now. I loved these jeans. One size down made for a perfect comfortable chic fit. I love how they are easy and look interesting and stylish at the same time. I wore with a blousy tucked in top rather than the bodysuit on the model and they worked for me. Size 2 for 5'2 about 120 ish lbs.
Super cool and trendy twist on mom jeans. Looked amazing on my butt and we're super comfortable. Stretched a bit, but not too much. I wore them over and over again. I want to buy them!

links_reviews_title: Would fit great if I was taller!
links_reviews_text: Didn't fit well on me as I'm curvy. The size 2 was a little loose in the waist, tight on the butt and baggy in the legs. I'm also short (5'3") so with the cropped pant it didn't elongate. For someone taller and with more of a streamlined figure, they'd look great!

links_reviews_title: Best jeans I've ever worn in my life
links_reviews_text: So sad I had to return these and will probably rent again or buy. Need these in my life! They were the first pair of jeans that actually had some slouch. I LOVED them! Perfect also with a sweater & heels.

links_reviews_title: These are just super cool. Rock star yet comfy!
links_reviews_text: The zipper on the side is a really cool look. They are mom jeans with a great edge. Watch out for the zipper getting hot or cold!
I've rented both the 8 and the 6 (I'm a true 8). The 8 was oversized chic. The 6 is fitted and sexy. I would probably size down because it was still quite comfortable.
Great fit. Fun jeans. Fit true to size.

I really liked these jeans, wore them several times and will likely rent again. They were out of my usual size, so I ordered one size up and preferred them that way - more of a slight tomboy fit than fitted mom style. They fit mostly like the model but fell a little lower on my waist/hips. Zipper detail, mixed washes and pleated waistband gave these an edge for everyday that I loved.
The fit was too baggy/mom-jeans for me, and I'm fairly pear shaped. I loved the design of these pants though!

This fit well on the hips, but was a little tighter than I wanted in the thigh area. I am short and am a bit curvy in the butt and leg region, so I think ultimately this type of cut is not flattering on me.
Super comfortable and really fun jeans - something different.

The fit is next level, the zipper adds some tolerable discomfort for cool points, you can wear these with everyting if u r not married to a skinny silhouette in which case maybe reassess why u r even love/hating on this jean and get on w it. Hard to send back.
usually size 2 or 26, 27 in jeans. zipper feels very cold against leg..

links_reviews_title: Loved the zipper and fit nicely.
links_reviews_text: I liked the wash a lot!

links_reviews_title: Tight around butt, big on hips. I'm bottom heavy
links_reviews_text: Cute boyfriend style. Would presser again. They do stretch so I would Order a size down
I wore this so many times. Loved it and wish I could've bought it.
Cool mom jeans with extra detailing. loved

links_reviews_title: I love these pants thy literally go with every outfit
links_reviews_text: i love a baggier fit so i went up a size because that's how i like to wear them

I am usually a 4 and ordered the 4 and these were massive. I had a couple inches of space in the waist band. I could probably go down to even a 0 with these. Very cute and a touch edgy but beware of sizing!
Fit was perfect, sleeves were perfect, Knit was perfect ! I couldn't ask for more!

links_reviews_title: This top was perfect to dress up my casual work attire. So stylish without being over the top!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. Comfortable and stylish

links_reviews_title: Super cute if you get right size
links_reviews_text: I loved this top so much. I asked for a 4 but received a size 8. It should of been way more fitted which is what I wanted but surprisingly they 8 was manageable. It wasn't the look I wanted, but it worked fine. I gave 4 stars because I know if I had received the right size it would of been PERFECT.

Not sure why I ordered this top in a 14. It was too big for me, as you can see in the photo. I'm between a large and medium in tops, but more towards a medium. It was comfortable and I still liked the sleeves. Would recommend but it may be shorter for someone who has a chest to fill out the top.

links_reviews_title: Very unique top, lots of compliments.

links_reviews_text: It's a great material and beautiful color. It is extremely hard to wash your hands or do a lot of moment. I wore this for an everyday look but I think it's more suitable for an event.

The sleeves don't get in the way nearby as much as you might think. This was really really appealing to me color-wise. Spunky but not overbearing. I would have purchased this if it weren't for how expensive it is.
The sweater runs small. I did get lots of stares with it. I wore it with skinny jeans and black booties.

links_reviews_title: Super cute but glad I rented!
links_reviews_text: I wore this shirt to my company Christmas party. It was just okay. The fit in the shoulders was big.
This top was a crowd pleaser at work. It's funky but professional and the sleeves are so fun. It's a little small for a normal 14, but otherwise, it was a good choice to wear to work.
I wore this for a ladies poker night. Just watch the sleeves when you deal. Got lots of compliments on it!

links_reviews_title: If size typically 0/XS, would not recommend. Cute sweater though
links_reviews_text: Beautiful sweater, great material. However, it was not tight/form fitting if you are a size 0. The sweater bunched up and did not lay straight when tucked into high waisted jeans.

Fun sweater shirt and does a good job of keeping it warm. Sometimes it's teal and sometimes it's brown depends on your position. The long sleeves are fun but can get annoying because they slip out when wearing a coat, and can get in it way while washing your hands. Overall I loved it, it's a hefty piece and great for winter.

I thought the sleeves might get on my nerves but the slit makes it almost unnoticeable. Beautiful color, texture and stitching! Loved the fit with a black boot cut slack! Hangs more like a thin sweater than a stretchy fabric which I loved as well. Stitching tones also accentuate your waist!
Get a size smaller, if not two sizes smaller - it was extremely large on the arms
Runs large . Cute idea but the sleeve exaggeration is too exaggerated . Too much extra material . Never wore it out. Size down
If you are fun and want to be fun rent these. Loved them so much I bought them. Size up!

This was the best choice for a day on an island - I swapped out my tshirt and overalls for my swimwear, and when I was done swimming and dried up a little, I just snapped the overalls back over my bikini. Made it easy to "get dressed" and keep exploring soon after swimming. I'm a true size 0-2, (pant size 4) and this wasn't too small for me. I liked it being really short, but just long enough to cover my butt fully.
Great for the southern fall transition. It is so hot here still but I loved the color of these cute overalls for fall! I felt like they were true to siE and very versatile!
Wasn't a good fit on me. I have long legs and a short torso. Returned.

links_reviews_title: Cute, casual, but didn't fit right
links_reviews_text: Didn't fit me right, was super cute, loved the color and cut, but looked a little awkward in the crotch.
Cute

links_reviews_title: Super comfy but not that flattering
links_reviews_text: I loved hanging out in these just lounging but I thought they made me look kinda frumpy
I wore this to a Fourth of July boat party and it was perfect! Showed off my bathing suit underneath perfectly and was incredibly comfortable.

These super comfy overalls were great for the beach and for dinner out after. The color is unique, but can definitely work for summer. They fit true to size. The only downside is there's 8 buttons to deal with every time you want to take them on / off.

links_reviews_title: An Easy Stress-free Outfit, but Not My Favorite Ever
links_reviews_text: This was a very comfortable light weight pair of overalls and I probably would order them again, but I wasn't overwhelmed with love. I ordered my normal size and the next size up and I ended up wearing my normal size. Underneath it though I couldn't wear anything thicker than any-shirt or it would have made the waist too tight which was fine for the event I was going to. Overall, I thought the fit was somewhat flattering, the color was cute and fun though without being overpowering, and it was a comfortable day time outfit that can be worn for a long period of time.
No issues with fit, it is true to size. Higher waisted when the side buttons are closed, I left them open.

I loved the idea of these and have been wanting to try some overalls, but... these aren't them. The material is thinner than expected, and the snaps at the side are designed oddly, pulling over a section of fabric to fasten them. The large fit me but the pleats made them incredibly unflattering... Didn't wear them. If you decide to try them, order up!

links_reviews_title: First time trying the overall tend!
links_reviews_text: These were so cute and fun to wear! I wore them for a casual day event. The were pretty short and you have to unbutton the sides to get them on and off but for a rental they were perfect! Definitely recommend!
Dang these are so short. I love the color but Oh these are small. The bib of the top part is short and I feel like I am wearing doll clothes plus my butt is sticking out the back.
Was hoping these overalls would be comfy and cute for work at home but they run very small so I returned them.

links_reviews_title: i wore this with a white tube top underneath
links_reviews_text: really cute & comfortable
Heavy durable material. Made really well. But not long enough for someone taller than 5'7"ish.

This is definitely an updated version of overalls. High waisted and super short in the back. I was expecting good old 90's baggy overalls and this was not it. Not really appropriate for the mom crowd (ha!)
Baggy in the tummy, looked bloomers on the bottom. No thanks.

maybe i am just not used to tailored designer overalls but these ran too small for me. they were tight in the midsection with the side buttons done which led to some unattractive puffing of the fabric in the legs. also very short inseam.
Unfortunately I wasn't able to wear these, I have a long torso and they were to short in the body and road up my butt too much. Disappointed as i really liked them.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear because way too tight
links_reviews_text: Size up, definitely runs small!
It unfortunately didn't fit!

links_reviews_title: Can all my clothes be this cute?!
links_reviews_text: Love this dress! I typically fall between a 4 and 6 in dresses and was worried this one wouldn't fit - with my smaller chest, the 4 was fine. If I were any bigger around my natural waist or bust, this dress would not have zipped. The only thing I would change is the low cut, although I wore a camisole and buttoned the top button and it worked fine. Lots of compliments!
Great fit and fun to wear. Kate spade clothing doesn't disappoint.

links_reviews_title: Really pretty -- borderline work-appropriate if you have a bigger chest
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, but I didn't feel comfortable in it at work -- the chest was a tiny bit lower cut than I typically wear and I ended up wearing a jacket zipped over it. I'd say it was "borderline" work-appropriate.
Great when friends compliment you, even better when strangers do! Hard to zip the side zipper.
It's a cute print and nice fit but it is low in the bust and I always felt like my bra was showing.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for my baby shower
links_reviews_text: I am 7 months pregnant and wore the size six. It look more loose fitting in the photos but is quite fitted around the upper torso and chest. If you have a larger chest I would definitely recommend a size up. Also the v-neck is a deep V so can show a lot of cleavage- I kept the top button clasped which reduced a bit of the cleavage. Overall beautiful dress and super comfy!!
Requires camisole for work

links_reviews_title: Far more cuteness factor than the photos show
links_reviews_text: This dress looks so unshapely in the photos, but it's quite flattering when it's on you. The dress has a slight waist detail to pull it in a bit, and the keyhole adds interest in the front. It is quite low, but the dress would be matronly without the pop. The sleeves are just enough of a puff to still remain professional. The sweetest surprise is the adorable "lips" print.
Fits well, true to size, flattering fit.

I wore this to a bridal brunch and it was a hit. The lips pattern is pretty subtle and most people will think they are hearts. When I initially rented this dress, I based my sizing off the model picture thinking the dress was a shift and a little shapeless, but not true! It has a nice defined waist although the sleeves are puffy. The neckline is actually a keyhole that is better buttoned than open like on the model because it tends to flap open and show too much cleavage when left open. Might be a different result for smaller chested girls (I'm a 32D) but regardless it was cute and I got a lot of compliments on it!

This dress was very fun and flattering. It was only a bit snug in the ribcage area, but it did not keep me from sitting or functioning at work. I loved the sleeves and the structure of the dress! The length was just above the knee and perfect with tights for work. The quality is so good and I am excited to rent more Kate Spade dresses for work; I love the professional vibe that still allows you to show some personality, too!

links_reviews_title: Adorable pattern great for date night, but whoa, NSFW.
links_reviews_text: This did not fit AT ALL on me like the model. It was actually quite fitted and flattering. The pattern is so cute, and was perfect for a Valentine's Day date night. However, the v-neck is pretty deep, and I found this was cut fairly small on top. As a result, there was a LOT on view, and I absolutely could not wear this to work without a cami underneath. Even then, the girls were squeezed a bit, so probably a little more cleavage than I'd normally allow at the office. Overall, adorable, but for limited purposes.

Cute fit and flare cut that is super flattering. Loved the little kiss details on it and the lovely buttons. Didn't wrinkle at all and the fabric was so flowy and nice. The only con was it was a bit low cut so I wore a cami under it for my niece's bridal shower.

links_reviews_title: Did not get to wear it as it ran small
links_reviews_text: It ran small in the bust and rib area

This dress was not a showstopper but that's because I was not in love with the voluminous sleeves. The deep V could also be an issue, but was easily solved with a cami under the dress. All-in-all, a fine dress. Nice material and well made dress.

links_reviews_title: Great dress with the top button closed!
links_reviews_text: Very fun dress with lips. It does show cleavage but was very professional when I closed the top button. I received many compliments!
Got lots of compliments. Very flattering fit. Cute pattern and dress hangs nicely.

This dress was super cute and very flattering. It is definitely slimmer fitting in the chest and arms, but still very comfortable & chic. My only complaint that is for someone petite, the arms are kind of long - they were sort of ballooning on me. But other than that - amazing quality and I love the kiss pattern - got lots of compliments!
If you're truly an hourglass shape, you can definitely size down one. I'm typically an 8, but would have liked the 6 better, I think. The waist was a little looser than I would have liked.

I wore this to work and it was super cute! I received tons of compliments. The top is pretty low, so I wore a tank underneath it which was pretty annoying but it was still cute. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Cute but a little low cut
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this dress, so cute and comfortable but needed to clip it to be able to wear it to work.
Heavier fabric, stay away in the heat of summer. Flattering and different silhouette. Print was subtle and cute. Thought it was a little snugger in the waist to be a size 12, but still fit.
Wrong fit for me

links_reviews_title: I wanted a cute dress to wear to work that wasn't just plain.
links_reviews_text: Dress fit nicely, although it felt a tad big in the torso. Also agree with other reviewers- you'll need a safety pin or cami to wear under this if you try to wear it to work.
I didn't end up wearing this. The neckline is rather low, the waist is narrow, the sleeves are large. Just didn't suit me.

links_reviews_title: Great, unexpected shapes on the sleeves and top. Fun print!
links_reviews_text: Fits very differently than shown on model! This fits true to size, and I should have ordered a 6, but was confused by the difference in the look on the model (drapey/looser) and in customer photos (fitted), so I ordered up. It's a great work length, and with the top button buttoned it's not too flirty for work. I think it's longer than on the model, and I'm pretty tall.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing to work, but it would be cute for a date night.
links_reviews_text: Was too low cut for work
Genuinely obsessed with this fit, how flattering and simple it is, and the adorable lips pattern. I wore it for a casual Friday at work and got tons of compliments.
Dress was just okay, it was comfortable and fit very well
Wanted to wear this for work, but the chest was a little to snug and pushed the gals together a bit too much for the office setting. I would have worn for something else.

links_reviews_title: Nice print but too small for me
links_reviews_text: Got a 4 - good quality fabric, cute print, decent length and perfect shoulder fit but too tight around the bust...

I rented this for work and was the first RTR look that I wore to work. I got soooo many compliments which is unusual for me at work. The keyhole is fairly revealing but not so much so that it was inappropriate- just had to be aware of it.

links_reviews_title: Heavy material - not for summer. Low cut.
links_reviews_text: I was surprised that the material of this dress was somewhat heavy. Since I ordered it in the summer time, I couldn't wear it because it was much too warm. I was planning on wearing to work but the cut is a bit too low.
I thought the fit was nice; however, this was too low cut for my liking. I tried fashion tape but it didn't last because of how the dress hangs. Too low cut for work IMHO. Cute print though!!
I loved this dress! It fit perfectly and was comfortable. I received a ton of compliments in this dress.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress for work! It's classic, flattering style, with a fun print!
links_reviews_text: Great fit, flows over hips perfectly!
This was a great no meeting day dress. It was perfect for when I didn't have any meetings on the calendar but still needed to dress to impress in case some popped by the office to see me
Tight in the rig cage and in the bust. Im a 34 DD and I should have went up one size

links_reviews_title: Too small on top, couldn't wear it
links_reviews_text: The dress looked cute in person but unfortunately I couldn't wear it. I couldn't get the side zipper up to fit on my chest. I'm now in my third trimester and though the bump seemed to fit fine, the chest was WAY to tight. Literally thought I was going to need to cut myself out of it at one point. Thankfully I wasn't home alone and had help to get the zipper down.
I was hitting all home-runs with Kate Spade dresses until this one. Couldn't get it over my chest. Runs super small.
This were good to were to work out in, but I found them to be a bit tight in the stomach and uncomfortable to lounge in.
Beautiful necklace with fantastic detail without being gaudy. Lovely length and perfect for dressing up tops or dresses!

These are typical everyday pants except for the color and fabric which feel great. These pants were correct in the waist but baggy elsewhere. I don't think the smaller size would have been flattering. This isn't the greatest fit for my body type.

links_reviews_title: Some sky blue to the gloom of winter
links_reviews_text: I wear a 2 or 0 but the 4 was kind of a nice roomy feel and the material is so structured and nice a slightly bigger size wasn't noticeable. I paired with the matching blazer and it almost felt like wearing sweatpants with the stretchy material but is such a durable, structured fit at the same time you get a comfy yet professional suit all in one. It's a must. And the blue is to die for.
I loved these pants!! They were super comfortable while looking professional. I loved that the color was fun without being too crazy.

Rented blazer to match. Perfect length for petites. Unlined which kills me for expensive brands. Has some stretch to it but didn't heavily wrinkle while wearing. Lovely blue color makes this a standout.
One of the most comfortable pair of pants I've worn. Easy to dress up or down, the material is nice and textured. Very tempting to buy
I loved these pants. The material is thick, comfortable, and stretches. Would definitely recommend!

These pants are amazing! I love them. I don't think they run big at all, I'm sort of between sizes right now so I'm not an 8 but the 6 was a bit tight. Nothing I couldn't deal with though. They were amazing and received many compliments at work. Would def rent again!
Go get that blazer, too. Turn heads and be comfortable. Work conference, check!

Good pants. Good stretch. They do have a slight pattern. I'm not familiar with Theory so I can't really speak to the size but the size RtR recommended fit very well. I did have a small usury in that my tucked in shirt showed thru the pants
I can be a 2 or 4 in pants sometimes. So this one was a shame I couldn't wear it. It was super long a too big for me. I loved the fabric and color though

Loved this! First off, Theory just generally makes well made quality items. Fabric was lined but still light weight enough for summer. Theory normally runs particularly small, so even though I'm a 6/8, I always do an 10 with Theory. The pants looked great but were a little big, and probably should have done the 8. I needed to wear a belt. Wore with the matching blazer, and a white shirt, brown belt & tan wedges.

links_reviews_title: Fit like they were tailored for me
links_reviews_text: They were the perfect fit. The color was bold but not aggressive - I got compliments literally all day. Also, SUPER comfortable/stretchy!

I wore this pants with the matching blazer to a work event. I was nervous ordering the size 0 pants but they fit like a glove. I wore them all damn and they were very comfortable. A great suit for any occasion.
These pants were great. Loved the color. There was a bit of stretch to it I feel like - I am not sure though. But it was great!

links_reviews_title: Super comfy but professional pants - good for short people!
links_reviews_text: Most pants are too long for me (5'3) but these were a perfect length! The material looks professional but is very stretchy and comfortable. Nice color. Great pants, would buy if they weren't still so expensive!

links_reviews_title: Very cute - I ordered one size down
links_reviews_text: Love the pants. Would definitely purchase if they weren't so expensive! The fabric is nice and they're very comfortable. I'm 5'3 and the length was perfect on me. They might be too short for a taller person though. I'm usually a size 8/size 29 in jeans and the size 6 in these pants fit me perfectly.

links_reviews_title: I rented these pants originally to wear to work, but ended up wearing them to church.
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size. I don’t typically wear cropped pants, so I have them a try. The color of these is sooo pretty. The pants were comfortable, but slightly sheer so you have to really wear the right under garments.
The texture of the pants gives them some interest while the stretch makes them flattering and comfortable.
Disappointed in fit will order size 8 next. Great quality fabric
I loved the color of these pants. These are loose throughout the entire leg, and I was looking for a little more form fitting style.
Run large, consider sizing down
The color is exactly as pictured and the fit is very nice. However, the hem on both legs had been let out , so they looked frayed at the bottom and needed up hitting at the wrong spot.
Love the pop of color. Wish I could purchase these. They are super comfortable!
I got so many compliments on these pants with the matching blazer. The texture is unique and the color a distinctive light blue. Classy suit.
Nice slacks, run true to size. Have an unusual texture. Wrinkled but shake out, would rent again.
Extremely cute - I wore once with a navy turtleneck and once with a purple blouse. Ran large - I should have sized down, as they stretched out a bit on the second wear.

links_reviews_title: Okay work pant, sags with wear
links_reviews_text: Rented this for work. The color is a nice change from all the neutrals in my closet without being so bold that it's only good for summer. I wore these a couple of times and didn't love the fit, especially the second wear - they definitely got saggier with wear! I have a Theory suit in the same size that fits better and doesn't sag so was surprised.
Normally I justttt squeeze into a Theory 0 but these were swimming on me. Was really surprised, had to return without wearing. The fabric is thick, soft, and stretchy - not crisp/cottony.
These are great pants for work. A pretty color. A comfy fit. I will rent these again.
Great Color. Great material. Perfect in height. A little wide legged
These pants are really beautiful but run large! The material is comfortable and they are well made. I would just recommend sizing down.
Fit was loose but tailored feeling. Professional and comfortable. I will rent these pants again!

Fun color, comfy fit. Looser than other theory pants I have; probably could have worn the 8. Arrived pretty wrinkled but the wrinkles fell out when I hung it. Not an absolute favorite piece, but will be nice for work for a day.

links_reviews_title: The texture isn't as what I thought....
links_reviews_text: The texture of the fabric isn't as what it appears in the picture...a little disappointing
Theory makes some of the best work pants in the world. I love the cut and the stretch of them. Always classic.
Fits like all other Theory pants... I'm normally a size 4 in other designers, always a size 6 in Theory. Great color, not heavy, came with tags.
Great fit and easy to wear.
I really liked the material of these pants - soft, a little stretchy. I usually size up with Theory but I would size down for these pants if I rented again. They hit right above my ankles.
Large statement earrings. Not heavy and really go with a lot of things.
Everyone complement me on them, very beautiful
What a combination! Elegant statement earrings that also make people smile
Not to heavy
Fun gold earring to wear instead of the usual hoops!

I didn't look at the picture of the model wearing these before I ordered. They are much larger than I expected and therefore a bit off brand for me. Didn't end up wearing them. They do seem like good quality though.

...at least that's where I imagine wearing these earrings. In reality I wore them to an event and out for dinner and drinks, and they were just a ton of fun. Surprisingly light too for such a large pair of earrings. Will definitely rent again.
These are rockin' statement earrings! They're big and bold - be prepared to stand out and get lots of compliments! Great for a party, or any day, really.

Great romper to throw on day or night! I wore it to a HH and then to Sunday funday. It's a comfortable fabric and thick enough where you don't need to wear a bra. I would rent it again next spring/summer!
Loved this romper! Great for a casual, but cute look. Definitely could have worn a medium, but I always size up to be safe. Would 100% rent again!
I wore this romper for my bachelorette party in Nashville! Loved it! I have a long torso and the length fit well. The straps are adjustable so that definitely helped. Would highly recommend!
I loved everything about this! I wore it twice. Such an amazing fit and super comfortable. Considered buying it!

links_reviews_title: I think I'm gonna buy this one
links_reviews_text: So comfy! So fun and easy to be dressed up or down! Love

links_reviews_title: Felt like I was wearing a diaper! Not flattering at all.
links_reviews_text: Fits super baggy (but short!) and like you are wearing a diaper. I had to return it and didn't end up wearing it. Might look great on someone really tall but on someone petite it was unflattering.
So comfortable. I might buy! Great for hanging out, over a bathing suit, or just a hot day.

links_reviews_title: easy fun cute romper wore down the shore
links_reviews_text: good material not see through no bra needed

links_reviews_title: Wore this several times on vacation In Bermuda
links_reviews_text: Perfect for casual/beach/lounging

links_reviews_title: Great birthday night outfit on beach vacation!
links_reviews_text: Cute and flattering romper that was perfect for a birthday night out in Bali. Did not ride up when lifting up my arms to dance :)

links_reviews_title: Runs a full size too big
links_reviews_text: Runs a full size too big

links_reviews_title: Endless compliments on an amazing piece!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this romper in a size larger than I usually would because it became available and I had to snatch it up! I wore it twice and both times had people complimenting me left and right all day. I would have purchased it but because it was a little large, I hesitated. However, in my size, this would've been a keeper!
Very comfortable- perfect for a summer bbq or beach day. Super comfortable and breezy. I'm a curvy size 2/4 and found the medium to be a little big.
Lined so no bra needed

links_reviews_title: very satisfied! a perfect little chic bag for a date night.
links_reviews_text: has to be carried in hand (can’t really wear it on the shoulder)
I love Clare V, and this bag is no exception. The capacity is perfect, and it is much more functional than a clutch when holding cocktails.
I absolutely love this. It's so flattering on. I have a pretty short torso, and it hits perfectly at my waist. The material is unique and rich in texture. I so want to buy this...
I live this jacket. It's very warm, feels great and looks good. I wore it dressed down with jeans and dressed up with a black dress.
I would have bought this if it was a little cheaper! A great little bomber jacket that was a nice addition to day wear. It was a bit big though so I'd size down.
I wore this every where I went for a solid week. It was great. The quality is fantastic. It matched everything and looked fabulous with no effort.
Flattering, warm, and high quality! I loved this jacket. Wanted to keep it!

Great jacket for medium temps. Really comfortable and flattering. Could have worn a smaller size but the medium didn't look too big/sloppy at all and provided extra room for bulkier sweaters and my growing baby bump underneath.
Love this jacket, and I got so many compliments on it. It was also warm enough for me to wear bar hopping in the Winter!
Loved the quality. A little boxy fit (proportionally short & wide) but would wear again anyway.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for everyday. Comfy and warm for fall.
links_reviews_text: Size down if you are in between sizes. Dress up or down.
I liked this jacket, it is comfortable and on trend!
The detail in the stitching is amazing! Photos really don't do it justice. I rolled the sleeves up and wore for casual Friday at work. Really cute and comfortable. Would rent again!
Cute jacket that would have been fun for work. But those pockets! Placement, size, puffiness. Not flattering on my frame at all.
Not insanely warm, but not a windbreaker either. Cute pattern and nice fit. A little shorter that I prefer--hit right at top of hips. Not too boxy. Would've bought if cheaper!
I love this jacket, I thought it would be too boxy but it somehow really works even with a curvy figure. Looks great dressed up or down, with jeans or a skirt.
Comfy, stylin', also a bit matronly in a weird way.
Only the medium was available in this so it was baggy on me, but still very cute. Surprisingly warm. If I rented again I'd definitely get a small.
It was a great jacket that could be dressed up or down. It's a little warm for where I live, but was perfect for a chilly spring night in Colorado mountains.

links_reviews_title: Perfect everyday jacket for the Spring
links_reviews_text: This bomber jacket was perfect for the transitional weather from winter to spring (in Boston). If you wear a lot of black, it goes with everything. It was very comfortable. I am 5'9" and the length was good.
Too boxy and was not flattering but I liked the look of it.

links_reviews_title: Chic style. Can be dressed up for date night or dressed down in jeans.
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Runs true to size.

Loved this jacket even more than I thought I would. It was so comfy, surprisingly warm, and stylish for dressing up or down. If it wasn't so pricey I would FOR SURE buy it. I got so much use out of this
This was a great bomber jacket! Went well with anything and cute for work and the weekends

links_reviews_title: Loved. One of my favorites to date
links_reviews_text: Loved. Wish I could afford to buy it. Great jacket, looks high-quality but very comfortable to wear. Elevated my work jeans to be a bit more dressy. Fabric is soft and I love the pockets.
Like no other business jacket I've owned. Contemporary but professional.

links_reviews_title: Great design, but was little too large for me
links_reviews_text: Pockets are sewn so you cannot put anything in them
The small fit me ok, but I would say run a bit large, I def could have worn an XS.

I couldn't decide if this style was just a bit much for me of made me look older. Lots of compliments from older ladies on it. It was the perfect weight for temps in the 50s and 60s (keep in mind I'm cold natured). Super comfy. Don't know if I'd buy it but I did enjoy wearing it.
Fit just right on me. I've been wearing it everyday to work.
A fine jacket, I paired it with jeans and ankle boots, but overall nothing special.

links_reviews_title: Beautifully made, fun way to be polished
links_reviews_text: Will rent again but in a large. I'm small busted size 14 and the claws okay but the large would have been perfect
This is very cute! Runs a bit big and isn't too flattering but is still very cute!
Fits great, looks expensive and I felt great in it!

links_reviews_title: This is a great everyday jacket.
links_reviews_text: I wore this jacket for a casual work dinner and it was perfect. I wore it over a silk blouse and it made the outfit complete. I absolutely recommend this!
This dress was SO perfect! It made me feel insanely confident. My curves were flattered in the fit, too! Definitely recommend.

links_reviews_title: Super comfy and lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The length was perfect on me (I'm 5'2")... The sleeves are fitted at the wrist and the dress is super flattering through the body. The color is beautiful and the fabric is super comfortable. Would definitely rent again!

Smocked bodice is very flattering and forgiving. I usually size up in Parker but this one worked in a small because of the stretch. The shoulder seams were a bit narrow but the pouf of the sleeve distracts from that with a stylish flair. Sweet floral in a classic navy was feminine and fabulous.

I really liked this dress! It's stretchy from neck to hip, so it's very forgiving and super flattering if you're curvy. I'm normally a 6, but am 22 weeks pregnant, and this still fit perfectly with a bit of room to spare. Teamed it with a velvet blazer and black ankle boots for a work meeting and it was perfect. The fabric is thin, so it's easy to layer without looking bulky.

I absolutely love this dress. I was a bit concerned about the drop waist style and ruching on my curvy body but it ended up being very flattering! I wore this dress to work and then an after-work party with friends and it was perfect. The quality is evident in the fit and fabric. Would definitely rent this one again!

links_reviews_title: I felt like a porcelain doll but, in a good way! The fit was perfect on my small frame.
links_reviews_text: The sleeves and the lining are my favourite parts. I have a small frame, chest included, and it still looks great. (No puffing out in the chest.) My fiancé told me that I looked like a porcelain doll lol. I wore this to college and it's incredibly comfortable.

I so wanted to wear this dress to work, but it was too small! I'm surprised none of the reviews mentioned how small it runs -- very tight across my hips and chest. Otherwise, love the print and fabric!
Great work dress
Loved wearing this dress. Not too short, good amount of stretch and cute print.
It fit perfectly and was super flattering. I wore it with thigh high suede boots for a night out on a girls weekend. Love this dress! Would consider buying it!
Dress is true to size, however it is very short.
Didn't find it super flattering, I think it would look great on someone with a less curvey figure.
Shoulders were really bulky. Wore leather jacket to cover them. Waist super flattering.

This was pretty short on me (5'11") but work-appropriate with black tights and dark gray booties. The fit is flattering and forgiving, and the pattern is really nice up close. Got complimented on it at work (by my coworker who loves Little House on the Prairie, so maybe that explains it). Not sure I'd rent again but fun to wear!
I am 5'4 and this was quite short on me
Cute, a little short, has a 90s vibe that I liked.

Rented this with m unlimited. I sized up to a S because Parker can be funny on sizing but this one did not work at all. The entire front and back are smocked so it made my chest squash flat and my rib cage stick out. The sleeves with the ruching were weird and unflattering. I think you need to be extremely narrow to pull this one off. Sent it right back.
The shirring kept riding up a bit on me but a great dress. I dressed it down with some cobalt blue jeans and a cute choker for work as it was too cold for just tights at the time.
cute dress for work, didn't flatter my short torso/big belly, but was okay! didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: This dress is great! Wore it to a family birthday dinner.
links_reviews_text: Dress is a little unforgiving in the middle. I wore Spanx with it which made me feel better. I also added a brown woven leather belt.

links_reviews_title: Love this style...but order up a size!
links_reviews_text: I always wear an extra small, especially in this brand. But this one is tiny. Order up and enjoy!
Loved the smocking, was very comfortable and easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: This was perfect for my baby bump .
links_reviews_text: It has a lot of give so was perfect for date night with my growing belly.
I think I should have gotten this in an XS. Fit was Big in some places and weird in others.

links_reviews_title: Waist is a bit frumpy but nice overall
links_reviews_text: I like this dress and think the design is cool. The stretchy material in the middle does make my hips and stomach look big and kind of weird, but it's good for thin people.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for San Francisco winter + NYC fall
links_reviews_text: Thank goodness for Unlimited. I loved this jacket so much that I rented it towards the beginning of winter and kept it the entire season. It was the perfect statement piece: long, but not overwhelming on my small frame; warm, but not stuffy; trendy, but also classic. Highly highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: A little boxy, but cute print
links_reviews_text: I didn't love the way this hit. I think it's meant to be oversized but it wasn't flattering on me. The shoulders were a bit too big. I also wanted to wear this out but it didn't keep me that warm in a Boston winter. Would be fine if you needed to be warm in 30s/40s with layers
The coat is way too thin for NYC winter, but would love to rent again in the fall time. It was stylish and cute. A little boxy but still looked good as long as you leave it open.

wore this rental at least 5 times in a week! was loving the weight, not too thick but great on 40 degree days. The plaid was really nice and felt like great quality. I sized down 1 size in this jacket (usually a 12 got a 10) and it was perfect fit with a light sweater and scarf. Definitely recommend.
Nice fabric. Not itchy or heavy. A perfect weight.

links_reviews_title: I love the structure of this coat! Great for DC Fall
links_reviews_text: I usually wear US size M (6-8) and I got this in Euro 44. I could def size down. But I don'think the material is that luxury that worth $730 dollars, hence I won't buy it. But I will be on the hunt for a similar coat that is more budget friendly. This is a great way to try it out and this design is timeless :)
The wrinkles would not come out. Therefore, the dress just looked messy Fit was okay, a little loose in the midsection And if you have a long torso, you may not like the fit.
Rent the coat with the jacket if you're tall. It runs tight and small. Most of this brand is the same sizing
Gorgeous piece with matching jacket. I sized up based on other reviews but likely didn't need to. Only wore once so got away with it.
At 1st I didn't know how to style this with the interesting cuts on the top would have looked weird with a blazer. But it looked perfect with a white button up underneath and made it a fresh look!

I love this dress. I wore it to work and then wore it to MC an event. It was perfect. The weight was significant enough to provide a little bit of warmth during a cooler time of year. It was professional yet not boring. Loved it. #workwear
Cute dress and coat. Wore to work. Thick material. Top was a bit loose and I'm not small chested at all. The rest of the dress fit well. Plenty of compliments.

I rented this for work. I thought it was cute but I found the neckline and shoulders a bit awkward. My everyday necklace hit just at the dress. A longer necklace would have worked better. Material has very little stretch. Usually I need to err on the larger side for such dresses. I'm a 2 or a 4 depending on brand and have been wearing a 4 in other Toccin dresses but in this one the chest was massive and I had to size down to a 2. Amazingly it still fit through the hips!
Love the heavy fabric for the Fall transition. This is an easy dress to accessorize and it's a little more interesting than the normal business dress. Rent it!
The dress is amnazing.

links_reviews_title: The combo with the jacket was just amazing - so many compliments
links_reviews_text: So sophisticated and forgiving. Beautiful combo that solicited comments and compliments all day from all sorts of people. Loved the set.
It was big thru the shoulders and chest area and I am a 40dd. The hip and waist area is true to size

links_reviews_title: Sized up as recommended but it was way too big
links_reviews_text: The dress was extremely high quality. Beautifully made, very heavy fabric with just enough give. May try it again in my actual size.

This is a cute dress, but the fabric is really heavy. The contrast between heavy fabric and smallish straps didn't work for me personally, however if paired with a black turtleneck underneath it might be more balanced. Just my thoughts!

links_reviews_title: Omg too small. Zipper runs all the way down past the butt.
links_reviews_text: Very odd fit. The zipper runs from top to very bottom. The fact that you have to zip up from below the butt up, is just bizarre. This didn't fit.
The dress was beautiful. The grey is a little lighter than it looks in the picture.
Only 3 stars because the top was too big and gaped widely under the arms. The bottom half fit perfectly.
I wore this to work and paired in with camel suede heels and a black jacket. Perfect fall colors and materials without being too heavy for the temperate climate where I live.
This dress is beautiful and made of nice material. However it is too small. I could not wear it. Definitely size up. Honestly, I would even consider going up by two sizes.

Hadn't rented from this designer before so opted to size up just in case. Wish I didn't as it was too big in the upper half but I managed to hide it with a blazer. Very heavy, thick, quality dress with great detail. Received many compliments and look forward to renting more from this designer - definitely true to size. Hit just above my knee and I'm 5'10.

I wanted to LOVE this but I just like it. The colors are more beautiful in person and there is beautiful stitching detail that you can't see in the photo. The fabric is THICK but has stretch so it hugs every curve (definitely recommend Spanx, even if you're thin, just to smooth everything out. Although the fabric is thick, it does show some "bumps"). It created a very beautiful silhouette. My only complaint is the top. It is cut straight across and just fits very strange. The dress as a whole fit small, but the chest was HUGE. You could see straight down the top when I was just sitting. Maybe better for a smaller chest so it lays more flat? I don't know but it was odd.

links_reviews_title: Ran too large so I couldn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: I recommend sizing down.

Beautifully cut, high quality, relatively heavy but stretchy fabric. Love the camel and grey color blocking. I found this dress fit me just right in the waist (no room to spare) but was quite large in the bust and armholes. I'll wear a cami with sleeves or a thin sweater under this, but unfortunately it is not a great fitting dress for the less-endowed. This would look terrific on a fuller busted gal, though.

The size 12 was very snug on me though I did layer it with a beige cashmere turtleneck. Not at all uncomfortable, just form fitting. The dress itself is fantastic. It's actually dark gray and beige, not black. Some interesting stitching details and the fabric is thick and high quality. Perfect with tall boots. Loved wearing it and will rent again.
substantial fabric wore with a camel colored sweater jacket

links_reviews_title: lots of compliments and perfect for work
links_reviews_text: fit like a glove, but not too tight. perfect for work. fabric is quite thick.
This was perfect. So easy to wear and super lightweight. Definitely would rent again.

links_reviews_title: This romper is so cute! Loved the fit and the pockets! The straps were also adjustable.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. Nice that straps could be adjusted since I'm 5'10 and rompers sometimes are too short. This fit great.
Received so many compliments on this romper and it was SO comfy and cute. Ended up sweating so much in this on vacation, but you couldn't tell at all.

I rented this for a country party and revived so many compliments. I have long legs and struggle with finding rompers that are an appropriate length and this one fir perfectly. True to size and felt so comfortable the whole night.

This was fun and comfortable to wear. It's pretty thin and wrinkles easily. I ironed it before wearing and it still was really wrinkly by end of the day. The small fit comfortable. I can see how the xs could be tight in the chest so glad I went with small.
Added a sleeveless button down underneath to make it more work appropriate. Only downside is that if wrinkles easily bc the fabric is pretty thin
It was simple and great

links_reviews_title: Not good for women with bigger hips
links_reviews_text: I have a small waist and bigger hips and it's very unflattering
Loved this jumper. Super comfortable. easy to adjust straps. can dress up or down.
Cute but definitely intended for the beach/pool. I was hoping to wear this on vacation as a beach-to-lunch option but it was just too thin and short to be considered anything other than a coverup.

Sadly I don't have a photo of myself in this adorable romper, but it was perfect for our Palm Springs vacation. I wore it by the pool, as well as with a cute pair of sandals when we went shopping. Great warm-weather piece!

links_reviews_title: This was a perfect piece for a Sunday brunch. Super comfortable and flowy.
links_reviews_text: Definitely order a large if you have a full chest.. I did and it fit perfectly.. definitely more flowy in the stomach and shorts part. Would highly recommend this piece for a daytime event.

links_reviews_title: The material is so comfortable! Very versatile romper for casual everyday wear.
links_reviews_text: The material is so comfortable! Very versatile romper for casual everyday wear.
fits perfectly

I really like this romper but wish I would have gotten my normal size small. An XS was available and it worked but was a little tight. The top is extremely small- I have a small chest so it worked. The bottom wrinkles easily so would not recommend if you will be sitting and getting up frequently.

I really liked this dress! It was great for a hot day as it didn't show any perspiration. It was a little tricky to find a bra that didn't show but some boob tape did the trick. I had to be careful on the stairs with the length, would have been better in a petite.
This ran a little large in my opinion. I still liked it but the extra fabric made photos unflattering

This dress felt very feminine while still being sexy. The deep V is flattering if you have a small bust and the length was perfect. If windy, I do warn you that the dress easily opens due to the wrap style of it.

This dress was cute but material is swishy and a little loud and the chest was too open-couldn't bend down without popping out. Granted, this was a 0 and I am more of a 4, but I was grabbing things at the RTR store and this was the only size available.

links_reviews_title: super cute and easy to throw on - wore it to the beach with a sweater for a family event.
links_reviews_text: Really cute and comfortable dress - worked with my baby bump. Definitely need a big chest to fill it out - I have big Bs right now and it was falling off a bit (only complaint!)

As the title says, it rubs small, especially on top. I ordered up and still could fit into it. Too bad because I liked the color and fabric and would've loved it for the weekend. A nice casual dress if you can get it to fit you.
VERY low cut and gapes open. Also the interior fabric showed all along the ruffle. It was not wearable.
This could be great! But it fits so poorly in the chest. Didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, but runs a bit big
links_reviews_text: I would have liked to have a smaller size but this dress got lots of compliment. Loved the print!

links_reviews_title: Looks better on they hangar. Beautiful dress but not on me!
links_reviews_text: Fabric was delicate and had a slight tear in back seam when I received it.
This dress is super cute, but make sure you grab some fashion tape! It's a wrap dress so it moves.

links_reviews_title: The top of the dress is small. Low cut and couldn't pull it tighter to make it less revealing
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear it! Too low cut!

links_reviews_title: Fun dress but a lot of cleavage
links_reviews_text: Loved the swish of this dress. And as a wrap dress the fit is very flattering but has the side effect of a lot of boob. The fabric is beautiful and I loved everything else about it.

links_reviews_title: cute but didn't get to wear it
links_reviews_text: loved this dress! i went with the 2 and it was a tad tight, so next time i'll order the 4 (for reference, i am 5'6, 125 lbs, 34B, fluctuate between 2-4 or s/m). didn't get to wear it but will definitely order again in the fall
Fits well

This is a fun dress to wear - I had to size up because there wasn't a 6 available and it's a wrap so you can usually get away with it. The top is a little big - and really open so not necessarily that appropriate for work but you can throw a cardigan over it. Length is nice - even for us shorties. Cute dress overall - not a showstopper

Beautiful material. Rented this dress for weekend wear. Paired it with sneakers & it was perfect for running errands & weekend activities. The fabric is nice & has a little stretch, but the dress was a bit roomy. Size down & it would be perfect.
This print of this dress looked cheap and the fit was way too tight in the bust. Careful of the back box pleats - made me look much larger from the side.

I'd absolutely buy this dress although it's more fun to rent it :) the print is way more vibrant and unique in person, it's super fresh without being transparent, and the pockets are just the cherry on top! Will rent over and over for sure. Just runs a bit large on the mid section, but totally forgivable
I'm between a small and a medium right now and am swimming in the small. Nice very lightweight fabric for summer. Good coverage for office setting.
Adorable but runs huge, size down 1-2 sizes.
Beautiful print and style but it needs a belt because it's shapeless in the mid section, almost like a tarp

This is such a unique dress...everything about it. not especially figure flattering but very cool and I loved the look, feminine in an edgy way. Exciting for rtr to have small designers like this and hope to see more.

links_reviews_title: Cute with a belt. A little billowy without
links_reviews_text: Cute with a belt. A little billowy without
A little wider then needed but not oversized. Belter with thin black belt and was a great fit. pockets are always a plus!!!
The dress ran a little big but I liked wearing it. It was super comfortable and is a great print.

links_reviews_title: Great everyday dress. Good for A line lovers
links_reviews_text: Fun easy dress. Great to pair with tennis shoes or heels.
This was cute, but not what I expected. It's all cotton, so no stretch- if it had even a tiny bit of stretch, I could've sized down, which I needed to do. A bit boxy overall- I added a belt.
Great fabric, fun print, perfect sizing and flattering waist detail.
this dress was great to wear to work. super comfortable and looks very put together

links_reviews_title: Felt very comfortable and got lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Loved it. Flattering
Fitted, but not clinging. I'm short, so I rolled up the sleeves. I feel very June Cleever today. :-)

links_reviews_title: Wrinkles easy, but super cute dress. got a few compliments and added a fun belt. COMFY
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and cute cute. Very 50's vintage fell. I enjoyed wearing this dress.
Pros: Combines 3 trends into one dress: midi, floral and stripes!
This dress runs very large. I usually wear a 4/6 and size up when between sizes. I rented a small and had a lot of extra room. Otherwise a great work dress!
Fit is large but loved the look

links_reviews_title: Great dress just a tad big
links_reviews_text: This dress is so beautiful! I wore this to work and received many compliments. The reviews are definitely true, the dress runs big. I usually wear a medium and would have ordered a small but it was not available so I tried the medium. It was not unwearable, but I definitely would have preferred a smaller fit. It was large in the chest and waist. If the dress was slightly smaller it would have been 5 stars!

Flattering, well made and casually elegant-the perfect work dress, brunch dress, day dress. I have a large bust and have a hard time with this style-usually by the time it fits on top it is enormous/unflattering on the bottom. This is made with just enough volume in the hips to create a shape without too much bulk.
Runs a bit large. Very comfortable and easy to wear. Great for summer sightseeing.
