Loved this. It looks a little bit like an old hand-sew dress from a kit, but done super well. It fits beautifully. Got several compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: I did not end up wearing it - beautiful dress but ran big!
links_reviews_text: great fit overall but ran big!
Definitely size down in this dress. It was very big- especially through the waist. Fabric was nice and the lenght hit me mid-calf. Has pockets

links_reviews_title: So pretty, more maxi than midi
links_reviews_text: This was so pretty! The colors were so perfect and helped the skirt be a statement but understated. It also flows so nicely when walking. Note - I am 5"4, wore a size 6 on my waist and it was definitely more maxi than midi.

I loved this skirt for a day of wine tasting! I paired it with a cream sweater and jean jacket and white tennis shoes for a more casual look. It was cute but not too much for the day. Would rent again!
I received sooo many compliments on this skirt. I've worn it twice to work so far and I am planning on wearing it this weekend once more before I send it back!
Really enjoyed this skirt. The material was such wonderful quality. My only gripe was that it was longer than I was hoping for. It hit me right at the ankle which was a little awkward.
pleated fabric in season-less floral silk. very fitted waistline, so size up. nice movement and easily dressed up or down.

links_reviews_title: Great Skirt for dressing up or down
links_reviews_text: I paired this with converse and a denim shirt while on vacation in Venice, Italy. Perfect for walking around all day without feeling too casual or over dressed. Loved the silky feel!

Loved this skirt! Perfect length, the material was so soft and nice. Could wear for many different occasions and style differently each time. The waist band was not stretchy at all though so I wore it more high waisted. Will definitely rent again
Really pretty pleats and silky material. Great transitional floral for summer into fall.
This isn't the shirt I wore it with but the only shirt i had a pic of with it on. I'm obsessed with the fabric and the flow. Super easy.
Super lightweight but not see thru. Went to my ankles (I'm 5'4").
Perfect skirt for work, light and airy, comfy!

This was super silky and beautiful. Hit a few inches above ankle. I went down a size bit it was too tight after I ate so I'd say get your normal size. The only problem is that it kept get caught under my rolling chair at work due to the length :(

links_reviews_title: Lot of fabric to this skirt
links_reviews_text: Nice pleated skirt, lots of fabric to it.

links_reviews_title: Really cute but could not zip the skirt all the way
links_reviews_text: Beautiful skirt with a pretty design and nice pleated detail. I wanted to love it but it fit too tightly around my ribcage. If you have wider ribs like me, size up.
I wore this with a cream sweater and sneakers. So comfy

links_reviews_title: Really pretty but was alittle tight in the waste for me to wear
links_reviews_text: Real pretty. Unfortunately the waste band was alittle too tight and has no "give." Might try to lose five pounds and order it again lol
Runs small on the waist and has no give. If you're planning on wearing this comfortably all day think about ordering one size up for a little give in the waist
The waist is non-elasticized, so getting the size just right is important! I really liked the swish and how it styled up a t-shirt for everyday wear. Would definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Silky, soft fabric. Pretty artwork with Tao contrast floral effect.
links_reviews_text: A lot of pleats makes 12R seem too big on the hangar but it actually fit and looked good wearing the skirt.

links_reviews_title: Stepdaughter wore this for professional family photos
links_reviews_text: She LOVED renting like I do and she LOVED the oversized sporty style because that's her M.O....if I had been renting this for myself I would have wanted the small or maybe even the medium.
Nice casual top, but I was surprised to find that this top is cropped! Wider, loose fit and definitely cropped.

links_reviews_title: Wore over dress for a little more dressy look
links_reviews_text: Nice over sheath dress for work
This is a soft, medium thick sweater that is perfect to throw on in the evenings after a day or sun with a pair of jean shorts. Well made. Loose fit.
Cute top but shirt for long torso people
Too short for my age

links_reviews_title: Could not wear- It is a true cropped top.
links_reviews_text: I am 5' tall and the large was even too short to wear. Tried to put a tank underneath to peek out but it just didn't work.

links_reviews_title: Love this hoodie so much. 2nd time renting it and I wore it almost everyday on vacation.
links_reviews_text: So comfortable and cute for the beach. Great summer top. Would even buy!

This is cropped but didn't show much stomach with wearing white high rise jeans. My husband loved it on me and my daughter said she would wear it. It was a fun top to wear around town running errands.

As others stated, it is extremely cropped. I rented it based on the measurements stating it was 22 inches from shoulder to hem. I measured it and it's 18 inches. If you have a larger bust, it is even shorter. I wouldn't wear something like that but it was above my naval ring. I rented it for the weekend but I wouldn't leave my place in this. It is really cute and I love the colors. I could see using it at the beach or while boating but it's not worth one of my unlimited spots for that. Or wearing it over a casual dress.
Loved the colors and weight of this (light and not too much for late summer day) but it was too cropped. Had I gotten a bigger size I think it would have been too boxy.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but more of a crop top
links_reviews_text: This was a cute, relaxed top that will work for vacation; it is comfy but still polished. It is more of a cropped top, however; not ridiculously short, but if you wear low rise bottoms, your midriff will be exposed. That's not necessarily a problem - it's just something to be aware about!
The colors are great, the hood is cute. It was a little shorter than I had hoped, but a great beach top.
The top runs short. I was able to wear it with high rise shorts.
A bit short and boxy
Good for a breezy summer day; thicker material so not for those 90+ degree days!
It's shot so it works well with high rise pants or shorts!
Rented this on unlimited for a vacation on the beach - it was the perfect comfortable piece to throw on after a day at the pool or beach while still being really cute!
If you're throwing it over a dress or dig really high-waisted pants, then sure, I can see this working. But it was too short for my taste. Nice soft fabric though.

links_reviews_title: super cute and flattering, loved this for a casual everyday look
links_reviews_text: a bit cropped
Perfect top to add a layer for cool spring nights
A fun, youthful top that is nice for everyday. Fabric is soft and on the heavier side. Loose fit.
Quality piece with great fabric and fit. I may end up buying this piece.

links_reviews_title: This is why you get a 5th spot
links_reviews_text: Bought a 5th spot specifically so I could get and keep this coat. It's beautiful and very warm, pics really don't do it justice. I sized up so I could wear bulky winter sweaters under it and I'm glad I did, it's perfect.
Love how long. Wore to a formal event felt amazing
The buttons aren't the easiest to close, great on a pear shape!

I was excited to rent this coat and the unique closures, but it swallowed my petite frame. The shoulders and arm length were great. However, it felt like the coat was supposed to have a tailored design and yet it was too loose and unstructured through the body (on my petite frame....) to keep it. I think others will love this coat, though!
This is a fantastic coat, with a great fit and all the style. Warm, soft and beautiful, the trifecta!

The bottom of the shirt ended right at my waist line and flared out only on the bottom portion, while the top portion fit more snug but was still really comfortable. Only thing is the neckline started to stretch out after the first wear. It was still ok for the second wear but I probably wouldn't purchase it because I'd be afraid some permanent stretching would occur. Great rental!
I love this shirt and even considered purchasing. It is so cute and comfortable! Love it

Really liked this top and paired with a pop of color with my necklace. Wrinkles easily; however, I would recommend this top highly. Love how it is loose on the bottom and is quite flattering as long as you wear tighter pants with it as it is boxy.

links_reviews_title: True to size nice flow look but definitely not swimming
links_reviews_text: On trend cute empire/peplum top. However with my bigger bust it meant the white line was only just below my boobs so if it wasn't perfectly flattering -if I had a flatter chest the shirt would've sat a little better where it supposed to it definitely doesn't make you look very slim. it's a fun look if you pair it with some tight skinny jeans. I would recommend for a C cup and below as my D cup was a little bit too much for the shirt to make it look the way it should. Otherwise quality nice good, for a cool summer night but it would get a bit hot if the weather was really really warm.
Fit was great, length great. Love this. I'm going to regret not buying it. :)

links_reviews_title: Simple, high quality top. Easily styled for work or weekend wear!
links_reviews_text: Loved the comfort and fit of this shirt. I paired with jeans and a nude mule shoe. Got several compliments!
Great top, comfortable, trendy. Wore it to work, out to cocktails and out for lunch. Love everything about it and received tons of compliments. Would definitely rent again!
I'm not exactly sure this was flattering, but I loved wearing this. It's super comfortable, flowy, and trendy. Works well for the office or just hanging out.
I felt this top ran a little big but it was cute and I'd rent it again

This super cute and trendy top has a layered look as if its a cropped sweatshirt over the blue and white striped blouse - I love this! It runs true to size and has a nice loose and flowing fit. This is perfect with jeans and white sneakers for everyday but you can still dress this up if you want too!

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments, great easy throw on piece to style up any look
links_reviews_text: Loose fit but still flattering, doesn't wrinkle too easy, the top has stretch to it so don't worry about larger burst. Even though the cut is high its still flattering if you have a tummy. Super comfortable and light weight, great for a cooler summer day - tempted to purchase but will hold off and order again!

links_reviews_title: Runs short in the torso but I liked it.
links_reviews_text: Runs short
Cute with fitted work pants, causal but still felt dressy for work.
I liked this as a more casual outfit but could also see wearing it for work. Fit true to size for me.
Cute shirt that runs large but works great for casual every day shirt. Would size down next time.
Great work top :)
Great top, wore with dark jean shorts and sandals for a casual dinner. I have a long torso and was hesitant to rent but fit was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Cute for work and casual wear
links_reviews_text: I wore this to work (a pretty casual environment) and on the weekend. It is thick for summer but fortunately the weather was cool. I could definitely see getting a lot of use out of it: with jeans, skirts, shorts.

links_reviews_title: Got a lot of compliments on this top!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size
Work ready but can go anywhere
Loved the look of this unique top--perfect for work and lightweight enough for a warmer day. But I definitely could have sized down to an XS.

links_reviews_title: Super Cute Top, Easy to Wear
links_reviews_text: I wore this top and received tons of compliments on it. It's casual but also has structure so you can wear it to work and also on the weekends. Totally want to buy this top !!
The top white part cut off strangely across my chest. Quality wasn't particularly nice, and the cut just wasn't flattering at all.

links_reviews_title: Fun top to wear on vacation!
links_reviews_text: Fits great and looks good with white jeans!

links_reviews_title: Yikes, not for big busted women
links_reviews_text: The shirt was really cropped so if you have a larger chest that's all the fitted part covered then it billowed out. Better fit for a different body style than mine.

links_reviews_title: Very cute for everyday wear with jeans.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable top and trendy so it amps up your daily outfit. I wore this top several times. Highly recommend it.

links_reviews_title: Small un-noticeable stain but cute top
links_reviews_text: The top I wore came with stickers pointing to a stain. It was not very noticeable so I wore it anyway. Was a great top and would have bought it if not for that stain.
Perfect in every way
Let me count the ways. SO cute! Comfortable. Amazing. One of my favorite rentals ever. I'd really like to buy it. It's great for work or everyday wearing. Enjoy!
Cute for everyday, didn't realize the bottom was striped I thought it was just solid but it's cute. Wore with a big necklace so it didn't look so boxy. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Cute & extremely flattering to wear for work & a casual hang out
links_reviews_text: The shirt fit me perfectly and I fell in love with it as soon as I tried it on. It is very cute and it works both for work and for a casual setting. I definitely would recommend this shirt and would rent again in the future!

links_reviews_title: This shirt was perfect for a casual Friday at work. I paired it with dark flared jeans and heels
links_reviews_text: I wish I took a photo! It fit TTS and was so cute!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to work and immediately got a compliment!
links_reviews_text: This is such a flowy top that the sizing is a little large - definitely could have worn an XS.

links_reviews_title: Size down if you are hourglass or like a fitted look
links_reviews_text: This t-shirt is light and airy and comfortable. The problem is that the cut is boxy which is always unflattering on an hourglass figure. I think sizing down might have helped make it look more fitted. Either way, still worth ordering if you want a fun casual look on a warm day. It's about to be 75-80 degrees here in January in Texas!
Loved wearing this with black leggings and a black puffer jacket! Want to keep!!
Cute tshirt that fits well.

links_reviews_title: This was perfect for a casual day in the office.
links_reviews_text: I loved this shirt! Looks adorable tucked into jeans.

links_reviews_title: cute color, livens up an outfit
links_reviews_text: fit meh, neck a bit stretched out, sleeves a little long on the arm
It's cute. NOthing special. NOt work the cost to buy.
Wore this a couple times. Super cute for summer
It's cute. It stands out. Probably would have sized up one size only because I like my tees on the loose end but it still fit fine.

links_reviews_title: Cute T-shirt- I prefer roomer fit. Didn’t wear.
links_reviews_text: Tighter across chest -
Too tight across the chest but otherwise cute t shirt
Oversized fit but not in a cool way. Just made me look like I was wearing clothes that did not fit. Sleeves are an odd length. Ended up just wearing it to the beach

links_reviews_title: I wore this sweater on Valentine's Day!
links_reviews_text: Runs true to size, can virtually be paired with any color and type of bottoms, which is so fun. I wore this on Valentine's Day.
Traveled in this and it was cute and comfy. Love everything zagid & voltaire so this was expected. I got the large but would've been fine in a medium
Dress up or dress down this was a beautiful sweater, light weight and great for the office.

links_reviews_title: Wore for an Alaska cruise as a layer - perfect!
links_reviews_text: tight fitting and stylish

links_reviews_title: It was perfect for our trip to Champagne France.
links_reviews_text: Great fit and perfect for a cool spring day
Super cute and easy. Perfectly soft, thin, drapey, light wool little sweater. Flattering and comfy.
So easy to wear and style. Lightweight but warm, but not crazy hot either. Perfect.
It was just a perfect sweater ! I paired it with my black jeans , but also with my green Adidas track pants ! Got tons of compliments . Definitely something i would wear again and again
Wore it all weekend and to work tucked into a full skirt. Runs small/short so tucked in is best in my opinion
Rented for Valentine's Day. It was warm and flattering- but runs so small! A size Large was still very tight.

links_reviews_title: Light weight sweater love love love
links_reviews_text: Runs a little short, but loved it so comfortable - great for weekends
Great lightweight sweater We were going to a cold destination and I rented a few sweaters since I live in a warm southern state, I didn't want to buy any. I wore it several times on the trip.

links_reviews_title: Classic and well made - and makes people smile
links_reviews_text: This sweater fit as expected and was very comfortable. Loved the cut and style- so many people approached me and said they Googled the phrase, and it means I love you so I think it was helping to spread some joy every time I wore it :) works well with many different outfits- would highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Would totally wear this everyday if I could.
links_reviews_text: Super comfy sweater with a twist. Great for a casual day at work. I can understand some of the other reviews about the sleeves being long but I have long arms so it was great for me!
Smart cute sweater. I sized up one for length based on reviews and it fit well except arms a bit big. Thin but warm.

This is not at all what I expected, but I loved wearing this sweater! First of all, it is THIN. I thought this would be more of a sweatshirt top material, but it's a fine knit. If it's cold you're going to need something on underneath. I wore a tank but wished I had worn long sleeves under it. However that makes it breathe nicely. I'm normally an XS but got an M because I wanted it to be a bit oversized. Even sizing up, however, it wasn't long enough to wear with leggings like I thought it would be; it's more of a square shape but if you have a shorter torso it might work. The sleeves were long on me, covered my hands, but that's to be expected a few sizes up. The letters are more of an off-white than white. It is soft and comfy. I will say, the BEST thing about wearing this sweater is the light it carries. Everywhere I went people were reading it and smiling, smiling at me, one guy waved at me from across the street (not in a creepy way! Lol). I felt like I was spreading love just by wearing it and I smiled all day long it returned the favor. I don't normally wear things with phrases on them unless I really believe in what they say, and I would absolutely rent this again to feel l'amour.
The fit is small I'm typically a small and rented a medium and it was perfect. The quality of the sweater doesn't match the retail price but I thought it was cute on. Very lightweight.
Wore this a few times. Can be dressed up or down with jeans, skirt, etc. true to size

links_reviews_title: Wore to work, lounging, and traveling
links_reviews_text: I kept this for several weeks because I didn't want to let it go! Really nice fit and simple yet classy/sophisticated. Comfortable and easy to pair with a variety of bottoms.
Really well made. Love this sweater and will definitely rent again.

I wore this sweater a few times for different occasions! I wore it both with jeans and with skirts. I wore it to work and on a date, so it goes with a lot. I'm an 8-10 and sized up to the L based on other reviews and was glad I did or else it would have been too cropped. It's fairly thin too so it's easy to wear under things. I'll rent it again and considered buying.
I sized up as I wanted a casual look...perfect for that!
I got lots of compliments and people speaking French to me. It fit well and easy to wear for everyday events. It wasn't as soft as I normally like, but it was fine.
Cute sweater. It is thin so I definitely had to layer with an undershirt and a heavy coat in the Canada fall weather ( high 40s-low 50s)
I wore this on the weekend. It was just okay. I would have been disappointed if I'd ordered it for a special occasion. It was fine, pretty lightweight, but not special.
liked this sweater but didn't love - rented it for everyday / lounge wear. It's cute and soft but ran a bit small - if you like more loose sweaters or a baggy look, I would avoid.
This sweater is adorable! If it was more reasonably priced, I would buy it.

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater, great for casual everyday or casual dress at work.
links_reviews_text: The length is pretty true to waste level (vs falling below). I typically like sweaters that fall lower unless I am tucking it in. But it's still super cute.

basic black sweater that was easy to wear multiple times on a cold weather vacation. not super soft but not itchy either. of note, it is slightly shorter in length (i.e. when I lifted my arms straight up, I showed about half-inch to one inch of tummy even in high waisted jeans)

links_reviews_title: Loved this. Fit well. Comfortable. Got noticed.
links_reviews_text: I appreciated its whim. Really enjoyed wearing this. Comfortable, too. Great fit.

links_reviews_title: This is a really nice little sweater!
links_reviews_text: The fit is very tailored thanks to some darting in the knit. I would say it runs very slightly on the small side (so when in doubt, size up). Overall, this is a very flattering sweater and perfect for springtime since it's thin.
It's lightweight, it's stylish and it's true to size. I wore it with camo pants but I can see this pairing nicely with a circle skirt, jeans, or culottes.

This light weight sweater was perfect for transition from a cool spring morning to a warm afternoon. This sweater is true to size and not too tight or short in the arms. Easy to dress up with some black pants or keep causal with jeans.
Too boxy on me

links_reviews_title: Super cute and comfy! Loved it
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a small, sized up based on reviews and it was perfect fit!
I love the feel and fit of this sweater. Easy to wear with jeans. Hits at the waist. Soft and lightweight.
I loved this sweater and almost purchased. Very lightweight yet warm.

It was pretty cute, but definitely borderline too short for me (long torso). I saved it by wearing a black tank top underneath. Other than that the fit would have been perfect. The material was much thinner than I expected.
Absolutely adored this sweater! So comfortable and so cute for everyday! Runs true to size and is the perfect sweater for work or the weekend!

links_reviews_title: Radiated love at a poetry reading
links_reviews_text: Wish this was a little bigger and baggier, but it's a true-to-size fit for my petite frame

links_reviews_title: Comfy and chic!! can dress up or down
links_reviews_text: sporty yet chic. I wore these mostly with sneakers but I could see how they'd pair well with some heels. was worried at first they might be ser-through, but this was not the case. Might end up renting them again!
Such a well made, quality garment. The movement in this fabric gives these pants such a rich luxurious look. These looked great with nude heels and a cropped top for work.
I loved the pants, but they were very see through in the back -- hence the jean jacket around my waist

links_reviews_title: Cute but didn't work for me
links_reviews_text: I struggled a bit to make this work. A tighter fit on waist and thighs than expected. Pockets showed through front so needed longer shirt. Feel that pants would have worked better with tucked in or fitted shirt. Loved the zipper detail at ankles.
Would have loved a smaller size but this option worked out great. Easy to transition from day to night. Super comfortable.

Fit strangely for me otherwise. The pant legs fit but without any stretch, they kind of shifted in strange ways and don't have great movement. Because of this, the side zippers also kept shifting to the front of my shin. Another reviewer mentioned this, but the bottom part of the pant balloons out and the bottom elastic is quite tight. Just not great.
Worked great with cropped black top and zipped up blazer during day. Took off blazer for a bday dinner at night. Super comfy and chic

links_reviews_title: Loved but too tight on hips.
links_reviews_text: I loved these pants. Great material but these were just too tight across my hips.
High waisted just doesn't work on me, so while not ideal I rolled the top over once. The benefit to this? Both the waist and the ankle length looked much better.
loved them so much I bought them I am between a sz 10-12. Rented these in a 44, which fit a tiny bit large but very comfortable and upscale.
Runs way small. Looked awkward. Never wore.

I am a petite middle aged woman. Could I pull these off? I wasn't sure. Turns out I didn't care because these pants were hands down the most comfortable pants I have ever worn (and I've been around for over 50 years). The crotch hangs a little low, but still, I didn't care, because - you know, the COMFORT! The material is soft - almost silky feeling, but provided plenty of coverage despite the lightweight feel of the fabric. I will enjoy these plenty for the next few weeks until we part ways....a sad day for sure!
Super cute! The length was perfect just runs small / a little tight around the booty. I am 5'4 135lbs will try and rent again in a size up
Loved these. They are very easy to wear - pair with many styles. Super comfortable (wear a thong, though - underwear lines are inevitable), and just trendy enough.
I loved the fabric and street chic style of these pants. However, since they are high wasted and I'm 5'3 they came up too high on me. If only I was a little bit taller :)

Tight in the thighs and loose around the waist which makes for a bit of an odd fit. Comfortable and light, a little see through but fine with skin tone underwear. Zippers at ankle make these ideal to wear while getting a pedicure #protip.
These were cute and comfortable but I don't know what I was thinking...February in New England is not the right time for these...I'll try again this summer.

Loved these pants! They are of high quality and are tailored wel. I paired them with a cute black sequin top with heels and then dressed them down with sneakers and a cute white top. I have an athletic build and a short waste

I rented these and never wore them. The top was long which I wouldn't have minded because I could have worn them high up on my waist. But the bottoms were so tight. It just looked so strange and unflattering. Even unzipping the legs it didn't look good. Material was silky fabric and that paired with the color meant you saw every line in underwear.

links_reviews_title: it was so comfortable! and the zippers make it very stylish/trendy
links_reviews_text: i was not so sure about this, but they are so comfortable and actually looked cute - once you get over the drop waist- I wore it with a cute navy top to make it dressier, but I can see how you can potentially dress it down or up!

links_reviews_title: Very sex and the city with heels and a blouse
links_reviews_text: Runs small in butt but not at waist. Hard to tuck in shirts to pair with the pants and their cute high waist. Looked awesome with heels and blouse to my dinner date. Felt very chic in them! I ordered a size up from what I usually wear and they were still snug.

links_reviews_title: I chose a size large because some said it ran large and it was too large for me
links_reviews_text: It's comfortable but I didn't think it looked great. I wouldn't wear again.

links_reviews_title: Way too long in the front (long inseam)
links_reviews_text: couldn't wear, awful. look like parachute pants from the 80s
Overall decent - better for straight body type, did not flatter or fit my pear shape well.
Those rose gold detailing on these is everything. Paired with blush sandals and a white tank and got endless compliments.
Perfect for traveling
This pant was super short. I am 5'9 and it hit me mid calves, the fit was also off. Ended up just immediately returning it.
I really loved these -- felt like I was wearing PJs to work! Ankles were pretty tight, left big marks by the end of the day

links_reviews_title: Not for girls with a booty
links_reviews_text: These pants are not made for girls who got back or hips. It's a shame because they really are nice pants. I couldn't wear the size 38 I rented.

I have a long torso, so these weren't as high waisted on me as some other reviewers. I am a pear, and these didn't accommodate my curves perfectly. The front rose much higher, while my shirt kept coming untucked in the back. They aren't really cut for someone with a booty. From the picture I also thought they were going to have more of a blush undertone, but in person they're a nice cream color.

links_reviews_title: The pants were heavy and not a very light fabric so it wasn't great for summer.
links_reviews_text: I liked the style, I just wish it had been a lighter fabric.

links_reviews_title: I am short and curvy, it wasn't flattering on me
links_reviews_text: the fabric was high quality but overall just not comfortable for hanging around the house. Nice color

Very versatile piece! I paired it with a tank and sneakers on the weekends, with a button-up and flats to work, and with sandals and a crop for brunch. Other reviews complain about it being tight around the calf - it is a bit tight, but wasn't bothersome to me. Also, you can always move the zipper on the pant leg an inch up and make it wider. Give them a try. As my sister put it, "Those look a lot cuter on than they did on the hanger."
At 5'9 these pants were much too short for me.
Fit very small. My daughter who is usually a 6 (and athletic build) could not get these up over her thighs.

links_reviews_title: If you don't want to get out of your pajamas....
links_reviews_text: These are high-waisted, comfy , loose fitting, but trendy pull on pants. The fabric is thick, high quality and the rose gold zippers on the ankle make them seem extra special. They are not the most sexy pants you'll ever wear on your butt, so choose something else for date night. These pants are for going to movies with girlfriends and for dinners on your cheat day! Since they are baggy, wear them with a tight fitting top just like the model shows.

links_reviews_title: A bit billowy from the knee to the ankle.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable high quality fabric but too billowy from the knee down. Love the zipper accents at hems.
These ran small. I didn't get to wear them. The length and shape of how the waist to the crotch area fit me were not flattering. I have curves and they didn't like these :)

links_reviews_title: Not good for what I was looking for.
links_reviews_text: The bottom of the legs were really tight on my calves and the material felt kind of cheap. I wanted to wear them with a silk blouse but ended up just having to return them since the fit was strange.
The waist is too high or maybe it’s the crotch that is too low. Even with that it still looks great! Heavy material and cute ankle zippers!!!

links_reviews_title: Weird fit and kinda thin but really cute
links_reviews_text: A very light knit (not very cozy, kinda thin), and strange fit in the shoulders, but very cute!

Love a cardigan with clean lines! White and navy stripes are very crisp and sweater is comfy material. The sleeves fit me just right which is unusual for a small, by the pictures I think it's suppose to be loose but on me it's right to the wrist. Looks best unbuttoned I think. Wore with navy tank and dark jeans.
It's the perfect addition to anyone's wardrobe - a cute little cardigan. Fits great and feels even better - the material is amazing. Not only would I rent this again, I would absolutely buy it!
I wore this to work with black pants. I tried to wear it closed but it looked better open. Really cute stripe pattern. Comfortable fabric. I recommend!

links_reviews_title: Good lightweight sweater but odd fit
links_reviews_text: It was an odd fit. The V in front was very wide and the sleeve sat oddly in the armhole. If you push up the sleeves it's less annoying. Too bad because the bold stripe pattern and weight was great.
Runs small in chest area. Awkward fit. Did not wear.
It's true to size in my opinion. I thought the cut was weird and it hung long on me. It just wasn't my style. That's why I gave it two stars.
This top fit well but I would have preferred a loosier fit to make it look more like it does on the model. The material is a bit thin so it's not going to keep you warm.
This is a beautiful, lightweight cardigan. Perfect for a summer/early fall evening.
Great sweater
I really liked the style and that it was light weight. The sleeves and shoulders are tight and just fit weird.
Simple and easy to wear.

Really stretched out throughout the day. There was only a large available when I wanted it so figured it would be fine since it's a sweater, although I am mostly a medium in tops. It just looked strange in the shoulders but I was able to make it work by buttoning it up. It stretched so much throughout the day, my arms were swimming it by 3 pm.

links_reviews_title: Rented for casual Friday at work, very cute with jeans.
links_reviews_text: Fit is a little loose but I would still say stick to your normal size.
Fits true to size, nice every day piece. Well made, high quality, light weight (can wear in the summer on a chilly night or in the office) and preppy in a good way!

Loved wearing this to work and got tons of compliments. So much more fun than a plain-colored blazer. The material is heavy and the structure is nice. It does definitely run a size small so if you want to button it go up a size. Even after sizing up closing the top button over my chest was a no-go but the others were perfect.

links_reviews_title: Got Compliments, but I Didn't Love It
links_reviews_text: Snug in the shoulders and the jacket showed signs of wear. The collar was floppy and the bust was also tight. Def runs small for Theory. Thick fabric and the colors were great. I got a lot of compliments, I just didn't love it.

links_reviews_title: Love the pattern, jacquard material, and colors.
links_reviews_text: Definitely fits small as other reviewers have noted-- I'm usually between a 4 and 6; wore a 6 and could have worn an 8 easily. There were some loose threads in the sleeves on arrival, but nothing terrible. It's a bulkier jacket, so not exactly slimming, but I still really enjoyed the piece. I wore it over a navy jumpsuit and it worked well for an early fall wedding.

I love a good statement blazer, and this one by Theory fit the bill. It was really well made and beautiful, and I got several compliments. It was very warm, too, so it's great for fall/winter/freezing cold office spaces. There was a bit of padding in the shoulders (just a bit) so if that's not your thing I would skip this one.

links_reviews_title: The pattern was just perfect for a Spring look.
links_reviews_text: The material is thick so it works best during the chilly days of Spring.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous pattern, fitted European cut, very flattering!
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful flattering jacket that I may have to own! The only down side is that the sleeve are a bit short - and I'm a petite. Extremely fitted but nice flair just above the hips.

links_reviews_title: Bright departure from the standard blazer
links_reviews_text: I have so many black, navy, gray blazers, I was eager to try this colorful, yet professional jacket for a board meeting. The cut is potentially flattering as in nips in at the waist and flares out, but on me it was too loose, so I belted it and it looked great! Beautiful embroidery, quality fabric, love the small lapels, which could be folded over or turned up for a more casual look. Looks great with jeans too, so a versatile piece.
This jacket has beautiful fabric. It suns a little snug, but still wearable. The sleeves were super short though. I would have preferred a longer sleeve. I got many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Great blazer for work and night out
links_reviews_text: Nice amount of stretch
It fits really well, I only button the bottom button and left it that way all day. Got lots of compliments
Very pretty but I would order a size up.
The jacket is has a great structured shape! I love how you can dress it up or down. The pattern isn't overpowering so you could wear it often.
Great material and pattern but a little tight through the shoulders

links_reviews_title: Best friend graduated with her PHD from Dominican University in Chicago
links_reviews_text: Show stopper

links_reviews_title: Great for work and after work
links_reviews_text: Such a bold and unique piece. The size 8 was a bit tight but not obvious to the eye
Great blazer it does run a little tight keep that in mind if you want to button It
Quite fitted and almost too small.

I guess I don't get it. Theory can make the body long enough (finally!!) for someone with a longer torso. The seams fit in all the right places, too, as long as you size correctly for the brand 1-2 sizes from your normal size. But they can't seem to make the arms of their jackets long enough! I'm sure that the intent is that they're bracelet length. If you were to choose to buy it, know that they can't let out the sleeves long enough. If you're great with bracelet sleeves, it's a nice, warm, winter weight blazer with great color.
Theres no give in this heavy, embroidered blazer. That being said, it is a true statement blazer. Lots of colors to pull through to balance an outfit.

I was eyeing this blazer, I was so excited to see it available on RTR! I ordered my true size and it fit as if it was tailored to me. The fabric is a bit thick, so it sticks out in profile in the back. The colors are stunning. One potential negative- I'm only 5'3" and the sleeves were barely long enough on me. Maybe with a long-sleeved button-down underneath it would be less obvious? Glad I got to try it, added some brightness to a cold winter day.

Paired with jeans and flats for my biz casual office. Many compliments. Great fabric and tailoring. Runs small. I should have sized i Up as i couldnt button and sleeves were shirt, but worked fine to wear open.

This was a good unlimited item. I wore this for a high stakes work meeting and an evening legislative reception. I felt comfortable and confident. This jacket felt tight if you wanted to lift your arms, type, drive, etc. but that may have been the cut. I would rent this again in the next larger size.

Funky blazer that brings a unique design to the party! Running true to size with no stretch to the fabric I recommend sizing up for backup. As the bust and midsection area are more fitted with no stretch you may want to consider sizing up for your primary size. I would recommend layering this with a light t-shirt and a pair of your finest slacks. I am 5'0" and the length of the blazer was right around the hip area. Great to make a statement at your next event !

links_reviews_title: The color and fit are amazing. Got a ton of complements from my coworkers. Will rent again!
links_reviews_text: Theory typically fits smaller. It was definitely very fitted and the fabric does not have much stretch. I did not button the top button and could not roll up the sleeves, but I was extremely happy with the fit. My coworker thought I had it tailored specifically to me. The fabric is thick and a high quality and the color is beautiful. The sleeves are a little short and can be worn with a button down or another top without feeling like they are too short.
Absolutely adore this. Definitely snug, but that's typical for the fabric. 100% would rent again.

links_reviews_title: LOVED, fit well, can dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Fit well, sleeves were long enough; usually wear a 4, the 6 fit perfectly

links_reviews_title: I wore it for a meeting, was a little too tight.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful! Runs small.
Runs small. I'm normally a 10/12. Rented this in 12 and I definitely could have gone up a size. Good quality.

links_reviews_title: Spice up a boring blazer look
links_reviews_text: Runs slightly small (I'm usually 0 or 2, but this fit perfectly on my shoulders), but also great for my #29 week bump! Fun blazer for work/weekend!
Wore this for a show. Loved the tailored fit and quality brocade fabric. I prefer the short sleeve length as I style it rolled up with a bralette & leather pants.

links_reviews_title: Either this is super tiny or i got the wrong size
links_reviews_text: So small I could barely even get it on my arms

links_reviews_title: So disappointing! This was sooo small and it flared like a peplum instead of laying flat.
This runs small, so I never wore the blazer. It looks great and is very high quality.
links_reviews_text: I would size up in this blazer. I wear a 4 and ordered a 4, but the arms were so snug and the back flared out when I buttoned. It is a great looking blazer and I may try a larger size in the future, but I was unable to wear it this time.
Hated the fit. The pattern was really distracting (in a bad way) and it was really bulky.

I usually wear a 2 in Theory blazers, occasionally a 4, so I was disappointed to get this in a 4 and not be able to move my arms at all. The print was cool, but the brocade fabric felt a little heavy and old fashioned.
Ran very small. Size up.

Got a lot of compliments because it's nice and vibrant and looks expensive. But beware - it is thick...definitely don't wear outside in the summer. Also it's a little small - couldn't button but fit in the arms so I still wore it.

Really cool embroidered blazer, definitely a jacquard feel to it, but very heavy! Couldn't wear it to my summer work event. Also runs very small, I'm a size 6-8 max and needed a size 10 just to be able to raise my arms

Based on the other reviews, I didn't think this would fit me but took a chance since it was the largest size. I'm typically a 10-12 and this 12 fit more like a 8. I'm usually OK with a bit of a gape in blazers and not buttoning given large chest, but this didn't cover chest at all with something like an 8" gap. It's pretty and nicely made but sizing is tiny.

Extremely fitted; I would order two sizes up. But the main problem was that the sleeves were noticeably short. I'm 5-5 and my arms are not long. These sleeves were noticeably above my wrist. Returned without wearing. Beautiful fabric though. Sigh.
It's a very pretty color and pretty neckline, but it's very thick and somewhat bulky. It was not itchy, as others mentioned.

The sweater is beautiful and the color is gorgeous. However, it runs REALLY small and it's very short. I'm usually a Small or 6 in mall store tops and I had to wear a size Large in this - and it was still small. It also resulted in an odd fit: it was tight in the chest, but loose through the arms and shoulders. I had to wear a cami underneath because it was just too short. It was also very itchy... I couldn't wait to take it off when I got home. I'd recommend wearing a long sleeved tee underneath for future renters.
This sweater was perfect for work. It was a bit heavier than I was expecting but is a great quality. Loved the color. The sleeves were a big long but I was able to roll them.

I love the sweater but it was a tad large. I should have ordered the medium which is my typical size for a fitted sweater.This sweater is a very tight knit. It would be great in very cold weather. It was 50-55 degrees today and I was hot. I did not need a jacket. I was complimented on the color.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, VERY warm but not too bulky
links_reviews_text: Nice structure (see image) and great, intense color! It is a really warm sweater, great for serious winter days. I wore a super thin thermo shirt under it to avoid itching and it worked well. New York winter can come!!

I wore a long sleeve shirt under because it was super itchy I wouldn't have lasted all day but after that it fit pretty well was definitely on the bigger side though. It was kind of bulky so the combo made me look bigger than usual. It was pretty though
Beautiful color. Thick knit. Runs small. I'm usually a size 6-8 and the large fit. But it's very hot. I didn't wear it very long. Anytime indoors was too hot.

Well, first of all, this was extremely itchy. I wore a mock neck long sleeve underneath but it wasn't enough because my neck was itchy. If you need to wear, you should wear it with a turtleneck. I honestly could not wait to take it off. It's a beautiful color and the fit was good overall but the length was short, so bending over and lifting your arms would leave you exposed. I just wish it were a different material.
I usually wear a medium but rented a large and am glad I did.

links_reviews_title: VERY warm and a bold great color.
links_reviews_text: Be mindful this sweater is extremely warm--i was sweating indoors with it on! Great color

links_reviews_title: Brilliant blue color - cold weather sweater
links_reviews_text: The neck is tight to pull over your head but once it's on - really pretty deep / bright blue color. Thick material. A bit cropped on me (5'8) so hit just above the hip which works with high waisted anything. Like that the turtleneck doesn't come all the way up the neck

This sweater fit me perfectly, however, I am petite and have a small bust so I recommend sizing up unless you want a very form fitting sweater. This sweater is also cut a little short, but it looked great with high-waisted black denim. It was not itchy at all, but I did wear a tank underneath as I was concerned the high-waisted jeans wouldn't be enough coverage... it was fine.

links_reviews_title: Super cute sweater. Way too small though
links_reviews_text: Much shorter than I expected. Awkward fit. It's really cute though, so may try getting it another time in a larger size

rich color. Great fit. A little itchy, but didn't bother me. I agree with others. This is a thick sweater and couldn't wear it too often because I rented it too close to spring and it started getting too warm.

This sweater really stands out because of the brilliant blue. I'm really sensitive to the feel of rough fabric on my skin, but I didn't react at all to this sweater. If I had the money I would have purchased this one.
This is a beautiful color sweater! Very thick and warm! Wish I could have worn it more! Just too big!

links_reviews_title: How do you fit your head?
links_reviews_text: Maybe I have a giant head, but it was such a struggle to fit this over my head. The color is beautiful but simply could not wear, as it was too difficult to put on.

links_reviews_title: Too itchy Gave me a rash
links_reviews_text: Fits well But itchy and caused a rash
Not a baggy sweater
Really nice thick warm sweater. I didn't love the neckline on me, so I only wound up wearing once, but it was definitely a very high quality piece!
EXTREMELY thick and warm. I was sweating wearing it.
The sweater was really itchy, hard to wear for a long period of time. Not super special overall.
The color is gorgeous. It's a little itchy but I wore an undershirt and was fine. Great for the couple of super cold days we had.

This sweater is beautiful. It's a great color blue and brings a nice pop to a cold winter day. I got lots of compliments every time I wore it! The fit is a bit boxy around the chest and armpits but still works for cold weather cozy vibe. Its also a little cropped so you'll need high waist pants. This sweater is also very very warm so be prepared to be cute and cozy!
Cozy, unique neckline, brilliant blue sweater. Perfect for ski hill.
Snug fit and very warm. Dresden sweaters are great quality.
Nice wool sweater. A bit itchy and short. Best to wear something underneath it.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color, details make it special
links_reviews_text: Beautiful weave, a warm and heavy (in a good way) sweater for every day.

links_reviews_title: Good fit and color but very itchy
links_reviews_text: I love the color the length and where it hit the waist as well as the sleeve length but the fabric was too itchy I couldn't wear it

links_reviews_title: I did not wear it is was too heavy and stiff.
links_reviews_text: the sweater is very heavy I think it weighs 10 lbs at least. too bad, the color is great and the detail is interesting.

Super warm and heavy sweater. If felt stiff. Some people might think it is itchy. The length is right at the top of the hips. If I had rented an x-small, it might have looked better. I got compliments on the color.
Fit was snug for a sweater but itchy. Need to wear tank or other underneath.

Beautiful sweater in stunning color. Got so many compliments on this sweater. Not itchy at all. Great sweater that I wore with jeans but would probably look good a bit more dressed up with black pants or skirt. Does run slightly small

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable, bright blue sweater. I had no issues with itching on neck line.
links_reviews_text: I got medium because small was not available and i was going for something more loose and warm, which the sweater provided. I wore it at 40 degrees and was comfortable.
This sweater felt as if it was made from the itchiest and thickest yarn available. I rented it to wear on a ski trip, but opted to wear something else that wasn't so uncomfortable.
Was a nice piece to blend into everyday wear.
Very heavy sweater with beautiful blue/purple color. I would purchase if could afford. It would be item I would wear with jeans or skirt. Great quality

links_reviews_title: True to size but a short hem
links_reviews_text: It's a thick and nearly itchy wool sweater so if you're sensitive to that wearing a cami like I did may not do the trick. Super warm a little body but snug. I wish it were a bit longer.
This sweater is a heavy knit, so it will keep you warm! It can be itchy, but it's fine if you wear a shirt under it - good for cold climates. The color is beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Too small and hits waist too high.
links_reviews_text: Nice color and heavy weight.

This little purse was so fun! I wore it to a black tie optional wedding as my statement accessory and it fit everything that I needed for the night - phone, lipstick, powder, ID/cards, and an Invisalign case. Loved it!
Rented this for a wedding and wore it the whole weekend. Plenty of room inside for the necessary goods. In good condition.

Rented this because another bag I ordered ended up being unavailable. This bag was perfect! It has card slots in the inside for credit card and ID. It fit my phone lipstick and kegs and was easy to open and close.
Love this bag! It fits all the essentials: some credit cards, phone, lip stick, and hand sanitizer! And it just adds a pop to any outfit.
Obsessed with this bag. Fit my phone, lipstick, keys, and had slots for credit cards/ID. Perfect size. Very shiny gold, great for formal event.
Fun piece. Great quality chain and materials. A little small, barely fit my phone (9+ with case), mirror and lipstick. Has pocket on the back for quick access.

This purse is great. It's just as good-looking in person as in photos. It went perfectly with the dress I wore, also from RTR. It was big enough to hold my phone, mascara and a tiny brush. Even my husband complemented it and I don't think he's ever given a purse a second glance before.
So cute minus the super unflattering butt situation
I was worried they might be heavy but were surprisingly not. Easy to wear, very comfortable. And so beautiful. Love the versatility.

links_reviews_title: Initially, got these for formal, but loved them so much that I wore them as everyday earrings after.
links_reviews_text: very comfortable, not heavy (do not weigh down earlobes)
These earrings are easy to wear, edgy, unique and fabulous!! I loved them! Would have bought them if I ever spent that much on accessories (I don’t), but would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for elevating an every day look
links_reviews_text: These are great. They are not too large and light enough I could wear them all day. A lot of the RTR statement earrings are very oversized but I wore these to a conservative workplace and for casual wear and they were the perfect medium size. You can also wear them reversed to change up the look. Highly recommend - I got many compliments on them.
These were even better than I expected. The weight was manageable and I was able to wear them all day. The mixed metals made them versatile for multiple looks. Definitely recommend!

Fits very comfortably on the body. I wouldn't wear this not tucked in. I thought it might be sort of grandma-ish but I recurved a lot of compliments and I think it fit into my professional work attire.
Runs large. Pretty colors. Slightly grandma. Had to re tuck a lot. Poofy sleeves a little like a pirate

links_reviews_title: I love the color and print.
links_reviews_text: A pit shapeless but is cute tucked into high-waisted jeans or skirt.
Wore this for work 2-3 times. Easy with black pants!

links_reviews_title: Super cute and great for spring. Got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_text: I got lots of complements but it was tricky to style since it runs large.
Colors and pattern were gorgeous, but it was way to big and looked sloppy. Might try again in a smaller size sometime.

Wore it 3 times. For work and casual weekend. Paired with tights and long boots. I loved the neck tie with a knot instead of leaving it like in the picture. Added more flair with that knot slightly on the left side of the neck. Beautiful print, great fabric and pleasing color.

links_reviews_title: Such a special blouse to dress up a pair of jeans.
links_reviews_text: I don't normally order items like this but I picked this up in the RTR store and so glad I did. I wore this tucked into high rise skinny jeans with a brown belt and felt very RL all night long. Love the flow of the sleeves and the open neck, not too low cut, but just low enough to be a little sexy. I plan to wear one more time to work, with the neck tied up. Love the periwinkle color and flowers. Great pop of color for fall but would be pretty in spring time too.
I didn't like the way it looked on me. Kind of aged me.
I rented this top again but in a size smaller this time, and it fit a lot better. It's a light weight, airy, material.
This is a really pretty blouse! I wore it with jeans, and it looked cute. The only downside was it wrinkled really easily, and I had a tough time getting the wrinkles out from being shipped.

links_reviews_title: Many compliments. Great patter and silhouette.
links_reviews_text: Despite being too large, I still wore it several times. Would consider purchase if fit was correct.

links_reviews_title: A little too Grandma for me
links_reviews_text: I thought this top was going to be cute but the cut was just too matronly.
Cute top, nice length that covers your bottom

links_reviews_title: Loved this top for spring/summer work wardrobe!
links_reviews_text: This is a very fun top for work. Light material, which is perfect for warmer weather. I wore it many different ways and loved it.
Loved the material. but the neck was a bit wide. It drooped down whee the tie is and I needed to wear an undershirt to cover up underneath it.

links_reviews_title: Felt like wearing a large bag
links_reviews_text: Was not happy with how large it was did not wear

I normally wear a small but for shirts like this I like to size down because I'm not a fan of super baggy, oversized shirts. I ordered the XS and it had the perfect amount of flow while also being a beautiful pattern! I wore it both to work and for a casual function.

Fun piece, I really enjoyed the print and the colors. I wore it tucked into high-waisted jeans once, and a pencil skirt the other day. That worked well, but I had also hoped to wear it untucked - but found it not as flattering, it felt too long.
Ordered the size large and it was too big to wear. If you're between a medium and large usually i would order down.
This nice print blouse runs big. The sleeves fit sloppy.
Loved the look and the shape. I usually wear a small but an XS fit perfectly. Very cute pattern and nice material. Can be paired with jeans for a casual look or dress pants for work.
This looked so beautiful online, I couldn't wait to get it. However once I tried it on, it was very unflattering. It's a boxy shape and the material is rough, not silky like the picture appears.

Debated wearing this to work or not, because it's an odd fit. The sleeves are super puffy and the body is very loose. I feel a little sloppy in it. Would not rent again. The only pros are that it's comfortable...

links_reviews_title: I sized down from L to M and it was still roomy.
links_reviews_text: The color is not as bright as in picture. In person it is more of a light blue/pastel purple.
Fit everything I needed for work and more. Laptop, accessories, book, flats, wallet. Gorgeous color and really liked the straps. Wish I could have kept!

Even though we never made it to the party, I wanted the bag as a "pick me up". I used it for shopping in my neighborhood. I loved the rich leather and deep navy color. I recommend it for every day, small party, and even for a wedding accessory.

I received this with the tags still on and the leather still stiff. The color is gorgeous and goes with everything. Loved the canvas straps and the small handles. I could fit a laptop, all my work stuff, an extra pair of shoes and more in here. Considered buying!

links_reviews_title: Photographs amazingly, nice details and comfortable
links_reviews_text: This is cropped but if you wear it with high waisted pants I don't see any problem with it. I wore it multiple times for an Instagram Event, a night event and even to work. The IG event is from the photos. The night out I wore with some Spanx faux leather leggings and sky high heels and for work I paired it with a high waisted pencil skirt. I got many compliments on all events. If it was in better condition I would consider keeping it, but it's a little too worn for the price.
As everyone else mentioned, the sweater is pretty cropped. I had to wear a black tank underneath to make it work appropriate. I also found it to run a bit wide. Overall though, super cute!

links_reviews_title: A perfectly sweet little cropped ditty
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous blush color with lovely detail along the shoulders. Well made and warm. It's cropped and a bit bat-winged, so not the greatest for layering. Material's surprisingly soft - not itchy! Overall loved and got a few solid wears before reluctantly returning.
Loved it but it's def cropped and doesn't allow for much up/down movement with arms

Loved this as a statement sweater. Arms were a little roomy - especially near the armpits - and fit was overall short. I have a short torso, so it worked for me, but you may want to size up if you have a longer torso.
Loved this sweater. Be aware that it is cropped very short and wouldn't be suitable for anyone looking for a standard sweater length.
I was worried with all the reviews about how cropped it was but it wasn't too cropped at all. I wear high waisted pants so it worked perfectly and it's a very soft material. I loved it! So cozy.

links_reviews_title: Cute date night sweater, too short for work
links_reviews_text: As the other reviews mention, this is a crop top. Lift your arms overhead and you might expose the goodies. It's super cute with a high waisted legging, Jean or leather skirt. Lots of compliments! Comfortable other than the crop situation.

This sweater is WAY more cropped than it appears in photos. I had skin even with high waisted pants (not pictured). Gave me a very boxy look too. It also lifts when you lift your arms, risking underboob. Otherwise, it's a nice yarn. No itching and cozy.
This was a cozy sweater that I layered with a white tank under. Sleeves were long, but overall cozy winter sweater.

I really loved this sweater but it was too cropped for me. I wish I had more high waisted pants to make it work because sweater is so cute and soft. You just need to have the right pants to go with the crop.

links_reviews_title: It is so cute. The color, the design and the material ... A must rent!
links_reviews_text: #everydaywear #girlfriendsweater
Rented this for casual wear/ date night and am in love with it. Definitely shows more brown in the photo- it's more pink irl. Also cropped a bit so perfect with high waisted jeans!

I may have just not realized this was cropped, but it was very cropped! I am between an XS and S in sweaters and if I lifted my arms up this sweater rose up all the way to mid-chest! Definitely wear with high waisted jeans and maybe an undershirt if you aren't looking for a cropped style

This was a weird fit. Love the tassels and color but it was very cropped. It barely met my high rise jeans and the arms are designed in a way that I could barely lift them without totally exposing my bra

There was nothing particularly wrong with this sweater, but it was a strange shape in the underarm area. It was much more cropped than the picture, even with high-waisted jeans. It wasn't itchy, which I was worried about!

links_reviews_title: Love this style! Very cropped though so be aware
links_reviews_text: Great sweater. Looks nice and fits cute. It was cropped on my petite figure so if your taller size up or plan on wearing something very high waisted with it. Did look a little worn out, but that's the nature of sweaters I think.
Super cute and soft. Looked great with high waist jeans. Really thought about buying it
Pretty sweater, but definitely more cropped than I realized from the photos.
This sweater was so cropped, it was too short even with high waisted jeans. Couldn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful soft hand. the color is beautiful and the yoke detail and tassles are gorgeous.
links_reviews_text: The only negative is that it's shorter than it appears in the model photo. It's definitely cropped and I had to layer a t-shirt under it. Still really cute and soft and cozy I wore it a couple of times.
sleeves were too short and its definitely a crop sweater. I wore high waisted jeans n would still show skin. Wore it with a same color shirt underneath and it looked good.

The top is shorter/boxier than it appears on the model. The bottom of the sweater hit right at my belly button making it too short for my comfort with even my high waist jeans. Perhaps sizing up would help
Super short sweater. The picture on the model is deceiving. Can only be worn w/ high-rise jeans unless you want your stomach to show. :)

Loved this sweater, but be warned that is is CROPPED. I paired it with high waisted jeans and the sweater barely covered my belly button. It's very cozy, perfect for an air conditioned office environment. Neutral and easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love, but WAY too short
links_reviews_text: I read the other reviews and knew this would be short, but woooow it was really short. Like, "if I raised my arms at all I'd be flashing people" short. I didn't have any jeans that were a high enough rise to make this doable without being a complete crop top. I tried to pair it with a skirt I ordered, but then it was just too voluminous in the middle. Super cute though, and not itch at all - I have sensitive skin so usually all sweaters itch me, but this one seemed fine! Wish it was a few inches longer!

links_reviews_title: Nice style, too cropped for me
links_reviews_text: The sweater was more cropped than expected, which was cute, just not for me. The detailing on the shoulders is lovely, but having broad shoulders already, this drew more attention to them than I'd like. Great piece for the right person.
I didn't realize this sweater would be so short! It was super soft but much too short!
This is a well styled sweater. But even with jeans that went over my navel, skin was exposed. Could not wear.

If this sweater was cheaper, I'd buy it in a heartbeat. Goes great with high waisted jeans or leggings or a little leather skirt. I thought the detail on the top was to die for. It is short, like the other reviews mention, which makes it a little tricky to style. But so cute! I'm sure I'll rent it again
This is cropped. I usually wear a medium but got a large. Even with sizing up I was unable to wear it :/
The color and detail are perfect. I just wish it was another inch longer. It's very cozy but shows all your ribcage when you lift your arms.
I love this sweater! It is def somewhat cropped so you need higher waisted pants or a skirt.

I should have listened to the warnings that this sweater was too cropped. I thought I would be fine since I'm short but at 5 feet tall this was still way too short on me. Overall it's true to size in the torso but there's something weird going on in the sleeves under the armpit area, it's like there is extra unnecessary material. It's a same because it's a beautiful color and cute detail.
I loved the color and the detailing, but holy moly, it's a crop top. I paired it with a high-waisted pant and designer belt, but it was not a flattering look once I sat down.

links_reviews_title: Super cute blush sweater with details
links_reviews_text: I really loved this sweater and adored the details. The only thing that would have been better is if it wasn't cropped so high. I wanted to wear this to work, but it was much too short.
Very cute, soft, non-itchy sweater. As others have said, it is cropped and looks cute with high-waist jeans. It is more of a tan color in person, not as pink as the photos suggest.
Its soft and comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Great piece to wear day into the night.
links_reviews_text: Very soft and comfortable. It is short, not quite a crop but could be on someone with a long torso.

I like that the sleeves are a little long on this, which seems very Zoe, but wish the hem fell about two inches longer. It was a borderline crop length, even on my short torso. Otherwise, really loved this one.

links_reviews_title: Love the color & paper bag waist!
links_reviews_text: Very flattering!! Pretty comfortable, although a little stiff. Very cute. Would recommend.
I love the pink color. The piece sent in the mail didn't come with the belt but fit just fine without it. It is a little loose fitting. I'd only recommend if you have an hourglass figure.
Wore these to church. Super high waist, ran TTS. Loved the color, style and length. Would have typically chosen these but I would rent again! The belt was missing from mine, but it still worked.

Would recommend ordering your true size - I sized up and was swimming. The pants sit at your waist, keep that in mind. Color is great, more pale than pepto. Material is light, which is good for warm weather. Does wrinkle easily.

links_reviews_title: Fun pink pants for a fun Monday!
links_reviews_text: Obsessed with these pants. Sized up, fit very comfortably. Truly wish I could purchase these. I'm short but the length was just right.
Cute pants are really easy to wear. They arrived a little wrinkled but nothing serious. Easy to Dress up or down. I would love to own these!!

links_reviews_title: Weird pleat location for me, but very high waist and cute color
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear these although there were several things I liked about them. I find it hard to find super high-waisted pants, and these were definitely high, and also fit my waist really well. The fit in the legs was good too. I unfortunately found the pleats in the front to be weird and give me the appearance of having a pouch that I don't actually have. Oh, well!

links_reviews_title: An Awful Look for a Large Person
links_reviews_text: I went out on a limb and rented these pants to broaden my fashion horizons. Clearly, too broad. My pair did NOT come with the tie shown in the picture. The pants were WAY too big in the waist and, even for high rise, the waist was way too long. I could have hiked these up over my boobs and I still would have had a droopy crotch. The pants looked like I needed a large belly to fill it out. I think that my thighs are a bit too large to make the flared bottoms look flared enough. This was a huge fail on in my books. Probably will steer away from culottes in the future.

Very cute! Would've been fun to wear as business attire- but easy to dress up for a night out. Loved the length and fit. It was just a little loose at the waist, but the big bow let me tie it tight. Very comfortable and easy to move in.

I rented these to spice up my work week and they definitely did! I wasn't sure about them when I first put them on, but I got tons of compliments from my coworkers, housemates, etc. They were comfy and not very heavy - a great transitional piece for spring!

links_reviews_title: Great for everyday in warm weather
links_reviews_text: Great casual culottes for warm weather. They are made with a thick cotton. Great color. Fitted high waist, which is a new look to me. I'm not sure I love that look, but I was happy to give it a try with these fun culottes. When sizing, rely on waist size. I usually would go for a size 6 because I don't like tight fitting clothes, but I made the right pick with a size 4 because the waist fit just right. Overall a great item to rent and I bet I rent them again.
Slightly large in the waist. Overall, good for everyday wear.
Adorable!
Good high waste. Needed ironing. Pleats are a little unflattering but if you embrace fashion in the name of a poofy tummy area, you'll be okay.
Didn't get it on past my butt - not made for an hourglass body

Sad that mine didn't arrive with the belt, because I really needed it to cinch the waist since the rest of the pants were pretty baggy. It was an unusual fit, as the pants were quite big except for a small section at the things where the fabric pulled. It's a pretty pink but these had been worn a lot. Opt for another high waisted pant - they have cute ones in lavender.
The fit of these is sooo off. Even if sized up, I probably would have had issues with it fitting elsewhere. These are meant for a more petite woman IMO.
Fits true to size, high waist, flattering pants

NOT for short, curvy ladies. The torso is very long-- so if you're short the fabric bunches in the front, giving you a pregnant look. Also, the pants are more like jeans-- not soft or floaty, (I am 5'3, 145lbs, hour glass shape)
A little poufy where the pleats were but cute with the bow belt

links_reviews_title: These were very cheery on a dreary winter day!
links_reviews_text: I really liked these except for the zipper and closure. There is a button inside but only a zipper with no clasp or anything to fasten at the top. I tied the bow over it because it looked strange.

links_reviews_title: Didn't quite work! A bit big. But gorgeous color.
links_reviews_text: Didn't quite work! A bit big. But gorgeous color.
These pants were nice, but the cotton didn't hold the color well so they just seemed like normal chino pants. The waist was comfortable though.
Great
This fit me around the waste and rest of my body but I believe I am too short for them, they bunched up in the front and did not look good.

links_reviews_title: Didnt love these on, I felt like the showed off all my problem areas- read baby belly.
links_reviews_text: A little higher than I would like- I have 5 foot 7 and they still did not sit properly.

These do fit true to size but just a little odd. I felt like the high rise was a little too high (which I never think) but almost like there was just extra fabric in the midsection (front and on my lower back). I felt kind of frumpy in them so I didn't wear them. I'm 5'3 and the length was perfect hitting 1-2 inches above my ankle, would have loved them if the waist area wasn't so off!
Didn't wear. Very unflattering on me. Don't flare out quite as much as on the model and are a thicker cotton material that isnt as drapey as they look on the model.
I usually wear 4 but tried these in a 6 based on some reviews, and they were much too big. The largest problem was they were super high waisted- they came up to my bra. Waaay too high to be wearable.

Wore these to work and got compliments all day. I was worried that he waist was a little snug, but it seemed to loosen and fit great throughout the day. Very comfortable. I put the belt off to the side instead of the front which really made the pants cute.
These were perfect! They fit amazing and look good with the little pink tie belt or another belt. They're a light material and perfect for summer. Need nude undies for them.
A few reviews said these ran large so I went with a 2. Normally I'm a 4 and unfortunately the 2 was too small.

links_reviews_title: I didn't get to wear them, unfortunately.
links_reviews_text: These pants just may not have been best for my body type, as I am pretty curvy. The sizing was correct in the legs and waist, but the fit was strange around the lower stomach area, as there was too much fabric.
Go for 2 sizes smaller

links_reviews_title: It's super cute in the picture- but that's it.
links_reviews_text: Really pretty blush color- but there is a pleat in the front that just should not be there.

Though it arrived without the sash, the pants were so cute! I got so many compliments on them and they were really comfortable. Due to the higher waist, they were a little big but it worked out. Also the front pleat can look weird if the waist falls too low.
Fit like a dream, so flattering! High wasted was adorable

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable pant, just not for curvy girls
links_reviews_text: If you have curves (Booty and thighs) this is not a flattering pant. The pleats in the front make a pooch form around your mid section. Very sad because the pants did make my butt look fabulous! Returned without wearing out.
The pants hit too high which makes them look like 1990s capris. The high waist and pleats combo is very hard to pull off.

These are comfortable, cute pants for spring. The material is a cotton, chino-like fabric so they are pretty casual. They can be dressed up a bit with a wedge, but they are definitely more casual than anything. They were REALLY comfortable though - I loved the high waist. I don't know that they are the most flattering if you have a belly... I'm 4 months postpartum and still not back to my normal size, with a bit of a pooch, and I don't know that they were the most flattering thing to wear. But they were comfortable and fun so I went with it!

This. This sweater was everything. With a jacket, without. With jeans, with skirts, for work, for play. It's a soft, medium-heavy weighted sweater with a chunky knit that sits right at the waistline. It's very versatile and I highly recommend it.

I did not like the fit of this sweater on me at all. Found it unflattering and frumpy. Hit me in the wrong place for my body shape, and it was too cropped to wear without something under it. Wool material seemed like it would not hold up after a couple of washes.
This sweater is shorter than I expected...I feel I need to keep pulling it down. Overall, I like the style, but the fact that it's short makes me not love it.

Not the most flattering on me but I still felt fashionable in it. I wore it alone one day and then dressed it up as pictured for a casual networking lunch. The only negative is that it was really warm for LA. Even in our "winter" it was too warm and I had to take it off as soon as I got home. It would be great if you live in a colder climate.

Per other reviews, this is cut very short - wore it to work with high-waisted jeans. It's chunkier than the site photos look, but I still thought it was pretty cute. Worth the rental for one wear but not worth keeping long-term.
I tried this on at the store, last minute. Usually wouldn't wear a large but liked how it fit. Super warm and soft! However, also looked a bit worn.
Kinda bulky but cute nonetheless. Wore w jeans to holiday party and layered w blank tank top for work since it was short
too large
Fits well.
Loved this sweater. It was so cozy and cute. My only problem is that the sleeves were bulky so it fit weird under jackets
Definitely cuter in person than on the app. Nice quality, cozy, flattering.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and got tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: Good fit and great transitional piece

links_reviews_title: Really wanted to love it, it's just a bit short.
links_reviews_text: The material, the details, the style is great. Maybe it just was too short for me. Should be described as cropped/short length.
Fit nicely, may be a little too cropped for some
Can dress it up or down. I wore it with a pencil skirt and boots.
Not inspiring. Big sack with arm holes. Showing signs of wear with piling. I didn't wear it.
It's short. Tall pants are a must

This sweater is perfect with a long shirt underneath and leggings. Looks very sporty. It's warm and comfy without feeling heavy or bulky. Hung beautifully and turned out way better than it looked in the pictures I saw.

links_reviews_title: Didn't work with the pants I thought it would go with.
links_reviews_text: Very cute, just not on me.
loved how casual and comfy, yet somewhat refined
This sweater was SUPER comfortable and cute. It fit like a crop sweater on me but maybe because of my large chest? It was great for the weekend.
Cute and cozy but too short for me
not flattering if you're top heavy, like myself. It would be totally cute on someone with a smaller frame
Soft and pretty, but didn't wear because too short in the front for my taste

I went two sizes up to account for the shorter length people warned about in other reviews, which meant that the neck opening was a bit larger and baggier. It's cute and fun to wear, but not the most flattering draping.
Great fit super cute
The sweater is very boxy and isn't very flattering, I wish it were a little longer. But it was very comfortable and warm.
Just very short and boxy - i wore with high rise jeans.
Loved this sweater - soft and beautiful. It was a bit short on me, as I have a longer torso, but I wore a longer l/s short under it and it worked well
Fit well. Fun sweater.
Comfy short sleeve, quality material. Nice Color
Comfy fit good quality
Very boxy and unflattering. I'm typically a size 4, but the small was short and still boxy, but not in an attractive way
Unique style, love the boxiness.
It's kind of boxy and then the fabric doesn't feel high quality
Great fit. Can wear to work or on the weekends.
This sweater wasn't my favorite. It was comfy but it was way short .
Cute top...too basic/boxy

links_reviews_title: I’m obsessed, I want this coat
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately I live somewhere warm and rented this for the cold NYC trip I was taking. Absolutely adorable, received complements everywhere I went, even from men. Just the best!
So many compliments on this one! Absolutely loved it for an everyday coat. I would definitely add it to my closet permanently.
Absolutely love!! Perfect winter jacket for Texas weather and the length is perfect for me
I loved wearing this coat in different outings. Gives a cool vibe to the look.

This is such a great travel jacket! I wore this on vacation in Spain in winter and it was warm but not too warm (40-50 degrees). It also doubled as a great blanket on the plane.
