It can add bulk around the hips where the pockets are so it probably doesn't look super flattering straight on if you hands are in the pockets. Just be mindful if you decide to take pictures in this coat!
Comfy and easy to style with everything. I'm usually a medium but if I rent it again, I would size down to a small. This was great for 40 degree weather.

I rented this coat for vacation and wore it everyday for a week. The coat extended to around my knees and was very straight (I would have preferred for it to taper in a bit at the waist to give some shape). I wore in in about 50 degree weather with fairly thin layers underneath and was warm enough but not overheated (although I was pretty constantly walking). There was plenty of room for a scarf or thick sweater, the outer pockets were deep and there was an inner pocket as well.
Very comfy. Wish I could've had a slightly smaller Size though
So it's not really a coat or maybe I'm just used to structured coats it's more like a hybrid cardigan/layering piece but still somehow warm

I absolutely love this coat and I sort of want to keep it! It is super stylish and easy to pair with other clothes - I wore it for work as well as for a wedding where I wore a black dress underneath. It's the perfect balance of formal and casual depending on how the rest of your outfit looks. It is also super warm and cozy and comfy. I would rent this again and again!
Very soft. Good for coldish fall weather (45-55 Fahrenheit)

links_reviews_title: Nice, but didn't feel as luxe as some other coats
links_reviews_text: I liked it for a short term rental. The XS was a little large on me so I'm glad I opted for that and not the S. It's pretty warm for what it is - turns out the weather that week wasn't as chilly as I thought it'd be so I didn't get as much use out of it.
The coat is pretty and kept me warm in 45 degree weather with a long sleeve under, and 30 degree weather with another sweater under. It was just a bit boxy but it served its purpose

The material is soft, M fit perfectly, and the coat is warm without being too heavy. I am bummed because the coat came with a missing button, so I can't button it up to stay warm. I would have probably bought it otherwise.
I loved this coat. Was warm and worked with business and business casual outfits. Would rent again.

I still have this jacket and should probably just purchase it at this point; I have worn it every single day both dressed up and down! I receive compliments every single time I wear it. It's not necessarily warm but I pair it with a sweater and a nice big scarf if weather calls for it. It's very chic and ties any outfit together. Would also be great for any age.
This coat fits well and is very warm! The inside feels nice and cozy. The outside is a little worn out and the fabric is balling up like old sweaters do.
It fits true to size, but is really shapeless and wasn't really flattering. I feel like it would work better for someone with a straighter body type

links_reviews_title: Great coat, perfect length and true fit!
links_reviews_text: The only reason I rated as 4 instead of 5 stars are the pockets - they are so far to each side of the coat that when wore open or closed, they are too far back to be useable at all. If the pockets were more normally placed, this coat would be 5/5 for me!

links_reviews_title: I should of sized down to a 6 at it was a little big on me.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful jacket and received many compliments

links_reviews_title: Not warm enough to be a snow jacket
links_reviews_text: This jacket definitely fit tts for Lululemon (a 6 being a small). The color of the jacket was nice but it was not warm enough to be a snow jacket. It held up fine in the Bay Area won but I could not imagine how cold I would have been in actual winter weather.
Very warm but great style and elevated compared to other puff jackets. Zippers get stuck like everyone is saying, but hasn't been a huge problem for me.

links_reviews_title: This coat is so warm and looks great! I've received so many compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a size up because I know Lululemon runs small but this coat was a bit too big for me. Besides it being too big, everything else is great!
Definitely too short for work but perfect for a weekend or vacation. It was super comfortable but ran a bit small.

links_reviews_title: Cute... but runs small AND big
links_reviews_text: I like the style! However, it was way too big around the waist (like a 2-3" gap) but then true to size/tight around the butt area! Good for a day, glad it's a rental!

I'm usually hesitant in buying tighter skirts, but this skirt is fit just right and hit mid thigh, which is where I had hoped it would hit. It's something I could easily wear to work and then out afterwards. The asymmetrical panel also adds an interesting touch. Overall, love this skirt and will be renting it again!

links_reviews_title: Cute, easy, COMFORTABLE, flattering statement skirt!
links_reviews_text: Wore it to an all white party and it was such a cute piece to break up my white a little bit. It was comfortable and fit so well. The material is a little thick however so it's more of a fall skirt but it's still short so I wore it in the summer!
Loved this skirt so much that I bought it! Runs a bit small though - I recommend sizing up.

This skirt was adorable. It had a vintage 1960s vibe but the asymmetrical cut gave it a modern look. The front panel was forgiving and helps cover your tummy. The sizing a was a bit funny as other reviews noted. It ran big around the waist and tight around the hips. Glad I ordered the 8 and not the 6.
Usually I wear a 0 or 2 but they only had a 4 - fit nicely!
I am glad I listened to other reviewers and went one size up. This does run small. I rented it for work but it was still too short, so I just wore it on a weekend.

Cute skirt - short, but opaque black tights and a conservative turtleneck balanced it out. One annoyance: the lining rode up a lot. If you're slim-hipped, no need to size up like I did (though the looser fit helped with the length).

The style of the skirt is really cute but the fit was just odd. I sized up but the waist was way too big, yet the hips would've been too small and the skirt way too short if I had went with my regular size. Since the waist is large, it almost has to sit around my hips instead.

links_reviews_title: It came 2 days early which I loved. Takes the stress out of worrying about fit and it working out
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 10, wore the 12. Loved the skirt. Several compliments.

links_reviews_title: Fits well, super cute, received many compliments
links_reviews_text: True to size, good length

This skirt was perfect for my friends casual bridesmaid luncheon. It's not too short/not too long. It prob would have looked better with black otk boots but I wore it with white booties. Would rent again!
Fit was perfect. Not too short as others described. Comfortable. Stayed just below the natural waistline and paired nicely with a fitted sweater.
This skirt fit so well and was so flattering. I typically have a hard time finding skirts long enough to cover my bum. I received so many compliments and would definitely rent again!!

links_reviews_title: Cute skirt for fall or winter
links_reviews_text: Skirt was comfortable but a little short. Ok for work if paired with black tights. I also wore with over the knee boots. If you have a booty it can be a little tighter and shorter on the back but again ok with tights.
Just a bit smaller and shorter than I had expected, but super cute!!

Runs a bit small- I wore the two which worked out well to wear it high waisted with a cropped sweater, but the 4 might have been better. Comfortable and cute for girls Christmas Party. Everyone loved it
This skirt is adorable for the winter! Fits true to size. It is short, but with tights is so cute! The front flap is faux wrap so no issues with too much showing.

Looooved this skirt! I'm usually a 2-4 but more of a 4 so I nervous to rent this skirt since all that was left was a 2. But it fit amazingly!!!! I LOVED it and wore it 3 different times before giving it back. Got so many compliments. Such a fun winter skirt that could work day to night.
There was no stretch of the material too small
The fit was a little snug in the hips but overall it fit well. It is short it's a must to wear tights

links_reviews_title: Tight if you have a booty!
links_reviews_text: Super cute skirt. I was bummed I couldn't wear it. I'm a true size 6 in the bum (which is what I ordered) but wasn't able to wear it because the black slit underneath poked out a bit due to how tight it fit my booty. If you're on the flatter side, this is SUCH a cute skirt!!

links_reviews_title: Ran way too small and short!
links_reviews_text: So short and ran very small.

links_reviews_title: Cute skirt. Fun and classic with a twist.
links_reviews_text: I liked the fit. Was a little short in the back, but was fine for the type of event I wore it to.

links_reviews_title: For those who enjoy playing up textures and prints in their work environment
links_reviews_text: Thick for the summer; perfect for June, not for July.
Very cute, looks like it does in photos. Fit pretty true to size and the material is nice and thick. I enjoyed wearing it.
Great length but wasn't snug on my waist which made it slightly unflattering.
the quality wants great, the material was thinner than expected and felt kind of cheap.
I paired this with SW over the knee boots and it looked awesome.
Overall it is a basic/unimpressive. Could not wear it.

Like other commenters, I sized up and this was still very small. The skirt is well-made enough that it was wearable even though it was very snug. I wore it to work with opaque tights but was self-conscious all day because of how short & tight it was. Thank goodness for the longer flap across the front.
This skirt was adorable, but runs very small. Size up.
Was super cute but definitely a little snug around the hips which made it a little shorter for work but I would definitely rent again.
I sized up based on the other reviews but found it was too big on me - I made it work with turleneck though! Cute for work and warm!
Definitely a little shorter and smaller than I imagined but I still wore it to work - glad I sized up! I was so tempted to buy this!

I found this ran just a smidge large in the waist, so a 4 was fine for me. If you're in between sizes I would choose the smaller unless you're tall (extra length might help). For me, being 5 ft 3in and 134lbs, this skirt was perfect. Not too short, not too long. For work you need tights, but for a date you could do either. I wore it with black tights, a black turtle neck sweater body suit, and black chunky heeled platform booties. I loved it and wish it wasn't so expensive even with the Unlimited discount or I would have kept it! I got so many compliments!
Lil tug in stomach, perfect length
Fit well - like the wool fabric and was very flattering
I felt uncomfortable wearing it out it was too short for me.

links_reviews_title: The quality and size was perfect for my lifestyle
links_reviews_text: Loved this bag! Wish I could have kept it
Rented this for the pop of color during sprint in quarantine. Very cute it and wore it for several virtual meetings. Small fit well the only thing is that the shirt is a little boxy at the bottom.
It's stretchy and cool and I love it
I loved the fit of this top! Sleeve length was flattering and it looked really cute with high waisted jeans and booties for my sushi date night.
Love the look made me feel very retro and ready for work!
Very true to size! I was a little warm wearing it but the colors are amazing and I got tons of compliments
It was quality material - stretchy, form fitting, light. Nice pop of color! The fit was normal
I wore this twice, once with black denim and once with a pencil skirt. It's a really versatile sweater that holds up in any weather. I really like the longer short sleeves.

Light weight sweater material with a little stretch. Order your size or size down if you like a snug fit. I prefer a sz M but it wasn't available so I got a sz L. It was bigger than I wanted but was able to play it off. Not sure I would order this by itself as I LOVED the contrast stripes with the skirt.
I love this set! It was such a beautiful piece and I loved pairing it with the skirt. The pieces are pretty true to size and I got a lot of compliments!
Loved the colors, print, fit, and texture. Very fun work look. Lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Great color and fit. I received a bunch of compliments, #nailedit with my selection.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, no cons. If you want a tighter fit size down.

links_reviews_title: Love the color but the fit is a little big
links_reviews_text: I love the color and the design of this shirt. Really cool vibe! The Xs runs a little big. Probably won't keep but it was fun to rent!
I cant remember which reporter it was but she had on this exact sweater from Tori. I thought it was cute and it looked great on her. I enjoyed wearing it but it was nothing special for me.

Really cute in theory but was just a little baggy in the wrong places (my arm puts) and a little long. The fact that it ends in a white stripe kinda looks like you're wearing an undershirt. Overall cute. Would rent again but west with jeans I can tuck into rather than over stretch faux leather pants. Consider sizing down.

links_reviews_title: Bright and sunny top with flattering sleeve length
links_reviews_text: I rented this in the dead of winter to cheer me up, ha. I opted for the medium after seeing other reviews and thought this fit well for my frame. The fabric is pretty stretchy and the length is great- I love that it hits me at mid-hip. The colors are obviously pretty bright. I wore it with a black cardigan for warmth but it could be fine without another layer in warmer weather.
Super fun to wear such bright colors. Comfortable outfit!

The detail line is black and the colors are vibrant and warm. Very stretchy so could have sized down for a more fitted look. I didn't get the skirt which I regret and wore black slacks which stilll looked great. I would rent this again with the skirt.
I love this set! The rtr store near me only had the Top in a Medium, but it fits well overall and doesn't feel tight. With the skirt it falls longer, but a slip under the skirt hides the shirt lines
I think I will wear it with black jeans instead of the skirt, but the colors are amazing and the material super stretchy. I could have gone down one if not 2 sizes.
Super cute! Loved the colors, knit, stretch. Only complaint are the sleeves are a bit of an awkward length.
Loved this outfit! I ordered a size up assuming that it would run small because it was a knit but I should have ordered my usually size because it ran true to size. Got tons of compliments!
the item i got is super worn out, the white stripe is actually no longer white
True to size

I rented this and the Mara Hoffman orange skirt to be Global Warming for Halloween! it was a great costume, got compliments all around. the top was really comfortable-- but the white stripes are actually pinkish up close? not much of a difference at a party, but a little odd... anyway, loved it!
Loved the colors, fabric, and fit of this top. Looked great with a pair of dark wash jeans. Would rent again in the summer or fall.

links_reviews_title: Great color, don't love the fit
links_reviews_text: I have broader shoulders and this was not flattering on me. I also wanted to tuck it into a high waist jean and it didn't sit right because of the material

links_reviews_title: Very cool top, tons of compliments, bright, fun and retro!
links_reviews_text: Fit very well, flattering and cool, my favorite so far!

links_reviews_title: A little short. Not something you can lift your arms in and not show your midsection.

links_reviews_text: Wore top and bottom as an outfit. The navy stripes and band are great. Compliments all day. Dress up or down. Comfy and lightweight sweater material. Great for fall!

Cute but should have gotten an xs. Small was a little too baggy on me. Wanted a fitted look. Super bright so had a hard time getting myself to put it on when I was getting ready for work but if you like that it is great.

links_reviews_title: This piece was cute and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: The fit was just right and the fabric was light with a little stretch.

links_reviews_title: A beautiful design - looks like the sunset. I received a lot of compliments when I wore this.
links_reviews_text: Really nice fit and flattering
I wore with the Theory Fire Opal pants and they looked great together. Very comfortable, material is light weight and stretchy.
True to size

links_reviews_title: Disappointed that I could not get this in the M which would have been a better fit
links_reviews_text: The sweater is cute and the colors are just my style, I only wish I could have exchanged the size for a M due to there being a lot of fabric/ generous cut... I think it would look best a bit more fitted. Wore it several times, nonetheless, and received compliments on the bold color and retro look.

Bright and bold, very comfortable, fits true to size. To me, given the $200ish price tag, a perfect example of why RTR Unlimited exists. In no world would I ever think this top was worth paying $200 for, but it's fun for work or casual wear.

links_reviews_title: Because the skirt did not fit, I kept this top to wear with a black skirt.
links_reviews_text: The material is non-breathable. I wore it for half of the day--I couldn't take it.
Fit me perfectly with the perfect amount of stretch over my 34D chest! A cute, sporty look for work.

links_reviews_title: Runs large, not a flattering knit fit
links_reviews_text: I thought I would like it but I didn't.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful colors - warning - the color is navy blue, not black!
links_reviews_text: Loved this top. I dressed it up under a suit at work and then wore it with jeans over the weekend.

I didn't expect this sweatshirt to be cropped, but was pleasantly surprised. The quality is good but nothing insane (I would not pay $300 for it). It's not particularly cozy - more of a rugged/grungy look.
Great little sweatshirt! Perfect length for high waist jeans and skirts. I wore with a jean skirt and with black jeans. True to size. Sleeves are slightly "dolman" style so can look a bit bulky.
This was one of my favorite rentals so far. I love sweatshirts that are not too long and do not have a hood. The sweatshirt is warm and goes with a lot. It's also very warm.

Excuse the messy room— this piece was really fun I wore it to work for a day of photoshoots and design interviews. It was a little snug so the XS is very fitted. I loved it styled over a dress but it was a bit too cropped for my liking with denim. I would rent again but opt for a M or L for an oversized fit.

links_reviews_title: Felt like this sweatshirt was made for me! Its comfy and cute!
links_reviews_text: It's a little fitted....so if you like a looser fit, you may want to size up!
Medium weight, perfect for a spring day. Cropped but not too much.

links_reviews_title: Didn't want to send it back
links_reviews_text: Loved this! Super cute and fun

This is meant to be a cropped sweater so I would keep that in mind. But it's a wonderful sweater it was very soft and warm and the print on the front was so fun. It went very well with the Delfi skirt I also rented

links_reviews_title: Smaller than what I was looking for
links_reviews_text: I was hoping for a bigger/baggier sweatshirt. This felt over washed and a bit stiff and small. It didn't have any give to it.

Cute sweater/shirt. The material was a little heavier than expected. I didn't end up wearing it because it was too small/tight on me. The arms were tight and the shirt was just at the top of my jeans. I would give it another try but probably rent a medium or maybe even a large because I want this top to be comfortable and casual. Looks like the photo though.
Love this, but it is very cropped and fitted.
Nothing special. Not particularly comfortable or flattering or attention grabbing. I felt underwhelmed.
Love this sweater. It was cropped but since I’m short hit right at my waist. The fit is less Boxy than I thought which was a pleasant surprise!
Good, sturdy sweatshirt. Not particularly baggy, and cut kind of short, but not cropped. Probably glows in the dark
Super cute sweatshirt but it was much tighter fitting than I expected it to be. Also more cropped than I thought!
It's a sweatshirt... the design is cool and the material is nice, but it didn't do anything special for me.

Everyone loved the design of this. I got a size larger because I have longer arms but otherwise it fit perfect everywhere else. It was warm without being thick but the shape of it is supposed to look a little big which looked nice.
It is so cute and comfy but it was so small. I usually wear a size small and got a medium so it could have that baggy feel but the medium was tight and short on me.
Didn't find the fit very flatting on my. Found it to be a little small overall.
I'm 5'3 and it was really short on me. Not flattering at all
The fabric isn't very soft but the fit is super cute and I like the printed detail

This was just ok. I usually wear a medium in rag & bone, but this felt small on me. As others mentioned, it was on the shorter side and the shape was somewhat boxy and unflattering on my short, curvy frame. Also, the fabrication was a terry type sweatshirt material rather than the soft cozy kind I was hoping for for winter.

This is exactly as you'd expect l. It's sweatshirt material and print on sweatshirt. It's fun. It runs a bit short waisted. You'll need something under it or can rock the belly vibe or high waisted pants.
Nice material. A little short and boxy. Runs a little large on the arms.
Cozy French terry lining and great embroidery. Got a lot of compliments on this and didn't want to take it off before going to bed. The fit was perfect for me but it may run small for some.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Got so many compliments too!
links_reviews_text: It runs a little short, so wear with high waisted jeans
I'm 5'9 and so only works with high waisted jeans. It's cute but no wow about it. Just regular sweater. Is very small, I'm a 32b/c and it's borderline too small for me.
Looks great, fun for lounge or casual going out, but not that soft or comfy.
This top felt cheap even though it was a new arrival and it looked frumpy on me.

links_reviews_title: I THINK I SHOULD BUY THIS
links_reviews_text: This was in my first RTR batch but I think it's love. I feel cool and chic and effortless. I feel like I can kick ass at my job or start a band, which is my ultimate vibe.

I wasn't really planning on wearing this coat but the occasion happened to come up where I didn't want to wear my normal puffer and I was really happy that I had this on hand but I would not call this warm. it was very stylish and I made it work. TRUE TO SIZE. if you want to layer in colder times size up. I had to layer in winter and was still cold. #fall

links_reviews_title: Size down for the perfect work coat
links_reviews_text: Warm and cozy but wish I had rented a small

links_reviews_title: cute pattern & print for late winter.
links_reviews_text: wide in shoulders

links_reviews_title: Nice, looked a little worn but that's the pattern
links_reviews_text: I liked this, wore it twice. The pattern is a little weird, almost made it look more worn than it was. Worked for a nice night out over a black shirt dress.

Enjoyed wearing this coat for about a week - loved the dark print and the soft material. For me, it ran a little snug in the shoulders and across the back, and I couldn't layer it over anything bulky.
The fit was perfect- not too tight, was able to wear a blazer under it, almost purchased!

links_reviews_title: Fun print but subtle enough colors to add a pop of interest to any outfit!
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear and flattering silhouette.

links_reviews_title: Chic, warm, and has the ability to amp up a simple look!
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly. I am 5'5 and thought the length was perfect with jeans, a skirt, or a dress!

links_reviews_title: Nice Addition to my NYE Outfit
links_reviews_text: It was almost not cold enough in my Southern town to wear a coat on NYE but I wore this one anyway and it looked great with my bright pink silk shirt and houndstooth ankle pants. Had to return it quickly but would have worn it many more times if I could have. Leopard print is subtle. Note that there is at least one more color besides black and tan - it looked almost like an army green to me. Would rent this one again - easily.

Overall, I LOVE this coat, the fabric, colors, length, and everything is amazing. My only complaint is that it is a big smaller than usual. Got the XL and I feel that it's too tight if I wear a thick sweater underneath - considering all of my coats are L/XL it does seem this runs a bit small.

I loved this coat! It's very comfortable and the pockets are deep. The color and subtle pattern make it easy to pair with almost anything. It's not the warmest, but mine was big enough to comfortably fit a sweater and scarf underneath. Very nice coat!

Please note the colors are navy blue and beige. When I looked at the image online I thought it was blue with white. Great fit though. Perfect for the summer and spring time. Light weight and super comfy.
Elastic waistband isn't super forgiving if you're wearing a form fitting top so keep that in mind! Otherwise it's really cute, and pretty thin fabric that's good for summer.
Good summer skirt. It's actually navy not black, my top in this pic is black. It does bunch a bit weird which is why I knocked a star off, but good for a one time wear.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite rents so far
links_reviews_text: I am obsessed with this skirt! It's so versatile and comfy and cute. I haven't returned it yet and I'm not sure when I will!

links_reviews_title: Perfect midi skirt staple to make any outfit!
links_reviews_text: Length was perfect, especially if you're tall. Waist is elastic so seam of the skirt looks a little cinched in some places, but super flattering and hugs in all the right places!
Was only able to wear this for work (because of the weather) but would rent again and wear for everyday! Might buy this.
Size up! The elastic waistband is incredibly tight. I had the XS, but should have gone w S

links_reviews_title: Comfy but fit a little odd
links_reviews_text: The material is soft and the skirt is very comfortable. Loved the style but the two darts in the back looked kind of funny. I wore a twin-set so it was covered up.

links_reviews_title: Goes with everything and Midi length

links_reviews_text: LOVE. This skirt is so flattering. I wore it with a t shirt tied in a knot and heels to work, put on a body suit and moto boots to wear on a date. Later in the week I styled it with platform sneakers and a crop tank top. I got so many compliments, this skirt was amazing.
Great skirt with a flattering shape.
This skirt is very pretty and versatile. I wore it twice - once to a dinner and once to work. Very comfy.
Has a nice swing to it, good fit.

This is a nice basic skirt, it's cut on the bias and pretty flimsy, so if you're self conscious about your belly, might not be the best option. It runs small for sure. The M fit me perfectly and I typically wear a S or a 4, occasionally a 6 in brands like Reformation and Mara Hoffman.

This jacket was very comfortable and soft. The material is more Sherpa-esque than that of a traditional peacoat which made it fun and different! I would size down in the future as this was a little large on the shoulders and waist. With the jacket being so long that gave it a very oversized look which I didn't love. But good for wearing over thick sweaters!

This coat is fun and cozy and I got so many compliments - really spiced up my outfit and also kept me warm. The only thing I'll say is that it does run oversized, which was ok with me but if you're looking for a more fitted look, you may want to try to size down.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I kept it for a month!
links_reviews_text: This coat got me through the holiday season in style. While not overly warm, it is big enough to allow you to add layers underneath. The coat commands attention. I wish it had one more button to keep more of the coat closed in the cold, and the collar flips up in an odd way, but all worth overlooking to wear this one.
Loads of compliments in this! I ordered a small but it still had room for a semi bulky sweater underneath.

This was perfect for 40-50 degree weather on thanksgiving. The buttons are pretty loose (and there aren't enough of them) but overall a great comfortable coat for cold weather. Probably not enough for below freezing temps though.

links_reviews_title: Love this coat; warm and bright and plaid!
links_reviews_text: I wore this coat on two chillier days in October in NY, and it was great! It really added to the style of the overall outfit, and was warm to boot! I am typically a size 2 or 4 and rented the XS which worked well. The sleeves were roomie enough to wear a sweater underneath. I would definitely rent this again!

This coat was soft and fluffy and kept me warm in 45(ish) degree weather. Only reason for 4 stars is because the top button wouldn't stay buttoned because the coat is nearing the end of its life. Other than that, excellent coat!

links_reviews_title: Cozy and on trend but not terribly flattering on my body type
links_reviews_text: New with tags and true to size. Fit well over a bulky sweater and I was able to button it easily but it was not terribly flattering when I buttoned it. Also the sleeves were a touch too long on me. Cute and on trend but maybe better suited for someone taller
I want to own it!
Super comfy and warm without being super heavy
SOFT. COMFY. Great color/pattern. Only thing is that its a little big in the chest/torso area than I would like. That's why I chose the XS and with a scarf that alleviated the size issue

links_reviews_title: This coat is super comfortable, warm and makes a great statement dressed up or down.
links_reviews_text: Fit seems true to size
Fit is perfect. Layers with sweaters nicely. Colors are perfect and go with so much! I hate to return it.
Fits pretty big.
For more casual days I wear this coat all the time and I get so many compliments. It's fun but still professional. I would buy it if I could!!

links_reviews_title: Cozy, but not as polished as I'd hoped
links_reviews_text: Much more of a plaid teddy coat than it looks in the pics. I ordered an XL and it fit and buttoned, but def looked better when it was open - when buttoned, it had more of a robe effect and wasn't my favorite. It was very warm though! and came to a little above my ankles (I'm 5" 2')
Cute and cozy coat. Wore to New York and kept me warm. Was good length for longer dresses underneath. Liked it a lot
I've never had so many compliments on a coat before! Loved everything about this coat. The pattern was perfect for the holiday season, it was very warm, and I loved the fit. Would rent again!
Big in the shoulders. I probably got a size too big. But I still loved it.
I have worn this once & am already in love. It is stylish & warm. Received non-stop compliments!!

links_reviews_title: Amazing and dramatic. Dress or down.
links_reviews_text: Wore for rooftop party in LA. Very sexy and personally was not able to wear a bra but it looks amazing on! Would imagine would look best on tall women due to the length!

This is a beautiful, light piece. I wore it buttoned at first, but it looked & felt better unbuttoned. I originally picked it because it looked turquoise- but it is green with light blue flowers. It was pretty comfy as well.
Be prepared to show some skin...

So pretty in person! You can wear with a cami underneath or not, depending on the look you're going for. As I'm more on the busty side, had I gone no cami, I would've needed to use boob tape (I use brassy bra) in order to get the right amount of support without my bra showing. I went with the cami so I could wear a normal bra, and it was for more of s casual weekday date with my husband. It also looked very cute with denim shorts for a daytime look.
A little odd, but fun. I have broad shoulders so it was a little tight, but I anticipated this and order a size up.

I should have gotten an XS instead of an S. It was a little big. Cute print and I got lots of compliments. I wore it as a duster because I'm so short it looked like smock when buttoned. Sleeves are gorgeous.
I loved the pattern of this duster! Great for summer! The elastic sleeves & buttons were a bit awkward though. Fits true to size. Not my favorite piece.

I loved this fun top. It was perfect to wear with high-waisted jeans. I didn't feel exposed or uncomfortable with a high-rise bottom, but if I was wearing low-rise, I might have felt differently. The XL just fit me. The arms were pretty tight and I couldn't move them with as much ease as I would have liked, but it still was able to button and I wore it to a lunch date with no issues. Fun top to try with a sexy spin! <3

links_reviews_title: Super Fun/Flowy Top, Great For Festivals
links_reviews_text: I wore this top to a music festival in San Francisco, where it can be a bit cooler. It kept me super warm and was super different and fun! The only thing is the arms are pretty tight, I probably would have been better off in a small, but I was still able to manage the XS and be comfortable!

I wore to work with a fitted black cami underneath (ugh dress codes!) but totally would've rocked this with nothing underneath if I wore on the weekend. The fabric is super sleek and flattering, didn't gather any static, and the slightly ballooned sleeves were so chic! I loved, and will rent again :)
The fit was perfect from length to width to coverage on the boobs. There are so many different looks that I will probably be renting multiple times.

First off i want to mention i did size up to a medium because i have a wide rib cage and was concerned. However i typically wear size 4 and could have definitely worn a small. With that being said it was gorgeousssssss! Flows when you walk and at 5'3 it didn't touch the ground. I wore a lace bralette under because i was going out with family but you can do a stick on bra or pasties with this. Pair with layered chains and jeans or shorts and you have the perfect summer outfit. A little more stylish than a typical maxi. Will definitely rent again!

This top was a hit! I received compliments all night. Front is super cropped, so high/ mid rise jeans are a must especially for a long torso (I wore this for a Booze cruise, so I opted for mid rise to show a little more skin). Will be 10000% renting again or buying this top soon!
I wore a lacy tube top and jeans under this as an every day outfit. It would be a great piece to take on a vacation or day trip. The material is nice and flowy and it has a lining underneath.
I really liked this! Worked with jeans and yoga pants. I wore it with a cami, or just a bralette, and one day with nothing at all (a more "date night" look). It is soft and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Cute way to dress up a pair of jeans for a daytime birthday party. Got many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Flattering style. A little too fitted on the top for bustier ladies but I made it work with a tank underneath.

Rented this to wear on my bday to a show & dinner, I just wasn't thrilled with the balloon sleeves and silky material - it needs slits on the sides or something, the billowy back made it feel almost like a giant silk robe, and not in a flattering way. The L was too small around and I have a 29 inch waist. The XL felt big everywhere else. The buttons were impossible to button. It's so low cut it really would've needed a tank under it or a pin unless you're wearing it to a club or are an A-cup. Glad I had a bday promo and it only wasted $5.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, unique item. Flirty but not too revealing.
links_reviews_text: Double lined, so runs a little hot. Beautiful print, very flowy. Going braless worked for me.

links_reviews_title: fun way to jazz up a pair of jeans and perfect for a party
links_reviews_text: Great fit with the XL- had to size up a bit in order to close it as I normally wear an M or L
Loved this top! It's so unique and flattering. It's low cut.

I liked this piece and wore it a few times. I wore it as a duster - over both jeans and jean shorts, with a tank top, and opened/unbuttoned. I liked the billowy sleeves, and the fact that it's lined, so when you walk and it flutters opened, you see a different (solid) material inside. It's memorable enough that this is a rental piece, and not something I would buy. But overall, I enjoyed this item.

links_reviews_title: Pretty, but tight at the buttons
links_reviews_text: When I opened the bag, I was IN LOVE! The fabric was so soft and the color was so pretty. Then I tried it on and couldn't button it. I can't size up as a Medium will drown me in all of the other places. I may just wear it open with a cute tank as others did.
I LOVED this duster/shirt. Too small to button but would definitely rent again a size up! I ended up wearing it open with distressed jeans and a white tank top.

This looked so cool in the photo. I'm 5'4 and it was too long. I thought it would be ankle length or just above but it dragged on the floor even with shoes on. Loved the idea just too big in the shoulders (I'm a size 8) and too long
I like the fabric; but, I like others had a hard time styling this top or topper.

links_reviews_title: I love this! I cannot wait to wear it with a great pair of jeans and heels.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful! The fabric is very nice. However, in the end, I returned it without wearing it because it was too tight through the shoulders and bust.
Beautiful, thick, silk-like lined material. But runs tight in the bust. I was just barely able to get the buttons closed. Would size up if you're larger chested.
I absolutely loved this top. I wore it with a cami and white jeans to work and also the theater. It's such a unique piece but also easy to wear. I would absolutely recommend everyone try this.

I will start by saying that the material on this blouse looks and feels absolutely gorgeous! I was in love with the color, and it felt amazing (if surprisingly heavy). However, after trying 15 different ways, I simply could not find a way to wear this that it didn't look like I had opted to put on a luxurious bathrobe over my clothes. Between the length and the sleeve shape, I just don't think the robe comparison can be avoided.

I received so many compliments on this. I wore it with a white tee shirt or camisole, and paired it with jeans, white jeans, and a white skirt. The buttons are tricky and it is tight through the rib cage/bust. Also it strangely restricts arm movement but was worth the occasional discomfort to look so glam! I was sad to send it back!

links_reviews_title: did not wear it. too small
links_reviews_text: did not wear it. too small

i received a lot of compliments wearing this, but i could not fully extend my arms. the buttons were a bit difficult to put on, i found it easier to button every other instead. it was a bit tight on the ribcage but it was still fun to wear.

I was really excited about this piece and it's really cute, but it runs really small. I normally wear anywhere between a size 12-16 and I couldn't get any of the buttons closed. Definitely size up if possible!

links_reviews_title: Very well made. Feels luxurious. Beautiful, however I did not wear.
links_reviews_text: I received the x-small and it did not close. I was unable to wear. I would definitely give it another try in a larger size.
Length was great. But I couldn't even button the chest. I'm a 36b

links_reviews_title: Pretty fabric, but I can't move my arms
links_reviews_text: Love the print, but the shoulders are too small. I can't lift my arms higher my shoulders. The waist is tight too; it's empire so it sits on the rib cage, and on me it barely closes.
This is a gorgeous piece, nicely made, hans beautifully. For curvy girl who is short waisted, the buttons hit pretty high and were tight with a L. Am going to try the XL though because I liked it.
It has a shiny brass chain. Nice color. The one inner pocket is too deep for pen, lipstick or other smaller items.
Simple and chic and a gorgeous shade of red.

links_reviews_title: The chain handle is to die for!
links_reviews_text: Love this bag! So cute and goes with so much. Red is a little darker than it appears in the photo. Overall lovely piece!

links_reviews_title: Very cute, but a little short on the arms!
links_reviews_text: Was like a thicker t shirt type material chest/base with a light cotton arm. The arm length was a little short for me, so I pulled them up a bit to give the 3/4 sleeve look. The elastic had plenty of give (wasn't stretched out!) to let this be comfortable and still look cute.
Really liked the top! The end of the sleeves were a bit tight which is why it's 4 stars but super flattering. Would rent again. I'm 5'3, 32C

Liked this top. Sleeves are blouse material so better for warmer weather. This is a cute top. Only downside is that the elastics at the bottom of the sleeves are tight. These left marks on my forearms.
I wore this on vacation in Paris, we took professional photos and the top was perfect. I wore if all day and it was comfortable.
Sleeves were short, but that appeared to be the style. Overall great work shirt. This is lined so it's not itchy at all!

More a "top" than a sweater as it's not a traditional knit. Sleeves are short so I pushed them up. I sized up to avoid it being too tight across the chest but might have stayed at medium. Would wear again.
For us a little weird in the chest and sleeve are 3/4. But some nice subtle cute details on the sleeves.
Wore to work. Cute with jeans and really comfortable. The sleeves are pretty short though and I am short, so thinking they'd be really short on someone taller.
Comfy (grey feels like thin sweatshirt with plenty of stretch) White wrinkles a little, but definitely a cute top with a unique vibe. This is a large. I weigh 120 lbs. Size up.

links_reviews_title: A little to casual for my office
links_reviews_text: It was more casual than I anticipated but thought I could get away with it on a Friday. The middle was more sweatshirt-ish than sweater-ish. But it really was cute - just better suited for weekend attire than my office.
This is a really nice shirt for the office, the material is really soft on the inside and the sleeves are on the perfect length for when you are typing in the computer.

I really liked this top! So simple in style, but yet cute and also a bit feminine. I liked that it wasn't baggy around the waist, like sweaters can be. I wore it to church and work, but I think it'd dress up very nicely for the holidays.
Sleeves were a little short, didn't quite come to my wrists. But it was super cute & will definitely rent again.

I should have read the other reviews more closely--one person said "I weigh 120 lbs and this is a size large" SAME. I ordered my usual medium and it's way too short (I'm a D cup, so that's probably the problem). Size up for this lovely sweater!

links_reviews_title: Fine for the office but nothing special.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and professional. Not a style standout. But worked fine for a day in the office.

Weight: 130 lbs/ Height: 5'3/ 32C/ Broad shoulders It's casual but can be dressed up for a more formal look. I have broad shoulders and the shoulder area was a bit tight for me. I should have ordered a Medium for a looser fit.
I love this top, but the sleeves are a bit short, and I'm 5'2. Other than that, great for work!
Slap on a pair of jeans and some shoes and you have a classy, yet casual work outfit.
This shirt is very versatile. The white long sleeves give it a cute touch. I have a short torso and it worked perfect. I ended up buying it. Got a complement the first day I wore it.
This was a really cute top but ran a but short in the torso for me.
I rented this to wear to work and it was perfect. It hits on the top of the hip so if you have a long torso it may be too short.

links_reviews_title: Runs small but that means it fits me pretty well
links_reviews_text: I love it when an item runs small! This is the item that fit me the best from my first ever RTR Unlimited order. I'm usually an XXS or 00P, but RTR typically only has XS or 0 as the smallest. This one fits well. The elastics on the sleeves were slightly tight, but doesn't bother me that much overall.

links_reviews_title: I liked the style. Cute with jeans.
links_reviews_text: The material wasn't what I expected. The grey part was a thick "long John" like material.

links_reviews_title: I thought the picture was super cute, the length was a little bit short.
links_reviews_text: Cute top, the material wasn't very nice and it has no stretch if that's what you typically like.

I loved this shirt. It was professional enough for work and gave my weekend jeans look and upgrade. I highly recommend. I wore with a faux leather black skirt for work and black jeans and grey uggs on the weekend.

links_reviews_title: Great quality. So cute for work or after work
links_reviews_text: Fits smaller than normal. I usually wear between a M & L. I am only 5' tall with a very short torso & this top was almost too short for me & definitely a bit snug. The bust fits fine. The arms are too short. The hemline is too short. Pretty cool shirt though!

links_reviews_title: Fun everyday sweatshirt to look more dresses up.
links_reviews_text: I wish I sized up just to be a bit more loose. It’s a sweatshirt but not!
The sweater is cute, but the sleeves were oddly short. I don't even have particularly long arms, so it was weird.
Sweater was ok and runs small. I'm normally a medium and the large just fit.

links_reviews_title: Loved it...but it was too tight for me
links_reviews_text: the shoulders run small.
Good fit. 3/4 length sleeves.
I chose for a casual Friday but worked just as well with jeans. A bit tight across the chest so size up if you are a bigger cup size

links_reviews_title: It looked ok but a bit small.
links_reviews_text: It was short generally and a little tight.

links_reviews_title: cute on hanger. Is a halter top, so it looked horrible on me.
links_reviews_text: Cute on the hanger. It is a halter top so it looked horrible on me.
The style and fit looked frumpy on me. The sleeves seemed short.

I got this top for work. But when I got it it was so tight that I ended up wearing it just one day casually with jeans. It was cute but if I did it again I would definitely size up. I'm normally a medium so I would go for a large

The fit of this top is all off! I wear between a small and a medium in tops depending on the shoulders. I'm 5'8" with a 34c. This shirt is not long sleeve - more like a 3/4 length sleve but with elastic ruffled cuffs that dig into your forearms. And the length didn't even come to the top of my high waisted jeans. It is practically a crop top. It was like I was wearing a woman's XSpetite. I give this two thumbs down for anyone that's taller than 5'.

I rented an XS because it was all that was available. The dress was stunning, but because it's a true wrap and has a very noticeable leg slit, I would rent a Small next time. I'm typically a Small / true size 4, the the XS meant the leg slit was much more noticeable than if I'd gotten a small. It can blow up in the breeze, so be wary of that. You may want to use fashion tape to avoid showing the whole city your knickers. The fabric has a nice weight to it without being super heavy. NOTE that the review photo is me trying it on after it had been balled up for a few hours, so it wouldn't normally be that wrinkly!!! I could see this dress working for spring, but it may be too warm for the dead of summer in most areas of the country. Beautiful color, can't stress that enough!

This is one of the most wearable yet trendy pieces out there. The fabric feels so luxurious against your skin and it flows beautifully when you walk. It looks fantastic and photographs soooo well. It hits the spot right between elegant yet sexy. It's a true wrap, so you have that flexibility. I did find that I had to get the slit under control or it would be way too revealing. Overall a beautiful piece, in a beautiful color.

I originally rented this dress to wear out for drinks, then to dinner in LA, but ultimately ended up wearing it to my first day of work. Everyone loved this dress and it ended up being so comfortable. I will definitely be renting it again.

links_reviews_title: Such nice fabric, a little oversized fit
links_reviews_text: Very unique dress, buttery feel fabric.
gorgeous heavy silk in a beautiful blush palette. cool western detailing for a unique and funky flair. flattering wrap dress fit.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous but a lot of material
links_reviews_text: Pretty dress, wish the small was available. It was a ton of material. The color is beautiful.
1. Super cute in person and when you actually wear it outside 2. It runs bigger than the usual size. So, once size down! 3. You need a safety clip/pin for the bottom part

One of my favorite pieces to rent! Usually I don't like renting things twice but how can you just rent this once? People stop me so many times to just admire this piece. You won't regret renting this! Can dress up or down !
Just not flattering. Maybe someone else could pull this off but I hated it. Didn't wear.

This dress was a total show stopper. I felt unbelievably cool and feminine wearing it. The material is a thick satin and the dusty rose color is super flattering. Dress wraps and drapes in the front so it's very forgiving over the stomach area. I wore it with nude strappy heels.

This dress is stunning in person. Worn to the office (be careful with the high slit!) and to a nice dinner. Even the XS top half could have accommodated a medium sized chest so choose your size based on hips. I'm normally a 4-6 and got the XS. It fit but the slit was probably more revealing than it needed to be. The fabric doesn't breathe very well and shows water so I wouldn't wear it on a very warm day. The material is beautiful and catches the light. Highly recommend this one.
i never wear pink but this dress was incredible
The color and silky fabric make this dress a total stand out!!

I rented this to wear for some WFH video conferences with clients (and lets be honest, to have something to wear that wasn't in the sweatpant family). I didn't end up keeping it because I felt there was too much fabric bunching across the chest and it wasn't flattering on me. Would probably look more natural on someone taller!

I rented this for work, but whoaa the opening in the front is scandalous. Would be better for a party. It was a little long on my 5'4" body, and the shoulders were a bit large (gave it an oversized look). The material is heavy and luxurious. Happy I tried it out but not work appropriate. May rent again for a night out.

This dress is FUN. I was looking for something unique, funky, and a little bit stand out-ish, and this dress served it all. The material is flattering, the wrap tie very waist-snatching, and the little western details make it totally special. I will say that the slit is HIGH, so this is definitely a dress for the brave!
The color and material are amazing! I wore with white short cowboy boots and it looked amazing. The only negative is that the slots are VERY high when sitting or getting in and out of a car.
I've never received so many compliments on a dress! It is beautiful and fits really well. The tie makes it easy to adjust around the waist too. I dressed it down with high-top Vans.

Grabbed this dress before a trip and wore to dinner on my birthday. It added such glam while taking up little suitcase space! The wrap cinches the waist and the slit lets you show some leg while keeping shoulders covered for when night cools. Loved and can't wait to rent again
Fits nicely on. Very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Looks so expensive and luxe. Like a super glam vintage cowgirl queen AHHH
links_reviews_text: The title pretty much says it all lol. Wish I had taken a photo but it was so incredibly gorgeous and flattering, super sexy without really being revealing (although because of the wrap design, the dress has two super high slits that pop out as you move/walk - not visible when you're standing still but you had to be a little careful because it'll literally expose your entire leg). Material is thick and substantial satin silk. Fit is true to size, I'm a true 6 and got a medium, but it's the kind of dress that would probably still look fine if you didn't get your ideal size.

I'm obsessed with Nanushka in general and this dress was no exception. The material is incredible and it fits so well. Shows a little leg but is modest up top. Paired it with booties one day and sneakers the next. Would definitely get again.
Fit perfectly and wasn't unflattering with my large legs. Wore several times with heels and sneakers!
Great pants to wear for an interview if you need to look hip, professional and want to be comfortable. A little big up top but worked

links_reviews_title: Great for travel!very comfortable and chic.
links_reviews_text: I would rent again!

links_reviews_title: These were great for our 80s party - comfortable with no muffin top!
links_reviews_text: These were great for our 80s party. Other reviewers said they were large in the calves, and I would probably agree since I have fairly large calves and they fit me perfectly. After I ordered the XS was regretting it since I thought I wouldn't be able to squeeze myself in without squeezing everything else out, but they were super comfortable and fitted without being too tight.

Perfect true to size fit. Loved these. Styled with dressy white shirt for work with black pumps .Later more casual to run errands with the hubby. These pants easily dress up or down. Lots of compliments!!!! Great piece. Considering buying.
Liked them overall but they were loose on my calves which was a weird look.
The fit is perfect and they are so comfy! They are cropped so I wore some fun fishnet stockings and booties to show that off.
Soft, comfy, and chic. Paired them with a soft tailored shirt for a more professional look. I felt great all day.
these are. very cute very sporty leather leggings they run TTS but would have liked them to feel more fitted/snug.

links_reviews_title: Be comfy and look put together!
links_reviews_text: These leggings are so fun and I really liked the red stripe accent. Great item to put together an outfit that looks way more dressed up than you feel wearing them.
I wanted to love these so much. They almost fit but they showed everything! All curves and cellulite. Never again-ha!

RTR recommended an extra large in these even though I usually wear a large and I actually needed a medium. What I hoped for was sleek leather leggings I could dress up on casual day at work. What I got was jogging pants that were leather. Two stars because they are comfy to wear.
They were cute and I wore them a couple Of times.
Fashionable Can dress up or down

I love them love the look with red leather jacket. Even though they over worn I had every intention of wearing them however at the last minute I opted to return them with wearing them. I might try another pair in a smaller size.

I've hesitated to wear these body fitting pants but love the look of leather pants on other people but these pants have made me a convert! They were incredibly comfortable, flattering and warmer than jeans. I may have to buy them...
I am 5'9" and have short legs but if I had longer legs they would be a bit short.

I rented these before in an XL. They fit great but we're a little looser in the legs than I wanted. Rented a second time because I loved them so much and size down to a large.. but they were so small.. ugh. Wld rent again in an XL just wish they were a little bit more fitted like leggings. They're more like a straight leg pants
The look of the pants was great. But the waist-band style was a little uncomfortable.
Slightly odd fit, with the front of the pant feeling slightly higher than the back ...? I didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Loved these, wore them dozens of times.
links_reviews_text: cute, they get a bit out of shape with each way but seem to snap back
Fitted.

links_reviews_title: I'm 5'9 and they were capris on me.
links_reviews_text: length runs short

links_reviews_title: love these comfortable and stylish! Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fit leg good, very flattering!
I was nervous about the fit of these (size 4/6 with wide hips), but they were great! Nice stretch material. Paired with ankle boots and a hi Lo white button down for work. Got tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, flattering and not overly warm
links_reviews_text: Really loved wearing these. They breathe a little bit more than other leather style leggings and were super flattering. Would absolutely wear them again.

links_reviews_title: The pop of color made this a fun faux leather pant.
links_reviews_text: Love that you can dress these pants up or dress them down.

The idea of these pants is fun, but as other reviews have mentioned, the fit just doesn't work - unless perhaps you have large calves relative to your hips and thighs. Like any legging should, they have nice stretch so as to be flexible in sizing above the knee, but suddenly they become wide and unfitted below the knee which, with the faux leather material, results in a really odd and, frankly, cheap look (like a plastic bag that stretched and didn't go back in place).

links_reviews_title: Loved these pants - very flattering and got tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I have an athletic build (larger stomach, no hips and butt) and they fit perfectly.
These are really great pants. So comfortable and I received a lot of compliments.
Hugged my curves in all the right places & forgave in others. An all around win! I liked them so much that I'm going to check out the designer's other offerings.

Following the other reviewers, I ordered a size small when I am a size medium normally. Love them in small! FYI, there is a weird stitch across the upper thigh. I paired these with high heels for a sexy date night with the hubby!
These leather pants looked great everywhere except my waist! The pants did not hug my waist, instead of sticking out. I never wore them and wouldn't recommend for curvy girls.
Great pants! Awesome way to dress up an outfit
Very comfortable stylish faux leather pants. Not too tight, not too loose, but did stretch out a bit after a few wears. Really love.

links_reviews_title: Great pant, runs true to size
links_reviews_text: I'm a thigh-heavy size 8-10 and these fit perfectly. Great, slightly-edgy, rock n roll look.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on these pants! They're so cool!
links_reviews_text: They're the perfect amount of edgy and they go with every basic. Fun way to dress up a classic look - I kept them for so long and loved them!

links_reviews_title: Cute pants, not comfortable or flattering
links_reviews_text: Pants were cute, but not fitted very well. However, I wouldn't want to order any smaller than my normal size as the material does not breath. Was already sweating trying them on

Feel like these should be cute but first, they ran large (I am a 12 and the XL had room). Second, the seams are not right at or above the knee but higher up in an odd spot. Too bad as the material was sturdy and the stripe on the side is cute.
Easy to wear, can dress up or down, and stylish. Highly recommend it.
Roomy but still sleek. Loved!
Perfect color, material and size. Able to fit phone, lipsticks, cash and credit cards, with a little extra space to spare.

I LOVE this dress so much! The fit was great, length was perfect for the flouncy skirt, and the sleeves were big but not too big (even on my petite frame)! The only con is that the v-neck gaped when I sat down/reached for something, so I taped it down with double sided tape and it was fine after that!
Loved this dress!! The fact that it's short makes the sleeves feel less overpowering. Super comfortable and just felt good in it.

This dress is a little silly, but cute. It’s super short - I don’t think a skirt this full looks quite right so short but it was ok with black tights. The chest was a little large but the wrap was cut in a way that it didn’t open up too much. I wish I didn’t have to iron the belt of every single dress that has one, but I guess pressing accessories is one step too much for rtr.

links_reviews_title: SLAYED ALL DAY in this dress!!
links_reviews_text: I seriously couldn't stop looking in the mirror. This size 8 hugged my size 10 frame pretty snug (as it should have). Thank God for a standing desk because it wasn't the easiest to breath sitting down, lol. But I felt like a million bucks all day and got so many compliments! I wore it with tights to work. It is a little short but the bulk of material on the skirt made it feel less revealing. I would feel comfortable wearing out without tights. Adventurous but still perfectly reserved! Rent it!
Such a fun dress - I'm usually a 2, the 4 was comfortable and playful! Everyone loved it Perfect to wear to a wine festival
This dress was amazing for my Hibachi bday dinner. Was a huge hit! Compliments galore!
Fun number I wore for a my birthday party. Very warm material and almost didn't need a coat on a cold fall evening. Tight around the waist! Generous in bust.
This was unique and fun to wear. I wish I would have been able to grab the 4 or 6 as it is true to size but it still looked cute.
Really chic. I enjoyed the design as I was going for a bit avant-garde.
Fun dress that was true to size! Sleeves were a little poofy but that was the look. Really loved!

links_reviews_title: Pouffy-party sleeves!! Lots of fun to wear!!
links_reviews_text: Wore this twice-to a shrimp boil party and work event, both times received lots of compliments! It's a lot of dress, the buttons are strong, which is good, because the waist is slim (it's flattering since the rest of the dress is so much) The fabric is heavy, dress is well made. I wrapped the long ribbon around more like a cummerbund and tied it in the back. A large bow on this dress felt a little juvenile. Overall great dress!!

The fabric is thicker than I'd expected. The skirt was lined. It highlighted my natural waist and looked super flattering. I'd been concerned about the sleeves overwhelming the rest of the look but they surprisingly worked. I loved the way I looked in this dress.

i am in love with this dress i wish i had discovered it earlier in the summer so i could wear it more. a huge hit with everyone who saw it! rented for a date and loved it so much i wore it to the office for casual friday.
Wore a camisole under neath due to large chest area but loved it for work!

links_reviews_title: Love the pattern and uniqueness of the dress!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the wrong size but the fit was still good. I got a lot of compliments on the dress

links_reviews_title: Runs small, perfect design for curvy girls
links_reviews_text: After reading reviews I sized up and that was a good thing. I normally wear 4, but 6 fit me perfectly. It works great with your curves and emphasis hourglass figures

This dress is super fun. The sleeves are puffy but not too much. The dress does run about one size small. I usually wear an eight in almost everything, But the application suggested I order a 10 and it fit perfectly.
Great everyday dress, loads of compliments. Transitioned well from day to night
So good. I received so many compliments and felt so beautiful all night wearing this. Couldn't recommend more!

Didn't look too enticing online but boy does it fit amazingly in real life. It's thicker material so definitely not for all climates. The length was perfect and the dress hugged me in all the right places.
A little too cutsie for me, but super fun and trendy!
This was an amazing dress and the sleeves were so puffy and perfect!! I'm very small chested so I did need to use double sided tape on the top
Loved this dress but the material does not stretch and is tight in the rib cage area!

The sleeves are super fun, and the mix of gingham prints really elevate the dress. Even though there's a lot of fabric it doesn't feel overwhelming at all. Don't wear if you need a lot of arm motion though!
This dress is so well made, unique and beautiful. It looks great with tights and booties for cool days and would pair great with some strapped sandals for a warmer day! Loved wearing this dress!

This dress is intense, but I loved it. The chest gaped a little at the front, but I just wore a white bandeau underneath. Unlike other reviewers, I didn't find it to be too short; i think if it had been any longer, it would have been overwhelming with all the fabric. The sleeves are amazing! I paired the dress with brown knee high boots. Runs true to size; were I to rent it again, I would probably size down.

Wore this dress a couple times whilst I rented it. Such amazing tailoring and a very well made garment. Slightly on the heavier weight so good for spring days or summer evenings when it cools a little. The kimono style waist fastening is so flattering.

This dress exceeded my expectations! I'd seen it online and in the flagship and was like meh. But in a pinch I tried it on last week and WOW it was so much fun!! And I got SO many compliments! Tried it on with black jeans and booties and it was cute that way too. It's really low cut just a warning!

links_reviews_title: I mean just look how cute in feminine this dress is!!
links_reviews_text: I have a small waist and large breast but it pushed it all up just right. I'm gonna wear it again this weekend shopping with my girlfriends!!

links_reviews_title: Over the top for someone short
links_reviews_text: This dress was extremely overpowering on me - I'm 5'3. The sleeves are very large and poufy. The neckline is very low and you can't really tell in this photo but the hemline is very short. I think this dress would work better on someone tall. The fabric is nice and thick and the tie at the waist lays nicely.

links_reviews_title: Loves of compliment but dress is a little heavy

links_reviews_text: I wanted this to work so bad! But unfortunately it was too small. I'm a standard 4 or 6, but the waist of this dress is tiny! There are hidden buttons that button down the front and I couldn't button them. One of my friends with a small waist borrowed it and it was adorable!
If your middle is your problem area, don't kid yourself that you can make this work. Super cute, but as a size 10-12, I would need this 2 sizes up.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress, but I looked like a flagpole wrapped in tons of fabric that had gone awry....
links_reviews_text: Love this dress -the design is so fashion-forward and fabulous.... but on my thin body type, the fabric and design overwhelmed my frame. Super darn cute... the sleeves are fab, the skirt has a great flare, and it's fitted in the right places... but knowing my body, I wasn't able to pull it off. Check it out, though!
Nice fit, quality fabric!

links_reviews_title: Very cute runs a little small
links_reviews_text: Love this dress however it runs a little small through the rib cage.
This dress is so cute in real life. Got my normal size, but unfortunately it didn't fit correctly. Will order in a size larger!

Love the idea and the styling of this dress but for me it was so short! The flare of the bottom made it look like an ice skating skirt and barely covered my bum. Taller peeps size up or reconsider. I am 5'8".
I absolutely love this dress! I have received 10-15 complements today on this dress. It's so cute and the sleeves are awesome
The fit was perfect I received so many compliments while wearing this dress.
Perfect fit, modern and professional look. Great quality material.

The fabric felt great but the fit was really off. It fit an an awkward length and I just wasn't a fan. Definitely for someone tall. The fabric is also unforgiving so if you have a little bump here and there, it will show.
Definitely too small through the hips not for pear-shaped.

Ok so even though the reviews were meh, I tried it and loved it! I sized up because I wanted to wear it to work. So many compliments. The sleeves are long but i think on purpose? The wrap effect was very flattering.

links_reviews_title: The arms in this dress run super small. I could not even get it on.
links_reviews_text: The long sleeves are built for someone who has no muscle. I cannot imagine how skinny your arms would have to be to fit this dress.
Was dressier than I thought b/c of the material. I wear a size 10 dress and it was a bit big. Not sure if the 8 would fit though. I really liked the dress.
This is a little too short for work. I treated as a tunic.

links_reviews_title: I had such high hopes but fit terribly
links_reviews_text: I wanted this to work out SO badly...I loved the picture and how it fit on the model. On me, it looked nothing like this. It was way too big and the folds looked awkward. Ill fitting and made me look heavier.

Sooo many compliments on this dress even though it's conservative and dark colored! Perfect for a business setting, especially in the cooler seasons (I wore with black tights and heeled ankle boots), but could easily be worn with strappy sandals for a dinner in Vegas. Appropriate length as well - sleeves just a tad long but not noticeably so. Fits true to size but there is zero stretch - the arms are quite narrow, so if you are bigger in that area this dress will not work for you. I love the dual navy satin / black chiffon look, the only thing that is a bit weird is that the tie-across sits a bit drapey, not 100% diagonally/taught. I found this to be a bit odd at first but based on the stitching it's intentional. Would rent again for another formal meeting at work!
This dress fit me so awkwardly. The tie across with the blue silk panel, once draped and tied, just hung lifelessly. This was not flattering at all.
I am a size 4 or 6 rent the runway said I should try a size 8. it came all wrinkly and I could not do up the zipper
Gorgeous dress but definitely does not run true to U.K./US size. I am a size US 6 and ordered a size 10 UK and it was swimming on me
Fits very strange- has a gap and material is sewn very odd by the chest. Could not wear.
I had to send this back without wearing it because it was too tight and I felt the material too polyester for the occasion I have in mind.
Too long for my frame
the chest and arms were too small to wear. I even sized up
Didtn fit
Very easy top to throw on with jeans! Loved it, super comfortable and flattering.
Loved this shirt, kinda boxy but I like that look. Fit true to size and got lots of compliments. also felt rich af in a satin shirt

Beautiful piece, not on me. It gapes at bust while being very shapeless elsewhere. I think this would be great on small busted ladies. I changed my bra to a minimizer style and it was better than in the picture. Lovely fabric and love the print too.

Rented this for an easy work top for casual Friday! Really comfortable and lightweight fabric, I would definitely rent it again. It is a shorter top so I have it on with high waisted jeans. The fabric is really pretty and unique. Perfect summer work blouse!

links_reviews_title: Soft and loose fitting cool material.
links_reviews_text: I wore this on a warm day in Florida and was cool in the breathable fabric. The color is vibrant and summery.
fits well
Great easy fit, loose. Cheerful color. Took some adjusting to get the ties right, but I loved it!

links_reviews_title: fun, bright shirt to mix up the boring primary cirs in my wardrobe
links_reviews_text: fit well. Was blosy, but not too much. Needed a camisole for work.
It runs slightly big, but very comfortable and I love the material to wear on a hot summer day.
Loved the idea of this, but the silhouette wasn't for me.
I loved this shirt. I am usually a small but RTR suggested a medium & it was fine because this is on the short side. Loved this shirt.
short and gapped at bust

links_reviews_title: This shirt is a highlight... literally!
links_reviews_text: This shirt is absolutely everything. Very flattering and beautiful quality, the shirt lays beautifully and is the casual piece that will make you stand out. I was really scared it would hang bulky and the bow would look weird with my curves, but this couldn't be further from how nice the shirt looks on. My favorite thing I have ever rented, and will rent again.

Fit would be almost true to size. I'm a true 6 but have a larger rib cage so sized up based off the fitted waist....glad I did! Was roomy everywhere else but allowed for me to wear a thicker turtleneck which is perfect for cold Minnesota winters. Fun rental, lots of comments, easy to wear!
This was a really cool jumpsuit. I got it in the store so that's the only way I knew to go two sizes up. Very cool and versatile

links_reviews_title: Cute jumpsuit with a little sass
links_reviews_text: Loved this jumpsuit but it was too tight around the hips to wear. I was planning on pairing it with a white or black long sleeve underneath. Does seem to wrinkle easily and runs small and a bit short in the torso. Hopefully I will rent again in one size up.
This jumpsuit was great! Wore it with a turtleneck underneath. It does stretch after first wear so either size down or throw it in a hot dryer
I'm in between a 4 and a 6 so I got the 6. It's a little snug in the waste area and the top gives a bit, but still wore it and loved it!

The only reason this jumpsuit did not get all the stars was the lack of room in the chest. I'm a 32 D - sometimes double D, and the buttons were a bit tight over the girls! Otherwise, perfect fit and length!

links_reviews_title: Too short in the torso area
links_reviews_text: I'm tall, but I don't have a long torso (long legs) & this was uncomfortably short in the torso area. Too bad, because it looks super cute paired with a black turtleneck & tall boots but if I went up a size it would've been way too large around the waist

links_reviews_title: Great for petites, but not for long torsos
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is so cute! It does run true to size, but I have a long torso and the straps are not adjustable. So, for me, this didn't work - it was just way too tight in the crotch because there wasn't enough length in the torso. It is adorable, though, so if that isn't an issue you have, I would go for it. This is cute! And it will definitely work for petites, it isn't too long. I'm tempted to try a size up and see if that works for me, but the 2R fit well everywhere else.

Very comfortable and I received tons of compliments wearing this to a birthday party. Only con is there is no zipper so you have to undo all 7 buttons to use the restroom and take it on and off. Runs a little small, I usually wear a 4 and the 6 fit me perfectly. Wore with a white turtle neck and heeled boots.

This jumpsuit fit almost perfect - my one critique was the top was a bit loose but the waist was tight so i couldn't have sized down. loved the length, it also was so comfortable! if the top was a bit tighter maybe i would have bought it.

I know others were underwhelmed but I loved this dress. The fabric was great, placement of the color blocking, the fit - all great. It is short but with black tights and chunky ankle boots it worked. Wish I could have kept it. Love love love.
This was my first Valentino rental, loved this dress and only sad it took me so long to rent it! Great fit, a little short though.

Rented this to wear to a house party. Planned to wear with tights, but it was so incredibly short that I couldn't wear it (5'8"). Nice fabric and cute pattern though. Maybe someone put it in the dryer?
Comfortable and fit well! A bit short, but with tights it was fine.
My only critique of this dress is how short it is. Was perpetually readjusting for longer length. But otherwise it was super flattering and a great basic design and color.

links_reviews_title: A little youthful but silhouette was great
links_reviews_text: Lightweight knit dress but not so thin that it felt sheer. I don't know that I'd rent this again but it was a nice twist for my wardrobe.

UPDATE—Wore for a work party and when the pictures came in I was appalled. I am hoping it was just a really bad angle but I looked like a linebacker. --- Wore this for Easter (hey, it has PINK in it) and got many compliments. I thought it was very cute. I did wear Spanx and that helped (doesn't it always?). I'll definitely wear it again before returning.
Soft and easy to wear. Love this look.
So flattering, stretchy, very cute. Short! Needs to be worn with tights IMO.

I rented this dress for work, and was pleased to find that it was made out of a nice fabric, like a thin cotton sweater, yet still had shape. I was disappointed that it was a bit short but went ahead and wore it to work anyway. I wouldn't rent this dress again as I found it to be somewhat unforgiving. Notice how you can see lines where my stockings end on my waist. Overall though, it was pretty cute and well made.
Fits well, comfortable light material. Was kind of young for me. Got compliments.

I love this dress! I got so many compliments at work. I suggest sizing up if you don't want a tight fit. It looks tiny coming out of the bag but it stretches quite a bit and the fabric is excellent quality. It's a bit on the short side, so I suggest tights if that is not something you are comfortable with.
Such a cute dress- I had to cut the tags off!!
I absolutely adore this dress! So cute and so comfy to wear. It's a little short for work (I'm 5'8"), but with a pair of opaque tights, it was totally office-appropriate. Will rent again!

I wore this dress to work. I liked the material... thin knit so it didn't add unnecessary bulk. The colors are playful and so is the cut (minidress with some flare) but I think it would have been more flattering if it were a bit longer
Not too thick, very flattering. Wore to the office and transitioned to HH easily! Would absolutely have purchased this Valentino number if it were not so expensive.

I received a lot of compliments on this and it was a nice, comfortable dress for work. I wouldn't recommend wearing this if you are planning on having to lift your arms up and even putting your hair in a ponytail could be dangerous - it's a bit short :) I wore with tights and tall boots and put my hair up in the bathroom, away from prying eyes. As others have stated, the material is a lot lighter than you might expect, but it is extremely soft and comfortable. Rent this one!
I received soooo many compliments! Very comfortable and true to size. I'm 5'2", 118 lb, 32D and the S fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Love this color block sweater dress 💛
links_reviews_text: Such a beautifully fitting sweater dress. This is one of my favorite rentals and the perfect fall to winter transitional piece. I wore it with booties and black sheer tights. The fabric highlights your waist, is super slimming and hides any flaws well. Will rent against!

links_reviews_title: Adorable and flattering, but a tad short for work
