There is black ribbing on the neck and stitch detail at the waist which make it really interesting. Smooth soft wool. A little short and slim - I often wear a 4 in Theory but would have been better with a 6
Loved the color. The tone to this elevated its style. It is very short in waist.

links_reviews_title: beautiful color, but fit is tricky
links_reviews_text: This is very fine non-scratchy wool in a beautiful flattering color. Turtleneck has subtle but visible navy ribs in it. I got a large because it looked so fitted, and I'm glad I did. It had a tendency to ride up and is fairly short to begin with. Expected to like it more than I did, but fit never quite worked.
So pretty and unique. Fit perfectly. Obsessed with the sleeves.

Very cute and feminine. Small fit perfectly but also very forgiving. Quality is great and didn't have any pilling. Medium thickness and warm. All of the various elements work together well: mock neck, pink color and puffy sleeves. Wore this to a daytime birthday party and plan to wear it to work as well. Would rent again.
Material feels expensive and is thick. Slightly short in the cut but wore with high waisted jeans and loved.

links_reviews_title: It makes me look like I'm on a ski trip in 1982. In a good way.
links_reviews_text: Very cute. This is basic piece with a little added style , which is always very nice.
It was nice to wear out to dinner! I liked the pattern and material. Could've sized down because it definitely has an oversized fit.

links_reviews_title: Slightly too big on me, but beautiful color
links_reviews_text: This is a great quality sweater - the material feels nice and thick, and the color is so pretty. It is a little long on me than I would prefer (I'm 5'4"), and it would be absolutely perfect if it were slightly smaller. But I'll still wear it because I love the color
Adorable striped pink everyday sweater with a feminine sleeve. Very comfortable, thick material, not super fitted in the body but still slimming in shape.

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved this sweater! It was super cozy and I wanted to buy it!
links_reviews_text: This is the first item that I regretted sending back. This sweater can be dressed up or down. It is work and casual appropriate. The detail of styling is not evident in the pictures. Must be worn to be appreciated. Fitted where needed and provides lots of interest!
I like the sleeves, but it's not super flattering. Nice and cozy and warm though.
This is a thick, well made sweater. It fits in all the right places and the quality is impeccable.

I loved this sweater to switch things up a bit. The sleeves are chic and the color is lovely. Only issue is I felt it was a little overwork and was losing its shape. Happy we wear and happy to return!
Cute sweater and got a lot of compliments!
Loved this sweater! It was so comfortable at work and the sleeves were adorable rolled up or pulled down.

I rented this for a causal fall party. Paired it with knee high boots and high waisted jeans. It was more fitted through the stomach area and big sleeves. It was just warm enough for a cool fall night.

links_reviews_title: The sleeves are way puffier than what is shown in the picture
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were too puffy. its hard to wear this with a jacket. If you don't need to wear a jacket then this might be perfect for you.
Cute sweater for every day wear. A little pilly. Large fit and sleeves were big (but that's the design). Probably wouldn't rent again
Such a cute and stylish sweater! Wore to work and was so cozy all day and got lots of compliments! True to size.
The sweater was fine, but personally I felt it looked a little worn. It is truly just an every day sweater. I wore it to my daughters rec basketball game.
Adorable sweater that fit great. Almost bought it
Really easy to wear flattering piece. It was a bit big on my petite frame, but not noticeably so.

I think the sweater is new; it came with a tag still attached. The fabric is substantial and soft, and it drapes nicely for a slouchy fit. The length is a bit odd for an oversized fit though, so I ended up worn tucked into my pants. The bell sleeves are long and very pronounced. I ordered the M/L but could have worn the S/M.

Love the fit and details on this dress. It's cut so perfectly and has such cute little details like the buttons and the structured shoulders. I love the fabric, too: it has both some stretch and some solidity to it -- it molds on the body in a really flattering and yet comfortable way. Could totally be styled to dress up or down. Would consider buying!

I loved this dress! It's a heavy linen. Perfect for GA late summers/early fall. The structure is beautiful. A line dress. V-neck. Wide rimmed shoulders. I loved everything about this dress. I ordered my normal size but it stretched out throughout the day. I will rent again just a size smaller due to the stretch.

links_reviews_title: The tailoring and fit was perfection.
links_reviews_text: Very flattering fit all through the bodice. Not too tight on the skirt, so very work appropriate. Simple silhouette lets the tailoring be the star!
Lovely details, very fine linen/cotton dress. Don't normally like sheaths on me but this one for like a charm.
I loved how this dress fit and I received a ton of compliments. Will definitely rent this again, if not buy it!

links_reviews_title: Crisp, thick fabric and flattering details
links_reviews_text: Loved the cut of this linen blend dress. It was great for a warm day at the office, and it want wrinkly at the end of the day even though it's linen.
Looked fine

Great material, styling and fit! Sadly, they sent it not cleaned, ripped and missing the front buttons. I couldn't wear it and returned it right away. I would have loved wearing it. Size rented was 10 but couldn't wear it.

Very cute dress - I'm 5'11 and didn't find it too short. Skims the body so it's not too fitted but gives you a nice shape. The reason I gave it less stars is because the minute you sit down, it permanently wrinkles for the rest of the day - big horizontal creases. Also, when I received it, it was slightly puckering at the seams and even steaming it didn't get these wrinkles out. So I wouldn't count on it for an all-day polished look. Too bad, because the silhouette is terrific.
So this dress is destined to be amazing however 32 seconds after putting it on, I look like I slept in it. How I wanted it it one perfect for me.
I had to size up but this dress was flattering and comfortable but it does wrinkle and I had to iron it each time I wore it.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress but too pricey to buy
links_reviews_text: Forgot to snap a photo in this but it was a great casual dress. Only complaint was the neckline was pretty low. I didn't want to wear a cami as it would change the look since it was a v neck. I would purchase if it weren't so dang expensive for a cotton dress.

Loved this dress. It was so comfortable because the fabric had a bit of give. It did wrinkle but I still thought it looked nice for work. I have a straight boyish body type and it fit me really well true to size!

This dress fits well, although the material is a bit more difficult to keep ironed. The sleeves have a foldover material, but it hardly stayed folded making an odd look at times. The waist is fitted and the buttons in the front are super cute making the dress a cute look for a summer day at the office. I paired it with sandal wedges, but it could be dressed up or down. Give it a try!

links_reviews_title: Arrived wrinkled and missing a button. Fit great but couldn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: Fitted, cute dress, but wouldn't been cuter if I could've worn it.
Fit true to size, material does wrinkle easily, perfect in summer and can be worn to so many occasions! I would rent again!
The fit is great. There is a little give to the material making it a perfect fit. Very flattering.
The fabric, cut and style is on-point for work. Simple, yet stylish. A++

links_reviews_title: Perfect summer lightweight fabric and work dress . Wore it from work to dinner. Love this dress.
links_reviews_text: Lightweight fabric , loved the button details , simple and very flattering cut

links_reviews_title: Wasn't able to wear, was a bit small, didn't fit right in back.
links_reviews_text: Didn't fir

links_reviews_title: I got repeated compliments on this dress and how it fit.
links_reviews_text: Super great for dressing up or down. I did both!

links_reviews_title: Big in the chest, wrinkles easy
links_reviews_text: Fit well except the boob area seemed like it would be better for someone with a C or D cup. Also, it's cotton so it wrinkles easily.
I thought this dress was cute but the style is more casual every day than what I was looking for. I may rent it again for the office.

Love this dress but if you are pear shaped then it can be tight in the hips. I am smaller on top and bigger on the bottom so the top was way to big and the bottom a little too tight for comfort. It's unfortunate because it's a very cute dress.
I will definitely rent this piece again!! It was so cute and so versatile. Didn't want to send it back, but needed 4 new pieces!! LOL! Love this dress!!!
Cut too low for work but a nice, comfortable dress
Very flattering nice summer fabric

I have always loved Ralph Lauren but pieces like this seemed a bit excessive to purchase before I joined unlimited. This midi length button front dress is everything. So easy to wear and so comfortable. I wore this on both travel days to and from our trip to 30A as well as one evening on the trip. Looks fabulous with suede booties, can easily be belted, looks good with a sweater over top, would look great with a fun hat. Love this dress and will prob rent again next fall.
Wish there were a few more buttons at the top.
This dress is everything. High quality fabric, classic and flowing silhouette. I wore it many times but specifically to Disneyland. It was so comfy and breathable, paired with a white sneaker.

I wore this dress on a recent trip to Las Vegas and then again to Orange County. The dress is very comfortable and got a ton of compliments from women (and stares from men!). The size 4 fit snug around my large rib cage, but was a little too long on the legs. Other than the length, it's a perfect dress!
I loved this dress, only issue is the buttons popped open in the bust. I believe a customer before me sewed vertically down the button line which helped keep it closed but not completely.
Love the cut of this dress. Would buy if not so expensive. Lovely finishes. Pockets. Good length for my height. I'm between a 6-8 and the 8 was perfect.
Loose easy fit--didn't realize the dress had pockets! Buttons at chest are widely spaced so needed a safety pin to prevent gaping. Tiny clasp at waste helps with this too.

I give up on dresses with buttons. This one would barely close. Ended up wearing it open with a tank underneath and a big statement necklace to make it look like I intended it to be that way. I also felt like the style was a little matronly. I think if you wore this style in the 80s and 90s, it's hard to wear again now. I felt too retro, but not in a stylish way.

This dress made me feel very preppy and precious. Ralph Lauren runs large so I sized down to a 2 (usually I am a 4). The dress is very figure flattering and I think it would also look cute with sneakers. For work, I wore it with jute wedges.

LOVE THIS DRESS... not for the full busted ladies.... I am flat chested and still needed an extra safety pin to keep the dress from opening between the buttons whenever I sat down. Size up or use the safety pin but the dress looks wonderful on! I've worn it to school multiple times now.
Wore it for work and it was perfect. Is light weight and falls perfectly, great overall fit

Nothing "spectacular" but its cute for an effortless look. I am currently wearing it for casual Friday and plan on wearing it to brunch this weekend with a pair of Bob's. I think belting it will make it even more flattering - so now I just need to dig out my cream color belt! It is nothing special, but its easy to wear and doesn't look like I'm trying to hard.
It fit a little large and for that reason I did not wear it and sent it back. However, I am on the petite end so this may work better for someone else. I thought the piece was well-made and cute.
Comfortable, many compliments - only con was it gaped a little at the bust.

links_reviews_title: Pretty and swingy dress for dinner out in Mexico
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fabric and cut. The buttons hit me in odd places, so needed to use a couple of safety pins to keep it from gapping at the bust.
I felt great in this dress. Loved the retro vibes. Will definitely rent again.

This was a great dress for me. I wore it several times. It was great for lunch meetings. I work from home, so I usually am in lounge wear. This was an easy complete outfit that looked great. The dress isn't lined, but it has several nice details and the fabric is very pretty.

It's simple, but I really liked it. There was plenty of room in the hips, and it accentuated my small waist. My only complaint is the chest area was a bit tight, so I had to use a safety pin to avoid a mishap. Otherwise, it's a great day dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but fits a little strange
links_reviews_text: Love this beautiful dress, flowy and flattering. But it is challenging if you have a large chest for the buttons not to do weird things (even when it fits right) especially when sitting down

This dress was a hit. Wore it with boots and a trench coat and it was the perfect transitional outfit. It's like the perfect 90s sundress without the vintage smell. Seriously considering buying. Fit was TTS, slim through the waist and length was mid-calf (I'm 5'5").
Breezy fit, sweet floral. Versatile for weekend away!
Loved the lines of this shirt dress, but very gappy first couple buttons and needed to pin it to lay flat. This even though the dress wasn't even snug.
Tailored cut. Lightweight but quality fabric. Definitely can blow up in a strong breeze. I'm 5'8" and loved the mid-calf length. Might feel a bit too long for a shorter lady.

links_reviews_title: Wore this several times to a variety of events. It works for everything!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Simple yet elegant - good for many occasions (work, night out, weekend, etc.). Got many compliments on this dress!

links_reviews_title: Great for tall people and the torso/chest area is so well tailored!
links_reviews_text: Loved the pattern- unique

I hosted an outdoor bbq and then had a formal event that I was able to just change shoes and turn this dress from a day to evening dress. I loved the pockets and it was fitted but with room to stretch. I would buy this dress if I could afford it

links_reviews_title: So breezy and easy- perfect for the summer
links_reviews_text: It was a perfect fit and I got compliments all day!

Loved this top. Typically wear a 2-4 but the medium was the best fit. Very cropped - need high waist denim. Wore without a bra and fit great. I have a 3 month old so when holding him had to be on cleavage duty but otherwise stayed in place well.

links_reviews_title: Sizing is odd but this top is AMAZING
links_reviews_text: This may be my favorite top I have rented. It's such good quality and a beautiful design that is very flattering. My only complaint with this top is the sizing is strange. I ordered a small originally and could not button a single button on the front. I loved it so much, I snagged it in a large next time I saw it available. The large was a little big, but I went with it anyway. I recommend going up a size if you have a chest. I am a 34C with a fairly narrow upper body, and I think the medium would of fit best.

I wore this shirt with a dark wash denim skirt and loved the fabric and ruffles. The shirt was snug in the chest (32C) but I wore it without a bra and it was still very flattering! You have to button up the front, there is no zipper, so it's tricky getting on especially if it's too small!
Great top with a little crop. Make sure to size up I am usually a small and a medium was perfect!

links_reviews_title: I think these are child sizes not adults
links_reviews_text: I rented a large but fit like a small. It was really cute but way too small could not wear it.
runs very small

I'm always a medium in tops but the large was the only size available and reviews said in ran small so I got the large. Glad I did! I'm a 34 D and don't think the girls would have fit in the medium. Don't be afraid to size up in the top if you are fuller chested. The waist wasn't tight but still really cute and flattering. Would consider buying if it wasn't so expensive!
Great for a night out with jeans or during the day with shorts. Such a cute top!

Really wanted to love this top. As some of the other reviews state, the top runs small. On that notion, I ordered a large (I'd normally wear a small). I think the medium MIGHT have fit better, but it was out of stock. The large just fit awkwardly and I was never able to wear it. Great color combo/thicker material though!
A little tight, but this top did wonders for my wide-set bust. I loved it
Was able to wear it, very tight fit. Not super comfortable as the night went on, but it was cute!
way too small

links_reviews_title: The top is super flattering, perfect for spring/summer.
links_reviews_text: Need high waisted bottoms. Fits a little small- I usually wear a S/M but the medium was borderline too tight.

Such a cute top but it runs VERY small. I usually wear a zero or two, and I couldn't even button the extra small. There is also no stretch to the fabric. I probably could go with the medium. Might rent again in the right size.

links_reviews_title: Super cute shirt but straps fall off
links_reviews_text: I loved this shirt so so cute. It fit really well in the body but the straps fell down very easily. The shirt does run small and not for people with a big chest

Really cute shit that I rented for a vacation in Mexico. I wore it with jean shorts and some fun earrings. They only had the M available, and it was a bit big. I think the S would have been perfect. Overall loved the shirt!

links_reviews_title: Shirt went perfectly with jeans and nude heeled sandals.
links_reviews_text: fits perfectly, looks super cute.
This top has potential, but I recommend sizing up 1-2 sizes. It was 2"+ from being able to button in front. It runs super small, even for an A cup.

This is soooo tiny, and I got it to wear to work/everyday. It's basically the length of a bralette. I am a very solid XS and ordered that size, and when I threw it on like a vest there was a good 4 inches between the buttons! Didn't even try to get it to button LOL If you want this one, then I'd guess to size up TWO SIZES, and maybe only consider it for Coachella 😂😂😂

Super well made, quality material, absolutely adorable. I'm a size 4/6 in everything and this *just* fit around my ribs, so I think it runs every so slightly small. Easy to wear with a skirt, shorts, or pants/jeans!
The top was beautiful. Ran small
This top runs extremely small

links_reviews_title: So cute and perfect for a night out!
links_reviews_text: its a smaller fit but thats what I liked about it, its cropped so I wore high waisted jeans! not made for bigger chested people
This jacket is the perfect combo of cool and chic. It's a more fitted style leather jacket and the details are amazing. Received a lot of compliments! Wish I could keep.

The detailing on this jacket is beautiful omg!! The fur on the inside and collar kept me cozy in Toronto weather. I wish I could've kept it, so pretty. It fit like a glove but I couldn't wear a sweater with it! Only a silk button up or tee shirt

This is possibly my favorite rental to date. I love the fit and the fuzzy lining on the inside and the collar, the Moto details, and the embroidered stars. Goes with lots of outfits and is great length. Only complaint is that the pockets don't fit my phone :p
Cute and warm and fun. I did not zip as it would have been too tight but I prefer these types of jackets unzipped anyway
I wore this jacket multiple times over 2 weeks...it is adorable...the embroidered stars are fun the faux fur collar is super cozy. I can't wait to get it again!!
I adored this jacket. It's versatile and different. Was great for the rainy drizzle cold of the UK
Loved it!!!! Wore it almost every day, mostly for nights out but also for daytime. I kept this jacket for about 6 weeks or so. Didn't want to give it back.

Rented for a vacation in October and come February I still can't part with it! Warm enough for Chicago and London but not too warm for Southern California. Looks great with almost everything from dresses to jeans to yoga wear. Durable in light rain. Great quality and detail. I'm a consistent 4 and sized up to the medium which is a perfect fit. I think the stars are a fun detail and don't seem young or limiting at all!

links_reviews_title: Not your typical Black leather jacket
links_reviews_text: Love this jacket so much wish it wasn't 2k Fits true to size very flattering not boxy at all Surprisingly warm for a thin coat good for 40s temps I wore it when it was 32 and i wasn't that cold for in and out shopping The fur is soft Stars add edge

links_reviews_title: Love this jacket -- so comfy and stylish!
links_reviews_text: This jacket feels super luxe and can be worn with just about everything. It is lined with faux fur so it's warm. The stars are muted so not too flashy. I love this jacket. One note: I go from XS to S and this is an S. It fits great but I am in SoCal where it's not freezing so wear it with a thin shirt underneath. If you were wearing big sweaters you might want to go a size up. I kept this for three months!

This jacket is as close to perfect as it gets for me :) the stars are subtle enough for every day but fun enough to make a statement! The leather and faux fur is SO SOFT & it fits in all the right places. I absolutely adore this jacket & cant wait to rent more pieces -- i saw a white one on here somewhere!
Fuzzy on the inside and so cute, a little too small for me to wear zipped but I like it as a topper to an outfit. Would rent again
Love love love this. I wore it with jeans and a black tank then with black leggings, black long sleeve t-shirt. It's so chic and fabulous.

Soft leather, great fur collar, whimsical stars make this a great piece. Large was nice to be able to wear with sweaters. Kept this one for a few weeks- best thing I've rented so far, as a new RTR Unlimited member.
Great jacket- the collar and interior faux fur is so warm and comfy! The leather is beautiful and soft. I'll definitely be looking into other jackets by the same designer.
Feels luxe and warm. Wore it out for a night. Worth $2000? - not a chance, but a fun alternative to a standard leather.

STAR OF THE NIGHT! This jacket is so adorable. It is great for a date night or a night out with the girls. It is so comfy and the fur makes it so much more cuter. It does run a little bit small, especially in the arms. I would recommend sizing up! Can wear it with black heels or even black boots.

Stunning jacket. Some people said that the stars make it look young, but they are subtle so i think its totally fine! Also the fur is definitely vegan (someone said it was real - no way!) The fit is a little small so for layering, size up. Also it came without the belt, which was annoying but ultimately didnt matter that much for this piece.

Absolutely one of the most beautiful jackets I've rented from RTR. And I have rented quite a few and they are one of my favorite pieces (in the winter) to rent with my unlimited membership. This jacket is super high-quality, soft leather and (seemed brand new). I tried it in a smaller size because that was what was available at the time, and the XS, while I could wear it, it was not the right fit for me to be able to wear anything underneath or to zip up the jacket.…I'm going to keep it for a while.
I love everything about this jacket. I wish I could keep it. So soft and lightweight but warm. Adds style to whatever you're wearing.

links_reviews_title: Faux fur lined - warmer than expected
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear this because I needed a lighter jacket. The faux fur on the collar lines the whole inside so this is definitely better for a fall jacket than the warmer weather I was going to use it for.
Super cute
I loved this jacket! Kept me nice and warm in 50° weather. Dressed up any outfit i wore and received a lot of compliments. Definitely would recommend

links_reviews_title: the leather felt really nice, the coat all together was great i kept it on the whole party
links_reviews_text: the leather felt really nice, the coat all together was great i kept it on the whole party

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit, so comfy and warm!!
links_reviews_text: This jacket fit so well!! Most jackets are tight in the shoulders on me, but this one was absolutely perfect! I loved this jacket and did NOT want to send it back!!! Amazing piece!!
I wore this several times and got non stop complements. Didn't want to give it back. Will rent again!
Unique twist to a classic leather bomber jacket. I LOVED it. Got compliments every time I wore it.

links_reviews_title: This jacket is warm, stylish and perfect
links_reviews_text: This jacket is very warm and stylish. Super comfy jacket, got lots of compliments on it. Can't wait to wear it again when it's cooler out!
It kept me warm and stylish in Iceland!
Love love love this jacket. The stars are a great detail. A bit small over layers.

links_reviews_title: Great leather jacket, complements all around.
links_reviews_text: I love this jacket - it's warm and fuzzy on the inside but blocks the wind. I've been wearing it as my winter jacket and have not been cold yet.

links_reviews_title: Loved this jacket so much I almost bought it.
links_reviews_text: I rented this to wear to a wedding over a dress and it was so awesome. Comfortable and warm for a fall day. It fit my petite frame very well. The subtle star embroidery made it even more special. I kept it for multiple days.

I wear a 10-12 and this crop jacket is definitely barely fitting me, especially with a sweater. However, I had rented the grey version of this earlier in the fall and LOVED it! It is really warm with the faux fur lining, even for January in DC! Soft buttery leather, sassy zippers, and subtle stars.
Wore this every day of the month I had it. It was very warm and comfortable to wear. Very nice quality and lots of compliments. Can dress up or down. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: I do not have an unforgettable moment for this item
links_reviews_text: Love this jacket. Fits great. Warm comfortable and very stylish
Great to dress up with a skirt or down with jeans.

links_reviews_title: This leather jacket is so unique and fun to wear, so many compliments
links_reviews_text: The fur around the neck and the inside of the jacket was perfect for going out in the city at night. Definitely true to size. I ordered a XS and I am 5'4 110 pounds and I was scared the jacket would be too tight in the arms and it was perfect.
Will totally rent again. Fits perfectly, so stylish! Received a TON of compliments.
Not only did it keep me super warm, it's incredibly stylish and I got a lot of compliments on it
So soft and so cute! Loved it!
Casual and comfy but does run small
Loved the fit, the linen fabric and the pockets!
Still hanging on to this one Wore out & about on a trip to Chicago & ended up keeping it for an upcoming vacation

Pros: loved the sleeves, length and classic look! Can be dressed up or down—the material makes it feel more Lux than other rompers. Cons: None really. I ordered a size up for comfort (I’m too heavy) and it ran bigger than expected. It probably run true to size!
Small in the waist. Chafing between the legs. Very boxy all around.
Cute and flattering jumpsuit that fits the utility trend that is so popular right now.

I generally love Bec & Bridge. I didn't hate this romper, but I didn't love it (could be because I am petite and it was a bit long in the torso). Safari style with belt and rolled sleeves. Heavier weight linen--I was a bit warm in Mexico City humidity.
Very cute and very comfortable!
Such a cute utility one piece, perfect for warmer weather - I didn't want to take it off!

I love the material of this romper, it's like a thicker linen and so is both warmer than normal linen and super comfortable, it also just looks very chic like you would expect for a LBD except this is a romper. I would have bought this for my closet if it were cheaper.
Cute romper but ultimately not for me. It was just very large up top, and sort of sloppy looking at the bottom. Did not end up wearing
Cute & comfy for exploring a city on vacay! No fit issues

links_reviews_title: Nice option for a dressed up casual look
links_reviews_text: Super cute for a weekend in Sonoma with the hubs. Arms were a bit baggy but i cuffed them & ironed & was good to go.
The top of the romper was too large, especially the sleeves

It's a linen-y material, so it wrinkles at any moment (especially when you sit). But otherwise, fits true to size, comes with the tie around the waist or you can wear without. Annoying to go to the bathroom but hey it's a romper. Shorts are a good length to cover your butt. And fabric feels thick enough that you're not just jiggling around.

Note: I actually wore a size 2, but the dropdown list gave me a 6 as the smallest size. The weight of the heavy linen fabric was just right for colder summer evenings. Perfect for hourglass figures, but a tad too long for short torsos and petites.
The outfit itself is a little heavy, however; it looked very nice on, and was very comfortable to wear. I wore it to an amusement park and was very pleased with this outfit.
I like that this is pretty casual and comfortable. But it runs big, and I was sorta swimming in the thing.

links_reviews_title: Great jumper, runs short and small
links_reviews_text: I liked the fit and linen material of this jumper but I went up two sizes and it fit great. But I have a very long torso. Was hoping tit would be a bit more formal, but great for everyday

I am so in love with this romper! I usually can never wear them because of my long torso, but this romper fit so well and was just baggy enough that it hit my body correctly, but the tie at the waist made it so flattering. I wore it out and about all day and then at night for drinks. It's so comfortable and flattering and such an easy thing to just throw on and have an instant outfit.

Great thick linen type material, I just didn't wear it because even though I sized up two sizes the length was too short on my body. I always have this problem with rompers though. My shoulders are also pretty wide so it was a little tight in that area, but I'm sure I'll order this in the next size, It was a really cute item.

I really enjoyed this romper. Great quality construction with heavy, yet breathable, linen fabric. And great detailing. The pleats in front are perfect. A bit large on top, but worked for me (larger chest, due to breastfeeding) and draped well. I'd rent again.

I read the previous reviews, that the top on this ran large, but I was actually looking for something a little loose so I wasn't detracted. Should. Have. Listened. The top on this is gigantic compared to the actual size of the garment and unless you're my size with a chest that is cup size F or larger, I don't think you could even make this look like you're supposed to be wearing it.

This is the cutest, best fitting romper I've ever worn (and I've worn a lot haha). Fits so well in the bust and waist, and the shorts are long enough to feel covered, but not so long that I felt frumpy. I was going to buy this but even with the discount it's way too expensive. Loved wearing it!

links_reviews_title: LOVE LOVE LOVE. The perfect dinner / movie outfit. Not too fancy not to casual. Really comfy!
links_reviews_text: Size 10 US = Sz 14 UK runs a bit large. However I think if I would have downsized it would have been too short. I love the pockets and linen feel / look without the linen wrinkle. I really loved the outfit and received tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Nice romper but big at the top.
links_reviews_text: The tags were still on the romper. This may be why it seemed bulky in the arms and shoulders. I didn't wear it because it was so big at the top.
But the top was too broad in the shoulders and the pockets did not sit right.

links_reviews_title: Obsessed with every part of this jumpsuit, just need to size DOWN!
links_reviews_text: This romper is perfect in every way - substantial fabric, nice lines, breathable, etc. I am returning it and renting it in the next size down. The bust and shoulders were way oversized.
This romper is the best! Such a cute fit.
The fit on the bottom is true to size but the top is oddly large. I don't have a large chest (32B), so if you're a bit larger in that area, it'll probably work better for you!

links_reviews_title: Great for work and fun for St. Patty's Day!
links_reviews_text: Loved the tie and the dramatic puff sleeves (they were still work appropriate). This is a very conservative work shirt, but because of the lux fabric and color, it also makes for a fantastic St. Patrick's Day party shirt! I would definitely rent again.
I wore this shirt for an event and received so many compliments. The color is vibrant and it fits perfect.
Tons of compliments! Great for work or going out! I wore it with skirts and jeans, a million compliments. Easy to wear. Rent this!
The material and the fit is prefect. Received many compliments bc it is a unique piece. Not your everyday shirt. Color is prefect too.

links_reviews_title: Great shirt for work. Comfortable fit and fun sleeves
links_reviews_text: This shirt was very comfortable. If you're not into big sleeves I wouldn't suggest this shirt for you. My husband also commented that the shirt looked like it was good for At Patrick's Day because the design looked like clovers.

links_reviews_title: Fun shirt to mix things up at work
links_reviews_text: Overall, I like the shirt, but it ran a bit large and the sleeves were too big to fit in my suit jacket. I went without a jacket today and still felt very dressed up.
I ordered a M but really could have used a small.
Fabric is very thick and well made, beautiful color and pattern.
Gorgeous fit, quality details, totally comfortable. A winner in every possible way!
Runs large but looks flowy and chic..
This is a perfect blouse for work - it is professional but has a lot of interesting details with the neck tie and full sleeves. Can't wait to wear it tomorrow!
This blouse is very boxy and the sleeves are comically billowy. Not a huge fan of the polyester fabric either, but the pattern is cool.

It's a nice looking shirt but louder than my usual style. I didn't realize how large and poofy the sleeves were from the pictures. Also the wrist doing seems small, I can't get my hands through without unbuttoning. Didn't bother me until the end of the day.

links_reviews_title: Bright and cheery but not TOO much . Very fun blouse for work
links_reviews_text: Fit very true to size.
Fits great. So many compliments. Would so buy!
The sleeves were dramatic but perfect, along with the length of the shirt and the tie..looked cute both tied and loose. Statement piece for sure, but what a beautiful showstopper!
Great color and pattern. The drape and cut were very 70's chic.
too big and puffy arms. funny looking . did not like it. color tone is too bright. returned
This is a stylish shirt that won lots of compliments.
Fun statement piece! Received lots of compliments!

Wore this twice - once to an event at an art gallery and then once to work. Sleeves are quite voluminous but I liked it. Glad I sized down one though - I'm normally a small, but I got an XS in this and it was perfect.
The balloon sleeves felt overwhelming and were much too short for my long arms. I didn't wear this.

links_reviews_title: Great blouse for work, or day to night look.
links_reviews_text: I ordered a small, and it fit perfectly. Sleeve poof is generous, so I would size down if between sizes.
Love love love this shirt. Amazing quality and durable material. Tons of compliments!!
I love the sleeves and the bow of this piece.
Puffy sleeves look crazy oversize on petite gals
Slightly large but that's the style.
Loved this! I wore it with black pants for a presentation and it's a great statement blouse
The shirt really helped to get my work wardrobe out the blacks and grays I usually wear. Received tons of compliments.
I ended up returning without wearing. The sleeves were way too puffy and awkward. Pretty/fun print but awful fit.

This statement top is so easy to wear with black pants to work. The top itself is busy enough so you don't need to accessorize except for simple earrings. A more petite or shorter frame may be overwhelmed in this shirt. I'm 5'8 so it was easy to wear the long billowy sleeves.
N/A
I look like a ruffled quarterback

links_reviews_title: Love this top! Cute and flattering.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size in shoulders, plenty of room for larger-breasted girls with no gapping with the buttons.
This shirt runs a little large, which makes it seem even poofier in the sleeves. I got lots of compliments on how nice the color and pattern were.
Great print, great quality, but so big. I should have ordered the small but I think the sleeves still would have been way too long. Will work best on tall figures with longer arms.
Really fun shirt to wear tucked in with black skinny jeans and statement belt.
Loved it! It was a little tight by the wrist but I left one button open! Great shirt. Usually wear small but got XS and it was perfect
Great work shirt
These earrings are super pretty! A great way to jazz up your everyday wear.
Loved the color and fit. Fairly light weight so not great for cold weather.

links_reviews_title: So stylish and comfy, didn't want to send back!
links_reviews_text: Wore this with leggings running around Disney world and it was perfect!
Fit perfectly and was made of such a nice fabric. It was perfect for adding a fun layer to a casual winter outfit.

Great little jacket to dress down a body con dress. I'm 5'5 and it hit exactly on my lower waistline (I have a longer torso) and I like that it wasn't so cropped that it hit any higher. Ill definitely keep this in rotation for the chillier days in TX.
Great crop jacket with a dress
Loved this lightweight jacket. Perfect for summer into fall evening weather.
A great jacket to pair with tons of other options. Would definitely rent again! Also, thanks to Ashley who help expedite my shipment before leaving on my international trip!!!

links_reviews_title: Cute jacket. Would wear again or buy! Lots of compliments. #sportyspice
links_reviews_text: Super cute. Shorter fit isn't my usual style but I wore it anyway. Probably 6 people told me they loved the jacket. Love it

links_reviews_title: Cute jacket for casual Friday look.
links_reviews_text: Really great jacket! I dressed it up a tiny bit with dark jeans and high heeled boots, which was the perfect casual Friday look. No regrets, great rental!

links_reviews_title: The jacket I didn't know I had to have in my life
links_reviews_text: I randomly rented this since I'm on lockdown and don't need much. Well I'm seriously obsessed with this jacket in style, fabric and fit. I wear it for all my "essential" trips while locked down and it fits so cute (if you're short) and has a great fit and nylon fabric blocks wind or cold stores. I just love it and will be keeping it until life goes back to normal !
Got perfect. Looked really cute with jeans, T-shirt and sneakers. Great casual weekend look. Will definitely be renting again.
This is my second time renting. Fits great and goes well with lots of things. Sporty and wind-blocking. Perfect for norcal spring weather
Definitely wouldn't go any smaller! Fit perfectly. Loved the jacket
Great fit. Very comfortable and true to size.
I didn't end up wearing - it was more cropped than I would have liked. But overall very cute!
Great bomber, would rent again. Runs small but still looks great.
Fit perfectly. I would have bought it if it wasn't $700!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for everyday wear and versatile. I have worn it with a black dress, jeans, and a skirt.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. A little tight in the arms.

I loved this jacket - got so many compliments on it. Very high quality. I am usually between XS and S but I would recommend sizing up on this one because the XS I got was short in the torso and in the sleeves. The sleeves were also very tight around the wrists but I think this would have been better in size S.

links_reviews_title: nice jacket, just didn't work for me
links_reviews_text: I really liked the style jacket, but I didn't care for the color. It also arrived very wrinkled and it was hard to get the wrinkles out.
I rented this for everyday wear. It was a good weight for springtime. It was slightly more cropped on me than I prefer, but still looked nice.
LOVE this bomber. It's roomy without being oversized and it was a really easy piece to dress up and down. It looked great over an all black workout outfit and jeans and a t for work.

links_reviews_title: Cute concept, boxy fit, true to size
links_reviews_text: I'm a size 12 and ordered the XL based on other reviews - should have ordered the large. Also jacket wrinkles easily. but will order in a L and try again
Loved this bomber. Great for spring summer and pairs well with joggers or jeans! A bit tight for me in the shoulders, but overall great!

links_reviews_title: sporty and good looking. expensive fabric
links_reviews_text: small fit but looks very good with the jacket open
Great piece, it had a great structure and good quality fabric. The cuffs got a bit stained with ly blue jeans, but other than that I loved it. Received many compliments the three times I wore it.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun jacket! Received many compliments. Size up if you don't like it super fitted
links_reviews_text: Wore it with black jeans and a white shirt
Felt like a million bucks
This jacket is true to size. Easy casual look for everyday wear. If you want an easy on the go jacket it's great.

I absolutely loved wearing this jacket! It was a great transitional piece from Winter to Spring in March/April and I felt cool and put together every time I wore it. The only negative is that the pockets are placed really high so you can't actually put your hands in them easily.

links_reviews_title: This jacket went with everything. I took it to San Diego and Vegas and it worked out perfectly
links_reviews_text: Fit was cropped but very flattering
Would rent again, perfect for spring weather

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear with lots of things.
links_reviews_text: So cute. I loved this bomber. It's getting warm where I live so I sent it back within a week. But its definitely one I'd rent again.

I normally wear a L/XL in jackets. I rented the 2x on this one hoping it would be roomy for a sweater underneath - it was not. It's very short and overall very small. The two flap pockets are not in a flattering location. Such a bummer, it's so cute and the material is like a think nylon windbreaker but it's just too small.
Have rented before and love this blouse. But yet another RTR item that arrived with a huge hole in the blouse
I love this top! It's made of light, silky, flowy, comfortable fabric and fits well. Gorgeous button detail and floral print. 10/10 recommend :)
Classic silk shirt. Loved the buttons.

links_reviews_title: Perfect summer top with long sleeves!
links_reviews_text: I thought this top would be perfect for going out on a date night or for the office. It's very lightweight and looks create tucked in or untucked. I will say that all the buttons do require you to take some time getting them closed.
Runs TTS, really pretty pattern. Also you can pull it on overhead and avoid all the buttons!

links_reviews_title: Pretty print, flattering shape, great for work
links_reviews_text: Love all the details of this blouse- especially the buttons & conical cuffs on sleeves! Was worried it would be too small, but fit great. Great top for the office.
Easy to wear and beautiful.
Very tailored fit. It was definitely on the small side of medium. I never wore it because it looked odd. It was nice fabric and was well-made.
Nice fit on this floral blouse - comfortable fabric, many buttons added interest. Wore it with a gray suit and felt very put together!

I thought this top was prettier in person than in the photos. It is a soft, rather sheer material with a textured pattern. It ran true to size but next time I would size up to get a blousier look and more length.
If I could buy this shirt I would. It's beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Flattering blouse - nice pattern and button detail
links_reviews_text: The blouse fits true to size and is a nice material. It is flattering worn multiple ways - with jeans, high-waisted dress pants, a skirt, etc. Very versatile. The flower print is delicate and pretty.
Great staple. Tempted to buy but it's a bit too Standard. Wore this several times though. Works with a lot.
It is a very flattering top if you tuck it in. For a short person with a short torso the shirt is very long
Elegant, made well with nice design. Felt fresh and well dressed in this.
I felt so fancy in this amazing silk blouse! Perfect fit, a million tiny buttons.
Loved the fit, the fabric, the unique cuffs and the tiny covered buttons. Blouse has a nice drape and lines tucked in or worn out. Not a show-stopper but lovely.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fabric and elegant, slightly sexy fit
links_reviews_text: TTS, but consider sizing up if you are busy. I'm usually a small or medium, but 34E bust and I am comfortable with the ease of the large
Looked smart enough for an interview!
I loved this shirt and will definitely rent again. It fits TTS, is comfortable, flattering, and looks very professional! Rent!
Cute shirt but the material is not breathable... so it tends to hold smells. Usually I can get away with wearing a top 3 or 4 times before sending it back, but this one was one and done.
Cute shirt with a French tuck. Very light material. Wore once. Would order again.
I wore this to work with black pants. It fits true to size and is comfortable. I didn't love the buttons because they were a bit difficult to open/close. Overall, a solid option for work.
loved the fit and the quality

links_reviews_title: It's a comfortable, professional work shirt.
links_reviews_text: It was a little long for me. The material was soft. I wore it 3x.
Fit is loose, the print is lovely. The buttons are a bit annoying but the fact they are so closely spaced together means there's no gaping in the chest area. Wore it twice.
Great shirt Saw it in club Monaco and definitely was excited to try it. Victorian look with the little buttons. Great for work or going out
Suggest sizing down
Elegant blouse. Looks good with work pants or jeans!
It was a good work top, but I didn't feel the need to wear it again.

links_reviews_title: Nice details and the fabric feels great
links_reviews_text: Well made and lots of nice details. I'll rent this for work again.

links_reviews_title: Love the top! Wanted to purchase it now, but slightly out of my price point
links_reviews_text: true to size -- I'm 5'10" and it fits well and looks great tucked into jeans/work pants

I wore this a couple times to work and loved the fit. Followed other reviewers advice about not messing around with the buttons too much and just slipped it on. Love the simple design and comfort of the silk. Could definitely be worn through all seasons.
The print is pretty. The blouse is fine, it didn't wow me, but I liked wearing it.
Very light. Great for taking from work to happy hour.

links_reviews_title: Tried it on. Did not get a chance to wear it.
links_reviews_text: Fit was loose
Wore this to work with distressed black jeans on casual Friday. Beautiful top. Club Monaco does it again. One of my longtime fave brands!

links_reviews_title: Lightweight shirt that is great for work
links_reviews_text: I originally ordered a small, but it was too big in the shoulders and sleeves. Nice fabric and print. The covered buttons were a nice detail in the front.
Dressed up or down, the perfect shirt!
Good work too Flattering Nice fabric
Small so I sized up twice, but I loved it! Long enough for a long legged girl as well!

I'm debating buying this skirt! On top of being very chic and having pockets, it's constructed very well and great quality. The white is a little off-white, so it's forgiving for sitting on park benches or anywhere that may not be the cleanest. The zipper is also great quality, which adds a bit of weight to the skirt. The waist was a little tight at first, but throughout the day it became more comfortable. I wore this out during the weekend, and am now wearing it to work! Very versatile!

This crisp white skirt from DVF was so useful in my closet that I had to buy it. The gold zipper accent makes it more interesting than most a-line skirts and I am a lover of anything with pockets! Paired here with a cozy star sweater for the fourth of July. Now if I can just keep it clean.... @rtrjunkie

The fit was great! I have a small waist and always worry about skirts slowing riding up but this one stayed in place!! Some reviews said it was stiff - I thought it was really comfortable and held its shape. Super cute. I got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fashionable skirt with the perfect length
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this skirt. It's super comfy and it looks very elegant too. You can wear it with sneakers and a t shirt or with heels and a blouse. It's super versatile!
Loved this, comfortable and adorable. Chic and fabulous. Tons of compliments and very flattering
Heard this ran small, so got a size up and it was cute!

links_reviews_title: Cute skirt but make sure to order 1 size up!
links_reviews_text: Cute skirt with unique zipper design. But I would recommend ordering 1 size up! (Normally wear size 00 or 0, but wore size 2 which still fit pretty tight).
Super cute skirt, great for work. A bit tight in the waist but it worked.
I usually were a 10, ordered this in 12 and it fit pretty nice. Nice thick material, lots of compliments too!

links_reviews_title: Super cute skirt.. a true classic
links_reviews_text: I really like this skirt! It's a great stretch material. No fear of zipper pulling up or getting inappropriate! This is such a high quality skirt.. I think you will not be disappointed.

This is a cute-on-paper skirt. It's just not practical for anything but standing still for a short period of time and not sitting, walking, or generally existing. It's also way too small. I'm usually a 2/4 and a 6 was pushing it; I could barely breathe. It was immediately not cute the minute I sat down. Super wrinkly and the fabric is stiff. And white is a risk, but you probably already know that.

links_reviews_title: So flattering - but very narrow waist
links_reviews_text: I tend to have a wider waist/rib cage (apple shape) so skirts that are narrow don't always work, but it was so cute!! Stretchy fabric that feels expensive and very flattering in the back.

links_reviews_title: Very cute but size up 2 sizes
links_reviews_text: I loved this skirt. I am between a 2 and a 4 and ordered the 4. It started out very tight, almost too tight, but wore it anyways and as the day progressed it loosened up a bit. I would say order up 2 sizes for comfort right from the start. Really cute skirt. Loved the gold zipper!

The first thing you notice about the skirt is how well constructed it is, the fabric is sturdy and almost feels like denim and the seams/pockets are so streamlined. Because of how pale I am, I rarely wear white but this was a worthy exception. I was able to wear it on a windy day without getting all that cold which is a bonus for me. The only issue I had with this piece is that the zipper puckered a little bit but not enough to bother me. Overall: a simple skirt with great pockets, zipper and seam details and a perfect winter white.
I read the reviews and read that it runs small, which is true. I am usually a 4 but rented a 6 and it fit perfectly. Thank you ladies for leaving reviews to help choose the right size!
I received compliments all day in this skirt. Based on reviews I ordered this a size up and it fit perfectly. Easy to wear and super comfortable. One of my favorite rentals.

Overall I got a lot of compliments on this skirt and it was definitely snug but I usually wear my clothes a tad looser. So an 8 would've been more comfortable but glad the way my look turned out. I would rent this skirt again

links_reviews_title: Clean, classic lines, great wardrobe staple.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size for a slightly high waisted fit. Loved this skirt for its classic a-line shape and the cool zipper detail down the front. Heavier fabric but still works for warmer months. I wore this to work and I thought it was perfect. Many ways to style it but loved wearing all white. It's more of a cream color than white though.

links_reviews_title: Wore this on many occasions with a few different looks!
links_reviews_text: LOVE THIS SKIRT! Very flattering fit and good length. The waist was a bit tight but the material does has some stretch, so it worked. Goes with a lot of outfits and was able to wear on many different occasions.
This skirt is awesome! It was casual and fun. The material is lovely with just enough stretch. I loved the pockets !!! Def rent this again !
I LOVED this skirt! Flattering with good quality shape and fabric. Easy to dress up or down for work or play!
Perfect for summer, beautiful details such as gold zipper, POCKETS in the front and back

Other reviews said to size up and i'm so glad that I did. I'm normally an 8 in bottoms but the 10 fit perfectly. The fabric is very thick, high-quality, and not see through it all. The color is a bright light cream-it's not exactly white. It fit well on the waist but wasn't tight on the butt or thighs. The front zipper is fully functional and it stayed put the whole day. It wrinkled slightly after a whole day of wear. The length is appropriate if you're really tall. The fabric has a tiny bit of stretch to it but I wouldn't rely on that. Also it has two giant pockets in the front and in the back abs they fit so much. I hate tiny pockets you can't actually put anything in. I adore this skirt; it's a great closet staple and it's upsetting to send back

links_reviews_title: Fabulous fit. Runs 1 1/2 - 2 sizes small. Great length for taller girls.
links_reviews_text: This skirt fits fabulously, but make sure to order 1 1/2 - 2 sizes up from your regular size. I rented this skirt in size 12 compared to my regular size 8 (sometimes 10; I am 5'8", 155 lbs) and it fit perfectly. Extremely flattering fit. While the description calls this a "mini" skirt, I think this is a fairly regular length skirt at 19" long, not a mini skirt. The material is very thick (with no lining), which covers any bumps, doesn't show underwear, and doesn't show the tucked-in shirt color. The zipper can be opened from both sides, in case you want to show more leg. The only minor negative is that the zipper doesn't lie flat.

The skirt runs small. I went up a size but as the day went on I thought I should have gone up two sizes. Because if you can tell from the pic the zipper puckers and perhaps it would have layen better if I had gone up in size. Over all the skirt is one of a kind. I enjoyed wearing it.

You can see all of my RTR moments on my IG @ Latinaexplorer! These piece was so easy to wear, I didn't like how the bottom of the skirt wasn't hugging the hips, but I made it work. I did however like that the material was of very good quality and that I can dress it up or down. Definitely recommend staying true to your size!

Bad angled photo, but the skirt really does look amazing on. I'm normally a size 2 and the 2 fit like a glove. In fact, it fit so well that I tried it on and didn't want to take it off! Plus, the best part is that it has front AND back pockets. Who doesn't love that?
The description warned about it being tight so I ordered a size up - but I should have ordered 3 sizes up! The waist is impossible. Rest of it was cute though -wish I could have zipped it!

links_reviews_title: Loved the style, shape, construction. But the waist was way too tiny!
links_reviews_text: This skirt is undeniably cute. Great shape, comfortable fabric, and not too short. However, the waist was way too small! I'm a 4 in the waist, 6 in the hips (big booty girls, where you at) and so I sized up to 6. The skirt looked great: wasn't tight in the booty (which is usually my problem with mini skirts) but was too tight in the waist. Then I sized up to the 8, but the waist was only marginally bigger. I could zip it up, but anytime I bent over, or sat down, or basically moved, the top zipper unzipped! I was surprised there was no hook to keep it closed. I thought about sizing up one more time, but the 8 already puckering in the front, and so I decided to return it.
I am normally a 4/6 and ordered an 8 based on reviews but even that was a bit too tight for comfort. I would suggest getting nothing less than at least 2 sizes up.
Wore this skirt to work and received lots of compliments. It's nice and thick so it holds you in and no VPL.
Too small to comfortably wear yet gorgeous!
I didn't get to wear it out because it was too small. I had already ordered a larger size, but these run really tight and does not stretch. I do love the material, design, and all the pockets!

Normally wear a 2 but got this in a 4 and it was still uncomfortably tight, so much so that I did not wear it after try-on. I guess I could have paid the $14 to return it but was a hassle at the time. Love the quality of the zipper and both front & back pockets. Maybe I need to size up even more (or do some abs work) ;)
Did not fit well
This skirt is really cute. The waist is quite fitted but it was still comfortable. The length hit me above the knee.
Very tight on the waist, had to wear this basically very high but looked great and would rent again
The fit was so small and uncomfortably tight. I did not wear.
Nice garment, but if you have an apple body type (or not?), order 1 or 2 sizes up
I love this top. Great quality, great fit! You can wear it tucked in or out. Dress it up, wear a blazer, etc. Such a great piece!

This is a nicely made blouse from quality material (silk). I was iffy on the pattern, but it looked good while on. I didn't like the pockets in the front so I wore a cardigan over. Might rent again, just for variety.
Fabulous #work shirt. Comfy, fits well, and the fabric is luxurious. Love it.

links_reviews_title: So cute and very tempted to buy!!
links_reviews_text: Great work shirt that I easily matched with a lot of different types of pants/skirts/etc
This blouse fits TTS & is comfortable/lightweight. I don't love animal prints, but this one felt extra neutral and easy to wear.
Love the soft and airy but thick enough not see through material! For large bust I needed to tape between buttons at bust but other than that fit perfectly!
Perfect shirt for work
Super soft fabric and lightweight to wear in layers. Great for work or happy hour!
Wore more than once & would rent again. Would buy if it cost less. For an XL, the fit was a bit snug, but it fit me well.
Trendy print and flattering fit. Not sheer.

links_reviews_title: Professional and comfortable with a bit of edge...
links_reviews_text: Equipment brand clothing as a group is just solid. Very well made with nice details and fabrics. If you like the look of this shirt, just rent it. You will not be disappointed. Also pictured is the Snake Olivia bag by Loeffler Randall.
Great fabric and on-trend print. Runs slim in hips. Super soft and comfortable.
Another amazing Equipment blouse! I loved it! Fits true to size. The print and fit were perfect. I absolutely recommend!
Wore this with black pants and flats to work. Very comfortable and classy.

This shirt feels light and airy to wear. Did have to make sure it didn’t gap in the chest when I moved. Might want to wear more open with a camisole under it. I felt great wearing it and got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Wore for a few evenings out to dinner, perfect and comfortable. Lovely fabric.
links_reviews_text: Can be dressed up with pants or skirts for work, out for dinner- or dressed down with jeans for a fun night out.
Well-made garment of luxurious, mid-weight silk. I wore this to work under a black jacket, casually with a cardigan, and on it's own tucked into jeans. I sized up so it wouldn't gap at the chest.
Love this shirt but my broad shoulders and bust could not accomodate it.
This is a fun work top with snake pattern. I am usually between a M and L and the L fit well, the M would definitely have been too small around the bust.
Slim fit, if in between sizes go up one. I liked this blouse & felt good wearing it- I just wasn't in love.
True fit

links_reviews_title: This blouse is perfect in every way!
links_reviews_text: Tailored fit. Long enough to tuck in. Fabric feels great!

links_reviews_title: It was alright, didnt end up wearing, not sure I loved the pattern.
links_reviews_text: Fabric was nice!
Lightweight and comfortable but looks polished. Cute tucked in or untucked.
Comfy fit, super neutral color; loved everything about this top!
Not billowy but comfortable and chic. Really liked !

This style Equipment blouse is a staple work item for me and I wish I could buy it in every color. So easy to wear left untucked with skinnys or tucked in w/belt and trousers for the office. Fits TTS, breathes, feels light to the skin. I did get 1 comment from a co-worker who told me I needed matching boots! I'm not a huge fan of snake but I liked this blouse.
beautiful fabric and fit. I love these shirts!

links_reviews_title: This was a great option to rent due to the trendy nature of the print versus cost of the shirt.
links_reviews_text: This fit fairly true to size, though I didn't find the material quite as nice of a weight as I may have expected.

links_reviews_title: Perfect, trendy shirt for a summer work day!
links_reviews_text: I love this shirt! Super trendy! Lightweight material was fantastic for a hot summer workday. Very professional, tailored fit. It looked expensive, chic, and pulled my outfit together. Will rent again, and will work towards investing in a few of these shirts by Equipment for work wardrobe staples.

links_reviews_title: love it! good quality, great fit :)
links_reviews_text: Equipment makes a great button down, so comfy and stylish.. strongly recommend

links_reviews_title: Interesting snakeskin print. Nice, low-key shirt.
links_reviews_text: I wore it untucked. It was large enough to not gap at the bust line, but I couldn't button the very last button around my hips. The cuffs had extra buttons so you could make them tighter. This is a nice feature for people with short arms, like me. I wore the sleeves rolled up though so I could show off a bracelet I had rented.
I love this one! The print is beautiful and it goes well with everything! It. Is true to size even with my full arms! I will rent this again!
Great shirt and fabric. Appropriate for work, especially if you want to jazz up your corporate office!
On trend pattern, oversized, wore w white jeans, another time w black pants. Great everyday shirt!
I'm a big girl (5'10 200lbs 38C) so this didn't quite reach the full length of my arms. Loved the color and how light the material was.

links_reviews_title: Trendy pattern, fun but appropriate for work!
links_reviews_text: Loved how light the fabric was (super breathable on a hot, rainy NYC day) but it was totally opaque! The cuffs have two sets of buttons for wrist sizing, which I found really helpful because I overestimated my size.
Paired with jeans and heeled sandals. Perfect for work. Loose fitting but not too much fabric.

I wish the designer at equipment knew how to measure and cut better. I've worn XL in Equipment that I am literally swimming in, I look like a circus tent, and this XL was not tight but it definitely didn't fit me like I wanted to. It's tighter around the arms and the hips and looses around the waist. I wore it for work but and I got plenty of compliments but I like a looser fit that I can tuck in and move around in. Fit is just MEH.
Can't stop ordering Equipment. Esp in an animal print. Own a bunch and love to switch up the prints with RTR.

great fit, super flattering. looked great for work (biz casual) and more put together than a normal sweater because of the v neck. it's hard to find a flattering striped sweater, esp for a plus sized person.
This sweater is warm, but sexy at the same time. It did have slight piling.
I wore this casual during the day with puffy vest and sneakers and with booties to go out. Love it! Hubby likes the cleavage too.

Rented this to pair with some black jeans I also rented (Midheaven Astrid). The sweater was cute, warm, and comfortable. I wore a black cami under but it never really showed. It's a thick sweater. The stripes are more cream than white. I may keep this whole outfit to wear over this weekend as well.
Comfortable but stylish! Sleeves were a little long so I cuffed them. There was no way I could have worn to work without a tank underneath, but liked the chance to add a pop of color.
Flattering, great for Spring.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear but layered over tummy so sticks out
links_reviews_text: I tried to take a pic showing how the wrap over the tummy sticks out. Very soft and I did wear it a few times
Loved the drape and fit of this sweater. The knit was very comfy but came across as polished and professional. Lots of compliments!
Bunch's around belly if short waisted. Longer in the front than in the back (on me). Probably awesome on along waisted person. Nice tailoring.
I think this sweater looks/fits better in real life. It's a sexy fit, but can be worn anywhere. Soft and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Many friends liked this black & white sweater! The diagonal pattern was great!
So many compliments on this sweater!
links_reviews_text: I love cross-overs. I'm big-busted, so a lot of cross-overs don't work on me, but this one is made in such a way that it DOES work. I'm really glad this got reduced so I can buy it!

Don't let the "zebra" pattern scare you off. this is a beautiful sweater that is very flattering and comfortable. I was expecting a black and white sweater but it's definitely cream and black. i would rent again
Really loved the cross cross and puff sleeves. Will rent again
Fit was TTS looked really good on-I have no waist so it was great on petite torso
Cut nicely

links_reviews_title: Cozy sweater for every day wear
links_reviews_text: Fits well, nice design.

links_reviews_title: Such a cute sweater, fits true to size.
links_reviews_text: Might be a tad low cut, I added a piece of fashion tape and it worked great!

The sweater was comfortable, but not as flattering as I hoped. The stripes seemed to make my shoulders look wider, and I would have preferred the sleeves to be slightly longer. As someone mentioned previously, the material sticks out a little bit around the stomach area as well. I did not have any problems with it being low cut, I was able to wear it without a camisole underneath, no cleavage spilling out

links_reviews_title: nice comfy nice with leggings and boots
links_reviews_text: nice

Loved this warm and unique sweater - the interesting stripe pattern and slightly cropped/overlapped style made it feel different than my usual boring winter sweaters. The fabric is pretty heavy, so recommend in cold/cooler months.
Pros: Nice material. Stripes are cute. Worn with burgundy slim pants. Cons: None really.
The sweater is very warm for summer.
A bit bulkier than expected, but nice. I should have tried a 6 . The 8 was too big in the shoulders/arms and way too much cleavage. I sent it back...
Comfy but cut low so I wore a camisole underneath. Good for spring transition. Fit large

links_reviews_title: I did not like it. unattractive
links_reviews_text: unattractive in my opinion

links_reviews_title: Nice lightweight sweater. Runs a bit small
links_reviews_text: Pretty
Soft sweater and fit true to size. Pattern made my shoulders look small compared to bottom of sweater. I sent it back without wearing it.

The cut/ fit was very flattering on my body, but unfortunately the sizing seems to run large. I ordered an 8 but am swapping for a 6. I'm very busty, so this shows a lot of cleavage on me-- maybe not appropriate for every office, but for me this is a great day-to-night piece.

This fits true to size. I thought the pattern of the stripes would be flattering but it made me look pregnant. People legitimately would have gotten up from their seats on the subway for me. So i did not wear
This felt kind of 1980's. The cut was flattering, but the wool/acrylic blend looked cheap.
Thick cable knit, flattering cut, but the drape at the v hung weird. Didn't wear.
The sweater was true to size and looked great. Unfortunately a little too warm. Cotton and wool. I ordered on a really cool day. Better for fall
It's ok. Warm enough for no jacket. Wouldn't purchase or rent again. Nothing over the top.
Baggy fit and didn't look as polished as I thought it would
This sweater is great on the curves.
Not too revealing with the deep v. Appropriate for work and works for day to night. Hides tummy which was a goal for me :)
Fit well. Roomy. Comfortable

links_reviews_title: Meh, looks better on the model.
links_reviews_text: Felt big with the shoulders laying awkwardly. Loved the pattern and the weight of the sweater though. Just didn't fit well on me.

I'm smaller on top than bottom and this was constricting on top in an uncomfortable way. Conversely the bottom was flowy and did no favors for my booty. This is one that was cuter on the hanger than on me.

Runs large though so should size down. It gapped on my body and should have hugged my upper torso better. Easy jumpsuit to go to the bathroom in which is always a plus. Can dress up or down. Recommend this one for sure!

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it
links_reviews_text: Love the fit. Hides my bootie and I don't need a bra with it! Love the thick material. I'm so happy I bought it!
This is such a lowkey, chic look for a workday (in a casual office, of course) or for the weekend. VERY fitted in the bust so perfect for girls with little boobies. :)

I really liked this jumper. It was easy to dress up and down. The bodice was snug and as others have said, going to the bathroom is an adventure. (Zip it up while it's at your waist and then pull it up to make it easier since the top is stretchy) But I really liked this one and would rent again.
Bit of a tighter bodice, nice fit
Sized down based on reviews and loved it! So comfy on a hot summer day in NYC. Top gives you some nice cleavage for those of us not well endowed.

links_reviews_title: I wore it twice in one week!
links_reviews_text: I love the tight fit around the bodice and loose fitting pants. Super cute for a casual date night or everyday wear. I paired it with heels for date night and sandles for our to lunch. I would rent again!
If you're busty this may be a little snug to get on. Wore this 3x - just a great, easy spring outfit.
Fit was TTS. Super comfy and great for everyday wear in Florida during the spring.
The material was very thick and unflattering, so I didn't end up wearing it.
the bottom of this jumpsuit was cute for everyday but I felt suffocated in the top - and I sized up!

I like how this fit which is great because with a pear shape I was a little doubtful. That said the material is too heavy if it is really hot outside. I was sweating most of the time. I thought maybe there was a better time of year to wear it but I am not sure when that would be because it's sleeveless...so it's a no for me on this outfit.
I am small but don't have much of a waist. This jumpsuit created the illusion of a nice waist for me.

The top is snug, but cute. I ironed the little peplum detail to keep it down. It was very difficult to zip by myself when I went to the bathroom. Super cute and fun to wear, but if you're not with a buddy, might be challenging.

links_reviews_title: very stiff fabric and short waist. Size didn't work for me
links_reviews_text: It looks so cute in the picture, but the waist hit me too high and I didn't wear. jean fabric is heavier than I expected too
The bottom ruffle on the waist was wrinkled so it pointed up - difficult to get it laying flat, but otherwise it was cute and super comfortable!
The jeans fabric is pretty thick but breathable. The ruffle around the waist wouldn't go down though. I didn't let this bother me.
Absolutely stunning jumpsuit- got so many compliments! Very slimming
Not a good fit on gals with a long torso
I thought this was so flattering and unique. Tight in the right way on top and flowy throughout the hips on down. I'll be renting this again!
#daytonight prefect spring jumper and so comfortable

Rented this for a baby shower I hosted. Absolutely loved it! Super comfy. It was a fresh take on 90s throwback trends. Pockets were huge which was great while I ran around doing hostess stuff. Felt pretty and young!

links_reviews_title: Change of pace for tropical vacay
links_reviews_text: Zipper was difficult to manage (not snug) but caught on fabric when sipping - made bathroom breaks a little challenging

links_reviews_title: Wore this everyday on vacation! Love it!
links_reviews_text: Stretchy on the top so fit is really nice!
I was really excited for this cute jumper, but unfortunately I was swimming in a size 4 so I couldn't wear it. I'm normally between a 2 and a 4. Will try the 2 for next time!

links_reviews_title: Made for a long torso and a tall body - not flattering for a petite.
links_reviews_text: The ruched top was way too long as were the straps. The bottom could have worked if I had a much longer torso or were 4-5 inches taller. Not a good outfit for someone 5'1". Cute and well made though.
This is the perfect work dress - I just couldn't get a good picture because of the color. Very flattering, professional, and comfortable. Runs small - I'm a 4 and the 6 was perfect.
One of my favorite rentals so far! A cute and classy dress that's perfect for work and can be worn out for happy hour too!
Tight around the bust. Material does not breathe. Although I live in a humid climate. Super cute and I did get many compliments.
For like a glove, maybe could have gone up a size but it still worked. Love the flowy sleeve and bottom. I'll definitely be resting this one again.
Tons of compliments, easy look.

links_reviews_title: So pretty! Wore to work, would rent again to go out!
links_reviews_text: Loved this. Such pretty detail, super flattering. Only downside was that I really needed to squish my chest down. I had major puckering in front with a regular bra at first.

links_reviews_title: Excellent work dress! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress and am seriously considering buying it. It's fun and flirty with the ruffled sleeves and ruffled bottom but still looks professional. I have wide shoulders I'm comparison to the size of my waist and the 8 is surprisingly not tight across the back. And I can cinch in the waist a bit with the tie to make it fit me perfectly. Super happy with this pick!!
I love this dress! Wore for a client meeting and felt very comfortable. I was worried the 2 wouldn't fit me due to reviews but it was perfect.
Super flattering and cute dress! Got so many compliments
Are usually wear a 12 in dresses & 10 in pants. I had to pin The breast area due to Showing my bra. You could not tell that it was pinned. I ordered a 14. I wear a 36 DD

links_reviews_title: Very easy to wear for all occasions.
links_reviews_text: This dress is very flattering to A-line figures. I ordered it a size large so it would be comfortable for travel and it was. I wore it for work, church and presentations and received many compliments.
Such a beautiful dress that hits your curves in all the right places. I am 5'7" and it hit me at the perfect length. Highly recommend!
Nice nursing friendly dress with beautiful flouncy flourishes. Hit me just above the knees. Glad I listened and sized up twice. The bust fit just right.
Fit perfectly and was incredibly comfortable. I wore this for an election night party.
Sized up based on other reviews, and the dress fit ok. A bit thin, but overall, it's an ok work dress.
I will start by saying that, due to being short-waisted, I had to size up AND wore spanx. However, it was worth it. It looked so polished and professional. I will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: The top and bottom sizing aren't quite coordinated
links_reviews_text: I WANTED to love this dress, but it's all just not quite right. Maybe best for the women with less up top. I had to pin it closed, and even then it felt like I had a gaping hole unless I stood up perfectly straight. The top felt one size smaller than the bottom. The skirt is a lovely, unique shape. Maybe size up one to ensure it fits best.
Love this dress! The material is really nice and the dress is super flattering.

links_reviews_title: Great quality, order up if you have boobs!
links_reviews_text: I'm usually between a 4 and 6... could not wear the 4 because it was pulling so much at the bust (I'm a 34D). Great quality but will order the 6 next time.
It fit everywhere but the bust. Just didn't work on my shape.
Comfortable fit, loved the movement at the bottom. The dress was feminine but color kept it from being too girly for work.
The fit was really flattering and worked well for my broad shoulders. It may run a little large since I usually wear the next size up but it seemed somewhere true to size.
This is probably the best dress I have ever rented. I got so many compliments. It was very flattering and easy to wear. I might not be able to let this one go.

This dress is beautiful for curvy girls, however it puckers at the bust. It's already slightly loose at the waist so I think a size up would just be too big all around. Not the best dress for women with a large chest (I'm a 36 DD)

I love this dress. Rented it for daytime event. It was very flattering with the tie waist. Not tight or too short, figure flattering for sure. Super comfortable and perfect for a cooler day and a conservative event. I would definitely wear it again.

I loved this dress, but for me it seemed to run about two sizes too small. If you have a larger chest, this may not be a good option. I'm a nursing mom so I thought the button down might be a good option, but it didn't work for me. Too bad because it's such a cute dress.
Wore with tights to work and got so many compliments! Great details to dress up a navy dress. A little short for work but with the tights was very appropriate.
So cute and fun, can wear either to work or out. Love this dress, I have rented multiple times!
The size 8 did not fit my 34DD chest, so I was not able to wear it. It might fit in the next size up, but I worry it wouldn't be flattering.
Been waiting to rent this for awhile. Very cute but it runs a little small
