Loved the dress but it was much too small through the chest. I sized up to 6...definitely needed an 8 in this one to look like it did on the model
Too small on the top and very short. Runs small

links_reviews_title: So cute! Buttons gap a bit
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments on this one. Buttons gapped a bit.
Looked fine, wore it to work one day and sent it back. Wouldn't have purchased it if in the store.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress!! Even the guys in my office noticed the details.
links_reviews_text: 5 stars from me!! I have a large chest so maybe size up if you are a C-D
I usually wear an 8 but I have a 38d bra size and this was way too small up top.
Cute but snug without any stretch. Too short to wear to the office.

links_reviews_title: Love love love the dress.... would buy if I could.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a Sunday luncheon for an organization. I received so many compliments. I'm so sorry that I failed to have picture taken of me in it. I wore the 8, which is my normal dress size. Perfect for a variety of events. The ruffles so dress it up.
Such a cute dress! Fit perfectly. Loved the waist belt
Tight in the arms and weird bust

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and casual, perfect for tropical vacation

links_reviews_text: Rented this dress to celebrate my birthday in Mexico. It was a perfect vacation dress! The color is beautiful and the length was perfect for me (maxi dresses are sometimes too long for me). Will be renting again this summer!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a casual night out
links_reviews_text: Sized down with my small chest and it fit perfect! Adjustable straps were helpful too. Great casual maxi dress with a little flair.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I almost bought it
links_reviews_text: It's a little itchy in the seam under the breast, otherwise, it's perfect.

Rented for a college game day dress. Loved the vibrant red and cute V cut. I felt it ran big if you aren't chesty. Is not a slimming dress, definitely more comfy and cool than slimming. I think it may look better if I size down next time. Plenty of room in the hips and booty.

Rented this for date night with my husband. This dress was so flattering! It also hid my growing baby bump. Love that this hit right st the ankle- it's the perfect length. S also appreciated the adjustable straps. Will rent again!
Perfect for the daytime ! Very light weight and airy. Fits perfectly/ true to size

I rented this for a week at Va Beach and didn't want to send it back. It's so comfortable and beautifully made. It ran a little big so I wore a light cotton bralette under it. If it's available I'll probably rerent it this summer.
This color is so vibrant! The dress is comfortable and sexy. Perfect for a summer day!
Cute comfortable dress - wore it multiple times! Color is vibrant and got a ton of compliments
Great color. Fit well but there is no stretch in the fabric so size up if between sizes. Adjustable steps were great. Could dress down with flip flops or up with heels.
Runs a little big and I rented an xs. Got a lot of compliments and it was super great quality and cute!

links_reviews_title: I love this dress! Perfect for Sunday brunch.
links_reviews_text: Perfect for us small chested girls. It is a little revealing but does have adjustable straps so that's a plus. Would recommend going down a size. I'm a size 10 regular and 5'6 and felt like it swallowed me.
Can be dressed up or down and also great for maternity dress
Fit great. perfect day dress.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Perfect for my vacation
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my vacation to Cuba, and I received so many compliments on it! I love that it isn't as long--I'm 5'6 and was able to wear it around town without getting the bottom dirty. I would advise against sizing down because there is a tight cinch along the top ruffle which can make it a little difficult to get on.
Perfect summer party dress! Great fabric and color.

links_reviews_title: Cute for post partum, but not super great for nursing
links_reviews_text: Hides your lumps-- pretty cute, but pretty exposing if you're going to nurse in public

links_reviews_title: I was complimented SO much on this piece, and it was beautiful!
links_reviews_text: Nothing LOVED.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress. Great color. Lots of complements.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size and looks very much like it does on the model.
Color is very vibrant and the ruffles make it summery. The overall structure of the dress can make it look a little bit maternity like- not very flattering. I enjoyed wearing it on my vacation
I wore this several times. Great coverage. I was able to wear no bra with it. I received a lot of compliments as well.
Something about this dress was not flattering on me, I can't pinpoint exactly what it was. wanted to like it but oh well
A RTR favorite. The color of this dress was bold and perfect. It was super flattering and comfortable too.
This dress is comfortable and cute! You can dress it up or dress it down! Great fit and a perfect choice for a summertime party.
SO comfy and can be dressed up or down. One of my favorite rentals!!

links_reviews_title: Pretty, but hard to wear a bra with
links_reviews_text: Everything about this dress is great except that its not really made for those of us with a large bust. There is no real way to wear a bra with the keyhole cutout in the back. And from the side, it tented out a little too much for my liking due to my bust. Other than this, the color is beautiful, fabric feels luxurious and the ruffle details make this dress special.
This dress was so fun for MDW. It hit me right above ankle and was very flattering.

I wore this for a fun Mexican birthday dinner. I loved that you can tighten the straps if you have a short torso like I do. It fit more like a full maxi since I'm only 5'3, but I liked the way it looked. It was a comfortable, flattering dress with fun tie and ruffle details. I enjoyed wearing it!
I enjoyed wearing these to work. Heels are a must to keep from looking frumpy. I sized down from 2 to 0 based on reviews
Awesome fit from hips down. Awkward waist. Very high waisted. Not particularly flattering.

These were nice work slacks. Extremely high waisted. I never wear a 4 in pants and these fit just like a 6 in most other brands, so size down. For having SUCH a high waist, they were comfortable.l, and I liked the camel color. I am 5'5 and the 4 hit me at a perfectly cropped length
Very very comfortable, would rent again for sure. The color is great, material on the thinner side so not too hot or itchy.

links_reviews_title: So comfy, warm and lightweight but so large?!
links_reviews_text: These pants are so comfortable, soft, lightweight and warm... however, they run really large. I definitely had a fake figure while wearing them and on someone that is 5'4" these will go all the way down to your feet. The hips, waist and thighs are pretty wide, very loose.

links_reviews_title: Trendy and comfy pants for work
links_reviews_text: These pants were cute and insanely comfy (very soft!). Can be dressed up or down. Based on reviews, I sized down.

links_reviews_title: You'll feel like a boss in these pants. Great for work and everyday.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size.

links_reviews_title: Warm & nicely tailored but runs large
links_reviews_text: Love the colour and the tailoring. The wool material also keeps me warm in colder weather. Does run large. Fits a bit loose at waist hips & legs. Fixable with a belt. But will definitely size down next time I rent.

Great loose fit. Felt so chic and professional. Like them so much I'll probably buy them!! Look awesome with heels or pointy flats. Run large - I'm usually 4 in pants and the 2 fit loosely on me. ADORE
Love these pants. They are warm and super cute. I usually wear a size 6 but saw some notes that they run large so I went a size down and got a 4, I may even try a 2 next time.
I wear a lot of rag and bone and usually know my size so I'm surprised a size 8 didn't fit. Still super comfortable and warm but would try a size smaller

Rag & Bone was made for taller bodies. I was surprised that the waist fit true to size, but these pants do not look good when you sit down (they paunch out at the zipper - too much fabric), and the length is all wrong unless you are tall. They are cut to be more of a kick crop. When I folded the leg, they looked great! But otherwise, way too long. Overall, a rental failure.
These were great pants for work. Perfect with a black sweater and leopard flats! Will definitely rent again!
I am typically a 4 or 6 in dresses/pants. If in between sizes, I suggest you size down. I have a "pear" shape and am bottom heavy, but the 4 fit like a dream!

links_reviews_title: These pants are just fine. I wanted more from R&B.
links_reviews_text: Was hoping these would be a modern Greta Garbo look, but unfortunately they were just ok. Fabric is nice, but it wrinkles. I am short, so these were full length on me. My daughter thought they were a bit "mumsy" and I agree.
I liked these pants I just picked the wrong size. Will go with an 8 next time as the legs are very wide.
Ran large, too big to wear.

links_reviews_title: I adore these pants!! So flattering.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 2 and the 0 was perfect. Love the fit, relaxed and warm. Perfect for fall season at work.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering! I wore multiple times and was sad to send them back.
links_reviews_text: I wore with black shirt and blazer, great professional look. A little short, but they worked.
I'm normally an 8 and the 6 worked, but just seemed too big in hips area. Seems like they are meant for someone with small waist and big hips. Also, they looked very WORN OUT. Did not look expensive.

I ordered a size down because all the reviews said they run large. That was a mistake as the pants run true to size. They were very comfortable and felt more like sweat pants than dress pants, I just wished I had ordered my normal size.
nice material, does not wrinkle easy

links_reviews_title: Itchy, unlined wool pants and a smaller waist
links_reviews_text: Ugh. Did not like these at all. No stretch, didn't realize they were wool, totally unlined, and the waist seemed just a bit too snug. :(
Photo shown is a crop, but these were full length pants (I'm 5'3"). Fit runs big.

I rented these for a business trip to have a business casual option that would be warm and versatile. I never wore the pants as the fit was overwhelming on my frame. I own and wear rag and bone and rented my usual size, but these pants seemed 1-1.5 sizes larger and lacked polish. Maybe a lining underneath would have provided more structure and tailored the fit more? Not recommended for petites with a straight body based on my experience. Size down if you have the option.
Fits large. Not super flattering.

links_reviews_title: Great relaxed fit, right length for me
links_reviews_text: Loose fit but flattering Right length A bit thick for true spring but good for fall through early spring
They were not flattering on my pear shape. Didn't wear.
I was swimming in these in a size 2, my normal pant size. I returned without wearing.
Rented a tie front light brown pant for a work event in Orlando. Last minute was offered these as a sub. Heavy material not conducive to spring in Florida, didn't wear these.

links_reviews_title: Outdated style, thick fabric, seemed worn
links_reviews_text: Too big, didn't like thick wool fabric, style seemed outdated, not as cute as photo

These are quality wool pants in a flattering cut. As other people note, these run large. I usually wear a 6. I would rent these again in a 4 so they sit higher on my hips and the crop hits the ankle higher. The leg portion is not lined, and so the wool can be a bit itchy. Overall, these are stylish and cozy.

links_reviews_title: A little itchy, but cute and wrinkle resistant.
links_reviews_text: Great basic work pants. Found it ran large and stretched throughout the day. No lining in the legs so it would be itchy if you're sensitive to that kind of thing.

These pants are so chic, and also quite comfortable and warm for winter. I was skeptical of wearing cropped pants in the winter at work, but I was usually comfortable. These do run about a size or two large; I typically wear a size 6 in pants, and ordered a 4. They fit well in the waist, but the legs/hip/butt area were still pretty roomy.

Other reviews say these run large and it's true. I rented a 0 and am usually a 2 or 4. I initially thought I would have been better off with the 2 b/c the waist was a little tight on me but the pants stretched out overall, so I am glad I went with the zero. The inseam also seems to be fairly long so I would keep that in mind--they hit me right above the ankles. Warm and versatile for winter.
The fit wasn't great--it was large for a 4 and didn't do anything for me.

Unlined wool pants usually make me itch, but not these. High quality wool, with some give, made for a comfortable fit. Runs large as I usually wear size 6 pants. Only con would be the pockets, which are practical but do not always lie flat, making your hips look bigger.

I really love these pants! They definitely run big, I'm a solid 10 and even the 8 is a little big, I might be able to get away with a 6. They're a great length, they look good with booties or flats and are keeping me warm in a very cold Chicago winter! I'm keeping them longer than I usually do so that definitely says something!

links_reviews_title: comfortable, warm, wears well all day
links_reviews_text: Comfortable but classic. I wish the color worked for me.

links_reviews_title: got tired of it pretty quickly
links_reviews_text: Warm and can go casual with jean jacket or dressed up with boots and leather. Does not pack well - wrinkles easily
Loved the color and the sleeves. Great for work or everyday. Soft and not at all scratchy!

links_reviews_title: SO cute, loved everything about it
links_reviews_text: flattering shape and colors, really comfy!!
Super soft and comfortable, loved the subtle shoulder puff too!
I adore this top and wish I kept it and purchased it. The sleeves make it fun and the colors are gorgeous. I definitely recommend this!

links_reviews_title: Just what I needed for a pop of color!
links_reviews_text: This is a fitted sweater, would size up if you are looking for a relaxed fit. Wore this with jeans one day and then ankle pants and heels another day. Very now and adorable.
Soo cute, and really warm actually! It feels woolly but not itchy or uncomfortable. Super cozy... will probably buy 😍
Lightweight, comfortable material, fits well. Has some interested elements that make it a fun rental.
Very cute. Fits true to size. Colors are vibrant in person. Fun rental due to the sleeves.

links_reviews_title: Great sweater! Super stretchy and comfortable. Second time renting.
links_reviews_text: Fits super sleek

links_reviews_title: I loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly just above the hip bone. Not too short. Colors coordinate with so many things can dress it up for wear casually with blue jeans. Love Love Love it!
I love this sweater and am thinks about buying it. The quality is great, the colors are perfect, and it fits like a dream. I felt amazing wearing it.
I love this sweater. It feels soft against the skin and warm! perfect for cold weather. I also like the neutral colors. It looks great with jeans!
bodice was very fitted.
The only reason I didn't fall madly in love was because the shoulders fit a little funny.

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater, not really my style
links_reviews_text: I thought this ran a bit small. The colors are nice and it's fairly flattering, just not particularly my style.
This sweater was quite fitted and comfortable. It's a bit refined and could go from office to drinks.
Tru to size. Great for fall days.

links_reviews_title: Brings out the pooch if you have one
links_reviews_text: Unless your stomach is perfectly flat, this will Not compliment a full stomach after a big dinner. Cute neckline and arms though!
Loved this sweater. Wore several times. Note color on stripes is navy, not black. Very cozy and not itchy. Highly recommend!
Lovely soft sweater, fits slim.
Perfect fit. Love this!
Super comfy and warm. Good for day and night. Perfect for a day of sightseeing.

links_reviews_title: Runs small. Size up! Great sweater!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size small, but for this sweater a large fit me perfectly. It was super comfy and brand new when I got it!

links_reviews_title: Felt truly beautiful - and comfortable - wearing this dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved this vibrant purple dress! Wore a scarf to add some flare, and tights with high black boots. I received many compliments. I probably could have worn a size 6 because it was a little loose in the waist, but the 8 felt perfect for work.
This dress is a bright purple. Loved the color! I would have been more comfortable if I sized up. It was a bit tight on my arms.
This RL dress is way too big! Would've been able to wear 2 sizes smaller.

links_reviews_title: Great color and fit! Fit like a glove and was true to size. Felt great in it!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove! Beautiful color and great material!

links_reviews_title: I visited the church my boyfriend has attended for more than 20 years. It was my first visit.
links_reviews_text: The dress has a beautiful sheen to it, and the purple color is so vibrant. I love a-line dresses because the accentuate my waist. This dress hugged me in the right places and hung well in the back. I have a larger behind that sits up pretty high, so the great fit in the back was a great bonus!

links_reviews_title: Great fit, comfortable, really nice color!

links_reviews_text: You can't necessarily tell from the website, but the color is so vibrant and wonderful. It's definitely purple and looked great in. I got a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for hostess or charity event.
links_reviews_text: Dress fits nicely. I wore size smaller than I normally would. Wasnt too tight anywhere. Its comfy and easy to move in. I wore it woo a charity event that I organized. I felt it was appropriate. Not overly flashy (but I did wear it with some fun blingy jewlery!) This dress would be perfect for a work affair.
I didn't end up wearing this because it was too big. Material is thick, feels high-quality and it's a pretty color, though.
Love the fun color. Love the feel -- silky yet with structure. Very comfortable. Looks as good at the end of the day as at the beginning.
I think this is the perfect fit and flare dress with vibrant color. So many people commented on the color. I generally wear a 4 and I would almost say its close to running big.

links_reviews_title: The event was cancelled so I used the dress for a night out with friends
links_reviews_text: The dress fit nicely, had a nice swish and was flattering. Color was bright but not garish. Good for the work evening. It looked good with heels and low boots.
Plain typical cut, no frills, long sleeves, beautiful color, super comfortable! Ready to wear regularly as a wardrobe staple!
This classic work dress fits true to size and is very comfortable. Can be for almost every season.
The simplistic charm lended well to a day in the office. Dressing it up with a statement necklace will make it happy hour ready

links_reviews_title: Loved this - really comfortable. Perfect for a casual party and work.
links_reviews_text: Great fit overall. Material doesn't crease. I ordered a size larger to make sure the arms were comfortable and not that snug. Perfect. Would order again.
i really thought about buying this dress. it was perfect for work. fitted but not tight and appropriate length for the office.
This fit well; its a vibrant purple - I was inspired by the Duchess of Sussex purple dress and this was a nice alternative.

links_reviews_title: Rich color for the cold season!
links_reviews_text: I'm between sizes sometimes so I take what's available. I got this in a 4 and really wish I had the size 2. It was looser from the rib cage down than I would have liked (not that I want things skin tight but I like a fitted, professional look). Either way, I got lots of compliments and it was a nice, heavier material. I paired it with black tights and leather booties, along with a double string pearl necklace for fun (although I was aiming for chunky and gold).
Fit great, was comfortable, and was beautiful color.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color but otherwise pretty standard
links_reviews_text: Cut was flattering, but nothing groundbreaking. The color is pretty unique--a deep but bright purple. Fit is very TTS.
Cute bag but too small for everyday.

links_reviews_title: Easy shirt to throw on for work
links_reviews_text: Nice easy and comfy option for work!

Had to be interviewed for a commercial and needed something with clean lines, clear color, and work ready fit. It ran a tad small and I should have gotten the large for perfect comfort. Lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Better than a basic T-neck sweater
links_reviews_text: Bad color for me, with olive tone skin, but a very good color, shape and style. Material is soft and comfortable. Drapes nicely.

links_reviews_title: Vibrant color for an everyday turtle
links_reviews_text: Soft and comfy everyday sweater. Nice medium weight under blazers and coats.
I liked this sweater but it was a little too snug for my liking.. It is lightweight and I loved the color and weight of it.
Warm textile while not being bulky. Nothing exceptional but bright pop of color.

Beautiful color and material, very soft. Only thing is it does stretch out. I wore this a few times and the picture shows after a wear or two. On the first wear it was a bit more form fitting (though not super tight). Sleeves long on me but would likely be fine on most and easy enough to bunch so didn't bother me. Really enjoyed this top.

Nothing crazy special about this but it's a pretty color and true to size. Would be a good layering piece. For more reviews head to my RTR highlight on Instagram and feel free to DM me any questions @leahgay
Color pops and good daily wear for work
Fit well, loved the color.
I loved the color, fit and feel of this one. Would definitely rent again.
Basic turtleneck to wear under a blazer or alone. It was fine but nothing special. The neck was a little stretched out.
Warm but high-quality, thin and soft fabric. Ribbing gives it style and the turtleneck is soft. I wore it with jeans as well as for work.
High quality sweater, runs a little small (i would normally opt for a small, but went medium). The medium was a nice casual slightly loose fit, small would've been quite fitted

links_reviews_title: Very soft, very comfortable, very pretty color
links_reviews_text: This is long enough to not ride up in the back when I sit, even on my long torso. The color is great. I wore it all day without even an itch or irritation from this sweater. A lot of positive comments from people on the color, it's great!
Fits true to size, skims the body. The color is gorgeous. Great for everyday wear with jeans, etc.
Ordered an XS and it fit as an S. Pleasant color. Wore it with black jeans to work.
Nice soft fabric. I love the way it fits. Very flattering without being too tight.

Yes this is a basic but the color is beautiful and it fits well. Worn to lunch on a weekend get away in a very cold climate. Got compliments on the color and really liked wearing it. Would rent again.
Great, vibrant color. Wore to work and for casual events multiple times. The collar stretched a bit, but not really noticeable.

I can't add much to what's been written. The color is beautiful, and you can easily dress up or down, depending on what you pair with it. The sweater runs true to size and isn't scratchy or everyday heavy. Not a showstopper, just a very nice sweater.
If you need a turtleneck in this color this is a good item. It is not thin. Very dark color.
Not very stretchy fabric. But it's thick and kept me warmer than I was expecting!

links_reviews_title: I loved this sweater so much that I had to return it so that I didn’t keep it forever. Gorgeous.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous color. The size and style of the ribbing are very flattering. It’s perfect in all ways
Just an ok top.
Great sweater, comfortable, good fit.

links_reviews_title: I love this pop of color!
links_reviews_text: Slightly snug around chest... might want to size up if you have a generous chest. Beautiful color!
Nice color but tight and the ribbing unflattering on my large chest.
Great material- not see through at all. Alittle short on the torso and small sleeves (but I'm also 6'0.)
Shirt is nothing exciting! It is a boxy fit, so makes you look a bit wider than you are. But overall good stripes shirt.

links_reviews_title: The medium ran large for me. Usually wear a medium to large but I would need a small in this top.
Great top- easy breezy cute stripes!
links_reviews_text: Loved it and wore it a ton on my trip to San Diego- super easy to throw on with jeans and look cute!

links_reviews_title: Great casual top - comfortable and stylish
links_reviews_text: Loved the style!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and easy to throw on.
links_reviews_text: I loved this top. I wore it a few times a week when I had it. I was able to wear with a blazer for work and also just out and about with jeans on the weekend. Very pretty purple color.
Great casual top for work or play! Stripes more purple than they appear in these photos though.
Too short in the front
Love this top and everything from Madewell! Fits TTS
The fit is perfect and looks like the photo

links_reviews_title: Light weight and comfortable for travel!
links_reviews_text: The top is somewhat sheer and very wide. RTR recommended I try a medium when I'm generally a small, so I'd say get your regular size. It was a great top is hotter temps to throw on with jeans!

This was my first time ever wearing a jumpsuit and I loved it! I sized up as I'm a pear shape and the fit was good in the legs and thighs. The top was a little loose as a result but not noticeable or uncomfortable. I would rent this again for an event. I think it would even look great with a button-down underneath or sweater for work.
I wore this a couple of ways. Open for a photo shoot with a push up bra and with a black long sleeve top under for a family dinner. Comfortable. I'm in between an 8 and 10 and went with the 10
Beautifully made, has pockets, can be dressed up or down. Meant to wear with heels- the leg is wide and straight.

Cute front with the buttons. It's winter, so I paired it with a couple different tight t-shirts underneath. Hemmed so it just about hits the floor when you're not in heels (I'm 5'9" so it was a little short)

This jumpsuit was perfect for a work dinner with a long sleeve top underneath. I can see myself wearing it for an interview or some other more professional affair with a fun collared shirt underneath. I will be renting this again

links_reviews_title: Get a fun belt for this one!
links_reviews_text: This fits true to size. I'm 5'5" and had to wear a bigger heal than I typically wear due to length.

I originally rented a 2R but it was way too tight around the bust. If fit everywhere else perfectly, so I sized up one size. Still was a little tight around the bust, and I usually don't wear things that low cut to work, but I threw a RTR blazer over it and I looked classy and chic for both work and a networking/holiday party that followed immediately after work. I recommend pairing this with the Rachel Zoe blazer (light pink in color). Wear heels, the pants run long in all sizes!

links_reviews_title: Nothing to write home about but looked and fit as expected
links_reviews_text: I rented this for work/weekend/everyday and it was fine. The jumpsuit isn't fitted so if you're going for that kind of look. I paired it with a slouchy sweater and pointed toe flats. I wore with a belt to try to add some waist definition although the belt didn't look great with it due to the buttons/bodice shape.

links_reviews_title: Need high heels and fashion tape
links_reviews_text: This outfit length is 5-inches past the floor (likely for custom alterations to fit, if you actually own it). I had to fashion tape up the bottoms. I also wore a turtleneck underneath to keep from being chest revealing at work. One of the buttons came off, so I had to sew it back on. Got a compliment from every woman at the conference I attended.

Rented for a work meeting. I work in a very conservative industry and this was perfect. Weather was cold so I put a black turtleneck underneath. This is such a great piece- the fabric is very nice, the fit is very flattering. It lays very nicely. Also a great day to night piece. Love this so much I might buy. I wore my usual size 0. I'm 5 ft 2 in so it is pretty long, but my 5 in heels made it not drag on the ground. Would recommend for work or social event.
LOVE this jumpsuit. Although I had to iron the pant legs this jumpsuit is perfect. It fits like a glove and had just the right about of cleavage. I want to keep this one!

I liked this. I wore it to work, with and without a jacket. A bit low cut, so I wore a black camisole underneath and that worked out fine. A bit short in the stride. A bit tight across the chest. Not my favorite but still nice, worth a try.
A jumpsuit that functions as a power suit / dress. So flattering. Versatile, can be styled in many ways. Fairly easy to use restroom. So many compliments. I had to keep it!
Wore this by itself and also with a turtleneck underneath, got many compliments! Fit was great, will drag a bit if you don't wear heels.

links_reviews_title: Fit like it was made for me!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this jumpsuit - it fit like it was made for my body. My normal sizing is a 6-8 and the 8R fit beautifully. Paired it with a tailored blazer for work and it was a dream. Casual enough for day, but a smart pair of earrings, good heels and a killer bag would make this ready for after-hour cocktails. Will definitely rent again if not buy!

I was one cookie away from not fitting in this jumper, so I didn't wear it because I wanted to be comfortable. I'm normally a 2, but would size up to a 4. Otherwise, it was super cute and sexy in an understated way... I may rent the bigger size for another occasion!

links_reviews_title: Great comfortable jumpsuit for work and fun!
links_reviews_text: Since all the buttons and zippers are in the front, it's fairly easy to get in and out of (by jumpsuit standards). Wore it with a white button up and heels for work and then dressed it more casually for a play. I'm 5'6" and it needed about 2" heels to keep it from dragging on the ground.

Super cute jumpsuit. It fit pretty perfectly in the morning and I loved the proportions. After a whole day at the office it did start to feel restrictive. It was hard to use the bathroom, but you know what you are signing up for when wearing a jumpsuit. Overall, I loved the look!

This was my first time trying out RTR Unlimited & let's just say I should have read the user reviews a little more closely -- lesson learned! This jacket runs about 2 sizes too big. I normally wear an XS/S and got a S. It fits more like a large. The sleeves are way too long and the fit is very long and boxy. The jacket is super soft & comfy, so I wish I had gotten a different size. I got this thinking it could be an early spring coat in the Northeast; this coat is not warm enough to wear in the high 40's, low 50's.
Love this coat
I love this jacket. I'm usually a true medium and the small fits perfectly.
Really cute jacket for everyday, fashionable and warm. Loved it!

I was looking forward to this because I thought it would be super warm and comfy with the lining, but it was a huge disappointment. While the torso has nice cozy lining, the sleeves only have a thin satin black lining. It looks okay on, but my torso will be nice and toasty while my arms freeze off. Why did they design it this way? I'm returning it immediately.
Size down!!! This coat is so warm -- but too large!

links_reviews_title: I used this jacket for everyday wear and it was great for work and dinners out with friends.
links_reviews_text: I loved this jacket. It was an incredibly soft and perfectly light for fall to cold weather.

links_reviews_title: I'm in love with this jacket
links_reviews_text: It runs a little big! But it's so stylish and soft. I am absolutely in love with this coat and get so many compliments
This would have been cute but it looked worn. The shearling wasn't white anymore. It looked older than things in my closet! Would be embarrassed to wear out.

I usually wear a small on top but I read the other reviews and went with an XS. It fits great. The jacket is warm for more mild winter/late fall weather (50s and 60s) and I've gotten a ton of compliments.
Nice coat and was quite warm for those chilly early spring days. Worked well dressed down or up. I wore it for both.
This coat is super cozy. It's a cute, casual style great for everyday. It's a baggy, but in a comfy way, and the collar gives a nice contrast.
I normally wear a M coat and this definitely ran very large. But otherwise, cozy, chic and comfortable! The black corduroy is super fun.

links_reviews_title: I really liked this coat although I should have rented the medium.
links_reviews_text: Attractive and warm although heavy. My husband wanted me to keep it but it was too big.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, but listen to the reviews!
links_reviews_text: Loved this jacket, but my arms were definitely cold because only the vest was lined. And it was really big on. Aside from that it was great! I'd order again when it's a little warmer out and go down a size
The jacket is super cute and warm but is definitely oversized!

Trust the reviews! I read that it ran large, but wanted it to be a pinch oversized, so still ordered a medium (which is my normal coat size). It was down to my knees and the sleeves were at least 5 inches past my fingers. The material also felt kind of cheap and the gold zippers were kind of tacky. Returned without wearing.

Ordered this jacket for a weekend trip. I wanted something that would be good for fall/spring like weather. I was surprised when the jacket arrived, the overall feel of the jacket was more like a chunky sweater. I think it's because the sleeves are very thin and do not have the sherpa lining, it lacked structure. The body of the jacket does have the sherpa lining so it would likely be warm. As other reviewers mentioned the jacket does run very large. I ordered a small for my 4/6 size and it was still a little big. Depending on you style it, it may work. I never wore the jacket because it was not what I was looking for.

links_reviews_title: It's completely shearling on the inside- so warm!
links_reviews_text: It rubs large, it's also very long, didn't realize it was corduroy but it's completely lined - so comfy!
Not my style. Very big. Felt like a large man's jacket and not in a chic way

I honestly loved wearing this coat. It's warm and cozy (although the sleeves are unlined). But like previous reviewers have mentioned it runs massive. I felt kind of dwarfed by the small - but that didn't stop me wearing it out 3 times over the weekend. Would definitely rent again in the XS.

I read from other reviews that this coat runs large, so I ordered a Small and it fits perfectly! I love everything about this coat. It is soft and warm, and long enough that it covers my butt which helps with warmth on windy days. It looks chic zipped up as well as unzipped. Thinking about purchasing!
Fell in love with this coat, super cozy and warm . Big enough to layer a sweater underneath and not feel super bulky
Need to size down by at least 2 sizes.
I honestly considered buying this coat. My friends loved it, it's warm, and looks amazing

links_reviews_title: Love the style of the coat! Very cute and cozy.
links_reviews_text: Fits SUPER big! Wish I had gotten an XS, Normally wear a small or medium in coats but this was almost knee-length and super boxy in a S.
runs a little big but I like the oversized feeling. Very comfortable

links_reviews_title: Warm, cozy, easy to style - expect lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Listen to the reviews - size down. I'm usually a small/medium up top, and I went with the small. I easily could have used the XS. Regardless, it was perfect for a week of mild winter weather (50 degrees). Dressed it down with a concert tee and jeans, dressed it up with a turtleneck and high heel boots and flares. Four stars - because I wish the sherpa lining went through the sleeves.
Got so many compliments on this the first time I wore it out. So warm but runs big could have definitely gone down a size. However it did still look cool with the size it was.

Really wanted to like this. The part lined with the white fuzzy material was great, but the arms weren't lined so they were extremely baggy. It looks super strange. The small was enormous and longer than I was expecting.
This jacket fit wonderfully!! A little oversized but so cozy.
Cozy Coat but with all Show Me your Mumu clothes runs very big.

links_reviews_title: I really liked how warm this coat was and stylish but cozy!
links_reviews_text: The fit is definitely oversized. I would say size down. I loved how soft it was with the faux sherpa inside and the black corduroy outside. It was perfect for my trip to Nashville when was 30s and snowing/raining. It is also longer than on the model. The only negative is that the zippers are rough so my hands were scraped up a little when I put them into my pockets. The item I received was brand new with the tags still on it. If I lived in a colder climate I would probably buy this!

links_reviews_title: So comfortable. Great every day jacket and so warm. Easy to dress up or dress down.
links_reviews_text: A nice oversized fit

This coat was everything I could hope for! I recently had my bachelorette party in NYC and wanted to rent a coat that not only could keep me warm in the city but that would also look cute in all the pictures I knew we'd be taking in Rockefeller Center. This coat did both those things effortlessly. Love this coat and love this brand!
Sleeves run long and body large. Size down.
I typically wear a medium in everything, but this size was swimming on me. So much so that I couldn't wear it outside. Go a size below normal on this one.

I rented this to take on a trip to DC because I thought it would be warmer than my own coat. It is warm but it was just a little too big and boxy for my taste. I could see it being cute on someone taller. I just felt like it overwhelmed a petite frame and I'd be better off with a belted style or something with more waist shaping.

This jacket is beautiful and soft, I really wanted it to work but it was just way too big. It's definitely meant to be oversized but it was very unflattering and made me look larger than I actually am.

I rented the Small (my usual size) and it was absolutely HUGE!! The sleeves were way past my hands and when i zipped it up it was very wide and long (and NOT in a cute way!). It fit to me more like a large than a small. SIZE DOWN! Also its hard to tell from the picture but the material is more like a corduroy velvet type thing? It was really strange.
This coat is the perfect blush moment to brighten your winter outfits. It is oversized, comfortable and chic. Love the detail on the sleeves.

I wore this to work events and to a weekend trip to NYC. I stood out, mind you, but loved the soft sleeves and pink color. The coat was a bit worn, and I definitely wouldn't feel comfortable wearing it to most places, but felt glamorous for a few days in it.

This coat is great for winter. The soft pink is perfect. The "fur" on the sleeves is so soft! I rented a size larger and it was bigger than I would have liked (even for the baggy style), but I still received so many complements!
The best shade of pink! This jacket was a big hit and is pretty warm. It's great for layering underneath for added warmth. I love the length (I'm 5'8") and love how it brightens up an outfit
I should've sized down to a medium.

links_reviews_title: Didnt get too wear too large

links_reviews_text: I loved the color online, but in person the faux shearling collar and faux fur cuffs look really cheap. Sent it back. The L fit me well with room for a sweater underneath.
the coat is beautiful. However, being 5/2 it was overwhelmingly big.
loved this coat, would buy if I could. Very nice, a little large for me

links_reviews_title: Surprisingly warm, cozy, and super soft
links_reviews_text: I loved this coat so much!! The color is a beautiful soft pink and the fur sleeves are soft and amazing. I would have kept it longer but the weather changed and it got too warm and I had to send it back. It's best for high 20s/low 30s. The pockets were generously sized and it's a great trench length. Fit is TTS (I wore a M and it fit well over sweaters). It did need a scarf because the collar is low and open.

links_reviews_title: If you're in the mood for a pink coat then yes
links_reviews_text: Warm enough for 35 degree weather
Runs large. Didn't wear. Nice quality. Would be warm. Loved the sleeves.

links_reviews_title: This was my back up but loved the fit and comfort!
links_reviews_text: Wore to a charity gala. Flattering but the fabric is lighter than I thought so it's not as forgiving as some but still complemented my curves. Great choice!

I unfortunately do not have a photo of this on, but it was the absolute perfect dress. Perfect fit, perfect style. It was SO comfortable to wear all evening and being 5'5" it was the perfect length with or without heels. I would love to own this dress.
This dress shows every little bump. The fabric is not thick. The slit in the front come inappropriately high too. Worse dress I've tried in a while.

links_reviews_title: Nice lines but slightly too tight in bust and hips for 32-24-35.
links_reviews_text: The address has sophisticated lines and look. To address tightness, might recommend a small rather than xsm, but this is a theoretical rec b/c length and proportions might then be off...

This jacket is super warm and absolutely adorable! I wore it to go out with some girlfriends for wine tasting and was concerned that maybe it was too young or too short waisted. It is short waisted, but it's still cute and works, even for an hour glass.
I wore this to an outside oyster roast. People wanted to buy the jacket off of me. I kind a wish I would've purchased it. Really wish I had it this weekend to wear.
This jacket is super cozy and cute. Print is awesome, but it is somewhat unflattering when zipped up.
Cute casual warm coat for my honeymoon to Montana.

links_reviews_title: This was AMAZING. I didn't think I would like it as much as I did. Wore it nearly every day I had it
links_reviews_text: It's warm, it's comfortable, and it's chic. I almost bought it!

links_reviews_title: Super comfy and kept me warm!!
Super cute jacket and very on-trend!
links_reviews_text: I thought I would get more wear than I did, but it's adorable. I do wish it was more cropped and a little less boxy, which is why I gave it four stars.

links_reviews_title: The coat fits perfectly and is so super warm.
links_reviews_text: This is an amazing super cute coat that is perfect for the winter.
Fit great and kept me warm on a night out with my girlfriends. Jacket does have pockets that have a close with a single-snap (no zipper).
I was so tempted to buy this top, and I may rent it again and do just that. It is ADORABLE.

links_reviews_title: Loved this top but too thick for summer
links_reviews_text: This is a great top. So much detail and really fun sleeve. I rented in a 12 based on other reviews (normally a 10), and 12 was definitely the right size. I love the cut and it can be worn with or without a bra due to multiple layers of fabric, but every time I put it on I couldn't imagine going out in the 80 degree heat/80 percent humidity with its thickness and long-sleeves. I will try this style again in the fall/winter.
This top was slightly long. I generally like longer tops tucked slightly in the front. BUT this top was amazing tucked into some more casual linen pants. Got so many compliments on this outfit!

This looks so cute on the hanger and then I put it on and it made me look huge. Huge shoulders, big chest, it's puffs out in the worst places and make you look puffy . My husband saw it on me and said " OMG, where did you get the puffy Seinfeld pirate shirt?" So yeah, this wasn't going to work. Might look cute and boho on someone tall and slim but it just looked weird on my athletic frame.
I got so many compliments on this shirt!!! I never wanted to return it! It goes with everything and can be dressy or worn for work. Super comfy too!

links_reviews_title: Super feminine and flattering top - low cut so a pin may be necessary
links_reviews_text: I adore this top...the pleats and ruffles are so feminine. It feels a little renaissance or romantic, but not so much that you can't wear it to a causal workplace, which I did. I did pin the front as the neckline reveals a bit too much, but I'll unpin it for a date ;)

This top was perfect for a night out with the girls. I paired it with jeans and boots but it could definitely be dressed up more as well. I wore a size 0 and it fit true to size, but if you are between sizes or have a larger chest I would size up. Very comfortable and I would recommend!
The top fit and was really cute, but just wasn't built for a large chest. The seem was straight across the middle of my bust and it created a double bubble.
Love it! So feminine. I’d purchase from RtR, but it’s on sale at Saks for a better price. (109 lbs in this photo.)

I liked this top, despite the "puffy pirate shirt" quotes that it elicited from my husband. It's definitely a lot of fabric, but it's well-tailored and I thought it was flattering. It was pretty loose in most places but weirdly tight across my back and biceps, so I'm glad I sized up. I did need to wear a cami to work because cleavage, but that wasn't necessarily a bad thing.

I wore this to my daughters school performance and then dinner with my husband. I really liked it, very comfortable, true to size, easy to wear, could dress up or dress down and got a few compliments! I will probably end up purchasing this too and if not will rent again! I'm 5'7 150p and wore a 6.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful blouse for gender reveal party
links_reviews_text: I wore this top to our gender reveal party and wore it again to a charity event and received endless compliments. The cut of this blouse is so so beautiful, if I were not pregnant I would have bought and kept this blouse. I have small shoulders and am starting to show a bump slightly and the 4 fit perfect, but a 6 would have definitely been a little more roomy. Can not wait to rent this blouse again!

This top is so pretty and girly! I would say that it runs a little small, definitely size up if you have a full bust. I'm typically a size 8 and I could barely squeeze the ladies in to this! It fit really well everywhere else, but I will definitely size up next time. I liked that the neckline was a little low but not super plunging. Perfect for weekend-wear, but I'd probably wear something underneath for work.
Again, the arms are giangantic!! Definitely can be a cute top if the arms were less pirate like.
fit well, a little big in the waist

Cute, unique blouse and can pair with so many different bottoms. I wore this with flared medium wash jeans and brown wedges the first time and the second time with flared tan/orange corduroy pants, but it would also look great with medium/light wash skinny jeans and heels!

links_reviews_title: Did not wear because it did not fit my chest.
links_reviews_text: The shirt was beautiful and very nice quality; however, the style is not intended for large chested women.

I'd love it if I had sized up - the ruching at the top is not as loose as I'd like (34D), making the neckline inappropriately low for work. Also the color is more of a beige/ivory not the crisp white pictured.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering and comfortable. More of a night out shirt.
links_reviews_text: The slit, I think, is too low for work. Not extremely revealing, but more for a night out. The built in cami sits perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Great blouse. Room in the shoulders. Layered in the middle but bunching did not add too much bulk.
links_reviews_text: Sheer material and flow. Has a tendency to rise up but I am tall 5'10.
This top is really versatile, you can wear it with jeans or dress pants and it looks great. It is a little cleavage revealing though, so a cami is needed underneath, otherwise it's a great piece!

I really wanted to like this shirt - it's Tory Burch and looks amazing on the model. On me on the other hand, not so much. There just seems to be a lot of bunched material and a lot of material in general. It made my body look bigger than it is. And although I am relatively flat chested, the cut shows a lot of cleavages.
Flattering
Fit was a bit odd, but very pretty and comfortable

Mostly true to size but a tad on the small side. I can usually wear a 6 and this was even an 8. The sleeves and everything were just too much. Beautiful quality but looked a little pit like a pirate shirt on me. I didn't end up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Cute blouse, a bit on the dramatic side
links_reviews_text: This blouse was cute, but the sleeves are a lot. I put it on and my husband immediately asked me if I was wearing the Jerry Seinfeld puffy pirate shirt. I ultimately did not end up wearing it. It fit true to size for a designer item - I typically wear a 6 in typical mall store clothing (Banana Republic, Ann Taylor, J Crew), but higher end designers always run smaller, so I ordered the 8 and the fit was perfect.
I'm heavy up top. If you're a size D or up go up two sizes. I usually wear a size 6. If I reordered I would order a 10.
Pretty shirt but a bit low cut for work. I wore a tank underneath.
Wore this with a skirt and received many compliments on it! Very elegant, feminine and detailed. absolutely loved it!
True to size. Great style. Flattering fit.
It is not made for girls with a bigger chest.

links_reviews_title: ok if you want the Pirate from Seinfeld look
links_reviews_text: Too blousy. I feel like I was wearing a tent.
Too much fabric for me
Fits true to size, looks good with slim pants
low cut, too small

Loved this top - wore it twice before returning. Fit is very flattering for small waist/larger hips - I wore it with skinny jeans and boots and thought the proportions worked well. Fabric is also lovely to wear; feels like a dream. Can easily see for special occasions, but I liked the contrast between the femininity and the denim. (Note: If you're fortunate enough to be curvy on top you may want to go up a size; the keyhole front worked ok on my 34B chest but not sure how the fit would work if I'd even worn a padded bra.)
The opening went lower than I expected, and it's very fitted around the bosoms. I felt that made it inappropriate for work... but otherwise I really liked the style.

links_reviews_title: Go up a size or be ready to have someone help you get the shirt over your boobs!!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful top. I love the fabric, the romantic look of it, and it makes curves look AMAZING! I do recommend going up one size, particularly if you are fuller breasted. I didn't go up a size and while I looked great, it was hard to breathe from the tight fit. Overall worth renting.

I rented this for work for the month but only ended up wearing it once. It's fairly see through so I had to keep my jacket on and the neckline is pretty low. Also, I'm all for a statement sleeve but these were too much for me!
Lightweight. Great for spring or fall. Trendy and comfy to wear.
I did like this sweater. The gold is metallic thread, just FYI. Cute fit. Mine showed some wear but not bad. Good rental with extra spot on unlimited.
I love this sweater. Super cute, casual sweater that is just a little bit different from the normal camo. The gold band has a little "sparkle". It's pretty lightweight and great for early Fall.
This is lightweight and perfect for fall. Can be dressed up or down. Love it. Runs a bit big - medium is perfect for me and I'm generally more of a large especially in the chest.
Really cute sweater unfortunately it was heavily pilled - if I had a sweater in this condition it would go in the trash.
I liked that the sweater was lightweight.
fit was very good. Felt comfortable on.
Such a great color scheme.

links_reviews_title: Fun mix of pattern, detail, color
links_reviews_text: It was cute.

These jeans didn't catch my eye on the app, but when I tried them on in the RTR store I absolutely loved them. The fabric reminds me of a great pair of vintage jeans, soft and slightly distressed but still structured. And the two-tone denim is really unique and cool! I rolled them up because I'm short and like the cropped look, but they were not too long on me and would likely be ankle length or higher on a taller person. I'm usually a 26 or 27 waist and the 27 fit nicely.
Fit and made well but zero stretch.

The fabric for these jeans felt amazing; soft and thick. I sized up, since they don't have a lot of stretch, and I've never tried this brand before. They were a little big, but it was fine since they have a relaxed fit. They were so comfortable, I wore these three days in a row! Lots of compliments.
Description says 2% Lycra - not the case. These are 100% cotton. Tiny waist and wider legged. Might be flattering on some - not on me!
Loved this striped top. I wore it extremely casually post workout to kids' games, but it could be dressed up too! Ran true to size and very flattering!
So tight. I did not wear
fits like a normal long-sleeve t-shirt, tighter in sleeves looser on the body
Relaxed fit, comfy cotton, great casual shirt.
Thin material.

links_reviews_title: Great pattern but slightly loose fit
links_reviews_text: I really like the pattern and cut of the shirt. It is a loose fit, so if you want something more fitted, I suggest sizing down.
Nice fabric, fit fine
I must not have read the description well, but this is a long sleeved t-shirt, not a sweater. Still cute and fits true to size.
I had a very casual night out with friends and wanted something cute and comfy. This was perfect and fit well. Not super clingy or baggy. Would rent again.
Lightweight soft material. Not hot to wear. A little boxy, not fitted at all but I knew that from the pictures when I rented it. A nice everyday top.
I love this top, I've rented it twice already. It's a high quality basic that looks good at work or on the weekend with jeans. I'm between a xs and s and the 0 fit great.
Looks great with maroon vest! Thin comfy material. Good fit!
Great quality tee--fits TTS and is flattering.
Cute stylish sleeve detail, boxy slightly cropped fit just wasn't super flattering on me. Fun to wear but not a keeper. Nice material and quality.

Loved this sweater for a chilly, rainy day to add a little bit of flare to an otherwise basic outfit. It's cozy and not itchy and the perfect shape for a comfy outfit with jeans without looking frumpy. I almost bought it!
Brought this along for a ski trip to Utah, wore to dinner one night. Comfortable, warm, and a welcomed change from my ski clothes. Sleeves were weird at first but I liked it once I got used to it.

links_reviews_title: Cute! A little bulky in front.
links_reviews_text: Super cute! It does kinda stick out a bit in front but isnt super long to pull off the baggy look. Love the sleeves!
It is baggy, but the length is on the shorter side. Comfortable and warm.

links_reviews_title: Perfect slouchy sweater with a feminine touch!
links_reviews_text: I love everything about this sweater! It's a little oversized and slouchy, but in a great way and the ruffles add the perfect detail to elevate it to a note feminine look. Also super warm!

links_reviews_title: Very warm sweater. Impossible to wear under a coat.
links_reviews_text: Very cute sweater. I love the ruffles on the sleeves. Don't plan on wearing with your average coat though as the sleeves are very bulky. The sweater is also very warm. Perfect for my chilly Northeast office. It's a fairly boxy cut. I usually wear more fitted styles but I am enjoying trying something different.

Got this in my RtR Update order, even though it was my least favorite of my 4 pieces, I still liked it. This sweater was very, very warm! It was maybe the slightest bit itchy. It was true to size and was plenty long enough. I would highly recommend if you're going to be somewhere cold.
Super cute sweater - love the arm details and the uneven hem - gives it a really fun look. It's also pretty comfy. Would definitely rent again!
Mmmm so cozy and soft. Wool not itchy at all. Stylish sleeves and cut. Great quality. Fun. Comfortable and on-trend.

links_reviews_title: Runs larger than another color of the same sweater.
links_reviews_text: I rented this sweater because I loved the pink one that seems to be exactly the same sweater. However this one was bigger, even though it was the same size. I should have ordered a Medium.

I thought this sweater was so scratchy! I wanted to wear it on a 2 hour flight, but literally had to pull something else to wear out of my suitcase because I couldn't stand how scratchy it was. It looked cute on and I got tons of compliments. It definitely runs a little large but looks cute tucked in the front a little. If I planned better I would wear a long sleeve shirt underneath to counteract the itchiness.
This sweater is great!! Very warm and not itchy. The sleeves add a fun detail. It was a bit large, could've gone down a size
This was very warm! I wore it to a concert and it was cute. It was fine fitting into my coat (despite the ruffled sleeves) but it edit feel snug on my arms.

links_reviews_title: Amazing fit, adorable sleeve detail, perfect for chilly fall day
links_reviews_text: This sweater was amazing, great fit, cute arm detail and perfect length. I wore it to work but would also consider wearing out to dinner or during a fall day activity. Would definitely consider renting again or purchasing.

links_reviews_title: Cute for days when you don't feel cute
links_reviews_text: This sweater was super cozy! I wore it to dinner and to work. It is very boxy and covers everything up - great for a day when you don't feel like showing off your figure. The ruffles were a little bigger than I expected but I liked them.
Super cute! Fun and easy every day sweater
Boxy, casual
Oversized trendy sweater. Comfy but slight big in waist area.
I loved this sweater, I wish I could've kept it. Billow detail was still flattering and the sleeve ruffle was so fun. Super warm and well made. Wore it at least three times while I rented it.
It was brutally cold, so I appreciated the warmth of this sweater. The styling is really cute, but it does run a little large.
It had a very boxy fit, but I still liked the style very much.

This is a basic sweater with a little flair. Oversized fit but I would order your normal size so it is not super cropped. Good weight and color. Wore it a few times and enjoyed wearing it but may not order again

links_reviews_title: Great sweater! I kept it for a while and wore a few times. It looked great with white jeans.
links_reviews_text: A full-look, but still flattering. I did not find it itchy.
Nice semi cropped sweater perfect with black jeans. Can keep it causal or dress it up!
This sweater is cute and oh so warm. The fit is a bit boxy (which I like) and there's definitely room to layer. Wish I could afford to keep it! :)

links_reviews_title: Impossible to wear a jacket over this
links_reviews_text: The sweater itself is very cute, I loved the style, especially the body is oversized so but short at the right spots so it creates an interesting silhouette, however the ruffles on the sleeves makes it really difficult to wear a jacket or coat, the arms simply bulk up so much and is uncomfortable to walk around with it stuffed inside a jacket....
worn for weekends and work alike! easy to dress up or down...
Cropped sweater, but perfect with high waisted jeans! Loved it so much I am considering buying it. Perfect for everyday.
Long layers work with this sweater.

links_reviews_title: Cute update on classic grey sweater
links_reviews_text: Nice quality and not itchy. But very boxy. Struggled to tuck into pants - could only do a front tuck. Overall pretty good rental!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to work and a comedy show. LOVE!
links_reviews_text: I really enjoyed this sweater. The sleeves added a nice touch. Would definitely wear again.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to work and out to brunch.
links_reviews_text: I really liked this sweater; I would have worn it more but the weather got warmer and so the sweater was too hot.

links_reviews_title: Fun all-purpose sweater for a fall vacation
links_reviews_text: Rented for a fall vacation. Great sweater to keep in my bag and layer when I was chilly. Ruffles on the sleeves kept it fun/interesting while slouchy/oversized fit kept it comfortable. Has been rented a lot, so the fabric has a lived-in look/feel. Would still recommend!
Cute sweater but so loose and short

links_reviews_title: Most versatile RTR piece I've rented!
links_reviews_text: The brand Cinq a Sept is so chic, and this sweater is no exception. I was nervous that it would be too boxy and bulky (I have broad shoulders and a bigger bust) but it was so cute and I got multiple compliments every time I wore it. It was the workhorse of my Update order- I wore it like four times over the course of a month in many different situations! I wore it out to dinner with distressed jeans and black heeled booties (very wintery/snow day chic), I wore it with sneakers to a child's birthday party, and with flat gray boots just to work.

links_reviews_title: Cute everyday sweater but difficult to fit underneath a jacket!
links_reviews_text: This is my second time renting this item and I found this one a bit overworn from the cleaning processes. Other than that its a very fun sweater that looks great with denim. I received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfy all in one
links_reviews_text: Great fit! Its a relaxed cut but doesn't make you look top heavy at all. This sweater is super warm and the ruffles are so cute! It's so easy to style you can throw on jeans and sneaks and still look put together.
Very boxy fit, but cute nonetheless

I wanted to keep this sweater forever! It was so warm and so flattering! I've never worn wool that was so soft and plush- now I know why this sweater was $300! It was the perfect fit in the bust with just the perfect amount of flare at the waist. I'm between a small and medium, and the small was just right. I kept it in my closet all winter long. I considered purchasing, but Spring is here and I decided it was time to move on. One of my favorite rentals.
I loved the pattern on these jeans and how unique they were. I got a bunch of compliments on them. They are a bit stiffer because there's no stretch. Fun!

links_reviews_title: Loved these and got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I am actually a 27 but read they ran small and wanted the baggy mom fit. So between sizes you may want to size up. However- they are "mom" fit - so they're intended to be baggy.
So cute. They're stiff but stretch as you wear. I sized up two sizes.

links_reviews_title: Adorable for a picture, but weren't realistic to wear.
links_reviews_text: This jeans were so cute in theory, but fit more like capris. I am only 5'8 and they hardly went past my calfs. If I would have sized up then they would have been huge everywhere else.
The jeans run small, I normally wear a 25 and got a 26. The crop was a tad short for 5'7" still fun to try a new style. Beware zero stretch! Check out my posts @thelindsayabigail on Instagram!
Very uncomfortable. I wear a 25 in Madewell jeans and got a 26 in these. I should have gotten a 28. Very stiff.
Loved the flower patterns and the fit on the legs but quite tight around the waist...! I had to reorder a size up as the first one I couldn't do up...I'd go bigger in size then you think...
fun jeans. Fit nicely on the butt, put were a little too loose on my legs.
These are so fun and great, I'm actually still thinking about them months after renting and might just pull the purchase plug!
Very small and you can't sit down in them! Not very practical!
I'm a 25/26...ordered a 27. I love them so much so I'm gonna wear them even if I can't sit or eat in them...super cute but I'll rent them again in a 28
Tight fit but super cute cut right above the ankle

links_reviews_title: I loved the design of this! Its a soft fabric and the embroidery is adorable. It didn't fit me sadly
links_reviews_text: These pants are adorable but have no stretch if you're a lady with wide hips / thighs, then these may not be right for you. I couldn't get the pants over my waist. If there was a little stress, then I think this would be a great pair.
LOVE these jeans. Sized up two sizes as suggested. My butt looks awesome, and the pattern is so cute. Might buy these, or at least keep them on heavy rotation, especially in the spring!

links_reviews_title: I bumped up a size and they fit as skinny jeans - not mom jeans
links_reviews_text: Ran very tight. I do love the embroidery though.

These jeans are cute but I couldn't wear them because they run small. I have other Levi's jeans in size 28 and they're not stretchy, so i got these in a 28, figuring they would be the same. These are much smaller than my others.
Didn't we eat, was warned to size up and regretted it!! Sure they're gorgeous otherwise :)

links_reviews_title: Loved! So many compliments on how cute the jeans are
links_reviews_text: I got two sizes up and they fit perfect! I normally wear a 29 and got a 31R they fit perfect. Love these!!
These are definitely "mom" jeans with the fit. Tight around the waist and hips and loose in the legs. Loved the flowers though.
No give in these jeans at all - great quality and cute

These run WAY small. I ordered one size up originally but didn't dare attempt to button them. I ended up needing THREE sizes larger than the curvy fit Levi's I own in order to get them over my butt. They do fit well and I like the way my bottom looks in the jean. Super cute with crop tops.
Normally a 27 in jeans but Levi's run small. Followed the reviews to order two sizes up and was happy with the 29.

These jeans were the ultimate updated mom cut, but man if they don't run small. I would have gone up another size but instead I opted for not eating or sitting and wearing these proudly like I was in Grease.
Normally I'm a 27 in jeans but I figured to be safe, and with a mom fit, I'd go a size up. I couldn't even get them over my hips and forget zipping them. Maybe go two sizes up if you have a butt?

It fit well, the down side of the fitting for me was when I sat down or bent over it felt tight to my belly. Maybe I needed a size bigger but it felt fine when I stood up or walked. They are extremely cute and you can dress it up or dress it down how ever you like.

I love the flower details and was so excited to pair it with the Levi's Floral Embroidered Ex BF Denim Trucker Jacket, after seeing both on a friend. The jeans ran too small for me, so I had to return them, but I hope they fit for others (maybe they were shrunk or Levi's run small? It was my first time trying Levi's)

links_reviews_title: SOOOOO cute!!! I received compliments from everyone!
links_reviews_text: They're very roomy in the knee area and were very tight on the waist for me. I couldn't ride in the car without undoing them, don't think I would have been able to sit for very long in them either so I would go a size up they would probably have fit perfect. The fit wasn't exactly mom jean style either, more like fitted or girlfriend style jeans. However I did love them and will probably buy them one size up.
Fit in the waist, a little too roomy in the hips
Really awesome pair of jeans! They don't stretch, so I sized up. They're really cute worn with a blouse!

These were a bit snug on the hips and slightly loose in the waist. I sized up after reading other reviews. My waist is 27, hips are 38. They have zero stretch. I got nonstop compliments and these made my butt look awesome.
Teeny tiny. I exclusively wear Levi's so really though they'd be the same size. Should've listened to the reviews. I want to rent them again 3 sizes up ha

Cute detail but the ankle was too tight. They were also baggy around my waist/butt by the time I got to work. I normally wear a 25 in Levi's - maybe it's the type of denim? Might be better if you're just going to wear them for a few hours.

So cute. Feel like a million bucks in these. Very high waist perfect mom butt! Yes, I sized up 1 size and they fit me like a glove. I wore with a tank top body suit and nude lucite yeezy knock off strappy sandals. I might even buy these! I'm not giving them back yet that's for sure!

They definitely run a little small but it's because they don't have any give. The jean is very structured and tighter around the calf than expected (and I have pretty average calves). Got a lot of compliments on these and would rent again. I would size up two sizes than your normal if you like things like this loose. For reference, I'm 5'8 around 150 lbs. and athletic -- normal size is 6 or 8 depending on the jean but I wore the 30R (size 10) in these.

God I love these jeans. I took them on vacation with me and they were extremely flexible: they shine on their own with a plain white tee, but the pattern is noticeable to wear with more funky patterns or accessories. The fit is....mom-like, as advertised, but were surprisingly very comfortable! Seriously considering buying these!

I'm so sad because I was really excited about these jeans and was considering buying them. They were too tight in the ankle and booty area. I'm a tall, curvy girl and I got the 32R and I'm usually a 12/14 in jeans. RTR: PLEASE add more sizes if possible!!

I'm so sad about these. The design is so cute. I had already made up my mind to buy them if they fit well. They weren't even close to fitting. I got my usual sizing and I couldn't even get them on my hips. My mom is a size 10 and tried them and they for her well, so I'd say they run two sizes too small.
I loved the pattern on these jeans, but a size up is necessary.. there is no give. I will definitely be getting these again, just a size up!

I'm 5'3", 135lbs, 36C-27-36, and rented a 28R. The jeans worked great for me. These pants were just loose enough to not give me a muffin top, but not too loose. I love how comfortable mom jeans are. Also, even though these are regular length, I was able to wear them with sneakers and didn't have to roll them or anything.
These run small. I am usually a 12, so I rented the 32, they didnt even fit over my hips.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress. Snugs really all the right spots & is still modest. Is extremely comfortable
links_reviews_text: Perfect in every way the fabric is soooo soft

links_reviews_title: I felt like a movie star!
links_reviews_text: I got a ton of compliments at the wedding. The dress hung beautifully and was comfortable to wear.
Buying it. Color is unique. Cut hugs the curves. Very comfy and soft.
Loved this! Wore it for the opening day of my bridal boutique. Comfortable to move around in, but super professional and cute.

The dress has a classy look and feel to it, and I received many compliments. There's some stretch in the fabric which makes it comfortable and easy to wear. The dress is fitted in the right ways to hug your curves but the draping of the fabric keeps it flattering.
Wraps in all the right places and is SO flattering. I wish it was a different color, it's almost like a brown-grey
Hugs all the right places without being too tight or clingy. The drape is just right. I wore this for a night out but with a blazer and tights I could probably have pulled it off for work too.
I have worn this 3 times and I'm still considering an actual purchase. It had an effortless sophistication and very figure flattering!

links_reviews_title: This dress is super cute and comfy!
links_reviews_text: I highly recommend this dress. It is very cute, yet versatile. It can be worn to a work party, a nice dinner date, or possibly to work with a nice blazer. It is made out of a stretchy material and very comfortable to move around. It fits true to the size. It does show the body figure because it fits snuggly to the body so I recommend bodysuit to smoothen out the figure. The flowy top adds nice layers and will make the straight figure more flattering and voluminous
An incredibly comfortable and flattering dress. The fabric is incredible; stretchy but doesn't look cheap at all. The draping is gorgeous.

links_reviews_title: Nice draped cocktail or date dress
links_reviews_text: Liked the color and cut of this dress, but didn't love the material which wrinkles easily...especially shows at the hem.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering with a perfect amount of stretch.
links_reviews_text: Good length for work.

links_reviews_title: Got it for a wedding... but no give on the curves
links_reviews_text: This is really nice dress and super cute, but very apparent of any curves anywhere.
Was a little long but, otherwise, flattering fit
Wanted to look elegant for a work event; it was very tight on the hips and butt

links_reviews_title: Obsessed and have rented multiple times
links_reviews_text: This is my favorite piece on RTR as a 6-month-long user. It is so classic, sexy yet elegant, appropriate for work. I can't even count how many people gave me compliments on it - almost everyone I crossed paths with at the office. I love the unique cut, but the material is very soft and comfortable. I am nowhere near the "thinnest" woman around but it was extremely flattering and made me feel so good. Would buy it if I could!
didn't like the fit or the material
I loved everything about this dress. It showed off all of my curves in just the right way. Note that you may not be able to wear underwear with this one.
These were clip on earrings which made it much easier to wear. But around the afternoon, my ears definitely needed a break. Would be great for v-day dinner or night out!
clip ons, very heavy- can't wear for more than 3 hours but very chic

links_reviews_title: Very big and didn't realize they were clip on!

links_reviews_text: Much larger than expected! Hurt a little wear, but super fun.
Wore out to dinner but couldn't wear for more than 4 hours-they're heavy!

Really liked this sweater. I am super sensitive to itchy materials and this was very soft and comfortable. Very minimal itchiness during my 16 hour day going from work to dinner with a friend. It was also just the right amount of thick where I didn't overheat in the office. The colors are vibrant and very aesthetically pleasing, I received many compliments from my coworkers. Would definitely rent again, highly recommend.
I was able to wear this both to work and around on the weekends and during a trip to Europe. Love it!

This sweater came new with tags, which is always exciting, and it is unbelievably soft. But it's just not that special. I wore it several times -leggings and maroon tennis shoes, jeans and black boots- but am not tempted to want to make it my own. It is SUPER soft, though, so if you are one of those people who tends to avid sweaters because of the itch factor, this is definitely for you.
The material of this sweater is surprisingly soft and it is so cozy! It is very oversized, I'm usually a 2-4 and this 0 fit oversized. Thinking about buying this one

links_reviews_title: Pretty colors, softest material, but 2 was a little big
links_reviews_text: I could have sized down for a better fit

links_reviews_title: This was a perfect everyday staple that would go with everything- Good weight and quality
links_reviews_text: Its a little long so size down-

I don't know what it was but I just loved wearing this. It was super cozy and nice fall colors. It was super soft and comfortable but not overly baggy and actually a bit shorter in the front than in the back, which I think is flattering. Wish I'd bought it.
I want to buy it!
Great fit, soft fabric. Great for everyday wear.

This is my favorite piece from RTR. When I first pulled it out of the shipment, I thought it looked like a tent, but after figuring out how to configure the tied waist, it fit like a dream. I actually wore this piece three times before returning it: on a beach vacation, on a trip to Venice (where it was comfy and cool while walking around the city), and to work. I styled it with different accessories each time. Wish I could own this one.
Fabric was cottony vs. silky so less dressy than I was expecting. Very roomy fit but built-in belt/tie helps make it flattering
Great dress for work!

When I first put this on it felt a bit like a sack, however when I added the belt that came with the dress it gave me a defined waist and make the dress look much better. Got lots of compliments on it at work. Great print and easy to wear. Dresses like this one are the reason I have a RTR unlimited subscription.

links_reviews_title: A little long but nice all the same
links_reviews_text: Length was just above ankle and think I would have liked better if if was mid calf but nice piece to wear into warmer months. probably better for tall ladies! Would possibly rent again.
This was nice for my business trip to Hong Kong. Lightweight and easy to wear. Professional with a blazer.
Nice dress. Fun to mix it up for work. Good weight, thanks to the liner. I'm 5'8 and it hits mid-calf. Lots of compliments.
I wore this in early April to work. It was light and breezy, but also warm enough for a 50-60 degree day in NYC. I liked the adjustable waist and fun print.

I wore this dress to a casual dinner with friends, but will definitely wear to work and maybe again for another any day activity before returning it. It's lightweight, comfortable and easy to wear. Great for early-mid pregnancy as well, as there's a bit of natural puckering below the tied waistband. No stretch though.
Cotton so it was comfortable and love the print.
Unflattering boxy fit and strange length. Did not wear.
This is a great work dress and I would rent again.

This dress is suuuper flattering. I get compliments every time I wear it. It has a large body with a tie around the middle too so you can wear it through fluctuating weight etc. Very comfortable, can be dressed up or down. Way better in person!
I loved how comfortable and easy this dress was. Great for running around.

links_reviews_title: I am OK with modest wear, but this was just dowdy
links_reviews_text: Fabric is faded, either through over-use, or by design. Fit was flattering but the cut is just bleh
This made me look wider; and the colours were kind of dull. Wouldn't rent again.
The dress fits like a pretty sack. If you're into shapeless fashion, this is your jam.
just wish it had pockets

This dress is so great - I found it ran somewhat large (I was worried it would be narrow in the hips because of the straight skirt) but the tie belt allows you to make the waist as fitted as you like.
