Generally I'd say size down if you are between sizes but don't worry about it too much because of the belt. The cream color is more of a tan, but overall it's just a really sophisticated, comfortable summer dress.

links_reviews_title: Artsy take on a casual dress
links_reviews_text: This dress didn't knock my socks off but it is definitely cooler than your average work dress and has solid fabric

Wore this on a day that took me from an extremely formal corporate environment in the morning to an extremely informal arts company in the evening and it worked swimmingly for everything. So comfortable and chic!
Got lots of compliments. Fit a little boring/boxy. But it is nice and easy to wear. Keeps you cool!
Long length....
Nice fit

links_reviews_title: Perfect mix of casual and quality
links_reviews_text: The fabric is really the winner here. Also, for those who want to show off a waist, the ties make it easy to adjust. Runs *slightly* large but I think this is intentional as the fabric doesn't have stretch and the waist is adjustable.
Very long - I'm 5'7" and was almost to my ankles. Kind of baggy overall, even with the belt. Would definitely size down. Still a cute dress, just wish I had gotten a smaller size!

links_reviews_title: It was a comfy dress - modest/perfect for work.
links_reviews_text: Size and fit as expected. : )

links_reviews_title: I was worried this would fit like a sack, but it was so flattering and comfy!
links_reviews_text: The fabric was wrinkled when I got it, but easy to steam out. Has a liner which helps keep it from being sheer or see-through.
Well made cotton dress. Beautiful print and fully lined, but still light weight. Casual, does wrinkle easily.

links_reviews_title: I really liked this dress. Doesn't have as much hanger appeal but looks great!
links_reviews_text: The fabric is light and airy, perfect for a hot summer night!

links_reviews_title: Love it. Super comfy and cute.
links_reviews_text: Roomy in the bust (I wear a 36DDD and it fit nicely).
Although this dress was true to size, the dress itself was rather boring. The midi length didn't have much give for walking and the brightness of the fabric was dull.

links_reviews_title: Brightened my day! May rent again.
links_reviews_text: A very sturdy, not too thick, well made skirt in a very fun color. Definitely recommend.

Love this piece!!! Even though the fabric is thick it's unforgiving. Panty lines and any shirt you might consider tucking in will show unless you're willing to wear some sort of undergarment. Received so many compliments and could not believe how flattering this bright orange color was on me! Really glad I tried something different.
Loved this skirt, pairs with a white sweat tank and blazer! Also rented the See by Chloe Joan Mini bag! Perfect combo! My only comment is that this is definitely more on the maxi side.
Great fit, didn't ride up. Is a thick scuba-ish material. Wish I would have gotten the top to go with!

Love the color- can dress it up with heels or dress it down with Dad sneakers. Skirt takes the star role regardless of what you wear. Blue eyeliner suggested! Fits great for a size 6 150lb 5'9"-- I felt like I was wearing a comforter -- so light and cozy.

Wore this during a hot (90 degrees) family reunion. It was a bit heavy for that hot of weather. I got tons of compliments. The only reason I took a star off is that it is not forgiving to the underwear lines and I found myself constantly pulling it down (it rode up). But the fit is perfect for hourglass, makes a booty look great, and is super bright!

links_reviews_title: My only regret is not waiting for the matching top.
links_reviews_text: This is a rental where the RTR precessions really shines. I'd never buy this skirt- but I would want to wear it once. Actually, I wore it twice because it was that great.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, unique, flattering and chic chic chic. Very well crafted.
links_reviews_text: It's just great!

Loved the way this skirt fit. For reference, I typically wear a size four and have a smaller waist with larger hips. The material was incredibly flattering for my figure and I got lots of compliments. Perfect way to include the neon trend for work!

Despite the fact that I don’t usually do bright shades - I was pretty obsessed with this high waisted skirt by Tibi. It was the perfect length, hugged my body and never wrinkled so always looked polished. Perfect for my polo match or any upscale daytime event. Took off one star as it is a little tough to wear after a big meal. @rtrjunkie
Loved this skirt. I thought the material was a little stiff. Otherwise, this was fun to wear and I paired them with the oscar de la renta earring available to rent too!
Got so many compliments. The fit is sexy and flirty - tight around the waist/hips and flares on the bottom. The color is fun and bright!

Fun piece to style with! I loved the material and wearing the waistband a little more high up. Definitely needs a good pair of heels with it if you're more petite, and maybe a crop top instead of something you tuck in so you can't see the fabric through it. Amazing color, too!

links_reviews_title: the color was so bright and festive!
links_reviews_text: This skirt was shorter than I thought, which is good, because I'm 5'2 and fit really well. Looked best with a crop top or body suit - denim/chambray and white were the best way to wear it that I found!
Skirt was beautiful, loved the fabric, true to size around belly however if you have smaller waist like me it's a little loose on top. Wouldn't go a size down though.
Super stretch knit fabric made this an easy choice for a casual cinco de Mayo wedding! Could be worn high mid or low waist. Perfect length for tall girls!

I picked this skirt because I liked how it looked in the other RTR members' photos. Still, I wasn't expecting it to be sooo neon, and I was initially turned off. I paid to exchange, and the moment I returned it, I regretted it. I think I need the jolt of energy on these gray spring days in NYC.
Perfect fit! Great for a party or everyday. I dressed it up with a crop top and heels. So many compliments!
So many compliments!!
Looks expensive but shows any extra weight you might be carrying in your lower tummy area. Wouldn't rent again because I felt like I could eat in it.
Love this vibrant color and fit

The color is so gorgeous and statement-making. The fabric and fit are interesting and flattering. This requires a skin-tone and truly seamless thong if you want to avoid panty lines. It's a head-turner

links_reviews_title: Cute, but waist is a little uncomfortable
links_reviews_text: Maybe if I got a size 8 this would fit differently, but the elastic band on the waist isn't super flattering. The fabric is so soft and really good quality. The color is beautiful. It's fitted, so if you have a booty, it'll def pop out.

I loved the thickness of this fabric and how it was cut to flare out a bit. I am a true size 0, sometimes leaning toward 00, and probably could have worn a slightly smaller size, but it worked. I would probably rent again!

links_reviews_title: the color is incredible and everyone will notice you :)
links_reviews_text: Fit is great and the fabric is fantastic, looks expensive.

links_reviews_title: Awesome - color and style are attention-grabbing!
links_reviews_text: Definitely a midi skirt but works brilliantly

links_reviews_title: Bought to wear on vacation - but never wound up wearing it.
links_reviews_text: A bit longer than I expected, and not so flattering in the tummy area. For the "look" would have wanted to wear a shorter top / something tucked in, but because of the way it hit my stomach wanted to wear a longer shirt with it but that wound up not looking right. Overall, just didn't fit me great and didn't have a shirt to wear it with.

I typically wear between a 2 and 4. The 4 fit perfect. This was snug. Paired with a white tank top and wore twice. (Early dinner and drinks with girlfriends & afternoon wine tasting event. Lots of compliments! Great color. Wish I could buy it!
So many compliments !

links_reviews_title: Fit, eye-catching color, comfort, unique shape. This skirt has it all.
links_reviews_text: Very slim fit with stretch.
Could have worn for an event but ended up just wearing to work and it totally worked being dressed down. Fit was very flattering as well

I wore this skirt at work and a family party with a gray t-shirt. I got tons of compliments. It's thick enough to be very flattering, but I'd still recommend wearing spanks under as it is very form-fitted.

links_reviews_title: I love this skirt I typically wear a 4 so it runs a bit small.RTR was accurate with size suggestion
links_reviews_text: Love it. great material and great alternative to shorts! Stylish and the color is fantastic! This skirt had a few small stains on it. I wore it anyway.

Fit snugly around the hips and thighs - spanx or a longer shirt or jacket would definitely make the fit smoother. Color generated a lot of compliments. I loved the skirt, thought it was a very fun item for spring.
Snug, fun, thick-knit sunshine of a midi
Color was beautiful, but even with the elastic waistband, was way too big.

This skirt might have been a better fit for someone whose frame is not petite/pear like mine. The color, the fabric, and the warp are great and very unique. The high waist skirt runs true to size around my seat, but large around my waist so I had to accessorize it with a belt. Therefore, finding the right top was a little challenging. Once I had matched the entire outfit, I really enjoyed wearing the skirt all night. Maybe renting both the skirt and its top would have been wiser. The fabric never lost its original elasticity and kept its shape.

This was a silly, fun rental. I size down to the extra small and I'm glad I did because it was more fitted. If you want it a bit baggier, then go with your normal size, but I do think it runs big. The short is very comfy and the pleated bottom was super cute.

links_reviews_title: Perfect top for a press event
links_reviews_text: Rented this fun top for a press event at Disney. This was the perfect fit for the Star Wars themed event. Got tons of compliments! Will definitely rent again.
Cute athletic but dressy sweatshirt

So this is not the best shot of this sweatshirt, due to the angle and my scarf, but I love love this piece and would definitely rent again. It's perfect for air travel -- keeps you cozy and warm but still looks chic/doesn't look like you're in pjs. It fits great, too. True to size, and comfy. Love!
Big but cute and comfy
I ended up loving this top! Fit was loose but not baggy, no wrinkles, and it looked great dressed up and on the way to the gym. Ruffles were a sweet touch and the arm detail gave it some edge.

This was such a fun sweater to wear. Its synthetic feeling but not itchy and even on a short person the lil ruffles looked fine and proportional to my body. FYI the text down the arms reads "follow me now"
Enjoyed wearing this as a casual weekend day or night look. Its a street wear style with the girly peplum twist.
Fun top! Love the peplum and sleeve detail, it is feminine & edgy
Love the material! Fits so cute with a little ruffle on your rear!!
Loved this, wore it multiple times. The ruffle makes elevates it for everyday wear.

links_reviews_title: I CAN WEAR THIS EVERY DAY!!!
links_reviews_text: Love this loose fitting top. Looks great with both jeans and leggings. I would literally wear this every day if I could. You can go either casual or dressy with this "sweatshirt." Fancy sweatshirt it is.

links_reviews_title: felt special on an average day
links_reviews_text: Darling sweatshirt with leggings and boots

links_reviews_title: This is a great unique spin on a black top! Loved it.
links_reviews_text: This was just the right amount of edgy, got lots of compliments
Fits just as expected! Material doesn't really stretch, but is thin and breathable.
cute fit! it doesn't wrinkle,

links_reviews_title: I ABSOLUTELY Love this sweatshirt! So chic!!
links_reviews_text: It fit great. Low in the back so I wore with leather looking Spanx leggins and booties. Great look!

Wish I would have seen this when it was a little cooler here. I love everything about this fun casual top! I normally wear a medium but I sized up because of what all the other reviews said. It fit fine and if I could buy it, I would!
Fit a little oversized as any sweatshirt-like piece should. Got a ton of compliments when I wore this with black leather bands and white tennis sneakers.
This was a fun, casual departure for Me. I styled it with leather leggings and furry high tops. Very fun
This sweatshirt was so trendy and chic! Got compliments on it everywhere I went! Order a size down as this brand runs large!
Super cute athleisure too. Not a lot of stretch but it's not supposed to be very form Fitting. I liked the ruffle at the bottom, added a playful element.
really cute shirt! worn with Shiny black leggings and leather boots
Unusual sweatshirt with pleated peplum. Loved the graphic font down the sleeves. Wore for work and everyday. Feels expensive. S fit well in shoulders but style is quite loose fitting overall
This was perfect casualwear for cooler days and nights. Loved the lettering on the sleeves. Perfect for traveling also.

Very cute shirt. Runs a little large but well made. Loved the contrast of the white lettering on the arms, which gave it a sporty feel. However, I didn't realize it said "Follow me know," which I didn't love/was sort of out of my comfort zone.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear, fun to wear with leggings or jeans
links_reviews_text: Fits well, I like the fabric, flattering

My boyfriend said he liked this top. I wasn't crazy about it. It looks casual but the material isn't soft (not uncomfortable or rough, just not cozy) and the neck is a bit tight pulling it over my head. I didn't like the way it matched anything which is weird for a black sweater.
Fit great just as photographed
I really like the quality of this shirt. Goes easy over the bump and still on trend.
I liked how this sweatshirt was both casual and compfy and somehow a bit fency too at the same time. Will rent it again.

Cute, fun and comfortable sweatshirt. Wore it a couple of times. One of the things I like about RTR unlimited is getting to wear these expensive designer casual clothes a few times and then sending them back. This one was a good rental.
Fun, unexpected way to try a sporty look- dressed it up with white booties for the office and got tons of compliments. A bit on the wider size- I'd suggest sizing down.
Perfect peplum. I loved wearing this shirt. It was cute and fun and totally work appropriate for a Friday!

links_reviews_title: Fits truer to size than expected.
links_reviews_text: I did not wear this item because it was too large for me--I sized up based on online size charts and should have stuck with my usual medium. The one thing I will say that I did not expect: this is a much shinier fabric than I expected; it's almost close to a track jacket material.

I rented this for a fun weekend look. Wore it with leggings and chunky sneakers to a casual party & now rocking it out w skinny black pants & booties for an edgy work look. Shirt is brand new - love it when something arrives with tags on! If I rented again maybe would go w XS.
Fun piece! Would rent again!
Super comfy. A little short sleeved for me but perfect around body. Enough room for me to layer a light sweater underneath. Medium would feel too big.

links_reviews_title: The best jean coat to throw on with everything!
links_reviews_text: I loved this coat so much. It fit so well and was warm without making me to hot (wore it in 70 degrees and was comfortable.). It looked cute with shorts, jeans and a skirt and I will definitely rent again

links_reviews_title: Great denim bomber for everyday wear!
links_reviews_text: Loved this little jacket. Could have sized up to Small for layering - XS was a bit tighter and shorter than I expected. Surprisingly warm. Def would recommend!
This is a cute everyday bomber, perfect for spring. The star in the back gives it a little extra sass without being too loud.

links_reviews_title: Perfect alternative to a jean jacket
links_reviews_text: Love, love loved this jacket. It really made outfits feel a little more special than a plain denim jacket. I wish I could have kept it. I will definitely rent again.

This was way too cropped! A bomber should hit at the waist, and this was really quite cropped and hit several inches above my waist - and I have a pretty short waist! The fit was just really unflattering and I sent it back without wearing it. Also, the pockets were so wrinkled, I would have had to spend a lot of time ironing it in order to wear it.
Love this jacket. Goes with everything, fits well, and is super nice quality!
I liked this for an easy travel jacket--comfy for the airplane.
Jacket sent looked very worn, it's a short jacket, ended up being a little too short on my torso

links_reviews_title: Love this jacket, goes with everything ver comfortable and true to size
links_reviews_text: Great jacket, going with everything
It's cropped which I didn't realize but like and it's a little tight across the back.
Comfy and stylish.
Comfortable cropped jacket. Sleeves nice and long. I wore size M. I'm 5'8", 142lbs
Cute jacket but if you have a large bust the pockets make it super unflattering.
A little too cropped for my frame. I had a hard time making it look good but was cozy.
Runs small.
Rented twice... wore it a billion times. Got compliments.
I rented this as the weather is warming up, but it is way to heavy (thick material), very long sleeves, which are a bit tight. Not comfortable!!!
Loved the eyelet detail- wore for winter work casual with a tank and jeans. Cropped waist. Pretty but lining is a little rough.

Comfortable like a sweatshirt but detailing makes it cute enough for work! It's definitely a stiff sweatshirt material, so if you want something not as boxy or more soft this isn't it. I have a short torso and this fit perfect!

links_reviews_title: Cute top while still being comfortable
links_reviews_text: I've had my eye on this for a while. Didn't want to rent it for work because of the holes. Wore it to dinner and it was perfect. You can see your bra through the holes but it's really barely noticeable. Was baggy and casual but still cute because of the details. Not too warm either so it is perfect for spring.
This sweater isn't tight on the bottom and is short so don't rent if you prefer long. Cutout detail is beautiful and not revealing.

Although the idea is cute, this shirt is very boxy. It's a sweatshirt material but a little on the stiff side and it stood away from my body. It was also slightly short and I'm 5'1. I had to wear a tank underneath. See my pic and the arrow where it shows it lays away from my body. Hard pass.

This sweatshirt is super-cute and easy to throw on and go for a casual but pulled-together look. A couple of disclaimers though: - the torso seemed a bit short to me. If you have a long torso and boxy/cropped is not your jam, this may not work for you - the eyelets go pretty Low on the top. Be prepared to either wear a cami, show some bra, or go bra less. Also, it was much draftier than I had expected. Overall a great, easy, simple piece. But I won't be renting again.
I rented this super cute sweatshirt for a fall trip to Florida. It was perfect for cool evenings on the beach. I rented the medium but would go for the small next time.

links_reviews_title: You don't need to size up
links_reviews_text: I sized up because I was afraid it would be too cropped but I probably should have stuck with my reg size. Quality is good but it can really only be worn once because it's white...

links_reviews_title: Simple piece that's easy to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: I rented this to a trip for Ireland. I wore it a few time- with jeans as pictured but also as an athleisure look. It's a good light weight pullover for summer - cute but simple. The fit is relaxed. Soft material and comfy.

Wore this in 100° weather because it's FREEZING inside my church! This kept me warm because it's sweatshirt material, but also kept me looking nice because of the cute cutouts! It's a win-win overall.

Though the only picture I took of myself in this sweatshirt is post-workout and not that cute, I loved the way this looked on me. It's super comfortable but a step up from a plain sweatshirt, and also more breathable. This is partly because it's all cotton and partly due to the eyelet details. It's hard to tell from the photos, but the sleeves are blouson and quite full towards the cuffs. I would definitely rent this one again.

links_reviews_title: Would've bought this if I could!!
links_reviews_text: I loved this piece so much more than I thought I would! I added this on to my unlimited order as a last minute choice and I was so happy I did. I paired this sweatshirt with everything from shorts, to jeans, to workout pants and it went great with everything. It was so comfy and versatile I wish I could've kept it. My only wish was that the arms were a little longer. I'm 5'7 with very long arms and the small fell a little short on my wrists

I wore this a few times. Once for work with jeans and then again for a casual party with a skirt and booties. It works both dressed up or down. It's super comfortable. Both times I dressed it up with some silver hoops and a bun and got tons of compliments on the overall look. It's a cute find!
Cute for a day. Nothing crazy special abt this sweatshirt, other than it's different and nobody else really has this in their closet. Which is why I LOVE unlimited!!

This sweatshirt fits exactly like it looks in the photo. Really comfortable, roomy but still fitted enough to not look boxy. Brilliant white in color. It’s still cold here, but I could see myself wearing this with a cute skirt in the warmer months.
The color is bright white which is great for contrast. And the shoulder cutouts are a designer touch. Had lots of compliments.
It's boxy, thin, and not soft.
Not the most flattering cut but super cute details. I wore it several times and will rent again as it's a great transition to fall
Sleeve length is just a bit short. But comfy and cute over all.

links_reviews_title: Really fun and different for a casual sweatshirt.
links_reviews_text: It's short and boxy...not quite my favorite on my body, but it's cute.

links_reviews_title: Loved the detail on this sweatshirt!
links_reviews_text: This sweatshirt was perfect for a brisk day at the zoo with the kids. The eyelet detail is beautiful and it is so comfortable. I would rent this one again.
Nothing against this just wasn't the banger I was looking for. Still really nicely made and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Nice sweatshirt; super easy to wear aside from being white.
links_reviews_text: Comfy and thick. Hole pattern makes it suitable for cool spring days.
Fit great, perfect for spring w jeans and a leather jacket Could be worn w sneakers day to day or dressed up w heels and jewelry
Super cute. Very feminine and cute.
The sweatshirt is cute, but very boxy. It isn't necessarily flattering so I would only rent it for a very casual occasion.
Comfy
Really cute but casual, would rent again. The material is a little rough but not itchy

links_reviews_title: Comfortable fit. Great for a leisure day.
links_reviews_text: Loose sit with nice lacy details at the top. Perfect for spring days. The style is a bit boxier than I expected.

The fit was a little boxy but still cute. The eyelets were nice and made the shirt feel breezy. Sleeves were just right but I do have short arms. The fabric had some wash wear to it and was not a bright white. No stains however. This piece will make me reconsider renting any all white piece.
Love the look of this top. Dress it up or down. Very feminine.

Really cute little sweatshirt. Need to wear a cami underneath due to the position of the cut outs. Wore to work and also on the weekend. Runs a tad short but as you have a cami on, not too big a deal if it rides up a tad.

I loved getting cozy in this sweatshirt. The eyelet details made me feel pretty. It’s definitely a loose sweatshirt fit. When I first felt the fabric I didn’t think I liked the texture, but turns out it all works for me.

links_reviews_title: Love this! Can a sweatshirt be worth $100?
links_reviews_text: Paired this sweatshirt with black pants for a casual daily look. Loved it. Kept me super warm. Lots of compliments. It does run a little large, but that's to be expected with a sweatshirt. Would definitely consider renting again, but I may just buy it to have as a fall staple.
This was such a pretty sweatshirt. The cutout details made it more dressy. I got so many compliments. Loved it!
Cute sweatshirt - good for daytime.

I'm super tall so I was looking for longish items. Unfortunately when I put this on it was a "belly shirt" and not what I thought the pre-school moms would appreciate at drop off :) The overall design is very cute!
Body and oversized but cute details.
it was more of a crop top sweatshirt so be aware of the style.
Can pair with jeans, shorts, etc. Really excited to have this for spring/summer when it cools off at night.
Travels well. I wore this for a training session out of state then a second time at my location. Received compliments in NJ and ATL. Simple with a flowey cool to it. Cross seasonal appropriate

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and quality fabric. Can be dressed up or down. Wore this to my sister's wedding.
links_reviews_text: I wish I ordered a size down, but I'm still happy with the dress.

I really liked this dress. Given I wore it for work, I wore a cami under it. If on a date, might have skipped it. The fabric is thick and got hot a few points under a winter coat. It's also an unusual texture, but not bad. Got a couple compliments on it through out the day.
I wore this for a presentation I had to give and I got so many compliments. The side bow and sleeves make it a unique dress. Will definitely rent again

links_reviews_title: I LOVE this dress! Second time I have rented
links_reviews_text: The fit is perfect. With the bow and the lantern sleeves and material, this dress is so great. This is the second time I have rented this dress. Just as classy and beautiful as the first time. If I get this one more time, I am definitely buying it!
Loose fitting but fun dress. The sleeves are a little tight (but you can leave the zipper open). The fabric is great quality and on the thicker side.

I really liked this dress and I got a bunch of compliments. It's both cute and sophisticated. Great for work! Only problem is that the cutout is a bit low. Some reviewers said they wore a cami... I used fashion tape to hold the bow in place, which got a little uncomfortable after a while. I guess beauty is pain!
Even better in person. Loved this. Easy to wear and lined for warmth. No zipper except on sleeves,which I did not unzip. Perfect.

I enjoyed wearing this dress and got a couple of compliments on it. The sleeves billow out and then come in with a snug longish cuff and the bow and keyhole neckline add interest. Didn't think it was super flattering for curvy types though.

I really enjoyed wearing this dress. The material is thick and it's lined. The sleeves are so much fun. My awkward pose is my attempt and demonstrating them. I also untied for the pic to show that the cut is low and required either a low cut bra or a cami if you don't want to keep checking that the ties are keeping you covered. Super cute (in my opinion).
This dress is so incredibly comfortable. Love the material. Perfect for work!

I really liked this dress. The style was unique and feminine, and it hung nicely. The full sleeves with tight wrists (yes, you may need help with the zippers, as others have noted) was an interesting affect, and the tie at the neck was a nice touch. It felt true to size and was a good length. I would rent this one again, for sure.
Adorable little dress. Length was perfect to wear as a mini dress or tunic with leggings on my 5'11" frame.

I rented this for work and it did the trick. I have a mini-bump (16 weeks) so I sized up, and I shouldn't have. The cut is roomy so I'd say stick with your normal size even if you like a looser fit, or maybe go down one if you want a more fitted look. The neck tie was a little awkard in a bow, but looked fine with a double-knot. The fabric is on the thicker side and feels a bit stiff. Overall a great work dress with beautiful details.

The fabric was not at all what I expected - I thought it would be very smooth and light (maybe it was the "airy" in the title) but it is quite stiff and almost a little crinkly. It wasn't bad though and holds its a-line shape nearly as a result, although it does wrinkle a little too. The stiffness also made the bow harder to tie and it didn't drape as much as I'd like. The color is beautiful though, a nice cool gray. The fit was a bit loose but with a nice shape - there is no zipper so you can't really size down for a smaller fit or you wouldn't be able to get it on. The wrists are nice and tight (with zippers that are a bit difficult to do up yourself) and have a pleasing pleat detail. In terms of length, a fairly conservative knee-grazing hemline. Overall very nice for work, but not too terribly special for me.

links_reviews_title: Great cut and color (i'm making this sound like a haircut)!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress so much I'm holding on to for a bit, so I can wear it to another work function. The color is a pale grey/blue. So pretty! I had to wear a cami underneath as the neckline is quite low. Unfortunately the lines of the waist of the cami showed through. I think I need to wear a cropped cami next time.

This dress is beautiful. The fabric is heavier than I initially expected. It has a wonderfully soft and warm lining which makes all the difference in terms of comfort. The tie collar was a bit troublesome at first - I kept attempting a bow but I couldn't get it to lay properly (and I like to consider myself pretty well-equipped when it comes to bow-tying). In any case, I opted to skip the bow and just do the first under-over layer of tying. It laid quite nicely and stayed put with minimal adjustments. Another favorite detail: the sleeves. The elongated tight wrist is a unique, classy touch. I styled this with white slides as it is still early Fall but could see myself renting again to wear with black tights and booties. All in all, it is a nice, comfortable, stylish dress. True to size.

This dress is very cute and professional looking. I absolutely love the bow! I do suggest going up a size for your back up size, because the fit is a little straight and the fabric has no stretch. This dress is super comfortable, giving you room to move around as you please. A standard bra works just fine and the dress hit me a little bit over the knee.

links_reviews_title: Conservative battleship-gray dress with unique details
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size, neckline was low but tie front covered it. Such a nice color.

links_reviews_title: The perfect cut and dainty style!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress. The cut is extremely flattering and the dress is stylish yet work appropriate. The front dips down a bit low, but the overlaid bow is the perfect fix. The length was right above my knees. Overall a very comfortable and cute dress! Another winner by See By Chloe!

It has been about a year since I rented this dress, and remembering the compliments, I was looking to rent again for a work function. Unfortunately, it's not available right now, and for good reason. It's a great dress. The plunging neckline dips a little low, but I found the ties to provide sufficient modesty. I styled it in monotone with grey tights and grey zebra print Rothy's.

Loved the dress, very cute on. wore a size up at 30 weeks pregnant and it fit my belly. However, the dress had very, very strong body odor. It seemed like the dress had been worn too many times and needed to be taken out of the rotation or much more deeply cleaned until it no longer smelled.

links_reviews_title: Loved the style and fit; absolutely perfect and comfy
links_reviews_text: Love this brand
True to size, but we warned, the sleeves fit snugly around wrist. If you have a watch, it is virtually impossible to reveal.

Wore it for Easter and an event. It is very comfortable due to the A-line but still feminine with the neckline and bow which I found refreshing. The length could be hit or miss pending your height. At 5'4" the dress came just above knees which, truthfully, I didn't find the optimal length but I will willing to forego in light of comfort and not sacrificing too much style. Received a few compliments - none from my hubby who didn't find it all that sexy (shocking).

links_reviews_title: Great dress but could not make bow lie flat/look good.
links_reviews_text: great dress, bow is tricky.
This dress is adorable! The bow is kind of awkward to tie and make it look nice, so I ended up using a pin to keep it in place.

links_reviews_title: Flattering and sweet (with a little sexy)
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments on the color and the dress overall tonight. It fit well - true to size. Were it not for my big chest, I'd be a 42. The fabric and lings also were good. Great for a winter birthday dinner party. it's a little low cut but for me that works well. The long zipper sleeves are a nice touch.

This dress did not fail me in the least bit. The fabric beautifully flowed with my body, the sleeves were gorgeous and the bow put the entire thing together. It really was a statement dress. I wore it to work with opaque stockings and low ankle suede booties. I got a ton of compliments! I'm going to hold onto it a bit longer to wear it to a nice brunch or afternoon tea session with the girls. It's very English but also doesn't make you look too mature wearing it. If anything, it makes you look very put together. I didn't have the problem that others had with the bow or chest showing, so I didn't need to wear a cami or anything. I also didn't need to wear a slip because it was nicely lined, which was awesome! Oh and my favorite thing about the dress? It doesn't wrinkle!

links_reviews_title: A little short and low cut for work
links_reviews_text: I love the look of this dress - truly! The proportions were just a little off for me. It was a wee bit short but I paired it with tights and that was fine. The neckline was a little revealing as well. Tried to get the bow tied in a way that covered that but it was a little awkward. Wouldn't rent again due to those things but really wanted to love this one!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit and style for work
links_reviews_text: Love this dress

this is a well-made dress with nice fabric, fully lined. it has a nice smocking detail at the shoulders. can be worn to work or dressed up for an event. there's a black version that i'll definitely rent in the future.
A looser fit would have been perfect. Although it is stretchy and did "fit", it would have looked much better in a larger size.
I received so many compliments on the dress. The fit is perfect, and actually does a good job at not accentuate my chest. I will definitely be ordering this dress again.
Fit of the dress was strange. The opening at the top was also much deeper than I expected. Did not wear
Loved this dress. The material was thicker than the picture made it look which worked out well since it was winter. Wore with black tights and booties.
I wore this to work and got plenty of compliments. I thought the tie looked a bit odd and the dress seemed a bit worn and the wrists are very small...but it was all fine.
Sleeves were hard to zip up myself.
This is a beautiful dress but not one for the busty. It was too tight in bust area and I couldn't wear. I was so bummed that it was not available in a size up.
Beautiful dress, got so many compliments at work. Everyone said it looked so elegant. Flattering cut. Would consider renting again.
Cute for work, I liked the neckline buttoned up. Very loose, small (2-4) fit me, sleeves just slightly short but plenty long to tuck in.

I loved this top. It was so comfortable and pretty. My husband even commented on how great it looked. Also it fit across my busy great. I'm use to having issues with gapping with a G cup, but not with this top.

links_reviews_title: Nice top. Like pairing with black jeans
links_reviews_text: Good fit overall

Lightweight and stylish, rented it for work but can be worn with jeans and booties. The suggested size was M but definitely runs big, a Small would have been a better fit for me. Received lots of compliments!
Perfect with a black suit. Light but not sheer.

I rented this only because of the print, I'm sell footwear and wanted to merchandise with the collection I'm selling in. I had no idea I'd actually love it so much! I'm not a frilly/ruffley person but when you unbutton a couple of the top buttons the neck looks great. The overall cut was very flattering, as you can see from the picture I did a little front tuck or it may have had too much volume for me. Overall a very easy top to wear that will look great on everyone.
Super comfortable. Blush undertone. Easy breezy on-trend.
Flowy fabric. Pretty muted print. Great neutral. Would match nearly anything. I wore with coral jeans and gold wedge sandals.
I love this top. It's so comfortable, bust minimizing appropriate for work yet really fun print. Highly considering buying this one.
This top was great. Comfy and thin. Loved the leopard print.

Lovely blouse! On trend! I wore it with a few buttons undone for a night out in the East Village of NYC. But the static cling is real! And the blouse is paper thin. So it's best for warm to moderate weather.
Wore with the top 2 buttons undone for a more casual look. Wore it multiple times before returning! Plays more as a neutral blouse than super animal-print. Will definitely rent again!
I just loved this shirt. The right amount of sass but conservative.

links_reviews_title: Ahhhh love this top so much!!
links_reviews_text: This is an amazing top and a perfect three season piece! Can be easily dressed up or down. True to size. Loose fitting without being oversized or baggy. Perfect for evening work event with black pants. Want to purchase!
Very cute top for work. Great for transitioning between summer and fall. It's lightweight, but still appropriate for fall. I would rent this again.

This blouse fits lTS but the fit is loose all over. This looks best tucked in or cinched at the waist with a belt. It is very lightweight (I wore in the summer in Las Vegas and in San Diego) but not sheer. Would definitely rent again.

Loved this top. It's perfect for work french tucked into a black pant paired with black heels. Love the ruching detail at the collar. Runs large. I will likely order again but next time I'll order the XS.

The pattern on this is perfect, and the material is luxe but lightweight, perfect for summertime work attire. I wore it twice and received many compliments. I rented the Large and found it a little big, so next time I would rent a Medium.

links_reviews_title: Classic shirt with a fun twist
links_reviews_text: Fits well..could have done a small but like the blousey fit.
Cute - drapes well. Ruffles detail adds something extra. Fabric is very soft and luxurious
Loved this flowy top with leopard detail! Perfect tucked in or out. Could have worn M
I love silky loose tops for work and this was exactly that
This top is so versatile. I could have worn it for work, but only wore it for evening events. I would buy this shirt.

links_reviews_title: Great top. Size up if you're tall!
links_reviews_text: Love the look of this top with black pants for work. Only issue was that the sleeves were a bit short so next time i would likely size up.
I don't usually wear leopard print but this top was fun and not too overwhelming. It was comfortable and easy to wear with jeans. I like loose fit so I'm glad I got a medium.

links_reviews_title: cute but size down...it was too large for me so i was forced to wear under cardigan or jacket
links_reviews_text: pretty animal print! love the ruffled collar

links_reviews_title: Have ordered for everyday wear - upcoming weekend escapes. Will look great with jeans/black pants.
links_reviews_text: True to size, though it you want it to look like it does on the model, suggest going up one size.

links_reviews_title: Very cute and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: Easy
Conservative enough for the office but the print makes it fun enough for a night out with friends.

links_reviews_title: The cutest top. Will rent again.
links_reviews_text: I love this top. One of my favorites

links_reviews_title: Nice simple but stylish blouse for work.
links_reviews_text: Nice blouse for work.
Fit is great but color not what I expected. Had a blush undertone to the grey

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear it to an event-- just to work. I felt very cute and trendy!
links_reviews_text: I work in a relatively casual workplace, so this was perfect to pair with dark jeans, boots, and a sweater for a chilly day. Would definitely consider renting again. I love that it's trendy animal print, but it doesn't feel too out-there. And the fabric is beautiful. Fun to tuck into jeans, and if you're going out for drinks after work, it's easy to undo some of the buttons to make it more casual. Great top!
Easy leopard top to add a hint of animal print
Very cute and versatile.
Comfortable fit, subtle leopard that's versatile for date night or the office.

links_reviews_title: Cute blouse that pairs well with a blazer.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit, cute style. Loved it!
looks good with black or camel
This is a beautiful blouse - I will be sad to let it go! Contemplating buying it - but it is a little $$ Love the neckline.... lightweight - perfect.
Fits true to size
Nice color and can keep you warm in 40/high 30s. It is pretty cropped but that's the style.

I got so many compliments on the color of this coat and loved the cropped style! I wished it had a hood for Chicago wind and cold. It also ran way big- I was swimming in it and it made me look much bigger than I am. I usually buy coats big to layer, but no need with this one- it leaves plenty of room!

I had this jacket for when I went out and didn't want to take my massive puffy coat. It kept me warm and it was lightweight. If you like in a cold climate then this wouldn't work for your everyday wear.

So warm, for 45-ish degree weather. It looks a lot cooler on more fashion forward than in the picture. It has a boxy cut and the neck part is really flattering while also keeping you warm. The color is very wearable while out of the ordinary. Easy to pair with any jeans/pants/leggings. It even has a pocket inside and a little hole to pull your earbuds through!
Loved the color of this jacket. It is slightly cropped and oversized. I wore it to and from the gym everyday.
Cute for everyday wear, it's a bit wide, so not great for zipping
I chose the smaller of the size, and I'm glad I did. It is not very long, but it is warm.

It's a cute jacket, but the sleeves were just a little too short and there was a gap between my gloves and the sleeves where my bare arms were v cold. Should have sized up because it's supposed to be an oversized look.

I loveee this. It was so cozy warm and soft and plush. It is pretty cropped which I felt like looked a little silly with how puffy and big everything else is, but still loved throwing it on for a sporty look for weekend errands.

I picked this up at the RTR store in flatiron solely because I was freezing and needed an extra layer. To my surprise, I wore this coat for the next 3 days!! I'm 5'1, so finding a puffer that's more on the cropped side can be really tough. This hit right at my hips. Definitely had some room inside the coat but I don't think it made me look bulky. Material is so soft and color is such a fun statement! Will definitely be renting again!
Loved this coat I will be renting again!

The color and material were cool but this jacket had a super weird fit. Very short and cropped but also way too large. Wouldn't have kept you warm because it was huge in the chest area. I tried a medium and a small and both were massive

Fits great - perfect for a cold day of marathon watching, plenty of room for a sweater or two underneath. Size down, this is an oversized coat and was still roomy sizing down one size. Cropped style so make sure you consider that - makes it a cute sporty look but not warm for your legs.
Absolutely LOVED this leather jacket. The arms were a little tight which limited full range of motion. Loved the length and fit in the body.
Loved this leather coat with denim and dresses. Thick and comfortable.

Loved this - super classic but something a little different from my black leather jacket. One of those things that just ~feels expensive~. Runs super small though so I went up 2 sizes since my arms tend to be long.

I can not say enough about this leather jacket. I've held on to this rental for the last couple weeks to wear to work and out on the weekends. I was able to dress it up and dress it down. Perfect for fall in NYC. Sad to give this one back! Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Butter mixed with a new car
links_reviews_text: That feeling of butter but smells like a new car. I wanted to wear it forever. Sized up-the arms would have been too tight in a 10

As one would expect from IRO, this is a beautifully made leather jacket. The color is stunning and the leather is soft and supple. This jacket is perfect for the Fall months. It does run small so I'd recommend sizing up.
Runs small
The 40 wasn't available so I took a chance and ordered the 38. While I could get it on it was tight in arms and through the chest. Too small all around. It's a beautiful jacket though.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color but way too small
links_reviews_text: Size up two sized on this one. I didn't wear it because it was so tight and it's heavy.

links_reviews_title: Wish it wasn't a bajillion dollars.
links_reviews_text: I'm obsessed with this and wish I could wear it every day for the rest of my life. Can't spring the price tag to buy it but I will likely hang onto this for the rest of winter and into spring. It's thick and substantial but comfortable. The leather is soft and the color is just the right blend of red and brown without being too much of either. A little bulky but I can still layer an overcoat on cold days. Will be so sad when I need to finally return it.

links_reviews_title: Amazing quality but definitely stiff and snug. Size up!
links_reviews_text: You can tell this is a high quality jacket and has such a cool look however it's so thick that it becomes snug and hard to move in. I should've sized up

links_reviews_title: Runs extremely small- order at least 2 sizes up
links_reviews_text: Was really excited for this jacket and in person, it's really beautiful. Sadly I couldn't wear it because it was comically small (ala Tommy Boy fat guy in a little coat scene). Highly recommend ordering up by 2 sizes!

links_reviews_title: Great jacket - versatile with unmatched quality
links_reviews_text: IRO runs smalls, especially through the back and shoulders. I'm 5'2 110 lbs and it was snug, but I have a more athletic upper body. I wore it to work and out at night and loved it. Leather is superior quality and I liked this color as it was something unique.
Seriously, so soft. I'm in love.

links_reviews_title: fabulous jack but runs two sizes too small
links_reviews_text: I rented this to wear casually. when the weather broke I tried to wear it but the size 6 (one size up ) was still really snug
Petite-friendly in that sleeves are perfect. A bit too tight for me but wearable. Probably closer to a size 2 or XS. I'm more like a 4 on top.

Really beautiful leather jacket. I really love the color and the weight of it. It'd be way too heavy for summer but I can see it being perfect for fall/winter. I'm normally around a size 38/40 and I chose a 40, and it was still very tight. I might go up to size 42 or even 44 next time. I ended up not wearing it because it was so tight. Definitely consider sizing up if you have bigger arms/broad shoulders.
These jeans fit well, were comfortable, and versatile. Perfect for everyday wear over the holidays.

These were cool light wash black jeans with little studs, which added a nice detail to my otherwise simple wardrobe. The waist was a little large but the reviews said to go up a size and I recommend doing so! Was able to wear them with a belt, and they fit my thighs nicely.
Loved these. They were a little tight in my waist at first but they stretched out to fit better throughout he day. I would still say size up tho. Thought the silver detail was really cute
They fit perfect and go with everything. I got tons of compliments. Super cute jeans!!!!
Bought these online in a size smaller because I found they stretched/ were too large after wearing just once and the smaller size is perfect.

These pants are so cute and unique! I love the studs and that these jeans weren't too long on my short frame. As other reviews say, they do run small and the waist was tighter than the rest of the jeans. I ordered one size up from what I normally do and they fit pretty well, the waist was a little tight but I didn't have any trouble getting them on.
These pants were a fun and wearable option to rent. I wore them a ton and got lots of compliments. The fit was just average, but the studs were very cool.

LOVE THESE JEANS! I was nervous to rent them since I wasn't sure if the studs would be comfortable or how this brand would run. However they couldn't have been more comfortable and a great fit! True to size, soft and trendy. Would rent again!
Perfect. The second time around I ordered a smaller size because they did stretch a little bit.

links_reviews_title: Fun detail to spice up your everyday look
links_reviews_text: I carry weight in my waist and have skinnier legs- i found these ran a little tight in the waist though they did stretch a bit as the day went on. In the legs they're skinny cut but not super super tight on me- especially at the bottom where they were not quite as tapered around the ankle as a typical skinny jean. At 5'r they hit mid-calf. I loved the wash and will wear them multiple times

links_reviews_title: Slightly tight initially but loosened as I wore them & fit great!

links_reviews_text: As other reviewers have said, these run super small! They don't have any stretch, and are a bit stiff. That being said, they were flattering and fun.

links_reviews_title: loved the detailing on these jeans
links_reviews_text: fit great and good quality. would definitely recommend
Metal studs are through and through so your skin can get cold on cold days

They were really cute and worked well with most tops. I wish I'd gone up a size because they were a bit tight and had no stretch at all. Loved the detailing on the jeans but the buttons were so cold in the winter. Overall they were cute but I don't think I would rent again

So bummed about this one, it's fantastic looking in person but there's very little stretch right out of the plastic and I couldn't even zip it. It seems like these pants do stretch with wear but I couldn't even get that far.

These pants were so cute I wish they would have worked for me. The material has good stretch, and I loved the studs. BUT they are definitely a cropped fit...I'm 5'9" and any type of cropped pant just ends up looking like a capri so they did not work out.
These jeans were cute, but I couldn't even get them over my hips.
I would have kept them forever if I could. They fit great and have the great details that make them unique.
I was super excited about these, however I found them not to be true to size. I am typically a true 27, however I could not even attempt to zip them. A shame because they are super cute!

links_reviews_title: Ordered these to fit as my pregnant belly started to grow. Cute, stylish, tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Ordered a few sizes larger than my normal size for my growing pregnant belly. These lasted me a couple months. Good loose fit in the leg.
Loved these! Studs provide a fun alternative to basic grey/black jeans. Tighter at the waist, more of a boyfriend fit through the leg. Would suggest sizing up.

Super comfortable Jean that makes your legs look tiny. They seem a bit snug and stiff at first but after sitting in them for about five minutes they are perfect. I didn't want to take them off! The studs give them an edgy vibe that you can pair with a pretty sweater and heels for a more glam look, or pair with flannel, booties and a leather jacket for an everyday street style vibe.
Wore these for a casual night out and was comfy and felt cute. Ordered two sizes up after reading other reviews and these fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Cool pants, but underwhelming on curves
links_reviews_text: I love the studs, the high rise and the ankle crop on these pants. I ordered a size 27 because that's my usual size. I could not sit down and breathe at the same time. I wore them a for a bit hoping they would stretch out, but they didn't. I went up two sizes and found they were a little big in the waist but tight in the butt, which flattened it and boxed out my waist line a little. And then they bagged out in the legs, butt and waist. I wore thermals and tucked in sweaters so make these pants look like i wanted them so relaxed. I liked them styled that way, but I'd never want to own these.

links_reviews_title: Could be cute but odd fit.
links_reviews_text: Runs a full size too small. I am normally a 25 but could barely button them. If I were to size up though, they'd be big everywhere except the waist. These would fit an hourglass figure best, with larger hips and small waist.
I am between a size 10 or 12, size 32 fits snug, jeans did not loose shape after wearing. Will keep for a while or purchase.
Usually a 27, got a 29!

Cute pants but oddly cut. The waistband was really small, which you can see in the product photos. I usually wear 28s in Joie jeans, so I sized up to a 29 and they were still too small. Non-stretch denim. The studs were quite cold when I put them on--better for warmer weather!

Such a cute dressier but still casual pair of denim. I usually wear a 27-29 in denim. These were just a touch too snug for my liking so I didn't wear them. Will rent again in a bigger size because I'm truly obsessed.
Very cute, runs a little small in the waist & doesn't have much stretch.
I paired these with a black oversized blazer for a casual professional work look. The pants were fine but absolutely no give and just very underwhelming

These pants are way too tight around the waist. I wear a 25 in nearly every brand, and I had trouble pulling these up this morning. I finally got them up and decided to wear them to work, but I couldn't sit with them button and zipped without being extremely uncomfortable. Luckily no one can see my bottom half at work because I had to unbutton and unzip them to breathe.

I loved these jeans! Based on the other reviews, I ordered a size up. They were perfect. The high rise is perfect and very flattering. The studs are subtle, but fun even that my friends complimented me. I need these in my closet forever.

The half bead detail on the front of the grey tone jeans made for a dressy -casual look I wore several times. My challenge was that I barely fit into the 32 so if a 32W was available I would have enjoyed them even more
I would size up. A little tight and i'm always a 28 and definitely needed a 29.
I got tons of compliments every time I wore these! They have a great, high-waisted fit and unique stud details on the front. Loved!
Very high waist, but overall cute jeans!
I got so many compliments on these beautiful jeans. I would def rent again

links_reviews_title: Cute jeans, but a little tight around the butt area
links_reviews_text: Loves the look of the jeans, tight around thighs but then looser around calf area. That being said I am definitely an athletic build, so might be different on someone else, but I would say that the leg and butt area does run slim

Good fit. I'm about 5'6 and perfect length with 3 inch heels. You have to shrug the romper off to no to the bathroom because it only opens via buttons up-the-front, but it was not super difficult. Def worth a try!

Compliments all day, this was very comfortable and classy - easy to dress up or down. It ran a little long - I'm 5'5" and with heels it still brushed the ground. If I'd had more time I would've tacked it up. Regardless, I felt gorgeous and moved around easily in it, would def rent again.
Vacation winner! I did have to wear sky high wedges to keep it from dragging, but it was so comfy and so very chic for a tropical vacation. It had a nice flow for hot humid weather. And... pockets!!!
Super comfortable, well made, fun jumpsuit! Not too long in the leg (I'm 5'5"). I belted it to make the waist stand out a bit more. Definitely rent this piece!

links_reviews_title: Like wearing chic PJ's to work !
links_reviews_text: #Lovethisjumpsuit#comfychic Only issue that was my fault ... I should have listened to the reviews and ordered a XS - but the small is still super cute on! You can adjust the waist with the tie… And dress it up or dress it down I paired it with bright yellow heels and a yellow Kate Spade bucket bag- I got compliments all day. It was so comfortable it was like wearing pajamas!!! I would definitely rent this if you aren't sure - Go for it!
I would have loved to have worn this, but I would need to be about 6 inches taller. Not even heels could solve how long it was! It was super cute & comfy, but way too big!
Super easy to wear with heels. The pattern is eye catching and I got lots of compliments. It runs super long but with heels it was fine, without heels it would've been dragging on the ground.

This is the first piece I have kept from rent the runway. When I say perfect, I mean perfect. I've worn it to work, church, brunch, dates, you name it. It's super flattering, cool and comfortable in the heat, it looks great with wedge sandals or heels, and it's perfect for travel. Unrolls with no wrinkles and it's easy to hand wash. 10/10 bought it with no regrets.
This was a little long on me, JUST workable with a platform sandal. The fabric and pattern were so dreamy and I got a TON of compliments!

Really loved this look. It was easy to do desk to dinner with this jumpsuit. It was a little big in the chest, so I needed to pin it or wear a tank under. Other than that, really loved the fit and look

links_reviews_title: Awesome fit, comfy, and flattering. I would buy it if I could!
links_reviews_text: As with any jumpsuit it was a lot of effort getting it on/off to go to the bathroom. But it was really comfortable and flattering--totally worth it.

links_reviews_title: You won't be able to pee all day, but it's worth it!
links_reviews_text: Super hard to get on and off given that it's a jumpsuit, but it's very cute and flattering. The colors really pop against the black and I got loads of compliments.
I wore this to a color themed party but enjoyed it so much I wore it to work too! Comfy but nice lines with great bright color pops. Long enough for me at 5'11"

I wore this for my work's benefit fundraiser that I ran. It looked great and unique, and I got lots of compliments! My only complaint is that it does run s little big in the waist and bust, I o definitely needed heels. Otherwise it was super comfortable and I especially loved the pockets.

I got tons of compliments on this! I loved the look and it was super comfy. The only reason it's not getting five stars is the top does not stretch so taking it on and off was a CHORE every time. Also no pockets!!!

I wore this twice - once to work as pictured with a sweater and once as a romper to a rehearsal dinner. You can dress up or down...looked great with heals and white sneakers. The colors of the pattern are also really bright in person. It has pockets too ;)
Everything about this jumpsuit was effortless! It's colorful and fun and I got a ton of compliments on it. I wore a blazer over it for work for another type of look.
Nice and lightweight, perfect for a resort party.

While the fit looked fine and I wore the medium, I think a small would have been a little better for me. Got a bunch of compliments. Colors are nice and bright against the black. Great spring transition outfit and for summer. Definitely more casual in my opinion but could be dressed up more with a nicer shoe.
Rented for a local fashion event. Wore the XL so it would flow better. The L fit just wasn't as comfortable. Received a lot of compliments and loved the pops of color. Definitely recommend renting!

Pro. Great print and perfect fabric for hot weather Con. Really hard to get on and off because so few bottons up top. You have to get creative to get your arms out/in, especially when going to the bathroom
Comfortable. Runs large so seemed bulky. I recommend layering for curvy figures.

I really like the style of this jumpsuit. It was comfortable, flattering and ideal for a warm day. The only quibble I had is that it's difficult to take off. If there were one more button at the bottom of the placket in the front, it would be so much easier to maneuver down over the shoulders and arms.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a casual dinner with family, perfect for TX in March.
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is incredibly versatile. I wore it to a casual dinner but with different shoes, it can go just about anywhere. The material was lightweight and moves well. I will be keeping this one in rotation. Its one of the most favorite things I have worn. Felt like PJs.

links_reviews_title: So fun, but pain in neck to get in and out of
Runs a little small in the tummy if you're apple shaped
links_reviews_text: But sizing up does the trick! Very long though. Had at least 4 inches underneath my feet.
Lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Colorful for Florida and Comfy for a 5 star dinner.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to dinner at Victoria & Albert's (Walt Disney World 5 star restaurant). It was perfect. Comfy enough to sit through a 3 hour dinner with room to grow and pretty enough to feel romantic.
length is a little long
I sized up and shouldn't have so I didn't actually wear it. Fabric and pattern was just okay.
I say true to size since I rented the 1XP and it was too big. The color is beautiful and the fabric is perfect for warm weather

I really enjoyed this jumper. In fact I bought it!! It's VERY long. Even with high wedges it's too long for me. I purchased it and had it altered. Runs large so I thought the small was perfect for me.

I rented this for a 5SOS and The Chainsmokers Concert and it was perfect. Fit great throughout the hips and I wore a regular bra. The length was great, wore with some 1.5inch shoes. It also has pockets, which is always a plus for me! Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: It's pretty. It's low cut, so I'd suggest wearing a tank underneath.
links_reviews_text: It's beautiful, flowy, true to size, wears well throughout the day. I def don't have any complaints.
easy

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit is fun and it works great for a late summer night out. The fabric is lightweight.
links_reviews_text: I thought the fit was great-but difficult to get in & out for bathroom breaks!
Loved this! Got a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this one!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and not too long even with flats for 5'3" me!

links_reviews_title: Flattering jumpsuit with ties on the waist that can be gathered to tighten
links_reviews_text: Fun print on a black base jumpsuit, deep cleavage so you may want to wear a bandeau under it. This also helped with deep cut arms. Nice length that allowed me to wear 2 inc heels. Loved the tie on the waist as it covered any stomach bulges while giving a flattering look.

links_reviews_title: Should've bought it when I had it!
links_reviews_text: Such a perfect staple piece that elevates almost any outfit!! Definitely not meant to keep you warm but does add flare to an outfit.

I paired this with the slip dress and some tan booties. I was struggling to find another way to wear just the cardigan without the dress and couldn't. I really think it works best as a set. Wrinkles easily, which is unfortunate but still very pretty and comfy. I sized down in the cardigan to an XS
It was interesting. I'm tall so it worked well. I wore it with long scarfs, it was pretty easy to match. I felt like I had to wear a scarf because without it, the satin made it feel like a bathrobe.
Super comfortable and a gorgeous navy color. Dressed up basic jeans or could be worn over a dress for a nice event.

links_reviews_title: The material looked too much like a bathrobe to me. Did not wear.
links_reviews_text: The material looked too much like a bathrobe to me. Did not wear.
So chic and fashionable

This was super elegant and luxurious. I was worried it would look like a robe, but it didn't. Considering my height and frame, it fit well and did not scrape the ground. It would probably look even better son someone taller. I wanted to keep this one.

links_reviews_title: This solved so many problems at once! Weddings are cold then hot then cold
links_reviews_text: Worn as a coat over a sleeveless navy dress, I felt so comfortable and still very dressy. I want one of these in every color

links_reviews_title: I hate shopping! Love it that I found something can make it easier!
links_reviews_text: Love this skirt! It is stretchy I could have went a size down. Want to buy it! Very comfortable and I needed comfortable bc I had to wear it all day!

I rented this for work. It's thick fabric and more forgiving than a typical pencil skirt on my shape. It is VERY long in my 5'4". See my hand in the photo? That's where the waistband is (so like 2-3" under my bra band). Overall it's cute and I still wore it for the day!

links_reviews_title: The best work power suit you'll ever need
links_reviews_text: Wore this for an incredibly important work presentation/meeting and it was AMAZING. Super comfortable and thick fabric, easy to wear and move in, long sleeves, and killer design. Received many many compliments, and I felt like a million bucks. If it wasn't so $$$$$$$, I would have bought it. The back stripe detail on the skirt also adds awesome design detail. Rent this, you won't regret it. One note: I'm tall and the skirt came to below my knees. It might be too long for some...
Great skirt but very long. I'm 5'8" and it hit me mid to low calf.
So many compliments. So comfortable, but far too expensive to keep. Will rent again
Not a wow piece for me, but fit well and was high quality.
Fit is pretty true to size. I did feel like it was a little long and would be better for someone taller. Material is thick and ribbed but not really the type that sucks you in.
An hourglass figure's dream skirt! True to size and beautiful. This skirt can be styled in so many different ways.
Very comfortable
Super rental and very flattering. The black and white pattern is subtle but stylish. The material is heavy enough hide any bulges or panty lines. I loved it!
Incredibly sexy and fitted! Has a good stretch for the legs
Thick and stretchy material. Wish I could of size down, but still cute on. Can be worn so many ways. Dressy to casual. Love the color. Thick enough for cold weather.

links_reviews_title: Classy skirt for a work meeting
links_reviews_text: If you are between sizes, I'd size up, though this skirt is stretchy and therefore a bit forgiving. Armani does not bother with vanity sizing, so keep that in mind. This skirt is super cool and polished. Wore it with a black crepe top for a business meeting and got lots of compliments in the office. Keep in mind that it is a pencil silhouette and a midi length, and therefore you are a bit constrained when walking. Give yourself extra time if you have to walk somewhere!

Lovvvvve this bag. The adjustable strap allows you to wear the bag in a variety of ways. The color is bold and sleek and kinda shiny. You can't fit a ton in the bag but it has room for all the essentials. I would definitely recommend this bag to a friend!

Wow wow wow I love this purse. It is sleek and fun. Easy to get in and out of. Fits more than you'd think with my keys, wallet, phone, and lipstick fitting nicely. The strap is ideal as a cross body since it's so thick I may have to buy this one!
It went with every outfit, just a little limited on space inside
Needed a casual bag and this was great. Came looking brand new.
Cute bag but difficult to dress up due to the logo strap

This is my second Marc jacobs snapshot bag. It's the perfect size and fits all my essentials, phone, keys, wallet, some lipstick and not much else. This all black one is a little more casual than some of the other more mod colors and patterns.
You can keep the skirt casual or dress it up. Perfect length, true to size, and very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Not too casual with a right combination
links_reviews_text: I thought the skirt might be too casual for work but turned out nice with a black sweater and knee-high boots. Really liked it and got compliments. Normally size zero is not tight for me but this one was right fit which tells it's a bit smaller than what it should be
Definitely didn't fit how I wanted but was still wearable. I would definitely get a 2 next time

I'm not a big skirt Weser but I really liked this one. There's a little extra fabric by the belly but it was flattering from most angles. I probably would have been fine in the 10 but ordered the 12 to be safe and it worked well - I had a little room. I got a lot of compliments at work for it. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Wore on date night and to work!
links_reviews_text: Wore this with high boots for a date night and then again for work with black tights and booties.

Wore this skirt with the Ralph Lauren Bear sweater to Thanksgiving dinner. Loved the material it was thick but not scratchy at all. It fit perfectly and was a great length to be short but not too short.
Good skirt for Fall. Cute and flirty. I couldn't wear as I currently need a size up, which wasn't available at the time I ordered, but I would say TTS.

This skirt is cute and perfect for fall. I ended up wearing it with a long sweater that hit right at the ruffles, so it was cute and I wore it all day. However, the way the seam is sewn for the first set of ruffles made me look like I had a bigger belly. Not the most flattering!
Fit was perfect when I sized up, had a little stretch that was nice for everyday wear. Length was perfect for my height (5'2"). Great fabric and look for Fall.

The hemline of this skirt is really flattering on legs. Although it creates a little puckering around your lower stomach, I still felt it was relatively flattering. Received a lot of compliments and was very comfortable for a day at work.
No complaints! Cute skirt for everyday wear. Comfortable and true to size.

Loved this skirt! Fit perfectly true to size. Wore with brogues and bare legs, but would definitely rent again when it's colder and pair with tights and booties or taller boots. Added a headband for some Blair Waldorf feels and a leather jacket for a touch of Serena ;)
Fits perfectly, love the built in slip, great fit and material
This skirt is perfect! Joie is such quality. I'm a true size 4 but this ran a little big at the waist. Maybe size down if you want to wear high waisted and not at the hips

links_reviews_title: Great skirt. Perfect fit and style.
links_reviews_text: I felt wonderful in this skirt. I wore it with a fitted black top, black tights and black ankle boots. It was just the right length. I received many compliments at work.

links_reviews_title: Adorable but too short for work
links_reviews_text: This definitely had a conservative look and was the perfect material for winter but was a little too short to wear to work.
I wore this to work and felt great! It might be a bit short for some to feel comfortable wearing to work, but I loved it. Fit great, and was very flattering.

The skirt runs a little large, I would recommend renting a size down. The skirt pairs pretty well with a fitted shirt (I paired it with a black turtle neck). There is some weird bunching in the font of the skirt where the frills are and an odd seam that cuts across the mid-section. But overall, I thought it was a cute skirt that was very work appropriate.
I rented this for my teenage daughter for Thanksgiving dinner out. It was very flattering on her and looked just like the photo. I paired with a black sweater and it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Cute skirt, good for work and fall style
links_reviews_text: The front was super baggy, lots of excess fabric. Would have been so cute if it fit better
A little short for work and the waist seemed to run a little small in my opinion. Super cute though and the wrap doesn't ride up in the front.

links_reviews_title: wore to work into after work activities
links_reviews_text: it's a little bulky but its cute, would rent again

I usually am size 8/10 so the 12 felt baggy, but with a camisole under to keep neckline from being too low I made it work. Not a huge fan of the tight wrists on sleeves, but as others hv said winter weight textile great for cold weather and gathered waist extremely forgiving.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress. No photo as event I was going to wear it to was canceled.
links_reviews_text: Love this dress. No photo as event I was going to wear it to was canceled.

links_reviews_title: I got a lot of compliments on how I looked the day I work this dress.
links_reviews_text: Run a bit large but that made me feel good. I wore a size 12 which is normal but I think I could have gone down a size, perhaps.
Winter work dress
Perfect dress. Winter-weight and texture. Just lovely!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a work event.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit and easy to zip up on my own.

links_reviews_title: Fit my body like a glove
links_reviews_text: I really found this dress to be figure flattering, particularly if you have a problem tummy area. It fit very n nicely. It is definitely low cut and unless you are going out to a club you will need a cami under it. The only issue I had is that it was too long on my petite frame. It came well below my knee. It would be perfect I suspect in length for average height ladies.

This dress fit TTS and was perfect for work! The fabric is warm, so great for colder temperatures. Sleeves, neckline and ruching were all really flattering for my hourglass shape. Neckline was perfect for a statement necklace, but I did have to pin the neckline so it was work appropriate (I have a large bust). Received many compliments and will absolutely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Wish the metallic thread were more pronounced. It lacked the "special" aspect I thought it had.
links_reviews_text: Very pretty conservative dress. Lacked to bling I wanted for New Year's Eve.
The dress is a great winter outfit that is comfortable, flattering and classy.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! I wore to a work Christmas dinner.
links_reviews_text: I fit into the size 0 and I am normally a size 2. It was professional, but also sexy and I loved the fit! The sleeves were really pretty. The dress was a little long on me because I am only 5'2", but the length worked out anyway.

links_reviews_title: Not really metallic and runs large
links_reviews_text: I would call this fabric grey rather than metallic. It fits fine but runs a size large. I'm between a 4 and 6, wore a 4 and honestly probably could have fit the 2. It was a fine work dress.

I'm between size 12 and 14 so opted for 14. Top is on the verge of being slightly low for work but 12 may have been too snug. This dress hides what I want to minimize and looks great. It is a heavier fabric which is nice for winter.

This was a ‘get myself out of my comfort zone’ rental (I think that bulky sleeves can add weight) but it worked out great. It’s sophisticated and great for curves. Got lots of compliments. Just a word of advice: you WILL need a safety pin to make it work appropriate, especially if you have a larger bust.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit. Gathers at the waist are very complimentary.
links_reviews_text: The dress was a close fit. The sleeves are a little short, if you have longer arms. It is lined and was great for the cooler weather in my area this week!

Perfect fit. I can never find a dress small enough in the waist and chest that still fits my shoulders, but this was it. Not as sparkly as other reviews make it seem so it wasn't out of place at a day time event. It will also make a cute holiday dress though. My boyfriend loved it so much he want to buy it in multiple colors/patterns. One of my favorite rentals and now one of my favorite dresses in my closet. P.S. I have long arms and torso so it would be a nice option for tall ladies too.

I would say it runs just a tad bit small. I am usually a 10-12... ordered an XL and everything fit well except the sleeves to me were a tad bit short. Overall well made dress! Very chic and it has metallic finish that looks gorgeous in person.

I thought I would be able to wear this to work but the silver thread made it too dressy for my office. Wore it on Christmas Eve to church. I think it's hard for pear shapes to wear a drop waist but I liked this one.

links_reviews_title: Love the cute plaid dress, very fit cut
links_reviews_text: Love the dress! It fits super well, very flattering. The only part is that it's on the short side, so it makes me a bit self conscious about the length of the dress. Need to be careful due to its length.

This dress was sooooooo cute. So much sparkle in it that you can't make out it a picture. I'm a true 6 and the medium fit perfectly. So I might say it runs a tad bit small. I want to go to more Christmas parties just to wear this!
Very cute. Great material and quality. I received many compliments while wearing. A tad short for work.
I love anything plaid but I usually stay away from a drop waist. This dress was actually really flattering and comfortable.

So this dress fit like a glove. I'm between a M and L and L was prefect. A bit short in the back so I'd probably wear with leggings. However it looks very festive and has a ton of sparkles on it. I definitely will be renting for a holiday party because it's high neck yet still sexy which (for me) is something i love! Just know it's definitely a winter look :)

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but short and rides up. Not work appropriate.
links_reviews_text: Runs mid thigh and constantly keeps riding up. Cannot move comfortably without the back exposing to much of the thighs. Fabric has little to no stretch. Shiny silver plaid. May be cute for holidays with tights but too short for work.
I got the size I normally wear in dresses and it wouldn't even zip up. Had to return and swap it.

I absolutely adored this dress. I wore this to work with black tights and studded ankle booties. This has silver threading throughout the dress to give it a subtle sparkle. I had so much fun wearing this dress to work, would absolutely, no doubt rent this again
