I got this to wear casually and really liked it, but then the weather turned and it wasn't warm enough. I'm often chilly and need more warmth

links_reviews_title: Felt warm and fashionable in Berlin in October.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and fashion forward.
runs large

links_reviews_title: Loved it enough to buy it!
links_reviews_text: This was my big splurge last winter and I have loved it every time I've worn it. Perfect for 50-degree weather. Can layer under it. Love it's edgy look. Long enough to wear with anything in my wardrobe. One of my best purchases ever.
It's large but cute

links_reviews_title: I loved it but friends did not
links_reviews_text: So I thought this jacket looked very cool and I got 1 random compliment from a stranger on it. But my friends said it was not flattering and that it was a strange cut and shape for me. I enjoyed that it had zippable pockets, and the cinched area by the wrists helps to give the jacket definition. It is also super light weight and takes up very little space, despite being really warm. Helpful if you are taking it for travels. I wore it to work once or twice and then returned it.
Perfect fit.

Jacket has a toggle adjustment in the back of the jacket to help with sizing. Unfortunately this does not help it being very long. I chose a size large and felt that even though I could adjest it to my waist it was too long. I'm 5'7" 190 lbs
I couldn't wear it-- it was like 3 sizes too big. Size down at least one size... maybe two. Cute otherwise!

I listened to the reviews that said to size down. I'm normally an XL decided to go with an L but should have gone down to a M. The design of the coat is chic but the size is overpowering. If you're tall (which I am not) you could make it work.
fit true to size- very comfortable and like the look
Awesome coat. Wish I could afford it!

links_reviews_title: Favorite coat & kept it all winter!
links_reviews_text: This coat was a favorite and I kept it for over 3 months wearing it even day. Dress it up or dress it down. Stylish, comfortable, looks very expensive (which it is). A shame to send back but it is spring time now and it had to go back!

links_reviews_title: A little special but not too fancy
links_reviews_text: Love love love this cost. The cuffs are a bit long but not super uncomfortable. The material is like butter. I dressed it up. I dressed it down. It worked for everything and just looks great. It was roomy so i was glad i sized down.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments, but not my favorite
links_reviews_text: The dress had a lot of stretch and was easy to get on and comfortable to wear all day. The pattern is unique and I received a lot of compliments. I found the waist to be too big, and thought the slit in back went up a little high.

This dress was fine, though I didn't love it as much as I wanted to. It ran a little big, and the fabric is really heavy/thick- almost canvas-y. It also kept riding up in the front, but probably because I was wearing tights. Loved the print though and wore it under a black blazer.
Sturdy material with lots of stretch
This was a great work dress. Thick/sturdy material. A little snug, but a blazer over the dress worked perfectly.
This dress has nice lines and a denim-like weight and texture with some stretch. Versatile.
Absolutely love this dress! It has some stretch to it so it's super comfortable and flattering. I'm tall, but it was still an appropriate length for work.
The title says it all.

I absolutely love this dress. It fit me perfectly. The fabric is thick with a little bit of stretch which is my preference for sheath dresses. Length hit at the top of my knee which is perfect for me. I'm a professor and this dress will be great for teaching in with a black blazer.

links_reviews_title: Super flattering, but maybe a little tight for the office
links_reviews_text: This dress was very flattering - material is stretchy, but has a good amount of structure. I wish I could come up with a better idea for where to wear it... it's more office-y than I'd wear outside of work, but felt a little too form fitting for the office. I'm usually S in DVF, and I think if I went up to M here it would be too long and roomy in the waist. If I can think of a reason to wear it, I'd rent again.
fit was true to size and material was comfortably thick

I absolutely loved the way this dress fit. It definitely hugged my curves but still felt very classy because of the higher neckline. Super fun print that I decided to go bold with and use a hot pink necklace and lipstick. The material wasn't the nicest I've ever felt, but overall this was a perfect Memorial Day weekend wedding guest dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect work dress! I typically wear a size 6 and this dress fit perfectly
links_reviews_text: Great quality

I rented this for a work meeting that called for something a notch up from our usual fairly casual environment. I'm 5'9'' 145 and the medium fit perfectly --- which, to me, means it runs true to size for most clothes and runs a little bigger than most DVF (where I often need a L / 10). The cut was flattering and I found the dress held its shape perfectly throughout the day. I would definitely rent again.
Fit was a dream and was very flattering. It was form fitting with being clingy.
Perfect fit, structured fabric, eye catching print, got so many compliments
I loved this dress! The pattern is fun and the dress is light enough for spring. It's well structured so it sits nicely and is very flattering.
Fits slightly large--I typically wear a 4 and this was the XS and I still had a bit of hip room. Great length for work, material is heavy cotton so wrinkles but maintains shape.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress, if you are between sizes go with the smaller size.
links_reviews_text: Dress stretches out throughout the day
Super cute work dress. Wore with red heels and a blazer.

Glad I sized down to the S because it fit like a glove without being too tight for the office! I usually wear M, size 4 (small top and bigger booty) and the S fit well! Be aware it's a cotton stretchy denim like fabric so you could dress it up or down with sneakers/sandals.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress and great to make the workplace a bit more fun.
links_reviews_text: Fit was good and dress was flattering.

links_reviews_title: Stunning Dress, comfortable and stylish fit.
links_reviews_text: Really enjoyed this dress. I'm between sizes currently as I had a baby earlier this year and am slowly working my way down to my usual size. I found this dress ran a little large. I would equate an XL to about a size 16. The material has a fair amount of stretch (and yet is stiffer) so you have some movement. Overall the black and white contrasted nicely and you can dress it up with a jacket and some jewelry or let it live on it's own. Love it.
It was a little stiff but I absolutely love the feel of the dress. Will definitely rent again with the thought of purchasing. But perhaps downsizing (my preferences but not needed really)
Dress was a bit stiffer then I thought. Flattering fit. Perfect for the office.
Wore with blazer for work. Nice dress.
This dress was a great piece for work but a bit form-fitting. I wore it with a black blazer and felt very chic and professional.

I feel like DVF usually fits pretty true to size, but this medium was super tight. I could zip it up no problem because the material has stretch, but it was way too tight for me to feel comfortable at work. I'm also 5'9", so it was tight AND short. Maybe would work if you're shorter and don't have the tight and short combo going.
Fit was true to size and a fun way to dress things up at the office! Would have been really cute with a bright, chunky necklace.
Runs true to size. And got two compliments at work and was told to buy the dress once I explained it was a rental.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and flattering fit, but it stretches and loses shape after a while
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress of good quality. It's nice for the summer, and with a blazer it could work in the fall. However, it stretches (especially in midsection) which causes the fit to deteriorate as the day goes on.

links_reviews_title: Canvas type material that is comfortable to wear
links_reviews_text: This dress is comfortable to wear. It is less dressy than I thought it would be for this designer. It is work appropriate, but wouldn't transition well for me to a dressier after work dinner. My cardigan left some black fuzz on the dress too.
I thought that this dress ran a little big. I think that i could have actually fit into the small. But it was a fun work dress. I got a compliment in the elevator from a stranger!
True to fit and classic.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear this too fitted
links_reviews_text: Too fitted for me

Cute dress, but I rented it for work and I don't think it's a really work-appropriate fabric. It's basically cotton chino fabric. Maybe OK for Friday casual. I covered it up with a blazer to disguise how casual it is.

I just don't think this dress was made for someone with my height. It was tight almost around my neck, and hugged my hips a bit too much while being super loose around my waist. I couldn't wear it because I would have been tugging at it all day.

links_reviews_title: Material is kind of like denim
links_reviews_text: The material was like a denim and pretty stiff. I liked the dress for a casual work day but I thought it would be a nicer fabric.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but gave me a cow complex
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress but worried it screamed "cow." As soon as I got to work my favorite co-worker said, "Oh, look at your cute cow dress" and it was confirmed. I'm not sure I want to wear it again, but it was comfy.
Pro's: Conservative design, dramatic print. Con's: Didn't realize this was a jean dress. The fabric was stretchy - which some women would be preferred, not me. Pro's: light weight.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Boss Babe dress! High quality!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit! Length was office appropriate and I could move it in without pulling it down or any bunching. Great basic shape with a fashion print. Fabric has some stretch for movement but has structure and thickness too it.

I really liked this sweater- it was warm and very soft. Overall, it ran short and tight, so i would recommend sizing up unless you like your sweaters to hit at your waist. The disappointment was that the sweater (which i believe was fairly new when i received it) had a horrible pulling problem (see picture). After just 1 wear it looked like crap and i did not want to wear again. Unfortunate because everything else about the sweater was great.

I think wool always tends to run small and itchy but this was not itchy, although I thought it ran small since the XL fit me great. I may could've worn a L but I wasn't going to risk it. I received compliments even from guys. Good for work or the weekend. Comfortable and was not itchy to me.
Comfy, cute sweater! It's meant to be loose. Fabric is soft but does shed a bit (got a few fuzzies in my eye from time to time). Great everyday sweater!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, thick sweater - so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I loved this chunky knit sweater! It's beautifully made and the colors are stunning. Spring is on the way or I would have rented it again. I usually wear a small, but from the photo, I thought this was designed to be a loose-fitting sweater. It's not - and if I rent it again, I'll rent a size small. It did arrive with a lot of pilling. I used a pill remover and it looked new again. I'm already sad that I sent this sweater back, it's so beautiful!

This sweater was just ok on me. It's really short, which seems to be a theme with RTR sweaters. It was also extremely itchy- I had to wear a long sleeved tissue turtleneck underneath it because I couldn't stand it.

links_reviews_title: Warm and cozy, sheds a lot
links_reviews_text: This sweater is made of alpaca and is nice and thick and warm. I would wear a shirt under it so you can easily take it off, because a few times I got uncomfortably warm while wearing it inside. It also sheds easily.

Very fuzzy, very thick. Soft, but prone to itchiness too. Really good casual option - I didn't have the opportunity to style it with a skirt or dress so not sure how well that would have worked. Fit was true to size - it was roomy (a straight fit through the body) without being oversized.
This sweater looks better in person and was nice quality and super cozy. Will definitely rent again!

I really liked this sweater. I wore it 4-5 times. It's very warm but it was perfect for the little California cold spell we had. Some reviews said it was itchy but I found it to be quite comfortable. It pilled a little but the pills were easy to pull off. It's very thick so it is not a piece you would layer under a jacket unless it was a very loose one.

links_reviews_title: It shreds a lot but beautiful colors!
links_reviews_text: It shreds quite a bit! I would have preferred if it was less cropped but the colors were beautiful. Ideal for a casual look on a very cold day.
Got so many compliments on this sweater. Cozy and SO WARM. This is a thick wool so you're guaranteed to be cozy.

I am used to sweaters that are a bit roomier but this is a more fitted style. It worked well as I am short, but this may be dropped on someone taller. Definitely a little itchy. Would recommend a base layer under.
Perfectly fluffy and slightly oversized. Very warm! Beautiful colors. Sleeves were a little long but stay up from the cuffs. Only real downside is the fuzz that comes along with it.
Perfect for southern ca ski vacation. Cute and cozy. Lots of compliments

Wore for apres ski. I probably could have sized down to XS as it was a little big in the shoulder and arms but it does run a little short in the torso so I was happier with the baggier S. Very warm so great for winter activities.
Size up. I have a longer torso and the length was cropped with a size small.
I really loved the style of this sweater and the shape was flattering, but it was too itchy to wear. Even with a camisole underneath, I had to take it off!
I thought it was going to be a bit longer, but that's the only reason I gave it 4 stars. Cute on!
Cute and flattering. Very soft. Also can get very hot very fast.
Wasn't bad at first but couldn't wait to take it off at the end of the day. Pretty looking but I wouldn't wear again
True to size. Good fit.
quite thick and tends to shed on clothing
This is one of the warmest sweaters I have ever worn. It was perfect for house-hunting in VT this winter. The colors are bright and have a vintage feel. It is cozy and not too itchy.

links_reviews_title: Cute, comfortable sweater, great for the cold winter months.
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear, fits like it should and comfortable

links_reviews_title: tight around neck, but liked this sweater
links_reviews_text: tight around neck

links_reviews_title: Too itchy for me to wear.
links_reviews_text: Not good if you have sensitive skin, if not, this would be a great sweater! Size up if you are looking for an over sized feel.

Love the feel, weight and look of this sweater. It's the one you want to put on when it's chilly outside! Like other have said, it runs very short. I would have prefered the M but could only get a small. It's not as short as a crop-length, but you will definitely show some skin when you lift your arms. The wool is mostly soft and very warm, with just a little sense of scratchiness. Like maybe wear a t-shirt underneath instead of a tank top. Great colors.

links_reviews_title: Too heavy, not flattering at all.
links_reviews_text: This sweater was awkward. The material is VERY heavy, and the fit was strange- nothing like how it looked on the model. I did not end up wearing this.

Super cute with jeans for weekend or black pants for the office. Love the bold stripes, but wish I would have ordered a Small as it was quite boxy. Loved it regardless - lots of compliments on it too.
This sweater is very thick and great for cold weather. I did not end up wearing it because it is more of a cropped sweater and I wanted something a bit longer.
I absolutely love this sweater. Very comfortable, flattering and goes great with jeans or a cute skirt.

I wore this sweater over a long-sleeved bodysuit and black jeans. Spent the evening at a casual evening 4-H/FFA benefit auction and dinner indoors. This sweater would have been the right choice if we'd been outdoors—it was very warm. I don't usually wear such bright colors, but this was fun. I could have gone with an XL and it would have still been oversized.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and cozy- but itchy!
links_reviews_text: I had this sweater in my unlimited plan and got it during the polar vortex. Yay!! Put it on with a reasonably thick base layer shirt (thick Uniqlo heattech long sleeved tee), and set out to enjoy a cozy day in my cold house. Took it off two hours later because I could feel the itchy right thru my tee shirt. Such a shame because I love it- fun colors, long arms, cozy knit. But for me it was just too itchy. I consider my skin usually somewhat sensitive but not overly so. Maybe it's the dry weather?
This sweater is really soft and wasn't itchy at all. The sleeves are super long and a little stretched out, so the didn't gather on me like on the model.
Warm cozy cold weather sweater. Not bulky. Only a little bit of itch.
A little too boxy and short, but I don't mind if it isn't perfect. Very cute and current design. Extremely soft. Excellent quality.

links_reviews_title: So warm and tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: At first I thought this sweater was nothing special. Fit is a little bulky but it's very soft and I was shocked at how many people commented on it. I ended up living in it all weekend long and had a hard time sending it back -- so warm and cozy.
Super cute but a little itchy. Also shed a lot.
I ordered true to size and this was like a crop top on me- no joke, it was at my bellybutton. It was also VERY thick, scratchy and warm. Returning right away and won't get to wear it!
As expected.
Could be a light jacket, but it's an oversized sweater.

links_reviews_title: Great coat for UK fall weather
links_reviews_text: I rented this coat for my trip to the UK and loved it. I originally got the 12 but I was swimming in it so got the 10, and potentially could have gotten the 8. The underarm seam was low so wasn't the best for wearing a backpack or tote, but it was good. Extra fabric kept me warm in 50/55 degree weather
too big
Love it more than I probably should. I'd wear this with everything. I'll likely buy this regardless of the season. Reminds me of a favorite sweatshirt but classier.

This coat is VERY oversized. I am usually an 8-10 in coats but given I wear some oversized sweaters I thought I would get a size larger and ordered a 12. It was falling off of me, so I returned for a size 6 and it was perfect. I highly recommend sizing down 1-2 sizes. It's more like a heavy cardigan style wise given it doesn't button shut, but it's warm for a mildly chilly day (40's-50's). The texture and color of this coat look great as well.

links_reviews_title: Nice casual coat; great for jeans or everyday wear
links_reviews_text: Not too thick; it is not lined and makes it a good lightweight choice.

links_reviews_title: Somehow both comfortable and slouchy while also looking put-together
links_reviews_text: This is a great transition coat. It is not lined and there are no front closures so it is not a winter coat (at least where I live in snowy New England). But it is still warm and a perfect layer on top of anything. Because it is slouchy and over-sized you can put anything under it, including a long cardigan, which I really appreciated. I loved this as a top layer for going to work or just running around. And I loved the color. I wore my usual size and the oversize look worked for me, but I think you could also size down for a slightly less oversized look.

links_reviews_title: The coat is easy for every day or a slightly more dressed up occasion!
links_reviews_text: easy, relaxed fit!

I loved the color and style of this jacket - it is just warm enough and I was hoping the over-sized style would be great for wearing a sweater underneath. I hate when layers start to feel claustrophobic when wearing a more structured style. I could have work three sweaters under this. I could have sized down at least one size, maybe two. But definitely still rent it, just keep that in mind. It's a gorgeous, trendy piece that added some fall color to my typically all black wardrobe.

links_reviews_title: It was a cute casual jacket that got a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: the sleeves are pretty baggy so it just made it hard to navigate doing things while wearing the jacket. It also isn't warm. Wouldn't count on it for warmth, but for cute.

I'm 5'2" and this was unwearable. I looked like a kid in her mother's coat. I love the oversized look on the model, and the fabric was super luxe, but I think you need to be tall to pull it off. I gave it 4 stars instead of lower, because it's a beautiful garment - not its fault that I'm a shortie.
Wore this to work, casually, and to go out - super flattering, easy, and comfortable for all occasions. Love the high quality material and fit. Feels trendy without trying too hard. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Even Tory Burch herself complimented me on my sweater!
links_reviews_text: Heavy warm material, I loved it, so well made and comfy! Perfect for a cold NY day! Tory herself came right up to me and complimented me on how nice it looked!
Wore this in Vail and felt warm and stylish! This sweater runs TTS and is a great material. There's also room to layer under it

This was a lot of fun to style and wear. It gave me a really trendy casual look for work. The material was heavy but not bulky, and really luxurious feeling. I tucked it into the front of my jeans for a more structured look.
Fabric is pretty stiff tight knit and very warm. Runs a bit large and I think XS would've fit me better. But overall look is very chic.

links_reviews_title: i felt so comfortable and elegant
links_reviews_text: high quality
Super cute but way too thick for any season but the winter
I loved the fit and style of this sweater, but it was VERY thick and heavy. Would be perfect for a cold fall day!
sweatshirt
It was stained
This sweater is really thick and well made. It looks crisp and flattering with jeans for everyday or with white or blue pants for work. It's quite stiff, so not as cozy as it looks.
Very heavy fabric. Super comfortable. I probably could have sized down.
Liked. Was comfy and thicker material than I thought it would be
I love this sweater/sweatashirt. It is warm and very comfortable. Perfect for winter.
Cute sweater. Kind of neoprene like feel but super comfortable and an interesting shape. Not the warmest but really fun.
I'm considering buying this one. I love it! It is effortlessly stylish and amazingly comfortable. I can easily go from the office to the lake with this shirt. It's a must rent!

links_reviews_title: This was a cute casual top. I would order a size down. Not flattering...just comfy.
links_reviews_text: Cute - would rent again in smaller size

links_reviews_title: Cute basic off white go to top
links_reviews_text: This low cut short sleeve top is not normally my style (it's a little earthy" ) but I'm always in the market for a great white shirt to pair with jeans or shorts and it's got great reviews This is not white it's a off-white/creamy white but is still great to pair w/anything low cut so depending on where you are going u just wear a cami or sports bra ... it's super comfortable and airy And I got a lot of compliments- keeping for a while!!! ***it's a great basic to have in my closet
Very casual good beach/summer wear item

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and cute. Very casual. I usually wear between small and med and small fit good
links_reviews_text: very casual and cute
Great everyday casual top. V is a little low. Had to wear a cami underneath
Grabbed this for a vacation. Didn't know the serial is pink and orange, but it's minimal. Very comfortable, cloud soft cotton. Textured and so not sheer at all. Would grab again next summer.

links_reviews_title: Simple but nice white shirt that matches with everything and very versatile
links_reviews_text: The concept of the shirt was great - bohemian, comfortable, could match everything. Unfortunately the fit was just meh...and the fabric make it a little too casual for me. I wouldn't rent it again.
I'm 5'6", 150 lbs with a 34C bust. The top fit fine except that it's super low cut and kept showing my bra. Probably could've worn a Small.
This shirt is boxy. The subtle striping is cute.
Way low cut in front because it was really really big. Didn't wear it.
Great fit, cute top super easy to wear!
The material looks very similar to the cloth diapers I use on my babies. I couldn't bring myself to wear it out of the house.
a little low cut but surprisingly not see through and soooo breezy. Survived the DC heat wave w this
Loved this top!! It was a thicker linen material that felt really nice! I wore it multiple times and got so many compliments!
Runs a bit big, but still fit great as an easy wear top with cute cropped pants/jeans. Wonderful for the summer heat.
Great boho comfortable look.

links_reviews_title: Wore this as much as i could
links_reviews_text: I just loved this cute little top and wore it about 4 times.

links_reviews_title: Love this as a white top staple
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, fits loosely which is what I was looking for. Didn't realize it had colored detailing but it didn't take away from it. Will rent again!

I absolutely loved this dress! The material is stretchy but not thin, super comfortable and a definite confidence booster! I wore this to work, the length and neckline is just right for office attire. Would rent again!

This was the perfect choice for Valentine's Day. I wanted something red without it being too bright. It's a beautiful shade and the shape of the dress is quite flattering. Little long for a short girl like me but good fit overall

This is a very form fitting dress but has stretch to it. It's a bit short, I'm 5'4 and it hit just at the knee. In my opinion it ran a bit small. If I were to rent it again I would rent the next size up.
Cute style by the collar wouldn't lay right on me. Also, the fabric sticks to regular tights and gets bunchy. Had to wear with slick panty hose to keep it in place.
LOVE this dress! Very comfortable with lots of stretch. Beautiful color.
Loved the color and fit of this dress. Very comfortable too. Would rent again
Soft, comfortable material. Felt sexy, confident, and classy.

I just noticed that this dress was supposed to have a belt? Oops! I wore it without one and it was cute. The material seems cheaper than other RTR dresses but it looked very cute on air. It's work appropriate with length and how low cut it is. I am a solid size 6 and the medium fit well.
Beautiful dress, great for work, but not too stiff to wear casually
I'm 5'0 and 96lb. This was a great dress for work and fit perfectly. The color was vibrant too.
This was a great dress for a professional photo shoot. The color is great and the fabric lays well. Shows off curves without being revealing.

links_reviews_title: Color, belt, neckline all make it pop!
links_reviews_text: I really adored this dress. I paired it with opaque tights and knee boots for work. I carry my weight in my middle and am about 15 lbs heavier than I like, so spanx were the order of the day. This material was not so forgiving about lines underneath, so undergarments require careful thought.

links_reviews_title: The fit, it was sexy but in a classy way.
links_reviews_text: The material is great and I loved the way that it looked on me. It says it comes with a belt but I didn't receive one, so I just put a skinny brown belt with it and it looked great.

links_reviews_title: This fit perfect and helped me feel professional at my last workshop i led
links_reviews_text: fit is perfect honestly, i would buy it except that it makes my butt look a bit flat (because it is)
Very comfy. Nice professional fit.

links_reviews_title: Love the styling on the model! Sizing was way smaller than expected. Would size up at least one.
links_reviews_text: Runs VERY small.
Beautiful burgundy color. Stretchy, high-quality fabric. I'm normally a 4 or 6, and the small was both too tight and too short.

links_reviews_title: Great color, but not too forgiving. Felt like a body con dress

links_reviews_text: Great option for work, flattering
I didn't wear it - the arms were too tight and the dress was too snug around the hips. Pretty style, though. Looked to be good quality. Recommend getting a size larger.

The color, fit, and style of this dress are amazing. Unfortunately I had to send it back because it was very form-fitting and too small for me. I can usually wear a small/medium, so if you're in between the two like me order a medium. I may order it again in a medium because I do really love it!

links_reviews_title: Just like in the Model pics!
links_reviews_text: Dress arrived new with tags!! It needed to be steamed. Fabric is soft, comfortable and has some stretch. The dress fit me exactly as pictured. The color is a perfect burgundy for Fall. Great basic piece, but not a head turner. Happy to have worn it, but wouldn’t rent again.

links_reviews_title: This dress was wrong just about every which way for me.
links_reviews_text: Too small in hips, too big in shoulder area (i don’t usually have this problem with dresses). It was also a lot brighter than it appears on my screen—fuchsia. And a couple inches above my knee which would not have been appropriate for work.

The colors, pattern, and overall quality of this skirt is great. But, as other reviewers pointed out, it highlights every lump and bump in your lower abdomen! The pattern made my long torso somehow look longer. I had to buy shapewear to confidently wear this piece. It's also a bit too form-fitting to be a good piece for work, but maybe I should have sized up.
Incredibly comfortable skirt with a bold pattern that really stands out. Such a fun outfit to wear and got a lot of great compliments and head turns from this one.
Love the bold colors and sliming lines. The dress was so elegant and comfortable! It was the perfect fit and length. Complements came in all day :)
Loves this skirt even more than I expected. Surprisingly flattering for the style/length. High quality. Easy to wear and a total standout. Tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: "This is the coolest thing anyone has ever worn to work"
links_reviews_text: Said a coworker. And it is. It's super cool. And comfy. And summery. Love.

links_reviews_title: Vibrant skirt for work or play!
links_reviews_text: I really loved how bright and graphic this skirt was! It ran a bit big, in my opinion. I would size down if I rented again. The fabrication is a cool tech fabric that breathes really well and is super comfy. Great for wearing to work all day. I would definitely recommend. Check out all of my rentals on my YouTube Channel. I also talk about RTR tips and tricks. Channel Name: Pointe Boutique

links_reviews_title: Can be dressed up or down
links_reviews_text: Wore this to work and girls night out. Matched it with T-shirts but think it could be dressed up to be more fancy and / or sexy. Loved the light weight materials and color.
Great skirt for work or a the weekend. Relaxed fit - shows your curves but not too tight and is very forgiving.
Loved the elastic waist, super comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater set when paired with matching top...
links_reviews_text: Light weight sweater material with a little stretch. Order your size or size down if you like a snug fit. I prefer a sz M but it wasn't available so I got a sz L. It was bigger than I wanted but was able to play it off. The material gave even more throughout the night for a baggier look than what I wanted. Nonetheless it still made for a great semi- casual party look!

Loved this item. The only thing I didn't like was the skirt fabric clung to the shirt you wore tucked under it. I had visible underclothes lines. Fabric was stretchy and kind of a sporty material. If you want a looser fit size up.
So easy to dress up or down. Love these sporty skirts from Tory Burch! There's a lot of stretch in the waist. I should have ordered a small
Loved the colors, print, fit, and texture. Very fun work look.

links_reviews_title: Pretty colors, but not flattering material
links_reviews_text: I wanted to like this as the colors are bright and beautiful, but the material was weird. I put a slip on under it and leggings and it still was sheer in some places. It clung to me in all the wrong spots. The fabric was almost like really thick denier tights. Maybe if you are cut more straight then it would look better. I wore it once, but I didn't feel it was flattering.

links_reviews_title: Office to church to day time
links_reviews_text: Super easy to toss on! I wore to the office with a jean jacket one day and church the next! Super cute and comfy! A tad see thru! Got a ton of compliments on the beautiful colors!
Great colors and fit. Not super structured fabric so quite unforgiving below the waistline

Great style! I rented the set for the weekend. Wore with my favorite black leather boots & jacket. Also wore just the shirt separately with dark jeans white leather boots and the skirt with a black sweater. So versatile!
Fun set together - the skirt fit large compared to the top. Not sure if it's worth 2 credits to rent both. Would prefer if it was a little shorter. Was a little long on me at 5,9"
I was nervous to wear this bright outfit at first but it ended up being really fun. The perfect rental bc certainly not an outfit one needs to own!

links_reviews_title: The most compliments in a day
links_reviews_text: I'm obsessed with the fit and flow as well as the colors of this two piece. Maybe it's my new hair cut, but I felt so cute all day and want to keep both pieces. The fit on the skirt even works with my hips and tummy (though if you tuck your shirt wear a slip to cover the lines)

links_reviews_title: Colorful and a great length; material a bit thin
links_reviews_text: The length is perfect and I love the colors. I will wear with a white or lack shirt rather than the coordinating sweater which is too much in my opinion. The length is perfect for my 5'7" frame. The material is a tad thin - you would want to wear neutral colored underwear, tights, or a slip. Very cute!!

Loved this skirt. The colors are very bright and vibrant in person. The skirt has a stretchy waist band and the knit is on the thinner side. It does show every bump and panty outline underneath though so you do have to wear some smoothing undergarments. At 5'2, it hit mid calf on me.
I sized up in this skirt assuming it would run small because it was a knit but I really could have used my normal size. I made the size I ordered work though. I loved this outfit it was so fun!

links_reviews_title: Receive SO many compliments on this. Amazing texture, easy to wear, really stylish
links_reviews_text: Loved the color - very playful. Wore to work, always received a lot of compliments. It doesn't wrinkle easily.
Didnt get the matching top but the skirt is a statement piece on its own. Fun skirt.
I got many compliments on this skirt at work. Note the stripes are navy not b lack.
Grwat color and fit. Hugs hips so be prepared. Compliments all day!

links_reviews_title: Fun and different, very eye catching when paired with top
links_reviews_text: I wore this with the matching top and really liked it- it was outside my normal look but it actually worked well. Agree with people who point out you cN see the top tucked into the skirt, but I didn't think it was a big deal. I wore it with black heels and handbag because I didn't notice it was navy detailing, not black! Wore it to a dinner where I wanted to look nice but not overly fancy. Complimented!

I trusted this to be a thick skirt, but it is t-shirt thin fabric which does nothing to help smooth any hip dips you might have. Wouldn't recommend unless you're comfortable with the skirt hugging every bump you have.
This skirt was super cute and comfortable

links_reviews_title: Perfect skirt for weekend or work
links_reviews_text: Wore twice - one with tank and flip flops. Again with heels and jacket to work
Pros: Stretchy fabric, bold colors, fun for work Cons: Could be tough to match a lot with
Loved this skirt, fits true to size and has a little stretch to it. My only issue with this skirt is that is stretched out by lunchtime at work and gave me a "droopy" looking butt.

Stopped literally every time I had this on - work, travel, brunch! Always felt confident when I wore this. I did not order the matching top, instead mixed it with my own basics to dress up for work and down for play.

links_reviews_title: Great for work. Not see through.
links_reviews_text: Great for work. Not see through.

I rented this without the hookup top. It was surprisingly versatile and went with a white t-shirt perfectly. It's kind of sporty so looks really cool dressed down with sneakers too. I am curvy on the bottom and didn't have any sheerness issues. I wore it twice for work and got tons of compliments. I would buy this skirt.
Runs true to size
Adorable but ended up being too cold to wear
#color

links_reviews_title: Leave it to rag and bone to finally convert me to white pants.
links_reviews_text: I thought I'd never wear white pants. These are amazing. They do run small if you have a butt. I sized up the the 6 (normally I'm a 27/4 in pants but the size 4 wouldn't even zip closed). These are wonderful. White pants still probably aren't practical but I bought them so we shall see...

A little odd fitting in waist so that it creates a pregnant pooch look, but with light shape wear that went away. Thick enough that it's not all panty lines and overall slimming. Picture doesn't do justice.
Perfect flattering fit. A staple item in your closet this spring.

links_reviews_title: Great fit for a Petite girls.
links_reviews_text: Fit is great if u r not looking for a casual look. The length is great and the cut is so flattering. The fabric has great quality, however is very see-through.

links_reviews_title: Nothing fancy but solid pair of white pants
links_reviews_text: I am in-between a size 2 & 4. I am glad I went with a 4 here as the butt area is tight. The waist was a little loose so I would say it is true to size but if you have a butt, size up. These pants work best with a flow-y shirt or something that can be worn over the waistband (the waistband looks a bit odd on its own).
I'm 5'2" so pants are tricky for me. These were the perfect length. The waist was tighter than I expected so I'll try a size larger the next time I rent these.

links_reviews_title: N/A - was too small to wear
links_reviews_text: Too small

I loved the high-waist and slim fit of these pants. They looked great with so many different styles of tops. I liked that the zipper is in the back as it made the pant more flattering from the front. I will definitely rent these again!

Fit TTS. Nice length for my short legs. Clasp at top of zipper was bent out of shape, which rubbed when sitting down/standing up. Echo other reviews that these pants are pretty see through. Arrived wrinkled with funky smell.
Unfortunately these did not fit- I am normally a size 8.
They definitely run small. I usually wear a 6/8 but the 10 fits perfectly. The back zipper is a little challenging but do-able.
It is way to small if you have any kind of butt, it fit on my legs but I couldn't get it passed my butt :( it's a nice material but weird that the zipper is up the back

Did not wear, unfortunately. These pants would have fit perfectly but because of the cut, they would not zip without a major assist from someone else. I couldn't wear them and ever plan to use the bathroom. So sorry not to be able to wear them, although I might try to size up and see if that helps.

There is no give in the waist and thank goodness I had Spanx else my squishy stomach would have melted over. It was very fitting, the length was perfect but I any normal walking/sitting I did made it really wrinkly. I may get it again if I plan on never sitting for the day.

links_reviews_title: Tailored straight leg white work pants
links_reviews_text: Fits very snug, may need to size up.

links_reviews_title: Great fit. Almost considered buying but
links_reviews_text: I would prefer pockets and side zip
I ordered a size down because that's all that was available, and it didn't fit. Also it was super see through. Otherwise really cute pants. Will probably order again in the right size.
I could barely get the portion meant for my thigh over my knee. The pants seemed nice, but I'm not sure even 2 sizes up would have fit.
They have little stretch. I normally wear an 8 really tight when stretchy. Glad I went up a size.
These run very small. Recommend sizing up.
didn't fit

Not see-thru. Zips at back, not side. I did not wear as they needed a good iron and it was same kind of look as my white jeans. I'm a 6 in most dresses and tops, and 8 in most pants. Sized up to a 10 and they were perfect. Overall probably TTS though.
Too short for 5'9" weird waistband these fit more like leggings
Nice pants but weird material. They weren't very stretchy and had a weird fit near the upper thigh/crutch area. Also, zipper is up the backside which was a bit strange.

links_reviews_title: Not long enough if you have long legs.
links_reviews_text: Wish these came in L as well as R. They would have been perfect if just a bit longer.

links_reviews_title: Nice pants but a bit too tight on my belly
links_reviews_text: Length was fine, style was good just a bit tight around my stomach... I need to do abs

links_reviews_title: I like the way they look...just too small for me
links_reviews_text: way too tight for my athletic build in a size 6

links_reviews_title: Rag and Bone is my fave!
links_reviews_text: This pant runs a bit large. It looked far to oversized when I put them on.

This dress fit like a glove! I would definitely rent again. But I will say be careful with what bra you wear with it. On the side of the neckline that cuts down the most, if you're not wearing a lower cut bra it peeks out over the top! Still super flattering!

links_reviews_title: Black Halo for the win! Great structure, fabric, color! Slimming, modern neckline. Great length!
links_reviews_text: Pros... hourglass figure with long torso compliments this style. Not stiff but not very stretchy. Would love to size down to 6... but narrow construction up top. Anyone above D cup... could get tight. Bottom of dress seemed wide. But drapes nicely. Piece is worth buying!
It was a little smaller than I expected for an 8. There was no stretch so a tight when walking but beautiful!!
I loved the color. I am glad I sized up. It was tight in hips and thighs because there is no slit.
Tons of compliments. Great way to brighten the wardrobe

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, neckline a little low
links_reviews_text: I think Black Halo fits beautifully and I loved this dress for a pop of sunny color in February and March. The asymmetrical neckline is an interesting detail but gets little low on the left side; you'll need to take care to select the right bra, especially if you have a larger chest. I wore it to a couple work meetings and it was fine, I got several compliments, but wouldn't wear it to my most formal business events.
The color...omg the compliments! You will stop traffic! No like literally cuz it's yellow. But fr great cut!

I am normally a size 16 or 14w. I got the 18 for this dress based on other reviews. Wore it twice once to church and once to business conference and constantly got compliments from both male and females.

I can see what they were trying to do here but I felt like the execution left a little to be desired. The color is GORGEOUS. The asymmetrical neckline is so interesting and unique but dips too low for modesty. It also shows the top of your bra and I felt like I was constantly adjusting my dress. The shoulders also felt a little roomy even though the dress fit well. If I had a cocktail party, I'd consider ordering this again but not for work.

links_reviews_title: This dress was a big hit! Bright and beautiful!
links_reviews_text: Wore for an on camera event and it played great. Color was so complimentary (I have olive skin and red hair). Would definitely recommend! Love Black Halo.
Great fit and color; heavy material.
beautiful dress
Order up a full size!
fit true to size
It may be a tad too low cut on one side for work, but nothing that a sweater or suit jacket won't fix. Great day-to-night outfit. Fit perfectly
I went with a different dress for my event but the cut and color of this was beautiful

links_reviews_title: Warning - may not be work appropriate
links_reviews_text: Color is gorgeous for fall, but this ran small and be warned.... you need a "stunt bra!" A normal bra will not work because the neckline is wide and low on one side. So low, it wasn't work appropriate. I made it work by wearing a scarf, but that defeated the purpose of the cute neckline. Not office appropriate.
I usually struggle Keith dress sizes but this one fit perfectly and flattered my body shape.

links_reviews_title: Very cute but too warm for California
links_reviews_text: I really liked this jacket but it's so thick and warm that I don't think I'd ever where this in SoCal.... great fit and color though! Very fun alternative to a regular old coat.
Perfect coat

links_reviews_title: Unique pattern-fun, pretty coat-great for a different look on a date night!
links_reviews_text: Love the colors on this coat, it's lightweight but warm for winter!! Perfect for something different during the winter. Fits true to size without too much bulk underneath. Another reason to love RTR, a coat that I would not buy, but adore being able to wear!!!

links_reviews_title: Such a fun alternative to a blazer and WARM
links_reviews_text: I picked this up at the SF flagship store and grabbed it as soon as I saw the woman wearing it return it. The color is gorgeous and the details on the collar and cuff give it a kind of casual bomber jacket feel. CAUTION: it is a bit snug on the arms, so layering is hard but it's warm enough that you will be fine with a light shirt or tank underneath even in chillier temps
Love this jacket, perfect length/ fit through shoulders. Wore it a couple times to work etc. Fun piece to dress up any outfit.
I wore this coat as much as possible. It was warm, great for layering and I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Stylish and well fitting coat for the fall
links_reviews_text: Only pros - comfortable, warm, good length and great color
Such a fun piece. Well made. Extremely memorable so perfect to rent. Blocks wind ok but lightweight. Not really a winter coat, but perfect for 40s and 50s.
Rented this twice and go so many compliments, I had to buy it! Felt great every time I put it on. Rent it and you'll see! Best purchase from RTR yet.
I absolutely LOVED this coat! It's so cute, fits great, is comfy, is thick, and the print is obviously awesome. I'll probably purchase it.
Cute colors and heavy! But too big. I wear a small coat normally but medium was recommended. Too large and sleeves too long. Will try in a smaller size.
I really like the color of this coat. The only downside is that for larger breasted women (c+ cup) buttons look a little wonky when both buttoned, so it's not for really cold weather
This coat is soooooo awesome. I loved it so much and wore it all over the place. Highly recommend!!
Great fit. Awesome colors. Lots of compliments on this!

links_reviews_title: Nice transitional plaid coat in unusual color palette
links_reviews_text: This coat is not very warm but it served me well before the weather got too cold last fall. It was a perfect car coat but the colors were a bit hard to work with. I really loved the knitted cuffs! They keep your wrists cozy.
great for going out or work

links_reviews_title: Great pattern, looked great with lots in my wardrobe
links_reviews_text: Loved it. Great fall jacket
Great fit
I love this coat! It was super cute and warm. I have a large chest, so it looked a little funny when I buttoned it at the top to keep my neck warm, but I didn't mind.

links_reviews_title: Vibrant color, elegant cut, fun striped cuff/collar detail
links_reviews_text: Wore this coat several times. It cut the morning chill (50 degrees) nicely. It's not lined so it wasn't overly hot. Perfect for fall or spring. I got the small based on the RTR size recommendation. It was snug on me, but I'm more often a medium. Unless you're planning to wear thin tops underneath and don't need to button the jacket, try to get your true size. It was easy to coordinate my mostly-neutral wardrobe with this vibrant color palette. And I got a lot of compliments. I'll rent again.

links_reviews_title: This is seriously the neatest jacket. the collar and cuffs add a unique element.
links_reviews_text: I joined that to save money, but if you are sending me clothes that are this cute, I am going to want to keep them all.

links_reviews_title: Jacket is so warm and an eye catcher
links_reviews_text: i have long arms but someone with shorter arms might find them too long. Inside is so soft and warm, colors are perfect fall colors.
Super comfortable (pajamas that are work appropriate + pockets) and oddly enough matched TONS of tops in my closet! (I have lots of yellows, greens, teals, and blues) so I bought them!

The material is stretchy, but heavy enough that it doesn't cling and falls nicely. Super super comfy--the waistband doesn't dig in, but is a strong enough elastic that it will find your skinniest point and hang out there, so hard to control where the waistband lays. I was super nervous about renting pants but these were perfection!
I didn't want to send these back. I wore them to work and around the house. Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: felt a bit like a French puppet
links_reviews_text: def need delicate shoes w this

links_reviews_title: "You look like an MC from Cirque du Soliel"
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, fit well, nice material, but not a crowd pleaser haha. Can't win em all.

I rented these as a sort of last minute grab for vacay thinking they would be a disaster, but they were surprisingly cute and petite friendly! They are tiniest bit longer than I would want, but totally work because of the elastic tapered hem. The strips are flattering and they are a cool, almost rayon/jersey fabric (but on the heavier side). You can dress them up or down depending on your shoes. Great summer/spring pant.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable love the fabric and cut!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit, love the pockets, wore them 3 times!
Fit great not tight size medium perfect may keep these

These pants are great! The colors are nice and deep without being overpowering or loud. The material has a luxe feel and could be worn on the weekend or to a more business casual office. The fit is loose but true to size. I am a 14/16 and could have sized down to the large, but I think I would have lost some of the flowy-ness if I had.
They feel like PJs, but they look great! They're short on me (6'0''), but ok when I wore heels. I would rent again.
These are definitely a lot of stripes, but they were fun and comfortable.
LOVE LIVE LIVE these! Perfect fit and sooo comfy! Wore with a knit light blue too and sandals perfect fit and comfort for vacation travel!

links_reviews_title: Nice enough. Not flattering on me
links_reviews_text: I rented these pants as a possible warm climate vacation piece. They look stylish for a casual affair and I'm sure they are comfortable to wear; but the thin material would not conceal my thigh problem areas without shapewear, which defeats the purpose of the ease and comfort I was hoping for. I sized up thinking the excess pleating would be adequate; but that did not work for me.
These were super comfy, great material (no ironing needed ever) and fit great. My only issue would be how long the ridiculous drawstring is.
I thought they were a little flashy for me but got a lot of compliments.
These are great for the beach where you want to get a little dressed up for dinner but not too much. The colors are great.
Definitely a little oversized but very comfortable and great for everyday wear. I wore them to several work meetings with heels and to brunch with a t shirt and flip flops. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Cute but felt a little clownish
links_reviews_text: I tried to dress this up a bit but just couldn't pull it off. They fit great and I actually got several compliments. A stylish guy on the train said "great pants!" and he meant it, but I did feel like they were a bit loud for me. Probably would have been better for weekend wear than work. Really comfy and well made -- if these seem like pants for you!
At first I thought is return them as looked to baggy on me. But rolled the waste and put on with heels and ended up loving them.

These are great--not too baggy or harem-like, nice length, comfortable waist band. I have worn them several times, each time with a fitted black t-shirt as shown on RTR. I am pear shaped and these looked good on me. Many compliments!

Comfy, great colors, and great for the hippy/big booty girls! I have a hard time with pants because of my butt and thighs and the medium didn't pull anywhere! Could also dress up, I just wore them to run errands.

links_reviews_title: Great for everyday and for work.
links_reviews_text: I LOVED these pants. They were comfortable, light weight & casual but still great for work.

links_reviews_title: Cute joggers that were comfortable and stylish.
links_reviews_text: Pants were a bit too big in the waist and definitely too long for my 5'4" frame.
The legs of these joggers were at least 8" to long! If I hiked the waist up under my breasts, the crotch still seemed low! Way too long for a 5' 3" person
too long for my short legs

the fit is very loose and the pants are long. People loved these pants. I think they're so cute and will rent them again. I wore them with a white cotton top and black blazer. The waist is elasctic and there is a functional drawstring. I wear an 18 in pants and wore the XXL in these.
stretchy fabric- great for tall gals. super cute and comfortable as all get out. The colors pop and there are many shades to choose from in the fabric for pairing a top/shoes/bag.

links_reviews_title: So adorable!! I want to keep it!!!

links_reviews_text: This purse was adorable. I was not able to fit my cell phone but did fit my wallet, keys and charger.
So cute! Be aware you can fit very little in this petit structured bag! Cell, card holder or small wallet and lipstick... not much else. Perfect for a night out. Great quality with great detailing!

links_reviews_title: The writing say s it all...
links_reviews_text: I am a large handbag girl BUT this little cutie was a perfect crossbody accessory! IT fit my id debit and credit card, lipstick, keys and phone. It is perfect for the timing too as I did not need to set it on any counters or spaces during the virus pandemic! Will rent this again!! so cute!! Colorful!!!

I always rent a big bag- too much stuff to carry it seems. Super cute salmon colored bag, but holds very little, so fun for a few days. A good spring transition color and look. The long strap has red, gold, and blue colored beads and gives the bag a different vibe. With just the handle, it's more of a dressy/night out look. Quality quality quality- charming and fun. Loved it.
Wore multiple times. Jeans and t shirt. Black pants and striped Oxford shirt. Cute so many ways. Would need to order an XL to wear buttoned all the way up.
Good fit and style. Can't go wrong for a cardigan style sweater.

I rented this because I was teaching a writing workshop. It was perfectly conservative. It was definitely too soon in the fall season to wear it because the material is really heavy. Wait until fall or winter because it's very warm. The pearl button details were my favorite, so pretty. The trim is navy, not black but that is subtle.
I was so happy with this sweater and kept it for awhile. I wore it to work, and out and about. The quality is excellent and the style is great. Long and boxy but really cute and trendy.
Really nice construction. Very Chanel-esque. Thicker material but breathable, perfect for spring.

I liked this a lot - perfect for a 50-60 degree windy Chicago day. Too warm for 70 though. Length covered my butt (5'2") and surprisingly the small wasn't too small for my large chest (36DD). That leads me think this runs large. Polished and conservative while buttoned up, but also found it to be versatile as a jacket worn open.
Loved the pink and pearl details. Great weight, perfect for fall and west coast winter. Great for brunch or a even a work event. Saved to rent again!
Beautiful piece, looks and feels very expensive. Definitely gave that Chanel vibe. Wore a small, and thought it fit better than a medium would have
This sweater is heavy and very flattering.
Beautiful sweater. A bit thick. And definitely very conservative. Perfect for afternoon tea!

Super warm! I didn't have to wear a coat on a super cold day! Very classy. I would recommend ordering your normal size and one size down. I'm a M/L, 36DD and this is the medium. The outline is not black; it's close to black, but it's definitely a dark navy.
I really loved this piece and really wanted to keep it. It looks great with a dress and heels. I wore this to work a few times. It's very warm and plenty of people thought it was Chanel.
The sweater complimented my leather dress! It also looked great sitting on my shoulders. I felt classy and confident in this look.

First day back in the office in 2019 and I wanted something polished and put together. The fabric is a nice heavy knit, no pilling or loose threads it looks very well cared for. I wore it with a black turtleneck underneath and had it buttoned up all day. Lots of compliments - everyone thought it was Chanel! I wore it in Medium, and it fit nicely. That said, I do like things a bit oversized and with the extra layer underneath I would have preferred a little extra room so would rent in L next time. GREAT PIECE!
So cute and you can dress it up or down. Felt so fancy in it :)

This is a beautiful sweater and arrived with the pearl buttons still wrapped in paper. It does run large in the sleeves and torso so I would suggest sizing down 1 size. I am normally an xxl and the xl was still a little big on me. This sweater pairs beautifully with the Fleming tote also by Tory Burch.

links_reviews_title: I've never received so many compliments on a piece of clothing
links_reviews_text: Great sweater - classic and made well, I received more compliments on this from everyone I ran into today than I have with any other piece of clothing.

The cut of this sweater/jacket is boxy and when buttoned, not flattering for an hourglass shape. I wore it open and it was just ok. Fabric is very thick and I was hot wearing it inside the office in the winter. Overall, it was mediocre. I wanted to love this, but jut couldn't
Love this. Feels thick and luxurious. I felt like a powerful woman at work!
This is a very heavy-weigh sweater jacket. The XL was truly XL -- probably could have gone down a size. It is a bit boxy, but was comfortable and looked neat.

links_reviews_title: So adorable at work - so many compliments!!
links_reviews_text: This is such a cute, flattering coat. I wear it to work and it looks fabulous. I have received so, so many compliments!!
Runs slightly large in the shoulders. I sized down and was glad I did as it made for a more streamlined look.

links_reviews_title: Great for work and cooler evenings...
links_reviews_text: Fun jacket, great for work and cooler evenings.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! LOVE this. Literally wore it about 4 times.
links_reviews_text: Fit well, got so many compliments- loved it so much, may rent again!
Really fun and well made. Nice for work but a little baggy.
Very thick sweater. I wish the navy blue had actually been black, but I knew that before I even received it. It wasn't my favorite of the batch I received, but it will be cute for work tomorrow!

links_reviews_title: Did not wear it because it was too big.
links_reviews_text: Did not wear because it was too big.

links_reviews_title: I rented this as part of my membership plan and I can't bear to part with it!
links_reviews_text: This cardigan is perfection. I absolutely loved wearing this out because it made me feel so posh and glam; I felt like Jackie O! Unfortunately, it's nearly summer now so the days are too hot for this heavy cardigan (because the fabric really is heavy) so it's best suited for fall. I still love it so much that I'm keeping it another month so I can wear it during cool summer nights or as an extra layer at places that blast the AC. Even at the member-discounted price of $298, it's still a tad expensive for me to purchase but I may have to if I can't bring myself to return it next month.

links_reviews_title: Classic sweater coat. Heavy weight. Got many compliments. Would definitely rent again.
links_reviews_text: Classic sweater coat. Chanel-like Style. Heavy weight. Got many compliments. Looks good on petite frame. Would definitely rent again for cool spring and winter days. #glamorous The trim on the jacket is navy, not black.
I got it because it looks like a long Chanel jacket but I think it would look cuter in a M and with shoulder pads. Didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Standard work day. Lots of compliments on style & color. Wore with pearl accessories.
links_reviews_text: Great weight, fit, color and style.

links_reviews_title: Cute for work, buttons are fun
links_reviews_text: This is the ideal rental piece since I can't picture incorporating this into my heavy rotation, but it's really nice. Definitely runs larger than most XSs, I'm usually a S in sweaters.
I liked the jacket a lot. I just didn't feel like wearing it this week.

links_reviews_title: Classy and soft alternative to a blazer
links_reviews_text: This sweater is long and made of a thick knit, making it perfect for spring when it's still cold. I love knits for the office since they are so comfortable and this jacket didn't disappoint. I got tons of compliments and enjoyed channeling my inner Jackie O!
got compliments
The picture is not clear, the dark color is navy blue, not black. Runs large and is long.
a little heavy and warm, and a tad itchy, but it looks fantastic!

This has been my favorite rental! Such a high quality piece-- thick fabric, no snags or stains, gorgeous pearl buttons with the logo. Great piece for tall girls-- the sleeves are long enough! Fits beautifully and glides over the hips. Really more of a navy edging than black. Loved it!
Great fit and flattering as usual with TB! Was hard to tell if the outline was navy or black....
Fit is true to size. Classy and sophisticated.
I wore this once.
Fits perfectly. Great quality. Warm.
A little short, tight in the arms

The bottom of the jacket sinches back and pulls at your clothes so you can't really wear it open? Even when I wore it closed it still was snug, especially around the chest (I'm a 36C, so don't usually have a huge problem with this). I'm usually a L and sized up to an XL based on other reviews and still didn't have much luck.

links_reviews_title: I liked this, it was cute, warm, and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Nothing to add here

links_reviews_title: Liked it. Didn't love it. Short
links_reviews_text: Color is technically navy but can read as black if you want it to. I am long waisted and it was too cropped to fit me right. Overall I liked it ok but only wore it once before sending it back on unlimited plan

links_reviews_title: Blah, can only be worn zipped
links_reviews_text: This is a goofy, at the hip fit. The waistline is like elastic, should only be worn zipped or would look like half the jacket is connected to your back.

This was very cropped and generally ran a size or two lower. It is also a dark pleather rather than the nylon as described- only the orange is nylon. I had liked this one when I first saw it and then decided to get it as I was going to a Chicago Bears game - the colors worked great for that! (But not necessarily for everyday)

links_reviews_title: Cute top- definitely dark green and not black!
links_reviews_text: Loved how this top fit. The tie front is a great accent. I think the description says black but I would call this dark green.
Definitely runs small! I had to order again in a larger size, and I'm glad I did! This is a gorgeous top.
The tie in the front added a beautiful detail. The top is a bit thick and has a built in halter at the breast. Overall cute top. Recieved plenty of compliments.
Good material and good for work. But need to definitely Size up!

links_reviews_title: way too tight as a Large..
links_reviews_text: n/a
Loved this item and would've worn it but it was damaged and ripped by the tie

I thought it was black but it's actually a very dark Hunter green color. I like it in this color and it went with the tan pants I rented, but I think the website photos are misleading on the color. As others said, it is tight and runs smallish. It is stretchy though. On my larger bust, it made for a "scuba/bodycon" style fit. It worked under my blazer, but I might have felt a little self conscious without it. Not necessarily for everyone.

links_reviews_title: Runs small, great material and fit
links_reviews_text: Per the other reviews stating the top runs small, I ordered a S rather than my usual XS. I'm glad I did because the small is snug (in a good way) and the XS wouldn't have fit. This top is a thick, stretchy, high quality material. My only complaint is that when I tie it at the hip, my skin is exposed a bit. It may be because I have a longer torso, because there's no skin showing at all on the model in the photos, the way she has it tied.
Like this shirt a lot color was weird -like dark green not black was trying to wear with blk pants and it looked off like the tie

links_reviews_title: Love the tie on the side, and the green color that wasn't really black.
links_reviews_text: It fits WAY WAY small. I'm 5'5" and 115 and I wore a large.
Received many compliments on this top! Great fabric and fit.

links_reviews_title: I loved the look of this top!
links_reviews_text: I originally thought the shirt was black, it is actually a greenish-grey. I still liked the color, wore it with black fitted pants. I think next time I would order the small, as the XS did fit, I liked how thick the material was and it was easy to move around in it. Where the long piece of material is on the shirt, you could see a little skin when the two pieces separated. Again I would order the small next time.
Was a cute top for something a little different. Wasn't in love with it though.

links_reviews_title: Lovely form fitting shirt with a unique style
links_reviews_text: Nice black shirt with some style - would rent again. Fit so nice and was comfortable.
Thick stretchy material. Simple top that is an easy work or going out look

links_reviews_title: Too short, tie makes belly visible
links_reviews_text: Had a hard time working in this shirt. It was short on my long torso and the tie made a belly peek show at times. Spent too much time pulling this around to enjoy.

links_reviews_title: I wish I would have read the other reviews - I agree with them 100%. So small and tight!
links_reviews_text: Thick, quality fabric but very small, tight and short.

links_reviews_title: Cute top, comfy, with a little edge
links_reviews_text: I really liked the stop but I thought the color was a little off. It's not the true black, has a very greenish cast to it. I tried to wear it with black pants and it appeared almost greenish charcoal next to other blacks.
Too tight for work. Would be cute for evening.

I may have liked this in a bigger size but it was really tight so I didn't feel comfortable in it. I usually wear an XS or S on top but this small was really snug. I am a skinny pear figure and didn't really like this shape on me, the extra fabric at the hips made them appear wider. The fabric was thick and felt good quality.

links_reviews_title: Tie waist reveals too much belly and skin
links_reviews_text: This top is a very dark shade of green (not black) as the photo makes it look. Inside there is tight fabrics in the bust area- not sure if it is meant to act as a bra but it made the chest area look very unflattering. The ties at the waist don't cover the belly area completely revealing too much skin. I didn't wear it.
Beautiful top that can be wore to work or date night. Fabrics is stretchy and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I thought it was gray but really forest green against my black pants
links_reviews_text: I love the tie and the fit. The color was a little off putting. It is one of those more fitted tops though so renter beware.
Gorgeous top but it was too tight for me even though I "sized up" (I'm usually a medium). Definitely body con.
Runs very small! The tie left too much skin exposed for work. I normally wear a 10-12. The xl seems like it would best fit a size 6-8.
Fit so cute - flattering and the perfect mom dress that still has style

links_reviews_title: Very soft, light weight, comfy af
links_reviews_text: Fit well, sized up because I wanted to make sure it was long enough. Glad I did, a little short.
Loved it....fit great! So comfy

I wore this to a fun girls night, PJ/lounge clothes party! I wasn't sure if everyone would wear pjs or other stuff so I went for a very casual dress so I would fit in. This was very comfortable and I even got some compliments. It's a little short, but is balanced well because the sleeves are long. I wore in August and didn't feel too hot when I was outside. Super cute!!
Loved this dress super comfy casual but cute and fit great

links_reviews_title: Soft and comfortable but a lil short
links_reviews_text: Fit nicely; except that it was a bit shorter than I'd like. I had tons of compliments. It was so soft and comfortable, but I definitely couldn't bend over if I'd have dropped something. Lol

This dress has the softest and most comfortable fabric imaginable. While I enjoyed wearing it, I didn't exactly find it flattering. It's loose, but somehow clinged to all the wrong places, especially my midsection. It's also too short - there's no way I could have worn without thick tights.
Shape was great, true to size, extremely soft! Perfect for a day out and layering!

links_reviews_title: I soooo wanted to buy this
links_reviews_text: But it was a little too short for comfort in the back. When I wore it with leggings it was fine, but I didn't want to pay that much for a dress that I was restricted to wear with leggings. Otherwise - SOOO comfortable and the details are great for such a casual dress. I wore it multiple times while I had it.

Ultra soft fabric that was sooo cozy! This is a nice casual dress for lounging or weekend/casual look. It wasn't that flattering for my body shape but I enjoyed wearing it for a casual Valentine's evening at home with my mother and a friend. I added a fun chunky & sparkly necklace to give it some pizzazz.
Liked that it was easy to wear, just slip on and tie at waist. Super soft fabric.

Was a comfy material but way too short.... not very flattering, didn't wear it. It fit well for the average size I wear, except it was just so short. A size medium would have been big. It just wasn't good.

links_reviews_title: Perfect travel outfit with a pair of leggings
links_reviews_text: So comfy - I should have kept it!

Super cute ! Looks good with sneakers, uggs, boots and ballet flats! Not to mention it's soft and comfortable. Can be worn in cold weather and even a warmer day like 75ish! I will Definitely rent again
Not very flattering. Definitely too short to wear without leggings. It was very comfortable, though.
I wore it so many times I should have just kept it! It became my go to shirt on a recent work trip. Easy to dress up, dress down and just comfortable all the way around.

I absolutely adored this piece from the moment I put it on. That's why I purchased it. The small fit perfectly! It's definitely short so I can see it not fitting well and feeling too short if you're above 5'3. But I received so many compliments when wearing. It's so comfortable and casual! If you have the opportunity to rent or I buy I definitely recommend.
This dress was as comfortable as sweats without making you feel like you were in pajamas. I loved it!
I rented this for weekend wear, but it was too short for me at 5'7"
Wore with leggings. Would have been way too short as a address

links_reviews_title: Good for a cozy day at home
links_reviews_text: way too short to wear without leggings. When adding leggings, it becomes super super casual.

links_reviews_title: I didn’t get the opportunity to wear this due to the fit.
links_reviews_text: The fabric is so cute and comfortable but the dress felt small in the waist/butt. Also very short for someone who is 5’7”.
This is a great wash and nice summer weight fabric but I am 5'8" and barely covered my butt! Maaaaybe could use as a beach coverup but did not work for me!

The tie around the waist is super flattering. I really liked the dress a lot. I probably could've gone up a size now that I see how it is running on the model. It was a little more fit on me but didn't bother me at all. I wore it to work and usually want to change like right when I get home but I actually left this one while I did stuff around my place and found it super comfortable and cute! Would definitely wear it again

links_reviews_title: Wore out of hotel after wedding
links_reviews_text: I loved the way this fit & looked on me. I wore it the day after a wedding out of the hotel & it was beyond comfortable. I will rent this every time I am staying over some where & need something to throw on that is easy & cute.
Ok for everyday.
I didn't want to take this off! Very flattering, you can dress up or down. A little on the short side; but that made it look less like pjs. I should have purchased this.

I only wore this around the house. It was comfy, but if you're like me and need some structure to clothes to guide your curves...then this is not your dress. It made me look a little frumpy, and I believe the M would've just been too tight and too short.
Comfy, soft, good for lounging, running errands
Color doesn't look at all like the photo! I have olive tones in my skin and the color completely washed me out. Couldn't wear it. But the fit was cute.
The back is tighter than the front and rides up a little

links_reviews_title: worn while visiting family and friends. Not too heavy.
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit. It should be worn with leggings or bare legged. I wore it with jeans and wasn't just right but it was passable. I thought this was super cute!
Basic sweatshirt dress. Nothing special, kinda short, but super comfortable. Wouldn't rent again though.
SO CUTE but so short :(
The dress runs very small and it shows imperfections.
Super cute, but super short. I'm barely 5'1" and there was no way I could wear this. Hit mid thigh.

I wish I had purchased this...it was the best thing to throw on with a pair of leggings and feel comfortable and pulled together at the same time...I even wore it for a 5 hour car ride, knowing I'd have to go straight to a casual dinner party and it was perfect! It would also be cute without the leggings and just a pair of tennis shoes in the spring but it might be a tiny bit short for me...
So soft.
Easy dress for everyday wear, so cute and very comfortable!
I really love this dress! I would have kept it except that it was a little shorter than I usually wear.
Wore this to work at 22 weeks pregnant. Runs long which works really well with a baby bump. Very comfortable.

I did not want to part with this. The medium wasn't available so I got a large and just loved it! The medium would've been a little better for the length but I still didn't want to send it back. I couldn't justify paying for it though. Will definitely rent again!
This sweater was super comfortable! It was a little big but it ended up being fine & stylish in that way.

links_reviews_title: Softest coziest oversized sweater! Loved this one!
links_reviews_text: I bummed around in this sweater at a coffee shop all day working on a paper and was so comfy! It's a really well made sweater and the slight bell sleeve compliments the oversized look without it being dramatic. I wore a medium and it was pretty slouchy but in the best possible way. Just don't expect a fitted sweater unless you size down at least one size!
It is so comfortable! Had to roll up sleeves a few times to eat. Length is great with leggings to cover.
A little baggy, but I didn't mind the fit because it was super comfortable and warm.
If it wasn't almost $200 I would buy it. Perfect big but not unflattering sweater. Wore with leggings.
Good fit and not itchy at all. Great sweater.

If there was a Fit choice between "true to size" and large, I might select "a tad bit large". At 5'5" 120lbs, I consider myself Small but not XS - unless there is an XXS to choose from, and in this case there isn't. I also have a long torso and it's difficult for me to find sweaters that fall nicely at the hip, this one does. I would buy it, but its too pricey for me at this point.
Love this sweater!! It's so soft and so cozy and the pastel colors are adorable.

links_reviews_title: I chose this a for a casual outfit.
links_reviews_text: It has an oversized, loose fit and the material is really soft. I really liked it!
This sweater is soft and warm but was huge. I couldn'trealistically pull off wearing it. Will try the xs.
Wore to a baby shower. Comfortable and cute! Length is great and not too tight.
This dress fit perfectly! I added a cami because of cleavage, but that didn't bother me. The mid section was designed to be flattering and the material is very comfortable.

Easy to wear, great stretch, flattering for many body types, perfect length, great dress! I wore to my hubby's work party and felt comfortable and confident. Pinned the neckline a bit higher. If I saw this on the hanger I would have walked past. After trying it on, the details with the ruffle and ruching make this extra special. Try it!!

For someone whose 22 weeks pregnant and outgrown the majority of their existing wardrobe, this dress was AMAZING. Stretchy, comfortable, and flattering. It can be a bit revealing up top though if you are busty. I'll probably rent again and wear with a black tank underneath. Rent this dress!
This was more a "fun to try" dress for me. Lots of compliments but not something I wanted to keep after the month! Just a fun dress and fit very well.
Gorgeous animal print that's always on trend and the material was high quality! Fit very well and I loved everything about it! Wish the price point was a little less so I could have bought it.

I wore this to temple with my family. I was worried my mom would think the print is too loud, but I got a lot of compliments from older generations!
