The material is thin and more flexible than I expected but not tight or revealing. Very flattering I'm usually a 2/4 or a small, but based on other reviews I ordered and XS

Sexy and comfortable, you'll feel like a pretty kitty in this gorgeous dress. The wrap-around style and slight ruffling makes this a flattering fit no matter how much you're bloating. Fit well and the material was so silky. I wish I could keep it!

I should have kept this. It's so flattering. The dress is also so comfortable and stretchy. The flare on the skirt adds some interest and bring the dressy factor up a notch. You could dress this up or down, for work or play. It's a sexy one without trying too hard.
I love this dress! Rented it for work and got compliments galore. I'm a 4/6 and the small was roomy so size down.

I love how this dress fit. I don't like leopard print enough to want to wear it all the time but this was fun for a date night. The material is stretchy and it has a very flattering fit. I usually wear a size small and the small fit well. I have a narrow frame so I probably could have done an xs for a tighter fit but I liked how the small fit

The event I got this for was canceled so I didn't wear it, but it's likely that I would have gone with this option. This fit as expected. I really liked the details around the waist, thought it looked fantastic straight on. I was not so in love with the side view as it was a little clingy across my tummy, likely due to my booty, but I probably could have gotten over myself. I didn't care for the long sleeves, but I pushed them up and it looked fine. Kind of echoed the ruching elsewhere.

links_reviews_title: I was unable to wewe this as it was too small
links_reviews_text: Too tight for work, runs small

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments throughout the night!
links_reviews_text: Having just had a baby, the dress was flattering in a time where my body is going through changes. Material was great and the roushing helped to hide my mid-section!

True to size maybe on the large side actually It was large in stomach area but still was flattering Came to my Knee at 5'6 Colors were a tad muted light pink with tan I wore a bandeau underneath to conceal cleavage for modesty Arms were good length on my long lanky arms

I felt like a million buck in this dress. With it being form fitted I was worried it would be uncomfortable. I was pleasantly surprised at how comfy it truly is. You are able to move in the dress which is a huge win for me. Plus I got TONS of compliments from the office!
This dress fits like a glove and is also so comfy. Perfect for a romantic date night with my husband!

This is a fun dress that is super comfortable. Usually size 4-6, size small fit great. The small panel/ruffle at the hip makes it unique and interesting. I wore it with a black shirt underneath, otherwise it would have been too low-cut. Will rent again.
Comfy, flattering and just easy to throw on. So effortless. Pattern means you needn't wear spanx. sexy without being over the top. I'm buying this one.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable! Looks great on and was perfect for dancing, walking around, and sitting.
links_reviews_text: Nothing to complain about.
Fit perfect
This dress fit perfectly. It was comfortable and flattering. Would definitely rent it again!
I rented this dress in a different color last year and wound up purchasing it. Saw this new pattern available and rented twice now. First in large, now in medium. Both sizes look great. Love it!

links_reviews_title: This dress is picture perfect and so flattering for this older mom. So, so many compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: The slight ruffle and print was such a hit for our event. I wanted a dress that would look good and be in style. Hit it on the nail with this stunning dress!

This dress is cute, but I would definitely recommend sizing down! I typically get a size Small in this brand and it has worked in the past. For some reason, this particular dress runs very big. I'm 5'6" and 130lbs and would get the XS next time.

links_reviews_title: It was a little va va va boom for work, but I wore it anyway.
links_reviews_text: Very form fitting.

links_reviews_title: I really like this dress. Looks nice and is comfortable to wear. I could have worn a size medium.
links_reviews_text: The dress is stretchy. I could have worn a size medium but, since the print is already eye-catching, I didn't want to be too sexy for work.
Im 4'11 snd i thought this dress was going to fit me long. It fit perfectly and not too tight. I felt beautiful and sexy. Great for work and date

links_reviews_title: Love it! But not for work.
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress that fits gorgeously. Nothing else to say.

I absolutely love this dress. It fit just right and was appropriate for the office and straight into a night look. I received so many compliments! The fit is true to size and honestly should be a staple in ones closet. I may have to purchase soon!

links_reviews_title: This warm, comfy, and stylish coat got me through a New York winter
links_reviews_text: This was the perfect coat for the 2019-20 fall/winter season in NYC. We experienced a very mild winter with hardly any snow and an average temperature around 40 degrees. The coat kept me warm even when the temperatures dropped down into the 20's since the padding is thick. However, I felt a little too warm wearing it when the temperature rose above 55 degrees. I also loved the color and received compliments from others about the coat. On the other hand, I wish it was a bit longer and extended mid-thigh. I didn't want to give it up!

This was a great coat for my vacation in Denver. Even though it was 0 degrees F with wind chill at times this coat kept me warm (even has a fuzzy lining). I'm only rating 4 stars and not since the waist drawstrings made the bottom poof out which was slightly unflattering, but not terrible

links_reviews_title: Rent for warmth, not for style.
links_reviews_text: Pro: this jacket got me through an unexpected arctic blast. it's very warm! Con: the crop is too short and the puff is too much...felt like wearing a sleeping bag, not a jacket.

links_reviews_title: You'll have to pry this from my cold dead hands
links_reviews_text: I need to buy this jacket. It's sooo warm and so cute.
I've never owned a warmer jacket - was great for winter and love the zipper pockets

This coat is a great color, and I loved the contrasting hue on the zippers. It is very warm, but it is very puffy. I'm in Chicago and live in puffer coats during the winter, but this one was really unflattering.
This jacket was just giant. Never wore.
Too big too wear
I liked this coat but couldn't wear it more than once because my hair kept getting stuck on the material.

links_reviews_title: This jacket is very cute, and very warm, but the material feels strangely sticky and uncomfortable.
links_reviews_text: Fit great, definitely warm and cute, but the material is super strange.
It worked for a very cold climate, but I just felt like a huge teal marshmallow. Very warm though!
Very warm and I love the look but I really got in the way when I would take it off indoors because it is so very puffy. I would wear it more but it's just a bit much for California.
Loved this coat, considering renting again! Amazing quality and insulation. Looks very cute in person!
Fits well; very warm and looks good on (for a puffer)
I like this jacket. It’s very warm and not too heavy. I think the pink string is cut and makes a good contrast with the jacket color.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: This is a cute puffy coat! The color is nice and the inside lining is soft.
The coat is of good quality, but it ran large on an already roomy cut.

links_reviews_title: This runs HUGE. I don't even know if a smaller size would work because it was gigantic.
links_reviews_text: So huge that I was able to "wear" a toddler in a baby carrier and ZIP the jacket over both of us! Perfect for that use.
It's one of those jackets that gape's open, so keep that in mind when deciding what you'd like to wear it for.
A little big but not uncomfortably- I believe it was meant to fit this way. Paired with the matching pants, I felt great, cute + confident, at commencement and after.
I rented a small based on reviews, but was a bit snug. Would rent again in medium. Got tons of compliments on this nonetheless.
Gorgeous violet blazer. Got tons of compliments from work. I'm typically a size 4 top. I did need to wear a tank top underneath.

Liked the concept of this jacket but felt it fit large overall. Or maybe my workouts are paying off? Color was lovely drape was nice. Jacket I lined no stretch. Just a bit larger than I'd have preferred. Styled as shown.
The blazer is adorable-love the color and the tie. It runs a little large though.
It was a bit too big and long in the sleeves, will rent again though in a smaller size
I loved the fit and style of this jacket. It's longer so it was perfect with slim-fitting pants or skinny jeans.

I'm busty but petite, so I ordered a medium. As expected, the sleeves were too long on me, but I was able to comfortably close the jacket and it mostly covered my bust, enough to be professional with a little camisole underneath. It's very flattering. Love the color as well, true to the photos.
I'm generally a size 10 in clothes sometimes size 12. I ordered an XL to be safe and it fit great with some room to breathe. Love the color!
Nice for work but wish the accompanying pants didn't run so small

I was unsure about lavender, but I ended up really liking it. I opted not to do the matching pants since I'm not that bold and went with a navy instead. I thought it looked good and was still professional looking. I also wore a small lacy tank underneath for coverage. I thought this was a fun piece and flattering.

Rented the jacket and pants for work meetings and received SO many compliments throughout the day on the color and style. Jacket runs a little large but the side tie is very flattering and accents your waist perfectly. The pants are TTS (I wore a 6) but the waist is SUPER high and small!! I left them unbuttoned most of the day. Overall loved it and would definitely rent the jacket again..... maybe not the pants... but together they make a beautiful statement and are very memorable!!!
I love that it's a wrap blazer so really would work on any shape. It also is longer so works for long torsos like mine. Also perfect with the pants that go with it! No complaints.

I absolutely loved this blazer/jacket! The color was perfect and it was light and comfortable. I wore it to a conference and dinner after and received multiple compliments! I am 6ft with long arms and longer torso and it was a good fit. I still might go back and buy it :)
Wow, the color!!! This is perfect, but I have a small chest so it was a little loose on the top but a safety pin helped. So comfy and classy!

This top fit true to size and had the softest material that draped perfectly. You could button or unbutton the inside to allow for some flexibility. The pictured look wasn't the exact outfit I wore but I got so many compliments on the color and style of the blazer!

links_reviews_title: I wore this suit for my Masters graduation ceremony and got lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Pro: gorgeous color, fun style, nice high-rise pant, great for small-chested women Con: bulky shoulder pads, slightly short in the arms for tall women

This jacket is fantastic! The fabric is buttery soft and a little stretchy. It is a true wrap jacket that fits perfectly and stays put throughout the day. The color is so so beautiful and the length is perfect to wear with yoga pants, the matching pant set, jeans, biker shorts... Everything. I wore it without a shirt and it looked sexy and boss at the same time. You could layer it over a black turtleneck, a white T-shirt, a lace bralette... it's so versatile. I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Fits perfectly to the waist. The lilac color is a show stopper!
links_reviews_text: Loved the look with the fitting pants. Beautiful color and fit. The side tie sinched the waist in the perfect place!
Ordered the pant suit set - jacket was fabulous. Pants had a bizarre cut, but they complete the outfit.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and the look! Especially with the matching pants
links_reviews_text: Blazer fit perfectly!

I got so many compliments! The color is beyond beautiful! I felt so confident in this suit. I was nervous about the fit because I am very petite but it fit perfectly. I matched with a metallic body suit and heels.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments I felt so beautiful and the color was perfect 👌🏽
links_reviews_text: The jacket is super light weight but it's a bit awkward in the chest area. I only wore a bra underneath and I had to keep re adjusting so my chest wouldn't come out. I use double sided tape and that helped everything stay together.

links_reviews_title: A pop of color for spring!
links_reviews_text: The fit is very flattering and makes the waist seem very small. It is feminine and the color is gorgeous. I would recommend a black or white camisole underneath for coverage.
Fit is great !
I did not wear this because it looked ridiculous on me. The chest area was completely huge and sagging on me.
My fault, took a chance on this color and it didn't work for me. Additionally, the stylelooked a little more mature than I prefer.
The sleeves were a little too large, maybe in a taller person would fit better. But overall, I liked it!
Didn't love. Wore it with a black tank and dark plum pants. The material is so soft that it doesn't stand up and I felt messy.

links_reviews_title: Great for a more formal workday.
links_reviews_text: I really like this blazer - it's a show stopper. Everyone at work called me "sleek and fancy." The only downside of the blazer is you can't really wear it open so it's hard to incorporate into your wardrobe in multiple ways.
I ordered the XL because it was stated that is equivalent to a US Size 10. It's probably an equivalent to a US Size 14. It also has shoulder pads. Unfortunately, I had to send it back.
Ended up not wearing this. The shoulder pads kind of threw it off for me.

I really liked the feel of the material and the color of the blazer but it didn't hold up very well around the collar area. Looked more sloppy as the day went on. And although the area around the shoulder and chest fit well, the sleeves were tight and somewhat constricting. Ok for casual wear but because of the shape of the collar, looked appropriate for work.
In love, the side tie gives me so much life. I love the lavender color, the whole jacket is very feminine, but I feel structured and ready for work in this — Deff one of my fave rentals.
It ran to big, I should have read the reviews

links_reviews_title: This item was large on me and the color wasn't a vibrant lavender.
links_reviews_text: Cute, but probably need to size down 2 sizes. I am not sure that would have work. liked the model's photo but it didn't look like that at home. I'd skip.
This was huge in the shoulders I couldn't even wear it .

I wore this outfit as a suit and loved it! It's a beautiful color and really stood out but looked so classy for an afternoon church wedding. The jacket fit well. The pants fit a little odd (tight at the waist and very loose in the zipper) but the jacket covered the odd fitting part of the pants.
Highly recommend sizing down as it runs a little large. Otherwise, beautiful.
Wore out to birthday dinner. Warm and soft. Nothing wrong and everything right
This jacket was so soft people kept rubbing it like a teddy bear. The color was a subtly rich warm tone. The magnetic buttons were invisible. I sized down to a small and it was just perfect.
The color was just as pictured. It is not as thick as other furry jackets so it's pretty versatile. Wore it to work and then to a happy hour with friends!

I wore for three separate occasions and didn't realize until the last event that this coat has hidden snap buttons. It was icing on top of an already amazing cake. I would definitely rent this again, as I did not want to return it.
Fun. True to size. Trendy.

This was my first RTR experience, it was amazing. I was worried about freezing at a November wedding and this coat kept me so warm throughout the night. I got so many compliments! It's such a soft faux fur! Im a true XL and sized up so it would be a little bigger and it's definitely true to size. I could've worn a 1X instead of the 2X but was very grateful for the extra room. I just can't say how much I loved this experience and I can't wait to RTR again!!

links_reviews_title: This jacket upgraded several outfits–love it!
links_reviews_text: Fuzzy, comfy!
This was a pretty color and super soft and lightweight! It was pretty big, though, I was surprised at how much room I had wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Warm beautiful fur jacket but it's too big for me
links_reviews_text: I rented this in XS and it was so big I was drowning in this jacket. Fur is soft, made from good quality material and it's warm. I chose not wear it and returned it.
Just too big. Otherwise beautiful.
Received many compliments but wished I would have sizes down to XS. Was a little boxy and large but still wore it. Would rent again in the right size.
I returned this instead of buying it because apparently I was having a small stroke at the time. Don't make the same mistake!
Loved the color and was super warm. Perfect for a wedding. I almost bought it because it was also really cute with jeans for a high low look.
The fit was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Perfect jacket to throw over any holiday outfit!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, warm and soft! Such a good faux fur jacket
Perfect winter coat! Soft, comfortable, and true to size. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Warm and super cute! Definitely works for a party as well as for casual dress.
links_reviews_text: The medium on me was too big. It looked baggy at the shoulders but I wore it anyway. The pockets are shallow so you can't fit much in them. There are three really nice hidden snaps that closed the jacket up and were secure not flimsy. And so warm. Next time I would get the small. The color is a very subtle purple.

Despite the terrible quality image attached, this jacket was adorable! I wore it out in 50-degree weather and it was warm without being too warm. The fabric is SO soft and I loved the deep burgundy color. Got a lot of compliments, except my sister who told me I "looked like a pimp". Definitely more of a daring choice but I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous coat. It's such a great color
links_reviews_text: This is a very boxy fitting jacket. Definitely size down

The color of this jacket is hard to tell. In some light, it is sort of brown but then may look a little burgundy. It was fun to wear though! If layered, it will keep you warm as low as 40-45 degrees but that is pushing it. I kept wishing it had a collar. Next time I will rent one with a collar.
A bit bulky, but the color, warmth and overall style made up for it! Fun piece for a night out.

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater for everyday but showing wear and tear
links_reviews_text: Cute sweater for everyday. It cinches at the waist in a flattering way. Looks cute with jeans and pencil skirts. It is cotton, so though it is thick, it isn't super warm. Sleeves are meant to be pushed up. The sweater I received is starting to show some wear and tear but was still in good enough shape that I wore, it just doesn't look brand new.
Nice rich color, not too hot, and the buttons are a fun detail.

links_reviews_title: Feeling like a chic Mr. Rogers (and I love Mr. Rogers!)
links_reviews_text: Loved the button detail on this sweater! I went I size up than I normally would but it still felt very short and a little bulky. But I loved the color and design of the sweater overall. Very thick.
It was great to everyday - for a weekend out too. Super comfy and the slide buttons add a little something extra.

links_reviews_title: It was a nice green sweater. Good for fall
links_reviews_text: A little short for long torso girls.

Warm, cozy sweater. Love the collar & fits very nicely. Sleeves are shorter than in the pic - a little longer than 3/4 length, but doesn't reach my wrists. Still it looks great. Wore w/slacks to work. For ref. 138 lbs & 5'7".

I sized up to a Large because I have a 20 week baby bump. I loved how this sweater fit and is tailored at the neck with the beautiful collar details and at the waist. If I was not pregnant my true size would have been fine and because of the fit of the sweater it makes you look like you have shape vs. being boxy. I actually looked "thin" wearing this with my 20 week bump (not that that is my goal but was surprised at how well the sweater hits at the waist). The gold accent buttons are classy but not gaudy. Loved this sweater.
Loved this jacket so much I held onto it for weeks! I hated returning it.

links_reviews_title: Not super tailored, but still nice
links_reviews_text: I have a small waist I like to accentuate to deflect from my long torso and although this fit alright, it wasn't tapered enough at the waist to my liking. I didn't wear to layer since I live in so cal, but it's warm and cozy.

links_reviews_title: Dear Santa, I want this jacket
links_reviews_text: Perfect day to night jacket! I easily transitioned this piece from converse and jeans to date night and heels. I'm a 14/16 in RTR and the XL was just a smidge small on me, but that wasn't a big deal.

This jacket was so amazing and such high quality. The fit was great and the leather was so soft and nice! I would definitely rent it again in the future if not buy it for myself. Definitely is a bit cropped though, but I prefer it that way so it was exactly what I wanted.
Best leather jacket I've ever tried on. The leather feels luxurious and the weight is pretty light too. Can be dressed up or down. Took this baby with me to a conference!

Fit was perfect and true to size. I wear a 2/4 and the small was just right. Leather was beautiful and in great condition. Dry cleaning smell was fairly strong but not enough for anyone to notice at the parties I attended. Looked equally great with dress and jeans. Highly recommend!
I wished I could keep this! It fit perfectly. Rent it!
This is the longest piece I've kept on my unlimited account. It's so comfortable- the leather is soft and the sleeves are the perfect length for my long arms. Wish I could afford to keep this one!!

This fit quite snug in the arms and the waist when zipped up (was a bit of a struggle to get it zipped at all). Couldn't fit much more than a t-shirt under. But that said, it was so soft and buttery and easy to throw on with everything - would definitely rent again in the spring and fall when this can be an outer later.

This leather is like butter and the cut of the jacket is just right. Paired it with a sheath dress and heels for a work look and then paired with a soft tee and distressed jeans for a weekend outing. Want to hang on to this one for a long time!
Great streamlined style for a leather jacket. . Fabric under arms makes the style less bulky than most leather jackets. Good quality. Classic staple that I would buy if it wasn't hundreds of dollars.

links_reviews_title: Perfect jacket for everyday or night out
links_reviews_text: This jacket fit me flawlessly. The stretchy fabric in the arms makes it form fitting without feeling restricted. It is a little cropped which is perfect for me with a short torso.

I rented this for a bachelorette celebration. Absolutely IN LOVE. Wish I could own this. It's the perfect length to pair with a dress or cute top. The under part of the arms are stretchy too for maximum mobility. Beautiful piece.

This jacket arrived brand new and is absolutely beautiful. The leather is so soft and lightweight. The sleeves are a little snug so I need to wear it with a sleeveless shirt or thin shirt underneath - and the sleeves are also a bit long for me but that is a common problem for me. I love this and plan to wear it a bunch before sending it back.
I rented this for a February trip to Vegas and it was perfect for daytime, nighttime, and everything in between. The leather is super soft and I'd love to own this piece someday!

Gorgeous jacket, really well made. Wore it 5+ times. I'm normally a 10-12 in tops and the large was a little snug. I couldn't really zipper it and be comfortable but it still looked good left open. Wish I could afford to buy it!

links_reviews_title: loved this jacket, comfortable and goes with everything
links_reviews_text: fits well

links_reviews_title: Pairs nicely with a dress... easy to dress up or down.
links_reviews_text: Buttery-soft leather that was comfortable to wear all day.

links_reviews_title: So comfortable, while stylish enough to dress up or wear with jeans.
links_reviews_text: The knit inserts are what makes this jacket so comfortable. I wish I'd bought it!

links_reviews_title: Love it. Wore it multiple times
links_reviews_text: Great fit
strong dry cleaning smell

links_reviews_title: The PERFECT soft leather jacket with great details.
links_reviews_text: I would consider buying this. The stretch panels on the arms makes it fit like a dream. I'm short-waisted, and it comes to exactly the right place on me. Buttery soft. Really the perfect leather jacket. I will wear it multiple times in my unlimited rental and might buy it.
flexible and warm

links_reviews_title: This jacket was a great item for my vacation in Europe over a winter break.
links_reviews_text: It is true to size, but if you don't like shorter jackets order a size up. I loved this jacket and it kept me warm while being stylish. I might have to buy this!!!

links_reviews_title: Love it. Having trouble sending it back.
links_reviews_text: Comfy, warm, sexy
Comfortable and fits like a glove! Wish I could keep it! Perfect leather jacket :)

links_reviews_title: It was perfect over the black jumpsuit I rented.
links_reviews_text: It fit beautifully. So, soft. I would rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Loved this jacket! Super flattering and oh so soft!
links_reviews_text: I wore this jacket for date night and LOVED the fit. I usually wear XS and that is what I ordered -it fit like perfection! It was very flattering and super soft! I will definitely rent again!
super cute jacket, good qulaity and i liked that it was not to boxy
I would rent it again!

links_reviews_title: perfect for over a summer dress moving into fall and adding this with boots.
links_reviews_text: The bottom of the arms is fabric which allows for some give even though it ran exactly my size which means you aren't wearing much underneath it when worn.

Rented this to go over a black cocktail dress for a wedding and it was absolutely perfect. The collarless neckline and smooth leather make this leather jacket much easier to dress up compared to other leather bombers. This jacket could be dressed up or down and makes any look more polished! Fit true to size and I loved that the front could be worn overlapping for more coverage or bent outward
Easy to wear with cloth panels under arm
I loved this jacket! It instantly made every outfit feel chic and put-together. It was hard for me to decide to send it back and not keep it, but the price tag was just too steep.
This was cute the arms were a bit long. The arms had a lot of stretch of you have bigger biceps.
It was too small for me but a gorgeous jacket
Excellent fit

links_reviews_title: The perfect leather jacket for spring!
links_reviews_text: I have had this item for almost two months with unlimited and I just haven't been able to bring myself to send it back! I wear it all the time! The leather is so supple and the knit panel in the arms gives you full range of motion, which is hard to find if you have muscular arms like I do. This jacket is definitely somewhat cropped and is a little awkward when zipped. It isn't a particularly warm jacket though, so I have almost never felt the need to zip it up anyways. If it were less expensive, I probably would have just bought it!

links_reviews_title: This jacket was awesome! I didn't want to send it back.
links_reviews_text: This jacket was perfect. It fit great and could be dressed up or down. I was sad to return it.

links_reviews_title: Everything bout this jacket is amazing. The fit and quality of the leather is top quality.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful soft leather.
I loved this green shimmery dress! The gathers at the waist and the long sleeves made it so flattering and comfortable. I got a bunch of compliments on this one.
This is a beautiful dress but a bit heavy and dowdy for a baby shower brunch. My fault, I did not make the best choice. This dress is perfect for a cooler day or holiday. Looks great with boots.

I loved this dress! Great quality, fit true to size, and super comfortable because it has a good amount of stretch. It's definitely more sparkly than the photos let on but I loved it for a holiday party.
Perfect dress for baptism of my niece.....dress has a slight sparkle that runs through it
Rented this for work and didn't realize it was a sparkly metallic fabric. Really great style and design, and nice color for the holidays. Didn't wear it, but would rent again.

links_reviews_title: I did not end up wearing as was much more sparkly than expected.

links_reviews_text: Fits great, however I didn't realize it was shimmery and too extra for work. Never wore to work.

links_reviews_title: This dress is very sparkly. I didn't realize this when I picked it. It is not appropriate for work.
links_reviews_text: It's a pretty dress, but very sparkly which isn't apparent in the photos. It is a nice party dress, but not work appropriate.
I didn't realize it was metallic (I guess I don't read). It was subtle, but not appropriate for my work environment.

Pictures don't show how sparkly this dress is. It's great for a Christmas party (comfy and not too form fitting while still being flattering). I won't rent again for work, but definitely would if I was hosting a holiday party.

I didn't realize this dress was sparkly when I rented it. It's perfect for a work holiday party but a bit too sparkly for my 9-5 everyday office attire. Dress fit like a dream though. Material is stretchy and comfortable.

I absolutely loved this dress! It was super easy to wear and you could dress it up a lot more or keep it simple for a bit more casual look. The pictures don't show it well but there is a glitter in the dress so it's very festive for the holiday season. The dress is very flattering!! I have curves and a tummy and I felt amazing in the dress!! Highly recommend for the holiday season!!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous and comfortable for chilly, formal events!
links_reviews_text: Rented this to wear on the dressier evenings on a cruise Thanksgiving week. It was fun a festive with the shimmery fabric but oh so comfortable. Was a great alternative to a sequin mini dress! Will definitely rent again in this gorgeous green or the grey option.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for the fall. Not too heavy or light. Loved the boatneck and uneven hem.
links_reviews_text: Has a silver shimmer that isn't easily seen in the photos
Beautiful dress that fit really nicely but it was wayyyy too sparkly for early November attire. I didn't wear it this time around but I will rent it again closer to the December holiday season.
Snug and stretchy yet modest. No cleavage, covers legs, doesn't cling too much on the hips. Got lots of compliments on color, sparkle, fit. I will probably rent again.
Rented this dress thinking it was a gray casual thing for work. Nope. It's green, and solid glitter. Ended up not wearing at all, as it's def more cocktail (albeit dowdy cocktail) than office.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color with lots of gold shimmer
links_reviews_text: The rouching highlights a tiny waist (or creates one) and the dress is incredibly flattering on the stomach. The dress is a little itchy in the arms where it isn't lined and the fabric is thicker, less nice than I expected but I'm still wearing it several time due to the pretty cut.

links_reviews_title: My 20 year old daughter loved it
links_reviews_text: Just tried it on (first RTR pick) and it's a winner. I was worried about the sparkles but it's subtle. SUPER comfortable, easy fit, the gathers down the torso are terrific and I love the swingy skirt and interesting hemline. Planning to wear this to at least 3 upcoming work events (with non-overlapping attendees, luckily).
Got lots of compliments and loved the color but it felt very thick and too warm for the spring weather. Will rent again when it's colder if it is still available then.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for work or on the go!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly and I love the turtleneck scarf detail!

Loved this sweater which looks great with jeans and a belt or even tucked into a shirt. It's got a sophisticated 1960s look and a nice pop of color. The only downside is in pictures you should be conscious of styling the two pieces that wrap or it won't look right
Love the color & chic design. Definitely cropped, high waisted pants are a must. It also kept me very warm!
I've rented this sweater probably 10 times now and always come close to buying. It's super warm and not itchy at all, and the color makes it so nice for winter in NYC when everything is sad and grey.
Loved the soft fabric. Kept me warm without the itch. The collar is very cool take on a turtle neck and I look forward to styling it a few different ways.
Very fun color and interesting detail at the neck. I got many compliments at work! The arms are roomy and comfortable, a must rent!

This sweater is everything. The neckline with the little scarf is the most unique thing I've seen in a while and can be styled different ways depending on your creativity to create subtly different looks. The color is super on trend and lands right between neon and pastel which is quite amazing. The fabric is super soft and there's no itchiness like some high neck sweaters have sometimes. And the sleeves, oh the sleeves. My absolutely favorite part. They're big and voluminous without looking crazy and totally add to the structural appeal of this sweater. The hemline is a high-low one perfect for french tucking it into high waisted bottoms. I dressed it up for work with heels and black cigarette pants with stilettos and down with LITERALLY gray joggers and fila disruptors. Both looked incredibly cool. It's THAT versatile. Get it now!

Sleeve length was great! Not too long for my relatively short arms. Fun color, and the bow detail was nice IRL. Hi-low hem is fairly cropped in the front but still long enough I could wear with high waisted jeans and not show my midriff. A tiny bit pilled but generally in good condition

links_reviews_title: Perfect spring top. Bright and warm.
links_reviews_text: It fits loose and is intended to. I liked pushing up the sleeves. I feel like the length was slightly shorter than average, but was perfect with mid rise pants. I was happy to wear this to an early spring party. It was bright and cheerful for spring but warm enough for cold weather.
The sweater is super soft! It's not tacky at all, which can easily happen with the lime green color.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on the color!!
links_reviews_text: It was a little boxy, but it was amazingly comfortable, great fabric, perfect for work, and the color got compliments all day long. Would recommend it!
So many compliments. I felt like a million bucks! Couldn't love this sweater more.
It was such a pretty sweater and lovely bright color, but I got very annoyed by the neck. Not great for wearing all day long and slightly shorter than anticipated.

If you have a long torso, this sweater will be very cropped, as seen in the picture. The material is great and got a lot of complements on the unique neckline as being very "Jackie O". Wore for St Paddy's day.
Beautiful sweater, loved how different the cut was. It came pretty worn with fuzzys all over, but loved it regardless. Wouldn't rent again only due to the wear.
Very comfortable sweater. Much greener in person than it is in the pictures though!
The length was a little short but it goes well with high waisted pants. Beautiful color and material quality was good! I got lots of compliments
I'm not in the market for new clothes...but I really loved this sweater. Compliments all around. Amazing color. Very comfortable .
This was just okay for me. Very soft, brighter color than I expected. The cut was a bit too boxy and cropped in front for me.

links_reviews_title: Super mod with the tie collar
links_reviews_text: Sweater was a bit more cropped than shown, but fine with high waisted pants (so long as you don't raise your arms too much). I wore this quite a few times, and would have even more if I wouldn't be seeing the same people! Got tons of compliments on it. Will definitely rent again.
I was trying a new style and it just didnt work for me. The color is beautiful. The neckline wasn't my style. Plus, it was shorter in length than expected.
I got so many compliments! It looked so great, I would've bought it if I could. The scarf is a little tricky, but I recommend tying it to the side so it stays in place.

links_reviews_title: Got compliments on color, unique scarf detail.
links_reviews_text: 5'2", 125lbs, curvy/petite 32C. Fit like a normal size sweater. Would compare to a size small in sweaters
It was super comfy but the neck tie thing was very confusing and odd. It wouldn't stay in place of how the model wore it.

links_reviews_title: Pretty sweater but very tiny/ Cropped and snug,
links_reviews_text: Lovely green sweater but very small.
Got so many compliments at work and a st Patrick's day party. Loved the color and collar. Highly recommend
The fit is so great but the things that makes this piece stand out is the color. I got so many compliments today on just the color alone.

links_reviews_title: I received tons of compliments when I wore this sweater - I would rent it again
links_reviews_text: The fit is boxy, modern and stylish. Could be worn casually with jeans or dressed up for work with high waisted black pants and heels.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful mint green that garners conpliments
links_reviews_text: People love this color green. I got compliments from both men and women on this sweater. It is definitely for cold weather, as it surprisingly warm. Also it's a bit cropped in the front so you have to wear high waisted pants with it. Very comfortable and not itchy.

This is a luxurious, well designed sweater. The material is great, the color a perfect pastley green and it's just trendy enough to be interesting but not odd. This type of sweater will never go out of style.
Sweater was too much of a cropped for me but it was cute!
Great fit! Lots of compliments!
Nice detail, but it was not flattering.

links_reviews_title: Not what I expected with the fit. Too baggy with no shape
links_reviews_text: The ties were just a hassle and didn't make sense.
Loved this, just wish it was not so cropped in front but I added a tank and it worked. Great color.

links_reviews_title: This sweater made me feel springy in the middle of winter!!
links_reviews_text: I loved the color! I loved the softness! I loved the cool neck; very sophisticated. Just didn't like that it was cropped.
This sweater is slightly shorter in the front which was perfect for my jeans with exposed button fly. It’s not too cropped or itchy. I wore it on Christmas and everyone loved it!
it's pure fashion! wear it and get compliments!

Loose fit, comfortable, very warm, stylish. When I first put it on I was worried it would be "too much fashion", but I loved the look with flats and skinny jeans and received quite a few compliments. This top is exactly why I love RtR: I would never buy a mint green jumper with a built in scarf, but turns out it's fabulous and fun.
Loved this look, so chic I wore it to work and felt so luxurious! Fit is loose sleeves were a bit big but I rolled them to my elbows and I loved it!
A Fun one to dress up and down.
The draping was really nice and I just love the poofed shoulders. It's like a nice navy work blazer but a little bit extra. The sleeves are formfitting and wouldn't allow for much underneath.

This jacket is cute, typical-good quality material, but runs slightly large. I typically wear an XS and it was just a little too big for me. I could pull it off but half a size smaller or even a full size smaller would be a better fit and look more professional.
Really high quality. Looks classy.

Loved the wide shoulder and puff detail. Trendy elements yet feels Chico and sophisticated. Should've sized down 2 sizes. I'm typically between a 4-6 and prefer a more fitted blazer to up the elegance factor and the 4 I rented had a lot of extra room in arms and body. Still looked flattering but a 2 would've been perfect. Will rent again

links_reviews_title: Super stylish for every day or to dress up or down.
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit. This piece went with many things in my closet and for many different occasions- every day or for a causal dinner.
Nice cut and fabric. But it's a little casual for my taste. Looks great with jeans. I felt very pretty on it. The broad shoulders look is nice
Loved the fabric, look and style. I will reorder in a smaller size as this fabulous blazer runs at least one full size large. I am a true size 4 and this 4 felt like a large 6 or small 8.

links_reviews_title: Great basic with a little flair!
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about the jacket. I have a 34 DDD chest and the Small fit me well. I am small framed with small ribcage but, packing about 20 extra pounds so, I feel this is probably a generous cut.
Love this really cute great for work
Unfortunately this didn't work for me. Shoulders were boxy and too large. It felt a bit like a pirate coat. Not for me

links_reviews_title: Beautiful neckline, large and padded shoulders, not too fitted. Great material.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful neckline, large and padded shoulders, not too fitted. Great material. Returning.
Love the style, however does run a little loose. Love the ruching on the sleeves, but could have sized down. For reference I got a 2 and am normally a 2, size 26 pant.

links_reviews_title: Runs big and button was missing
links_reviews_text: Light weight, can be worn for work a night out. Will rent the smaller size so I can wear it
I did f like the style felt a little clownish on my small gram but my fault for choosing. Others might love as very trendy look
great fit

links_reviews_title: Compliments from the fashionable ladies in my office
links_reviews_text: Very 80s style jacket, fit on my shoulders was perfect and it drapes nicely. Good length for me. The lapels were not pressed when it arrived, so I steamed them into the right position and they held that position all day.

links_reviews_title: Cute and stylish but sleeves too long
links_reviews_text: I love the 80s look of this jacket with the puffy sleeves and shoulder pads. It gives a little flare to a boring black jacket. The material is an all season crepe like material and good quality. I am normally a 12 and it fit true to size. I only had two complaints. First I'm petite and the sleeves were very long on me. I tried rolling them up but they would not stay. I tried pushing them up but they were not quite tight enough. The other was the button. There's just one but it's almost as if the hole is not wide enough and I kept struggled to get it in and out. For long term wear I could see myself accidentally pulling off the button. I would enlarge the hole slightly if I owned it.

links_reviews_title: Not for school, but definitely teaches your date to be late for your 7:00 dinner reservation!
links_reviews_text: Runs a touch small, but with thick tights I felt appropriate for date night. Soft leather and classic circle cut makes for a great garment. Lining does run a tad long, but it was t too noticeable with dark opaque tights.

After reading the reviews I was afraid it was going to be tiny, but to me it felt true to size if not a little bigger. I did feel like it stretched out while sitting which is more obvious by the length and flare in the standing photo (I know, circle skirt, but still). I have bigger legs and butt so this allowed me to get the mini skirt feel without the pulling in the butt, thighs, and gap in the waist. Perfect for a night out almost anywhere. Definitely purchasing.

I have a 26 inch waist, and the small fit perfectly. I prefer skirts to sit high up on the waist, and this one did just that. It's made of super soft and supple leather and was a great skirt to wear out at night. The only negative would be that it does wrinkle easily-- I packed it on a trip and had to lay it out for a day to give it time to unwrinkle. This isn't a look I would normally go for, but so glad I did.
Cute with a crop top
The skirt is a bit narrow in the waist so I wore it right above my belly button. It was a bit short but I wasn't worried about my backside being exposed. I would rent again.
This skirt runs very small and is very short. Also the lining showed below the skirt. Other than those two things I would have liked it and probably worn it.
I loved this skirt! The fit was amazing and flattering. The leather was super soft and buttery! The zipper detail in the back made it a little edgy. Perfect for a night out!

I would have to totally disagree with the other reviews and say this fits very true to size. I'm usually a size 6, occasionally a size 4. I got the medium despite everyone saying to size up and it fits absolutely perfectly. The length is cute, not too short, not too long. It sits comfortably right below my belly button. The leather is beautiful and so soft. I cannot wait to wear this. It's the perfect fall skirt.

links_reviews_title: It made me feel so large!
links_reviews_text: I can't begin to express my disappointment in this skirt. Two stars for the beautiful, buttery leather, but minus three for fit. I'm a solid 12 or large. Sometimes if something runs small I'll size up to a 14 or XL. Just to be on the safe side I sized up to XXL. That just wasn't enough. I had to shimmy my way into the skirt and suck everything way in while praying to the fashion gods to get it to zip. I succeeded, but I did not think it looked so great. I was going to take this on a business trip, but clearly this isn't going to work out. For reference, the lay flat measurement of the waist on this skirt for the XXL is 15.5".

The reviews I'd seen made me think I needed to size up so I gave the medium a try. It definitely didn't look too big and the length was good for me, I wanted it to sit higher on my waist which would have required me to get my normal size small. I typically wear 26 waist bottoms so I think sizing depends on wear you want it to sit on you. Will see if I can wear the M again but would love to give the S a try!
That doesn't mean this can't be worn by hourglasses, but size up and anticipate it riding lower on your waist. The leather itself is incredibly soft and worth sacrificing the high-waist look for.

links_reviews_title: I sized up and it was way too big. Disappointing.
links_reviews_text: I sized up from my usual and it was huge. I'm 5'2 and it was too long. I'm guessing a medium would have been perfect.
I really like this leather skirt. The length is good and looks cute with a pair of tights and boots in the winter. I would keep it if it weren't still rather expensive.
This was waaAaaay too small, I usually wear a size 12 and the xxl was too small and short

Very small and short. Ended up not wearing this because it was so short. The lining also showed (which may be because of how tight it was, so maybe not an issue if it fits you). Would recommend sizing up.
The skirt is a great quality and a beautiful look, but it was not flattering with my hourglass shape. It also looks like a micro mini if you are taller or have long legs.

links_reviews_title: Good quality but runs really small
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear as it was too small, but definitely good quality and would rent again in a bigger size.
Very classy and fun!
This leather skirt is soft and comfortable. I wore this for a night out. Might be a little long for someone less than 5' 6". I ordered a size up based on reviews and was glad I did.

I originally ordered a medium and lucked out and received a new skirt with tags. The leather is soft, but the waist was too big. So I ordered a size small. It was a totally different skirt (different zippers and placement, seemed old and worn out, and it was ridiculously small). I ended up buying the new skirt in a size medium and had it altered. Worth the trial and error. Beautiful!

I got this skirt in red and the reviews said to size up so I did - and was happy I did. I got an XL even though I'm usually 6-8. So I got the XL in the black version, which was a big mistake. Definitely needed the M. Not sure why the sizing is so off when it's the exact same skirt but different colors!

I loved this skirt because it's the perfect length and material to wear without having to worry about wind! I felt comfortable and confident walking around. The only issue I had was that the lining underneath kept poking out, it seems to be longer than the skirt itself.

links_reviews_title: Reviews said to size up so I did and it was way too big! !
links_reviews_text: This runs very true to size. It is supposed to be high waisted and the quality is amazing. Definitely would want this in my actual size so I could wear it.

I love this skirt. It is super versatile to dress up or down. I wore it was a casual, lower cut army green shirt tucked in and received a ton of compliments. It is a high waisted skirt and falls mid-thigh, and was quite comfortable and surprisingly not hot for the material. Wanted to buy it. It does run a little small (like a teeny-tiny bit).

links_reviews_title: this skirt looked great for work with a blouse, the fit was definitely suited for work.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, not too tight
I've rented this skirt before and it is great - but the zipper on it was broken this time! :(

I am 5'1, 115lbs, 47 years old, in a conservative industry, a 2. After reading reviews I rented a medium, figuring it might sit loose/low on the waist. That was a correct hypothesis. With opaque tights it was decent, barely, for work. I think my problem with this skirt is that it's a cross between a circle and an a-line, which is a little risque at this length -- I really a black leather skirt like this to be a cross between an a-line and a pencil, more conservative, with less flare at the mid thigh length.
This runs very tiny and is short. Would not recommend if you are over 5'7! Otherwise size up.
Great skirt and loved how soft the leather is. I rented an xl and could barely wear it. And I am a 8/10 usually
I rented this thinking it would be cute to wear to the office with tights...however, when I tried it on, it was very short.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering cut, perfectly paired with over the knee boots.
links_reviews_text: It is a tad short. Would ride up when I sat down. Would wear with tights next time
Barely got my butt in this one, was way too tight and short to actually wear.

links_reviews_title: Really cute! Perfect for a night out! Love the leather!
links_reviews_text: Super cute skirt! I followed the advice of other reviews and sized up! Fit perfectly! Just a little short for us long-legged girls!
The skirt is fun and good for casual but it looks a bit cheap. I normally am a size six and ordered a large. It was big on me but I kept it and wore it once and returned.
It's a little snug through the waist compared to other brands, but a quality item.
The quality of the skirt is very high-- well made, buttery leather. Looks expensive. The fit is on trend-- very short and with a high waist. For me, the fit was true to size.

I wear an 8-10 or M/L in pants and skirts, but I got the XL here and couldn't zip it up all the way. Even if I had, it's so short that I don't think it would have been appropriate for every day or wear to work
Fit well flattering

I really loved the look and super soft feel of this skirt. I am usually a 6/8 and rented a L, and it was still a bit snug in the waist and a litrle short for my liking, so I didn't end up wearing it. This look great on a shorter girl, though. Super cute and high quality!
Order at least 2 sizes up
Comfortable and nice to wear in hot weather. Loved the length of the dress as well. I picked a size larger than what I usually where, and still think it fits great.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for an outdoor lunch.
links_reviews_text: SO easy to wear!
Loved this dress! Bright colors and flowy, perfect for a vacation in Mexico. I didn't purchase but I would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress to wear out and about
links_reviews_text: Think it ran TTS. I would normally wear a Small but I rented the Medium because I am not back to my baby weight. I wish the straps were a little more adjustable.

links_reviews_title: Backup dress for my baby shower was perfect for a broadway show!
links_reviews_text: Loved the flow and ease. Wish I could have purchased it! Wore flats and in 5’4
Such a beautiful print and 100% cotton is such a plus - so comfortable and perfect for the summer heat. I absolutely love the colors
I've rented this twice and it's adorable but runs very long! I am 5'8 and was still tripping over it
Fit is flowy so perfect for a chill day where you do not want to feel constricted. Print is very cute and length is to the floor ( I'm 5'10) You can easily dress this up or down.

This dress is fun to wear! It is lined. Fabric feels high quality. Shabby chic and hippie dippy at same time. I probably could have gotten a small but happy with the medium. I would buy if not so much money.
Colorful and flowy. Perfect for summer!

links_reviews_title: Dinner with family members I hadn't seen in a long time.
links_reviews_text: This dress is cute in theory, and it has a goddess, boho vibe when you put it on. However, I'm 5'5" and wore high heeled sandals with this dress, and was stepping on the back of it all night. I wore it to dinner with family members, and while it is a casual dress, and we were at a casual place, I felt like a farmer all night and underdressed.
The print and colors are very pretty, and it's a good cotton fabric...I also loved that it had pockets and a very flowy feel. Great summertime or resort style.
This is flowy and comfortable. Perfect for summer. If you like fitted items this isn't for you, but I loved it.

Cannot recommend enough! One of those everyday dresses that makes you happy to put on and pairs great with a denim jacket. I will say, I'm 5'7" and it was on the verge of being too long to wear with sandals.
Pretty summer dress for everyday!

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable, tons of compliments.... slightly house on the prairie.
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable, tons of compliments.... slightly house on the prairie. Wore this dress in Jackson Hole, WY, it was perfect for the occasion. Loved the pink! Not too long to wear with flats and I'm 5'5". Would rent again :)
Love the print. Wore on beach vacation during 3rd trimester and the XS fit. Would rent again.
Wore it to work and then wore it to a girls dinner and had so many compliments!!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! It fit nice, but was very long.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'2" and I walked on this dress. The length didn't bother me! I just held it up. Otherwise I wore the dress several time with the same comfort every time!

cute and comfortable. the straps were adjustable which made it easy to fit and it has pockets!!! usually a small. small fit nicely. length was good for me... just barely brushed the ground in flat sandals (i'm 5'4")
I'm 5'5" and it was long enough that I had to wear a slight heel to keep it off the ground even with the straps tightened as far up as possible. Super comfortable though!

links_reviews_title: It was a great dress. Lightweight and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: This dress was so pretty. If you are short though, this might not be the dress for you! Very long!
This dress is really pretty and well made but SUPER long. I'm 5'7 and this dragged on the floor. Would be great for a taller person or worn with heels.

links_reviews_title: I felt like I was floating
links_reviews_text: This dress has two light layers and loads of fabric. It does run big. I should have ordered the xs. I am 5'8" and it was long on me. I considered espadrilles but really wanted to be casual so opted for a blush leather slide. The straps are adjustable which helped. It was so pretty and light. It's everything that you think it will be and a little bit more.
I'm a 4 and rented an xs and it was still massive
